GSP33brssgo1u:4: yamiha kāruṇikaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato 'pyarisahodara āpa mahatpadam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6: śrīgauryā sakalārthadaṃ nijapadāmbhojena muktipradaṃ prauḍhaṃ vighnavanaṃ harantamanaghaṃ śrīḍhuṇḍhituṇḍāsinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:12: śrīśaṅkaraṃ bhāṣyakṛtaṃ praṇamya vyāsaṃ hariṃ sūtrakṛtaṃ ca vacmi /
GSP33brssgo1u:17: iti śramo me saphalo gaṅgāṃ rathyodakaṃ yathā //7 //
GSP33brssgo1u:25: tatrāthābda ānantaryārthaḥ parigṛhyate nādhikārārthaḥ, brahmajijñāsāyāḥ anadhikāryatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:29: sati cānantaryārthatve yathā dharmajijñāsā pūrvavṛttaṃ vedādhyayanaṃ niyamenāpekṣata evaṃ brahmajijñāsāpi yatpūrvavṛttaṃ niyamenāpekṣate tadvaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:40: bhavyaśca dharmo jijñāsyo na jñānakāle 'sti, puruṣavyāpāratantratvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:41: iha tu bhūtaṃ brahma jijñāsyaṃ nityatvānna puruṣavyāpāratantram /
GSP33brssgo1u:43: yā hi codanā dharmasya lakṣaṇaṃ sā svaviṣaye niyuñjānaiva puruṣamavabodhayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:48: ucyate- nityānityavastuvivekaḥ, ihāmutrārthabhogavirāgaḥ, śamadamādisādhanasaṃpat, mumukṣutvaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:49: teṣu hi satsu prāgapi dharmajijñāsāyā ūrdhvaṃ ca śakyate brahmajijñāsituṃ jñātuṃ ca na viparyaye /
GSP33brssgo1u:52: yasmādveda evāgnihotrādīnāṃ śreyaḥsādhanānāmanityaphalatāṃ darśayati- 'tadyatheha karmacito lokaḥ kṣīyata evamevāmutra puṇyacito lokaḥ kṣīyate' (chāndo.8.1.6) ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:53: tathā brahmavijñānādapi paraṃ puruṣārthaṃ darśayati- 'brahmavidāpnoti param' ityādiḥ (taitti.2.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:58: brahmaṇa iti karmaṇiṣaṣṭhī na śeṣe, jijñāsāpekṣyatvājjijñāsāyāḥ, jijñāsyāntarānirdeśācca /
GSP33brssgo1u:59: nanu śeṣaṣaṣṭhīparigrahe 'pi brahmaṇo jijñāsākarmatvaṃ na virudhyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:61: evamapi pratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇaḥ karmatvamutsṛjya sāmānyadvāreṇa parokṣaṃ karmatvaṃ kalpayato vyartha prayāsaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:66: tasminpradhāne jijñāsākarmaṇi parigṛhīte yairjijñāsitairvinā brahma jijñāsitaṃ na bhavati tānyarthākṣiptānyeveti na pṛthaksūtrayitavyāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:67: yathā rājāsau gacchatītyukte saparivārasya rājño gamanamuktaṃ bhavati tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:69: 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante' (taitti.3.1) ityādyāḥ śrutayaḥ, 'tadvijijñāsasva tadbrahma'
GSP33brssgo1u:82: ucyate- asti tāvadbrahma nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvaṃ, sarvajñaṃ, sarvaśaktisamanvitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:83: brahmaśabdasya hi vyutpādyamānasya nityaśuddhatvādayor'thāḥ pratīyante, bṛhaterdhātorarthānugamāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:86: yadi hi nātmāstitvaprasiddhiḥ syāt sarvo loko nāhamasmīti pratīyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:88: yadi tarhi loke brahmātmatvena prasiddhamasti tato jñātamevetyajijñāsyatvaṃ punarāpannam /
GSP33brssgo1u:91: dehamātraṃ caitanyaviśiṣṭamātmeti prakṛtā janā laukāyatikāśca pratipannāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:98: asti tadvyatirikta īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvāktiriti kecit /
GSP33brssgo1u:105: adhikaraṇamiti- viṣayaḥ saṃdehaḥ saṃgatiḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ siddhānta ityekaikamadhikaraṇaṃ pañcāvayavaṃ jñeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:107: brahmaṇo hi nivṛttāvaraṇatvena phalarūpatvaṃ tajjñānopayogitayā caturthisamāsa eṣitavyaḥ 'caturthī tadarthe' ityādineti kecit /
GSP33brssgo1u:121: vaidikānāṃ purāṇādiprādhānyaṃ vā nirasyata iti vastugatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:122: tatra kaścidiha janmani janmāntare vānuṣṭitayajñādibhirnitāntavimalasvānto 'sya śravaṇavidheḥ ko viṣayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:126: taṃ jijñāsumupalabhamāno bhagavānbādarāyaṇastadanubandhacatuṣṭayaṃ śravaṇātmakaśāstrārambhaprayojakaṃ nyāyena nirṇetumidaṃ sūtraṃ racayāñcakāra 'athāto brahmajijñāsā'iti //
GSP33brssgo1u:128_0: tathāhi-'tadyatheha karmacito lokaḥ kṣīyata evamevāmutra puṇyacito lokaḥ kṣīyate'iti
GSP33brssgo1u:128_1: śrutyā 'yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ'iti nyāyavatyā 'na jāyate mṛyate vā vipaścit''yo vai
GSP33brssgo1u:128_2: bhūmā tadamṛtamato 'nyadārtam'ityādi śrutyā ca bhūmātmā nityastato 'nyadanityamajñānasvarūpamiti viveko labhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:129: karmaṇā kṛṣyādinā citaḥ saṃpāditaḥ sasyādilokaḥ-bhogya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:131: 'parīkṣya lokānkarmacitānbrāhmaṇo nirvedamāyānnāstyakṛtaḥ kṛtena''ātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati'ityādiśrutyānātmamātre dehendriyādisakalapadārthajāte vairāgyaṃ labhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:133: akṛto mokṣaḥ kṛtena karmaṇā nāstīti karmatatphalebhyo vairāgyaṃ prāpnuyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:134: 'śānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ samāhitaḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet'iti śrutyā śamādiṣaṭkaṃ labhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:137: 'na sa punarāvartate'iti svayañjyotirānandātmakamokṣasya nityatvaśrutyā mumukṣā labhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:140: tathā 'śrotavyaḥ'ityatra pratyayārthasya niyogasya prakṛtyartho vicāro viṣayaḥ vicārasya vedāntā viṣaya iti śakyaṃ jñātum,
GSP33brssgo1u:142: na hi vicāraḥ sākṣāddarśanahetuḥ, apramāṇatvāt, api tu pramāṇaviṣayatvena /
GSP33brssgo1u:146: vedāntānāṃ ca pratyagbrahmaikyaṃ viṣayaḥ, 'tattvamasi', 'ahaṃ brahmāsmi'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:154: tāsāmadhikāryādiśrutīnāṃ svārthe tātparyanirṇāyakanyāyasūtrābhāve kiṃ vivekādiviśeṣaṇavānadhikārī utānyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:161: yeṣāṃ mate śravaṇe vidhirnāsti teṣāmavihitaśravaṇe 'dhikāryādinirṇayānapekṣaṇātsūtraṃ vyarthamityāpatatītyalaṃ prasaṅgena //
GSP33brssgo1u:165: 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi'ityādiśrutīnāṃ sarvātmatvādispaṣṭabrahmaliḍgānāṃ viṣayādau samanvayokteḥ pādasaṃgatiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:170: tatra prathamapādasya spaṣṭabrahmaliḍgānāṃ śrutīnāṃ samanvayaḥ prameyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:176: tatra nāhaṃ brahmeti bhedagrāhipratyakṣeṇa kartṛtvākartṛtvādiviruddhadharmavattvaliḍgakānumānena ca virodhena brahmātmanoraikyasya viṣayasyāsaṃbhavāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:182: tathā ca brahmajñānāya vicāraḥ kartavya iti sūtrasya śrautor'thaḥ saṃpadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:193: yaditthaṃ tattathā, yathā śuktyabhinna idamaṃśa iti viṣayasiddhiheturadhyāsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:195: atra pūrvapakṣe bandhasya satyatvena jñānādanivṛtterupāyāntarasādhyā muktiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:197_0: iti sarvaṃ manasi nidhāya brahmasūtrāṇi vyākhyātukāmo bhagavān bhāṣyakāraḥ sūtreṇa
GSP33brssgo1u:198: etena sūtrārthāsparśitvādadhyāsagrantho na bhāṣyamiti nirastam, ārthikārthasparśitvāt //
GSP33brssgo1u:203: satyarajate idaṃ rajatamityadhiṣṭhānasāmānyāropyaviśeṣayoraikyapramāhitasaṃskārajanyo dṛṣṭa ityatrāpyātmānyanātmāhaṅkārādhyāse pūrvapramā vācyā,
GSP33brssgo1u:206: iti matvā hetubhūtaṃ virodhaṃ vastutaḥ pratītito vyavahārataśca sādhayati-yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocarayoriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:207: na ca 'pratyayottarapadayośca'iti sūtreṇa 'pratyayecottarapade ca parato yuṣmadasmadormaparyantasya tvamādeśau staḥ'iti vidhānāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:208: tvadīyaṃ madīyaṃ tvatputro matputra itivat 'tvanmatpratyayagocarayoḥ'iti syāditi vācyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:215: na hyahaṅkārādyanātmano yūyamiti pratyayavipayatvamastīti cet na /
GSP33brssgo1u:221: yadyapyahaṅkārādirapi tadyogyastathāpi cidātmanaḥ sakāśādatyantabhedasiddhyarthaṃ yuṣmatpratyayayogya ityucyate // //
GSP33brssgo1u:224: tathā ca yuṣmajasmadoḥ svārthe prayujyamānayoreva tvamādeśaniyamo na lākṣaṇikayoḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:226: atra śabdalakṣakayoriva cinmātrajaḍamātralakṣakayorapi na tvamādeśo lakṣakatvāviśeṣāt iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:227: yadi tayoḥ śabdabodhakatve satyeva tvamādeśābhāva ityanena sūtreṇa jñāpitaṃ tadāsminbhāṣye yuṣmatpadena yuṣmacchabdajanyapratyayayogyaḥ parāgartho lakṣyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:229: tathā ca lakṣyatāvacchedakatayā śabdo 'pi bodhyata iti na tvamādeśaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:230: na ca parāktvapratyaktvayoreva lakṣyatāvacchedakatvaṃ, na śabdayogyatvāṃśasya, gauravāditi vācyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:232: ata evedamasmatpratyayagocarayoriti vaktavye 'pīdaṃśabdo 'smadarthe loke vede ca bahuśaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:235: ayamahamasmīti ca prayogadarśanānnāsmacchabdavirodhīti matvā yuṣmacchabdaḥ prayuktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:237: etena cetanavācitvādasmacchabdaḥ pūrvaṃ prayoktavyaḥ 'abhyarhitaṃ pūrva'iti nyāyāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:238: 'tyadādīni sarvaurnityam'iti sūtreṇa vihita ekaśeṣaśca syāditi nirastam /
GSP33brssgo1u:241: vṛddhāstu 'yuṣmadarthādanātmano niṣkṛṣya śuddhasya ciddhātoropāpavādanyāyena grahaṇaṃ dyotayitumādau yuṣmadgrahaṇaṃ'ityāhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:249: ahaṃ brahmeti vyavahāragocara iti tridhā virodhaḥ sphuṭīkṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:251: te eva pratyayau ca tau gocarau ceti yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocarau,
GSP33brssgo1u:253: aikyāsaṃbhave 'pi śuklo ghaṭa itivattādātmayaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-viṣayaviṣayiṇoriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:255: yuṣmadasmadī parāpratyagvastunī, te eva pratyayaśca gocaraśceti vā vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:256: atra pratyayagocarapadābhyāmātmanātmanoḥ pratyakparāgbhāve cidacittvaṃ heturuktastatra hetumāha-viṣayaviṣayiṇoriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:261: cidacittvena grāhyagrāhakatvena ca virodhāttamaḥprakāśavadaikyasya tādātmyasya vānupapattau satyāṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:264: itaratra dharmyantare itareṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāvaḥ saṃsargastasyānupapattiritityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:265: na hi dharmiṇoḥ saṃsargaṃ vinā dharmāṇāṃ vinimayo asti /
GSP33brssgo1u:268: nanvātmānātmanostādātmyasya taddharmasaṃsargasya cābhāve 'pyadhyāsaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha--ityata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:269: ityuktarītyā tādātmyādyabhāvena tatpramāyā abhāvādataḥ pramājanyasaṃskārasyādhyāsahetorabhāvāt 'adhyāso mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ'ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:274: ahamitipratyayayogyatvaṃ buddhyāderapyastīti matvā tata ātmānaṃ vivecayati--viṣayaṇīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:284: athavā yadātmano mukhyaṃ sarvāntaratvarūpaṃ pratyaktvaṃ pratītatvaṃ brahmāsmīti vyavahāragocaratvaṃ coktvaṃ tadasiddhaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:290: dvitīye tu pakṣe tadasiddhirityātmano mukhyaṃ pratyaktvādi yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:291: nanu yadātmano viṣayatvaṃ tadasiddhaṃ, anubhavāmīti śabdavatvāt, ahaṅkāravadityata āha--viṣayaṇīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:295: dehaṃ jānāmīti dehāhaṅkārayorviṣayaviṣayitve 'pi manuṣyo 'hamityabhedādhyāsavadātmāhaṅkārāyorapyabhedādhyāsaḥ syādityata āha--cidātmaka iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:296: tayorjāḍyālpatvābhyāṃ sādṛśyādadhyāse 'pi cidātmanyanavacchinne jaḍālpāhaṅkārādernādhyāsa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:301: ato buddhyādeḥ pratibhāsataḥ pratyaktve 'pi parāktvādikaṃ mukhyameveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:302: yuṣmatparāktaccāsau pratiyata iti pratyayaścāsau kartṛtvādivyavahāragocaraśca tasyeti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:311: caitanyātmanā viṣayiṇastaddharmāṇāṃ ca yo 'haṅkārādau viṣaye 'dhyāsaḥ sa mithyeti nāstīti bhavituṃ yuktam,
GSP33brssgo1u:319: taduktaṃ ṭīkāyāṃ-'ānando viṣayānubhavo nityatvaṃ ceti santi dharmā apṛthaktve 'pi caitanyatvāt pṛthagivāvabhāsante'iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:321: ahaṃ karomīti pratīterarthasya cādhyāsatvāyogātpramātvaṃ satyatvaṃ ca ahaṃ nara iti sāmānādhikaraṇyasya gauṇatvamiti matamāstheyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:322: tathā ca bandhasya satyatayā jñānānnivṛttirūpaphalāsaṃbhavādbaddhamuktayorjīvabrahmaṇoraikyāyogena viṣayāsaṃbhavāt śāstraṃ nārambhaṇīyamiti pūrvapakṣabhāṣyatātparyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:329: na cedaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kartṛtvādau prameti vācyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:332: na ca jyeṣṭhapratyakṣavirodhādāgamajñānasyaiva bādha iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:336: kiñca jyeṣṭhatvaṃ pūrvabhāvitvaṃ vā āgamajñānaṃ pratyupajīvyatvaṃ vā?
GSP33brssgo1u:337: ādye na prābalyam, jyeṣṭhasyāpi rajatabhramasya paścādbhāvinā śuktijñānena bādhadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:341: yattu kṣaṇikayāgasya śrutibalātkālāntarabhāviphalahetutvavat 'tathā vidvānnāmarūpādvimuktaḥ'iti śrutibalātsatyasyāpi jñānānnivṛttisaṃbhavādadhyāsavarṇanaṃ vyarthamiti, tanna /
GSP33brssgo1u:345: na ca setudarśanātsatyasya pāpasya nāśarśanānnāyogyatāniścayā iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:349: kiṃ ca jñānaikanivartyasya kiṃ nāma satyatvam, na tāvadajñānājanyatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:353: atha vyavahārakāle bādhaśūnyatvam, tarhi vyavahārikameva satyatvamityāgatamadhyastatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:354: tacca śrutyarthe yogyatā jñānārthaṃ varṇanīyameva, yāgasyāpūrvadvāratvavat /
GSP33brssgo1u:362: tayoratyantaṃ bhinnayoritaretarabhedāgraheṇānyonyasmin anyonyatādātmyaṃ anyonyadharmāṃśca vyatyāsenādhyasya lokavyavahāra iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:365: na ca dharmitādātmyādhyāse dharmādhyāsasiddheḥ 'dharmāṃśca'iti vyarthamiti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo1u:368: satyamanidaṃ caitanyaṃ tasyānātmani saṃsargamātrādhyāso na svarūpasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:369: anṛtaṃyuṣmadarthaḥ tasya svarūpato 'pyadhyāsāttayormithunīkaraṇamadhyāsa iti na śūnyatetyarthaḥ //
GSP33brssgo1u:370: nanvadhyāsamithunīkaraṇalokavyavahāraśabdānāmekārthatve 'dhyasya midhunīkṛtyeti pūrvakālatvavāciktvāpratyayādeśasya lyapaḥ kathaṃ prayoga iti cenna,
GSP33brssgo1u:372: tatra pūrvapūrvādhyāsasyottarottarādhyāsaṃ prati saṃskāradvārā pūrvakālatvena hetutvadyotanārthaṃ lyapaḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:375: nanu pravāhasyāvastutvāt, adhyāsavyaktīnāṃ sāditvāt, kathamanāditvamiti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:377: etena kāraṇābhāvāditi kalpo nirastaḥ, saṃskārasya nimittasya naisargikapadenoktatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:378: na ca pūrvapramājanya eva saṃskāro heturiti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo1u:382: mithyā ca tadajñānaṃ ca mithyājñānaṃ tannimittamupādānaṃ yasya sa tannimittaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:392: yadvā ajñānaṃ jñānābhāva iti śaṅkānirāsārthaṃ mithyāpadam /
GSP33brssgo1u:394: jñānenecchāprāgabhāvaḥ sākṣānnivartyata iti vadantaṃ prati mithyātve satītyuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:407: nanu dehātmanostādātmyameva saṃsarga iti tayoḥ ko bheda iti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:411: evaṃ sāmagrīsattvādanubhavasattvādadhyāso 'stītyato brahmātmaikye virodhābhāvena viṣayaprayojanayoḥ sattvāt śāstramārambhaṇīyamiti siddhāntabhāṣyatātparyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:412: evañca sūtreṇārthātsūcite viṣayaprayojane pratipādya taddhetumadhyāsaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃbhāvanāpramāṇaiḥ sādhayituṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchati--āheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:415: asya śāstrasya tattvanirṇayapradhānatvena vādakathātvadyotanārthaṃ āheti paroktiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:421: atra paratrāvabhāsa ityeva lakṣaṇam, śiṣṭaṃ padadvayaṃ tadupapādanārtham /
GSP33brssgo1u:422: tathāhi avabhāsyata ityavabhāso rajatādyarthaḥ tasyāyogyamadhikaraṇaṃ paratrapadārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:428: pūrvaṃ svābhāvavati bhūtale paścādānīto ghaṭo bhātīti ghaṭe 'tivyāptinirāsāya svasaṃsṛjyamāna iti padam,
GSP33brssgo1u:429: tena svābhāvakāle pratiyogisaṃsargasya vidyamānatocyate iti nātivyāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:432: nanvasya lakṣaṇasyāsaṃbhavaḥ, śuktau rajatasya sāmagryabhāvena saṃsargāsatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:433: na ca smaryamāṇasatyarajatasyaiva paratra śuktāvavabhāsyatvenādhyastatvoktiriti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo1u:435: smaryate iti smṛtiḥ satyarajatādiḥ tasya rūpamiva rūpamasyeti smṛtirūpaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:439: dṛṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ, saṃskāradvārā pūrvadarśanādavabhāsyata iti pūrvadṛṣaṭāvabhāsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:445: evaṃ ca doṣasaṃprayogasaṃskārabalācchuktyādau rajatamutapannamastīti paratrāvabhāsyatvalakṣamamupapannamiti smṛtirūpapūrvadṛṣṭapadābhyāmupapādim /
GSP33brssgo1u:450: tathā ca pramāṇājanyajñānaviṣayatve sati pūrvadṛṣṭajātīyatvaṃ prātītikādhyāsalakṣaṇaṃ tābhyāmuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:452: tatra smaryamāṇagaṅgādau abhinavaghaṭe cātivyāptinirāsāya pramāṇetyādi padadvayamityāhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:453: tatrārthādhyāse smaryamāṇasadṛśaḥ paratra pūrvadarśanādavabhāsyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:454: jñānādhyāse tu smṛtisadṛśaḥ paratra pūrvadarśanādavabhāsa iti vākyaṃ yojanīyamiti saṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:455_1: 'pi paratra parāvabhāsa iti lakṣaṇe saṃvādyuktibhiḥ satyādhiṣṭhāne mithyārthāvabhāsasiddheḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:455_2: sarvatantrasiddhānta idaṃ lakṣaṇamiti matvā anyathātmakhyātivādinormatamāha-taṃ keciditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:456: kecidanyathākhyātivādino 'nyatra śuktyādāvanyadharmasya svāvayavadharmasya deśāntarastharūpyāderadhyāsa iti vadanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:460: yatra yasyādhyāso lokasiddhastayorarthayostaddhiyośca bhedāgrahe sati tanmūlo bhramaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:465: tasyaivādhiṣṭhānasya śuktyāderviparītadharmatvakalpanāṃ viparīto viruddho dharmo yasya tadbhāvastasya rajatāderatyantāsataḥ kalpanāmācakṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:468: śuktāvaparokṣasya rajatasya deśāntare buddhau vā sattvāyogāt śūnyatve pratyakṣatvāyogāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:476: bhavatvadhyāsaḥ śuktyādau, ātmani tu na saṃbhavatītyākṣipati-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:477: yatrāparokṣādhyāsādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ tatrendriyasaṃyuktatvaṃ viṣayatvaṃ ceti vyāptiḥ śuktyādau dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssgo1u:479: pratīci pūrṇa indriyāgrāhye viṣayasyāhaṅkārādestaddharmāṇāṃ cādhyāsaḥ kathamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:483: idaṃpratyayānarhasya pratyagātmano 'na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate'ityādi śrutimanusṛtya tvamaviṣayatvaṃ bravīṣi /
GSP33brssgo1u:494: asmadarthacidātmā pratibimbitatyena yatra pratīyate so 'smatpratyayo 'haṅkārastatra bhāsamānatvāditi vārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:495: na cādhyāse sati bhāsamānatvaṃ tasminsati sa iti parasparāśraya iti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo1u:508: bālā avivekinaḥ talamindranīlakaṭāhakalpaṃ nabho malinaṃ pitamityevamaparokṣamadhyasyanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:513: nanu brahmajñānanāśyatvena sūtritāmavidyāṃ hitvā adhyāsaḥ kimiti varṇyata ityata āha-tametamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:517: tathāpi kāraṇāvidyāṃ tyaktvā kāryāvidyā kimiti varṇyate tatrāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:519: mūlāvidyayāḥ saṣuptāvanarthatvādarśanāt kāryātmanā tasyā anarthatvajñāpanārthaṃ tadvarṇanamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:522: taṃ varṇitamevaṃ sākṣipratyakṣasidhyaṃ puraskṛtya hetuṃ kṛtvā laukikaḥ karmaśāstrīyo mokṣaśāstrīyaśceti trividho vyavahāraḥ pravartata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:525: evaṃ vyavahārahetutvenādhyāse pratyakṣasiddhe 'pi pramāṇāntaraṃ pṛcchati--kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:526: avidyāvānahamityadhyāsavānātmā pramātā sa viṣaya āśrayo yeṣāṃ tāni avidyāvadviṣayāṇīti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:527_1: yadyapi pratyakṣaṃ tathāpi punarapi kathaṃ kenapramāṇenāvidyāvadviṣayatvamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:536: anena liṅgena kāraṇatayādhyāsaḥ sidhyati vyavahārarūpakāryānupapatyā veti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:537: nanu manuṣyatvādijātimati dehe 'hamityābhimānamātrādvyavahāraḥ sidhyatu kimindriyādiṣu mamābhimānenetyāśaṅkyāha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:539: tathā ca pratyakṣaliṅgādiprayukto yo vyavahāro draṣṭā anumātā śrotāhamityādirūpaḥ sa indriyādīni mamatāspadānyagṛhītvā na saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:540: yadvā tāni mamatvenānupādāyayo vyavahāraḥ sa neti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:541: pūrvatrānupādānāsaṃbhavakriyayoreko vyavahāraḥ kartā iti ktvāpratyayaḥ sādhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:543: indriyādiṣu mametyadhyāsabhāve 'ndhāderiva draṣṭṛtvādivyavahāro na syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:547: nanvastvātmanā saṃyuktaṃ śarīraṃ teṣāmāśrayaḥ kimadhyāsenetyatrāha-na cānadhyastātmabhāveneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:549: 'asaṅgo hi'iti śruteḥ, ādhyāsika eva dehātmanoḥ saṃbandho na saṃyogādiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:551: na ca suṣuptau pramātṛtvāpattiḥ karaṇoparamāditi tatrāha-na caitasminniti /
GSP33brssgo1u:553: pramā yadi nityacinmātraṃ tarhyāśrayatvāyogaḥ karaṇavaiyarthyaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:556: tadāśrayatvamasaṅgasyātmano vṛttimanmanastādātmyādhyāsaṃ vinā na saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:558: tarhyātmanaḥ pramātṛtvaṃ māstu iti vadantaṃ pratyāha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:563: sati pramātari paścādbhavan doṣa ityucyate, yathā kācādiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:564: avidyā tu pramātrantargatatvānna doṣaḥ, yena pratyakṣādīnāmaprāmāṇyaṃ bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:568: kiṃ vidvattvaṃ brahmāsmīti sākṣātkāraḥ uta yauktikamātmānātmabhedajñānam /
GSP33brssgo1u:569: ādye bādhitādhyāsānuvṛttyā vyavahāra ithi samanvayasūtre vakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:571: vivekināmapi vyavahārakāle paśvādibhiraviśeṣāt adhyāsavattvena tulyatvādvyavahāro 'dhyāsakārya iti yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:573: tatra saṃgrahavākyaṃ vyākurvan dṛṣṭānte hetuṃ sphuṭayati-yathāhīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:588: nāpi pareṣāmetatpratyatraṃ ataḥ sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭānta iti netyāha-paśvādīnāṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:592: taiḥ paścādibhiḥ sāmānyaṃ vyavahāravattvaṃ tasya darśanādvivekināmapyayaṃ vyavahāraḥ samāna iti niścīyata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:595: tasyādhyāsasya kāla eva kālo yasya sa tatkālaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:596: yadvā adhyāsastadā vyavahāraḥ, tadabhāve suṣuptau tadabhāva ityuktānvayādimāniti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:600: tarhi kathaṃ vaidikakarmaṇo 'dhyāsajanyatvasiddhirityāśaṅkya kiṃ tatra dehānyātmadhīmātramapekṣitamuta,
GSP33brssgo1u:604: kṣutpipāsādigrasto jātiviśeṣavānahaṃ saṃsārīti jñānaṃ karmaṇyapekṣitaṃ na tadviparītātmatattvajñānaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:609_0: 'brāhmaṇo yajeta''na ha vai snātvā bhikṣeta''aṣṭavarṣaṃ brāhyaṇamupanayīta' 'kṛṣṇakeśo
GSP33brssgo1u:610: evamadhyāse pramāṇasiddhe 'pi kasya kutrādhyāsa iti jijñāsāyāṃ tamudāhartuṃ lakṣaṇaṃ smārayati-adhyaso nāmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:612: tallakṣaṇaṃ yathā spaṣṭaṃ bhavati tathodāhriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:617: kṛśatvādidharmavato dehāderātmani tādātmyena kalpitatvāttaddharmāḥ sākṣādātmanyadhyastā iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:625: ahamityadhyāse cidātmano bhānaṃ vācyaṃ, anyathā jagadāndhyāpatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:629: tasyādhyāstasya jaḍasya viparyayodhiṣṭhānatvaṃ, caitanyaṃ ca tadātmanā sthitamiti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:630: tatrājñāne kevalātmanā saṃsargaḥ, manasyajñānopahitasya dehādau manaupahitasyeti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:631: evamātmani buddhyādyadhyāsāt kartṛtvādilābhaḥ, buddhyādau cātmādhyasāccaitanyalābha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:637: taduktaṃ bhagavadgītāsu-'na rūpamasyeha tathopalabhyate nānto na cādirna ca saṃpratiṣṭhā'iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:639: mithyā māyā tayā pratīyata iti pratyayaḥ kāryaprapañcaḥ tatpratītiścetyevaṃsvarūpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:645: kartṛtvādyanarthahetoradhyāsasya samūlasyātyantikanāśo mokṣaḥ sa kenetyata āha-ātmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:649: vicāritavedāntānāṃ brahmātmaikyaṃ viṣayaḥ, mokṣaḥ phalamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:650: arthāttadvicārātmakaśāstrasyāpi te eva viṣayaprayojane iti jñeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:651: nanu vedānteṣu prāṇādyupāstīnāṃ bhānādātmaikyameva teṣāmartha iti kathamityata āha-yathā ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:654: tannivāsī śārīrako jīvastasya brahmatvavicāro mīmāṃsā tasyāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:661: avagatārthā eva vedāntā ityavyavahitaviṣayābhāvānnārambha iti prāpte brūte-vedānteti /
GSP33brssgo1u:663: yadi vidhireva vedārthaḥ syāttadā sarvajño bādarāyaṇo brahmajijñāsāṃ na brūyāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:665: ato brahmaṇo jijñāsyatvoktyā kenāpi tantreṇānavagatabrahmaparavedāntavicāra ārambhaṇīya iti sūtrakṛddarśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:668_2: śāstrārambhasaṃdehe sati athaśabdasyānantaryārthakatvoktyā adhikāriṇaṃ sādhayati-tatrāthaśabda iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:671: tatra 'atha yogānuśāsanam'ityatra, sūtre yathā athaśabda ārambhārthakaḥ yogaśāstramārabhyata iti
GSP33brssgo1u:672: tadvadatra kiṃ na syādityata āha-nādhikārārtha iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:674: ādye 'thaśabdasyārambhārthatve brahmajñānecchārabhyata iti sūtrārthaḥ syāt sa cāsaṃgataḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:676: nahi pratyathikaraṇaṃ icchā kriyate kintu tayā vicāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:681: vākyārtho vicārakartavyatā na hi tatra maṅgalasya kartṛtvādinānvayo 'stītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:682: nanu sūtrakṛtā śāstrādau maṅgalaṃ kāryamityathaśabdaḥ pratyukta iti cet satyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:683: na tasyārtho maṅgalaṃ kintu ca tacchravaṇamuccāraṇaṃ ca maṅgalakṛtyaṃ karoti /
GSP33brssgo1u:691: atha mataṃ prapañcaḥ satya ityatra pūrvaprakṛtārthāduttarārthasyārthāstaratvārtho 'thaśabdo dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:694: brahmajijñāsāyāḥ pūrvaṃ arthaviśeṣaḥ prakṛto nāsti yasmāttasyā arthāntaratvamathaśabdenocyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:695: yataḥ kutaścitadardhāntaratvaṃ sūtrakṛtā na vaktavyaṃ, phalābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:696: yadi phalasya jijñāsāpadoktakartavyavicārasya hetutvena yatpūrvaṃ prakṛtaṃ tadapekṣāstītyapekṣābalātprakṛtahetumākṣipya tator'thāntaratvamucyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:703: tasminnukte satyarthāntaratvaṃ na vācyaṃ jñānatvādvaiphalyācceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:704: phalasya vicārasya pūrvaprakṛtahetvapekṣāyā balādyadarthāntaratvaṃ tasyānantāryabhedāt na pṛthagathaśabdārthatvamityadhyāhṛtya bhāṣyaṃ yojanīyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:705: yadvā pūrvaprakṛter'the 'pekṣā yasyā arthāntaratāyāstasyāḥ phalaṃ jñānaṃ taddvārānantaryāvyatirekāttajjñāne tasyāḥ jñānatonatarbhāvānnāthaśabdārthatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:707: yanniyamena pūrvavṛttaṃ pūrvabhāvi asādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ puṣkalākāraṇamiti yāvat,
GSP33brssgo1u:709: nanvastu dharmavicāra iva brahmavicāre 'pi vedādhyayanaṃ puṣkalakāraṇamityāha-svādhyāyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:711: nanu saṃyogapṛthaktvanyāyena 'yajñena dānena'ityādiśrutyā 'yajñādikarmāṇi jñānāya vidhīyante'iti sarvāpekṣādhikaraṇe vakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:712: tathā ca pūrvatantreṇa tadavabodhaḥ puṣkalakāraṇamiti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:715: tadarthastu-ekasya karmaṇa ubhayārthatve 'nekaphalasaṃbandhe saṃyogaḥ ubhayasaṃbandhabodhakaṃ vākyaṃ tasya pṛthaktvaṃ bhedaḥ sa hetuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:716: tataśacātrāpi jyotiṣṭomādikarmaṇāṃ svargādiphalakālāmapi 'yajñena dānena'ityādi vacanāt jñānārthatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:718: ayamāśayaḥ--na tāvat pūrvatantrasthaṃ nyāyasahasraṃ brahmajñāne tadvicāre vā puṣkalaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:721: na hi dhūmāgnyoriva dharmabrahmaṇorvyāptirasti, yayā dharmajñānāt brahmajñānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo1u:731: avadānānāmānantaryaniyamaḥ kramo yathāthaśabdārthastasya vivakṣitatvāt na tatheha dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ kramo vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:738: yathā apāṃ praṇayanaṃ darśapūrṇamāsāṅgamāśritya 'godohanena paśukāmasya'iti vihitasya godohanasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:739: yathā vā 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajeta'iti darśātyuttarakāle vihitasya somayāgasya darśādyadhikṛtādhikāratvaṃ teṣāmekakartṛkatvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:740: tataścaikaprayogavacanagṛhītānāṃ teṣāṃ yugapadanuṣṭhānasaṃbhavāt kramākāṅkṣāyāṃ śrutyādibhirhi kramo bodhyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:742: nanu 'brahmacaryaṃ samāpya gahī bhavet gṛhādvanī bhūtvā pravrajecca'iti śrutyā,
GSP33brssgo1u:749: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi janmāntarakṛtakarmabhiḥ śuddhaṃ cittaṃ tadā brahmacaryādeva saṃnyasyabrahma jijñāsitavyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:750: yadā na śuddhamiti rāgeṇa jñāyate tadā gṛhī bhavet,
GSP33brssgo1u:760: dvādaśādhyāyānāṃ caikadharmajijñāsyakānāṃ kramavattayoḥ kramo vivakṣita iti kramārtho 'thaśabda ityaśaṅkyāha-phaleti /
GSP33brssgo1u:763: yathā vā kāmacikitsātantrayorjijñāsyabhedānna kramāpekṣā tadvanmīmāṃsayorna kramāpekṣeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:765: viṣayābhimukhyenodetītyabhyudayo viṣayādhīnaṃ sukhaṃ svargādikaṃ tacca dharmajñānahetormīmāṃsayāḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:766: na kevalaṃ phalasya svarūpato bhedaḥ kintu hetuto 'pītyāha-tacceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:769: brahmajñānaṃ ca svotpattivyatiriktamanuṣṭhānaṃ nāpekṣata ityāha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:770: svarūpato hetutaśca phalabhedānna samuccaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:789_0: lakṣaṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ 'svargakāmo yajeta'ityādivākyaṃ hi svaviṣaye dharme yāgādikaraṇasvargādiphalakabhāvanārūpe
GSP33brssgo1u:789_1: phalahetuyāgādigocaraniyoge vā hitasādhane yāgādau vā puruṣaṃ pravartayadevāvabodhayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:790: 'ayamātmā brahma'ityādi tvamarthaṃ kevalamaprapañcaṃ brahma bodhayatveva na pravartayati viṣayābhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:792: brahmacodanayā puruṣo 'vabodhe na pravartata ityatra hetuṃ pūrvavākyenāha-avabodhasyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:793: svajanyajñāne svayaṃ pramāṇaṃ na pravartakamityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:794: mānādeva bodhasya jātatvāt, jāte ca vidhyayogāt, na vākyārthajñāne puruṣapravṛttiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:799: evamathaśabdasyārthāntarāsaṃbhavāt ānantaryavācitve sati tadavadhitvena puṣkalakāraṇaṃ vaktavyamityāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:804: laukikavyāpārāt manasa uparamaḥ śamaḥ bāhyakaraṇānāmuparamo damaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:815: 'akṣayyaṃ ha vai cāturmāsyayājinaḥ sukṛtam'ityādiśrutyā karmaphalasya nityatvena tato vairāgyasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:816: jīvasya brahmasvarūpamokṣaścāyuktaḥ, bhedāt tasya loṣṭādivat puruṣārthatvāyogācca /
GSP33brssgo1u:817: tato mumukṣāsaṃbhava ityākṣepaparihārārtho 'taḥśabdaḥ taṃ vyācaṣṭe-ataḥśabda iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:822: tasmāt 'ato 'nyadārtam'iti śrutyā anātmamātrasyānityatvavivekāt vairāgyalābha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:828: sutravākyapūraṇārthamadhyāhṛtakartavyapadānvayārthaṃ brahmajijñāsāpadena vicāraṃ lakṣayituṃ tasya svābhimatasamāsakathanenāvayavārthaṃ darśayati-bahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:829: nanu dharmāya jijñāsā itivat brahmaṇe jijñāseti caturthīsamāsaḥ kiṃ na syāditi cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:833: karmaṇyukte satyarthāt phalamuktaṃ bhavati, icchāyāḥ karmaṇa evaphalatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:834: yathā svargasyecchā ityukte svargasya phalatvaṃ labhate tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:835: ata eva 'dharmajijñāsā'ityatrāpi 'sā hi tasya jñātumicchā'iti icchāṃ gṛhītvā ṣaṣṭhīsamāso darśitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:836: vicāralakṣaṇāyāṃ tu vicārasya kleśātmakatayā prathamaṃ phalākāṅkṣatvāt dharmāya jijñāse caturthasamāsa uktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:837: tathā vṛttikārairbrahmaṇe jijñāsā ityuktaṃ cedastu jñānatvena brahmaṇaḥ phalatvāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:839: nanu 'brahmakṣatramidaṃ brahma āyāti brahma svayambhūrbrahma prajāpatiḥ'iti śrutiṣu loke ca brāhmaṇatvajātau jīve vede kamalāsane ca brahmaśabdaḥ prayujyata ityāśaṅkāha-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:843: jijñāsetyatra sanpratyavācyāyā icchāyā jñānaṃ karma, tasya jñānasya brahma karma /
GSP33brssgo1u:845: icchāyā viṣayajñānajanyatvācca prathamāpekṣitaṃ karmaiva ṣaṣṭhyā vācyaṃ na śeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:846: nanu pramāṇādikamanyadeva tatkarmāstu brahma tu śeṣitayā saṃbadhyatāṃ tatrāha-jijñāsyāntareti /
GSP33brssgo1u:847: śrutaṃ karma tyaktvānyadaśrutaṃ kalpayan 'piṇḍamutsṛjya karaṃ leḍhi'iti nyāyamanusaratīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:850: ṣaṣṭhyā saṃvandhamātraṃ pratītamapi viśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ sakarmakakriyāsaṃnidhānāt karmatve paryavasyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:852_1: kṛdantasya yoge vihitaṃ prathamāpekṣitaṃ ca karmatvaṃ tyaktvā parokṣamaśābdaṃ kalpayata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:855: tatra yāni brahmāśritāni lakṣaṇapramāṇayuktijñānasādhanaphalāni teṣāmapi vicāraḥ pratijñāto bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:857: karmaṇiṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu brahmakarmaka eva vicāraḥ pratijñāto bhavatītyabhisaṃdhinā śeṣaṣaṣṭhītyucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:859: brahmatatsaṃbandhināṃ sarveṣāṃ vicārapratijñānamarthaḥ phalaṃ yasya tattvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:861: sūtreṇa mukhataḥ pradhānasya brahmaṇo vicāre pratijñāte sati tadupakaraṇānāṃ vicārasyārthikapratijñāyā uditatvādityāha siddhāntī-na pradhāneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:866: nanvanavagate vastunīcchāyā adarśanāt tasyā mūlaṃ viṣayajñānaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:867: brahmajñānaṃ tu jijñāsāyāḥ phalaṃ, tadeva mūlaṃ kathamityāśaṅkyāha-avagatīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:868: āvaraṇanivṛttirūpābhivyaktimaccaitanyamavagatiḥ paryanto 'vadhiryasyākhaṇḍasākṣātkāravṛttijñānasya tadeva jijñāsāyāḥ karma, tadeva phalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:869: mūlaṃ tvāpātajñānamityadhunā vakṣyata iti phalamūlajñānayorbhedānna jijñāsānupapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:870: nanu gamanasya grāmaḥ karma, tatprāptiḥ phalamiti bhedāt karma eva phalamityuktaṃ tatrāha-phaleti /
GSP33brssgo1u:871: kriyāntare tayorbhede 'pi icchāyāḥ phalaviṣayatvāt karmaiva phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:873: jñānaṃ vṛttiḥ avagatistatphalaṃ iti bheda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:880: athātaśabdābhyāmadhikāriṇaḥ sādhitattvāttena brahmajñānāya vicāraḥ kartavya ityarthaḥ //
GSP33brssgo1u:886: athajñātaṃ kenāpi tarhi taduddeśena vicāraḥ kartuṃ na śakyate, ajñātasyoddeśāyogāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:887: tathā ca buddhāvanārūḍhasya vicārātmakaśāstreṇa vedānteśca pratipādanāyogāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:888: tatpratipādyatvarūpaḥ saṃbandho nāstīti jñānānutpatteḥ phalamapi nāstītyanārabhyaṃ śāstramityarthaḥ //
GSP33brssgo1u:893: na ca 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'iti śrutyā seti vācyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:894: brahmapadasya loke saṃgatigrahābhāvena tadghaṭitavākyasyābodhakatvādityāśaṅkyabrahmapadavyutpatyā prathamaṃ tasya nirguṇasya saguṇasya ca prasiddhirityāha-brahmaśabdasya hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:895: asyārthaḥ-śrutau sūtre ca brahmapadasya prayogānyathānupapattyā kaścidartho 'stīti jñāyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:897: sa cārtho mahatvarūpa iti vyākaraṇānniścīyate, 'bṛhi vṛddhau'iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:898: sā ca vṛddhirniravadhikamahatvamiti saṃkocakābhāvāt, śrutāvanantapadena saha prayogācca jñāyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:899: niravadhikamahatvaṃ cāntavattvādidoṣavatve sarvajñatvādiguṇahīnatve ca na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:901: ato bṛṃhaṇādbrahmeti vyutpatyā deśakālavastutaḥ paricchedābhāvarūpaṃ nityatvaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:907: jñeyasya kāryasya vā pariśeṣe 'lpatvaprasaṅgena sarvajñatvasya sarvakāryaśaktimattvasya ca lābhāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:911: ahamasmīti na pratyetīti na kintu pratyetyeva /
GSP33brssgo1u:914: ātmanaḥ śūnyasya pratītau ahaṃ nāsmīti loko jānīyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:920_0: yathā idaṃ rajatamiti vastutaḥ śuktiprasiddhistadvat ahamasmīti sattvacaitanyarūpatvasāmānyena
GSP33brssgo1u:920_1: vastuto brahmaṇaḥ prasiddhiḥ neyaṃ pūrṇānandabrahmatvarūpaviśeṣagocarā vādināṃ vivādābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:921: na hi śuktitvaviśeṣadarśane sati rajataṃ raṅgamanyadveti vipratipattirasti /
GSP33brssgo1u:922: ato vipratipattyanyathānupapatyā sāmānyataḥ prasiddhāvapi viśeṣasyājñātatvādviṣayādisiddhiriti siddhāntayati na ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:923: sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvaḥ svatmani saccitpūrṇādipadavācyabhedāt kalpita iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:928_0: kimātmā dehādirūpaḥ uta tadbhinna iti vipratipattikoṭitvena dehendriyamanobuddhiśūnyānyuktva
GSP33brssgo1u:928_2: na veti vivādakoṭitvena yogimatamāha-asti tadvyatirikta īśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:929: niratiśayatvaṃ gṛhītvā īśvaraḥ sarvajñatvādisaṃpanna iti yogino vadanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:931: bhokturjīvasyākartuḥ sākṣiṇaḥ sa īśvara ātmāsvarūpamiti vedāntino vadantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:933: vipratipattīnāṃ prapañco nirāsaśca vivaraṇopanyāsena darśitaḥ sukhabodhāyetīhoparamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:934: tatra yuktivākyāśrayaḥ siddhāntinaḥ jīvo brahmaiva ātmatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:947: nanu santu vipratipattayastathāpi yasya yanmate śraddhā tadāśrayaṇāttasyasvārthaḥ setsyati kiṃ brahmavicārārambheṇetyata āha-tatrāvicāryeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:953: ki tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ caureṇātmāpahāriṇā //
GSP33brssgo1u:955: ataḥ sarveṣāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ niśreyasaphalāya vedāntavicāraḥ kartavya itisūtrārthamupasaṃharati-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:958: vedāntāvirodhino ye tarkāstantrāntarasthāstānyupakaraṇāni yasyāḥ sā niśreyasāyārabhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:959: nanu sūtre vicāravācipadābhāvāttadārambhaḥ kathaṃ sūtrārtha ityata āha-brahmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:960: brahmajñānecchoktidvārā vicāraṃ lakṣayitvā tatkartavyatāṃ bravītīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:963: nanvidaṃ sūtraṃ śāstrādbahiḥ sthitvā śāstramārambhayati antarbhūtvā vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:968: ucyate-śravaṇavidhinā ārabdamidaṃ śāstraṃ śāstrāntargatameva śāstrārambhaṃ pratipādayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:985_0: yata iti kāraṇanirdeśaḥ asya jagato nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtasyānekakartṛbhoktṛsaṃyuktasya
GSP33brssgo1u:986: anyeṣāmapi bhāvavikārāṇāṃ triṣvevāntarbhāva iti janmasthitināśānāmiha grahaṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:987: yāskaparipaṭhitānāṃ tu 'jāyate 'sti' ityādīnāṃ grahaṇe teṣāṃ jagataḥ sthitkāle saṃbhāvyamānatvānmūlakāraṇādutpattisthitināśāṃ jagato na gṛhītāḥ syurityāśaṅkyeta,
GSP33brssgo1u:988: tanmā śaṅkīti yotpattirbrahmastatraiva sthitiḥ pralayaśca ta eva gṛhyante //
GSP33brssgo1u:989: na yathoktaviśeṣaṇasya jagato yathoktaviśeṣaṇamīśvaraṃ muktvānyataḥ pradhānādacetanādaṇubhyo 'bhāvātsaṃsāriṇo vā utpattyādi saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:997: satsu tu vedāntavākyeṣu jagato janmādikāraṇavādiṣu tadarthagrahaṇadārḍhāyānumānamapi vedāntavākyāvirodhi pramāṇaṃ bhavanna nivāryate,
GSP33brssgo1u:1002: na dharmajijñāsāyāmiva śrutyādayo 'nubhavādayaśca yathāsaṃbhavamiha pramāṇaṃ anubhavāvasānatvādbhūtavastuviṣayatvācca brahmajñānasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:1003: kartavye hi viṣaye nānubhavāpekṣāstīti śrutyādīnāmeva prāmāṇyaṃ syātpuruṣādhīnātmalābhatvācca kartavyasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:1004: kartumakartumanyathā vā kartuṃ śakyaṃ laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ ca karma,
GSP33brssgo1u:1012: natu vastvevaṃ naivamasti nāstīti vā vikalpyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1016: nahi sthāṇāvekasmisthāṇurvā puruṣo 'nyo veti tattvajñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:1020: tatraivaṃ sati brahmajñānamapi vastutantrameva, bhūtavastu viṣayatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:1021: nanu bhūtavastutve brahmaṇaḥ pramāṇāntaraviṣayatvameveti vedāntavākyavicāraṇānarthikaiva prāptā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1025: sati hīndriyaviṣayatve brahmaṇa-, idaṃ brahmaṇā saṃbaddhaṃ kāryamiti gṛhyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:1026: kāryamātrameva tu gṛhyamāṇaṃ kiṃ brahmaṇā saṃbaddhaṃ kimanyena kenacidvā saṃbaddhamiti na śakyaṃ niścetum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1038: tasya ca nirṇayavākyam- 'ānandāddhyeva khalvimāni bhūtāni jāyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:1044: FN: 'idaṃ sarvamasṛjata yadidaṃ kiñca' iti pratyakṣam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1045: prathamasūtreṇa śāstrārambhamupapādya śāstramārabhamāṇaḥ pūrvottarādhikaraṇayoḥ saṃgatiṃ vaktuṃ vṛttaṃ kīrtayati-brahmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1047: brahmaṇo vicāryatvoktvā arthāt pramāṇādi vicārāṇāṃ pratijñātatve 'pi brahmapramāṇaṃ vinā kartumaśakyatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:1053: lakṣaṇadyotivedāntānāṃ spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgānāṃ lakṣye brahmaṇi samanvayokteḥ śrutiśāstrādhyāyapādasaṃgatayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1054: tathā hi-'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante'ityādi vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1055: tatkiṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇaṃ na veti saṃdehaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1056: tatra pūrvapakṣe brahmasvarūpasiddhyā muktyasiddhiḥ phalaṃ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1057: yadyapyākṣepasaṃgatau pūrvādhikaraṇaphalameva phalamiti kṛtvā pṛthaṅna vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1058: taduktam-'ākṣepe cāpavāde ca prāsyāṃ lakṣaṇa karmaṇi /
GSP33brssgo1u:1059: prayojanaṃ na vaktavyaṃ yacca kṛtvā pravartate'iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1061: yatra pūrvādhikaraṇasiddhāntena parvapakṣaḥ tatrāpavādikī saṃgatiḥ prāptistadarthā cintā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1063: na ca jagadupādānatve sati kartṛtvaṃ lakṣaṇamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1065: na ca śrautasya brahmaṇaḥ śrutyaiva lakṣaṇasiddheḥ kimanumāneneti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1066: anumānasya śrutyanugrāhakatvena tadabhāve tadvirodhe vā śrutyarthāsiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1067: na ca jagatkartṛtvamupādānatvaṃ vā pratyekaṃ lakṣaṇamastviti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1071_0: atra adyapi jagajjanmasthitilayakāraṇatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyate tathāpyagre 'prakṛtiśca'-ityadhikaraṇe
GSP33brssgo1u:1071_1: tatkāraṇatvaṃ na kartṛtvamātraṃ kintu kartṛtvopādānatvobhayarūpatvamiti vakṣyamāṇaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:1072_0: nanu jijñāsyanirguṇabrahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ kathaṃ lakṣaṇamiti ucyate-yathā rajataṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:1072_1: śukterlakṣaṇaṃ yadrajataṃ sā śuktiriti tathā yajjagatkāraṇaṃ tadbrahmeti kalpitaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:1075: yathā citragordevadattasya citrā gāvaḥ tadvadatrāpi janmādīti napuṃsakaikavacanadyotitasya samāhārasya janmasthitibhaṅgasya janma viśeṣaṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1076: tathā ca janmanaḥ samāsārthaikadeśasya guṇatvena saṃvijñānaṃ yasmin bahuvrīhau sa tadguṇasaṃvijñāna ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1079: ato janmasthitibhaṅgairnirūpitāni trīṇi kāraṇatvāni militānyeva lakṣaṇamiti matvā sūtre samāhāro dyotita iti dhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1080: nanvāditvaṃ janmanaḥ kathaṃ jñātavyaṃ, saṃsārasyānāditvādityata āha-janmanaśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1081: mūlaśrutyā vastugatyā cāditvaṃ jñātvā tadapekṣya sūtrakṛtā janmana ādityamuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1083: viyadādijagato nityatvāt na janmādisaṃbandha ityata āhaḥ-ṣaṣṭhīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1085: nanu jagato janmādervā brahmasaṃbandhābhāvānna lakṣaṇatvamityāśaṅkya tatkāraṇatvaṃ lakṣaṇamiti pañcamyarthamāha-yata itīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1086: yacchabdena satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ ānandarūpaṃ vastūcyate 'ānandāddhyeva'iti nirṇītatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:1090: yathā kumbhakāraḥ prathamaṃ kumbhaśabdābhedenāvikalpitaṃ pṛthubudhnodarākārasvarūpaṃ buddhāvālikhya tadātmanā kumbhaṃ vyākaroti-bahiḥ prakaṭayati,
GSP33brssgo1u:1091: tathā paramakāraṇamapi svetsitanāmarūpātmanā vyākarotītyanumīyata iti matvāha-nāmarūpābhyāmiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1096: 'yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvam'sarva eta ātmano vyuccaranti“iti śrutyā sthūlasūkṣmadehopādhidvārā jīvānāṃ kāryatvena jaganmadhyapātitvānna jagatkāraṇatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1098: pratiniyatāni vyavasthitāni deśakālanimittāni yeṣāṃ kriyāphalānāṃ tadāśrayasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1102: tathā ca yathā sevāphalaṃ deśādyabhijñadātṛkaṃ tathā karmaphalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1105: nanvanyepi vṛddhipariṇāmadayo bhāvavikārāḥ santīti kimiti janmādityāditipadena na gṛhyante tatrāha-anyeṣāmiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1112: vinaśyati'iti yāskamunivākyaṃ etatsūtramūlaṃ kiṃ na syādata āha-yāsketi /
GSP33brssgo1u:1113: yāskamuniḥ kila mahābhūtānāmutpannānāṃ sthitikāle bhautikeṣu pratyakṣeṇa janmādiṣaṭkamupalabhya niruktavākyaṃ cakāra /
GSP33brssgo1u:1114_0: tanmūlīkṛtya janmādiṣaṭkakāraṇatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sūtrārtha iti grahaṇe sūtrakṛtā brahmalakṣaṇaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:1114_1: na saṃgṛhītaṃ kintu mahābhūtānāṃ lakṣaṇamuktamiti śaṅkā syāt sā mā bhūtiti ye śrutyuktā
GSP33brssgo1u:1115: yadi niruktasyāpi śrutirmūlamiti mahābhūtajanmādijanmādikamarthastarhi sā śrutireva sūtrasya mūlamastu,
GSP33brssgo1u:1117: yadi jagato brahmātiriktaṃ kāraṇaṃ syāt tadā brahmalakṣaṇasya tatrātivyāptyādidoṣaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:1118: atastannirāsāya lakṣaṇasūtreṇa brahma vinā jagajjanmādikaṃ na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:1122: nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtatyetyādināṃ ca caturṇāṃ jagadviśeṣaṇānāṃ vyākhyānāvasare pradhānaśūnyayoḥ saṃsāriṇaśca nirāso darśitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1126: svabhāvādeva vicitraṃ jagaditi lokāyatastaṃ pratyāha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1128: kiṃ svayameva svasya heturiti svabhāva uta kāraṇānapekṣatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1132: teṣāṃ kāryārthibhirupādīyamānatvāt kāryasya kāraṇānapekṣatvaṃ na yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1133: anepekṣatve dhānyārthināṃ bhūviśeṣe varṣādikāle bījādinimitte ca pravṛttirna syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1134: pūrvoktasarvajñatvādiviśeṣaṇakamīśvaraṃ muktvā jagata utpatyādikaṃ na saṃbhavatīti bhāṣyeṇa kartāraṃ vinā kāryaṃ nāstīti vyatireka uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1136: etadeva vyāptijñānaṃ jagati pakṣe kartāraṃ sādhayat sarvajñeśvaraṃ sādhayati kiṃ śrutyeti tārkikāṇāṃ bhrāntimupanyasyati-etadeveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1137: etadevānumānameva sādhanaṃ na śrutiriti manyanta iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1138: athavā etadvyāptijñānameva śrutyanugrāhakayuktimātratvenāsmatsaṃmataṃ sadanumānaṃ svatantramiti manyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1145: tathāhi-aṅkurādau tāvajjīvaḥ kartā na bhavati jīvādbhinnasya ghaṭavadacetanatvaniyamādanyaḥ kartā nāstyeveti vyatirekaniścayāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:1153: yadi śrutīnāṃ svatantramānatvaṃ na syāttarhi 'tattu samanvayāt'ityādinā tāsāṃ tātparyaṃ sūtrakṛnna vicārayet,
GSP33brssgo1u:1154: tasmāduttarasūtrāṇāṃ śrutivicārārthatvāt janmādisūtre 'pi śrutireva svātantryeṇa vicāryate nānumānamiti pariharati-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1159: vākyasya tadarthasyaca vicārādyadhyavasānaṃ tātparyaniścayaḥ prameyasaṃbhavaniścayaśca tena jātā brahmāvagatirmuktaye bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1169_0: yathā kaścit gandhāradeśebhyaścorairanyatrāraṇye baddhanetra eva tyaktaḥ kenacinmuktabandhastaduktamārgagrahaṇasamarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:1169_1: paṇḍitaḥ svayaṃ tarkakuśalo medhāvī svadeśāneva prāpnuyāt evamevehāvidyākāmādibhiḥsvarūpānandātprācyāvyāsminnaraṇye
GSP33brssgo1u:1169_2: saṃsāre kṣiptaḥ kenaciddayāparavaśenācāryeṇa nāsi tvaṃ saṃsārī kintu 'tatvamasi'ityupadiṣṭasvarūpaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:1172: nanu brahmaṇo mananādyapekṣā na yuktā, vedārthatvāt, dharmavat /
GSP33brssgo1u:1174: jijñāsye dharma iva jijñāsye brahmaṇīti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1178: muktyarthaṃ brahmajñānasya śābdasya sākṣātkārāvasānatvāpekṣaṇāt pratyagbhūtasiddhabrahmagocaratvena sākṣātkāraphalakatvasaṃbhavāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:1180: dharme tu nityaparokṣe sādhye sākṣātkārasyānapekṣitatvādasaṃbhavācca śrutyā nirṇayamātramanuṣṭhānāyāpekṣitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1181: liṅgādayastu śrutyantararbhūtā eva śrutirdvārā nirṇayopayogitvenāpekṣyante na mananādayaḥ anupayogādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1187: yathā aindrāgnyādaya iṣṭayo daśa krameṇa paṭhitāḥ daśamantrāśca 'indrāgnī rocanā divi'ityādyāḥ tatra prathameṣṭhau prathamamantrasya viniyoga ityādyūhanīyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1189: yathādhvaryavasaṃjñakānāṃ mantrāṇāmādhvaryavasaṃjñake karmaṇi viniyoga iti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1195: tatra yadi vedārthatvamātreṇa brahmaṇo dharmeṇa sāmyaṃ tvayocyeta tarhi kṛtisādhyatvaṃ vidhiniṣedhavikalpotsargāpavādāśca brahmaṇi dharmavat syuriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1197: puruṣakṛtyadhīnā ātmalābha utpattiryasya tadbhāvācca dharme śrutyādīnāmeva prāmāṇyamityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1202: tadvaddharmasya kartumakartuṃ śakyatvamuktvā anyathākartuṃ śakyatvamāha-udita iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1204: vidhipratiṣedhāśca vikalpādayaśca dharme sādhye yer'thavantaḥ sāvakāśa bhavanti te brahmaṇyapi syurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1209: tathā 'āhavanīye juhoti'ityutsargaḥ, 'aśvasya pade pade juhoti'ityapavāda iti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1213: idaṃ vastu, evaṃ, naivaṃ, ghaṭaḥpaṭo veti prakāravikalpaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1215: nanu vastunyapi ātmādau vādināmasti nāstītyādivikalpā dṛśyante tatrāha-vikalpanāstviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1216: astitvādikoṭismaraṇaṃ puruṣabuddhistanmūlā manaḥspanditamātrāḥ saṃśayaviparyayavikalpā na pramārūpā ityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1217: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-dharmo hi yathā yathā jñāyate tathā tathā kartuṃ śakyate iti yathāśāstraṃ puruṣabuddhyapekṣā vikalpāḥ sarve pramārūpā eva bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:1218: tatsāmyena brahmaṇyapi sarve vikalpā yathārthāḥ syuriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1220: yadi siddhavastujñānamapi sādhyajñānavatpuruṣabuddhimapekṣya jāyeta tadā siddhe vikalpā yathārthāḥ syuḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1221: na siddhavastujñānaṃ pauruṣaṃ kiṃ tarhi pramāṇavastujanyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1222: tathā ca vastuna ekarūpatvādekameva jñānaṃ pramā,
GSP33brssgo1u:1225: sthāṇurevetyavadhāraṇe siddhe sarvevikalpā yathārthā na bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1226: tatra yadvastutantraṃ jñānaṃ tadyathārthaṃ, yatpuruṣatantraṃ tanmithyeti vibhajate-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1230: siddher'the jñānapramātvasya vastvadhīnatve sati brahmajñānamapi vastujanyameva yathārthaṃ na puruṣatantraṃ bhūtārthaviṣatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:1232: ataḥ sādhyer'the sarve vikalpāḥ puntantrā na siddher'the iti vailakṣaṇyāt na dharmasāmyaṃ brāhmaṇa iti mananādyapekṣā siddheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1233: nanu tarhi brahma pratyakṣādigocaraṃ, dharmavilakṣaṇatvāt, ghaṭādivat /
GSP33brssgo1u:1237: siddhārthe tasyā amānatvena tadvicārasya niṣphalatvāditi śaṅkate-nānviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1238: pramāṇāntaraviṣayatvameva prāptamiti kṛtvā pramāṇāntarasyaiva vicāraprāptāviti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1240: kiṃ yatkāryaṃ tadbrahmajamityanumānaṃ brahmasādhakaṃ kiṃ vā yatkāryaṃ tatsakāraṇamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1244: 'parāñci khāni vyatṛṇat svayaṃbhūḥ'iti śruteḥ, brahmaṇo rūpādihīnatvāccetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1245: indriyāgrāhyatve 'pi vyāptigrahaḥ kiṃ na syādataāha-sati hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1247: idaṃ kāryaṃ brahmajamiti vyāptipratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇo 'tīndriyatvānna saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1248: dvitīye kāraṇasiddhāvapi kāraṇasya brahmatvaṃ śrutiṃ vinā jñātumaśakyamityāha--kāryamātramiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1249: saṃbandhaṃ kṛtaṃ yasmāt śrutimantareṇa jagatkāraṇaṃ brahmeti niścayālābhastasmāt tallābhāya śrutireva prādhānyena vicāraṇīyā,
GSP33brssgo1u:1250: anumānaṃ tūpādānatvādisāmānyadvārā mṛdādivat brāhmaṇaḥ svakāryātmakatvādiśrautārthasaṃbhāvanārthaṃ guṇatayā vicāryamityupasaṃharati-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:1252: iha brahmaṇi lakṣaṇārthatvena vicārayitumiṣṭaṃ vākyaṃ kimityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1253: atra hi prathamasūtre viśiṣṭādhikāriṇo brahmavicāraṃ pratijñāya brahmajñātukāmāsya dvitīyasūtre lakṣaṇamucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1254: tathaiva śrutāvapi mumukṣorbrahmajñātukāmasya jagatkāraṇatvopalakṣaṇānuvādena brahma jñāpyata iti śrautārthakramānusāritvaṃ sūtrasya darśayituṃ sopakramaṃvākyaṃ paṭhati-bhṛguriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1258: yadekaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadbrahmeti vā yatkāraṇaṃ tadekaṃ bahmeti vā mahāvākyamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1259: kiṃ tarhi svarūpalakṣaṇamityāśaṅkya vākyaśeṣānnirṇito yataḥśabdārthaḥ satyajñānānanda ityāha--tasya ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1260: 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ' 'tasmādetadbrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ ca jāyate' 'vijñānamānandaṃ brahma'ityādi śākhāntarīyavākyānyapyasya viṣaya ityāha-anyānyapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1262: tadevaṃ sarvāsu śākhāsu lakṣaṇadvayavākyāni jijñāsye brahmaṇi samanvitāni,
GSP33brssgo1u:1270: mahata ṛgvedādeḥ śāstrasyānekavidyāsthānopabṛṃhitasya pradīpavatsarvārthāvadyotinaḥ sarvajñakalpasya yoniḥ kāraṇaṃbrahma /
GSP33brssgo1u:1273: yathā vyākaraṇādi pāṇinyāderjñeyaikadeśārthamapi sa tato 'pyadhikataravijñāna iti prasiddhaṃ loke /
GSP33brssgo1u:1276: tasya mahato bhūtasya niratiśayaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktimattvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1277: athavā yathokta ṛgvedādiśāstraṃ yoniḥ kāraṇaṃ pramāṇamasya brahmaṇo yathāvatsvarūpādhigame /
GSP33brssgo1u:1279: śāstramudāhṛtaṃ pūrvasūtre- 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:1281: yāvatā pūrvasūtra evaivañjātīyakaṃ śāstramudāharatā śāstrayonitvaṃ brahmaṇo darśitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1282: ucyate- tatra pūrvasūtrākṣareṇa spaṣṭaṃ śāstrasyānupādānājjanmādi kevalamanumānamupanyastamityāśaṅkyeta tāmāśaṅkāṃ nirvartayitumidaṃ sūtraṃ pravavṛte śāstrayonitvāditi // 3 //
GSP33brssgo1u:1285: purāṇāni sṛṣṭyādipratipādakavākyāni parakṛtipurākalparūpānarthavādāṃśca prādhānyenopabṛṃhayanti prasaṅgādadvaitabhāgaṃ karmabhāgaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:1291: vyākaraṇaṃ tāvadasminnarthe idaṃ padaṃ sādhviti padārthānvyākaroti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1292: niruktaṃ teṣu teṣu padeṣu yaugikamarthaṃ pradarśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:1294: jyotiṣaṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ jayeddetāmāvāsyāyāmamāvāsyayā yajetetyādinopāttaṃ kālaviśeṣaṃ vyavasthāpayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:1295: tathāca tattaddeśavyākhyānāya bahavo maharṣayaḥ purāṇādinibandhapraṇetāro yatra pravṛttāstasya mahattvaṃ vyaktameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:1303: tathā ca brahma sarvajñaṃ, sarvakāraṇatvāt, yo yatkartā sa tajjñaḥ, yathā kulāla iti sthitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1306: yadvā vedasya nityatvādbrahmaṇaḥ sarvahetutā nāstītyākṣepasaṃgatyā vedahetutvamucyate 'asya mahato bhūtasya niśvasitametadyadṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmavedo 'tharvāṅgirasaḥ'
GSP33brssgo1u:1307: iti vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ tatkiṃ vedahetutvena brahmaṇaḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sādhayati uta na sādhayati iti saṃdehaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1308: tatra vyākaraṇādivadvedasya pauruṣeyatve mūlapramāṇasāpekṣatvenāprāmāṇyāpātānna sādhayatīti pūrvapakṣe jagaddhetoścetanatvātsiddhiḥ phalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1310: asya vedāntavākyasya spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgasya vedakartari samanvayokteḥ śrutiśāstrādhyāyapādasaṃgatayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1317: yadvā yathā adhyetāraḥ pūrvakramaṃ jñātvā vedaṃ kurvanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:1318_1: vedarāśiṃ tadarthāṃśca yugapajjānanneva karotīti na vedasya pauruṣeyatā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1319: yatra hyarthajñānapūrvakaṃ vākyajñānaṃ vākyasṛṣṭau kāraṇaṃ tatra pauruṣeyatā,
GSP33brssgo1u:1321: ato vedakartā vedamiva tadarthamapi svasaṃbaddhaṃ nāntarīyakatayā janātīti sarvajña iti siddhāntayati-śāstreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1323: brahma sarvajñaṃ sarvakāraṇaṃ ca iti saṃgatidvayānusāreṇa sūtrayojanāmabhipretya padāni vyācaṣṭe--mahata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1327: purāṇanyāyamīmāṃsādharmaśāstrāṇi śikṣākalpavyākaraṇaniruktacchandojyotiṣāṇi ṣaḍaṅgāni iti daśa vidyāsthānāni vedārthajñānahetavaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1329: anena manvādibhiḥ parigṛhītatvena vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ sūcitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1332: nanu sarvajñasya yo guṇaḥ sarvārthajñānaśaktimatvaṃ vedasya tadanvitatve 'pi tadyoneḥ sarvajñatvaṃ kuta ityata āha--na hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1333: upādāne tacchaktiṃ vinā kārye tadayogādvedopādānasya sarvajñatvam, anumānaṃ tu pūrvaṃ darśitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1341_0: atraiṣā yojanā--yadyacchāstraṃ yasmādāptātsaṃbhavati sa tataḥ śāstrādadhikārthajñāna
GSP33brssgo1u:1341_1: iti prasiddhaṃ yathā śabdasādhutvādirjñeyaikadeśor'tho yasya tadapi vyākaraṇādi pāṇinyāderadhikārthajñātsaṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:1342_2: saṃbhavaḥ tasya sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktimatvaṃ ceti kimu vaktavyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1345: atrānumānena 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ 'iti śrutyuktasarvajñatvadārḍhyāya pāṇinyādivadvedakartari adikārthajñānasattāmātraṃ sādhyate na tvarthajñānasya vedahetutvaṃ niḥśvasitaśrutivirodhāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:1347_0: iyān viśeṣaḥ--adhyetā parāpekṣaḥ īśvarastu svakṛtavedānupūrvīsvayameva smṛtyā tathaiva
GSP33brssgo1u:1350: 'taṃ tvaupaniṣadaṃ puruṣam'iti śrutirbrahmaṇo vedaikavedyatvaṃ brūte na veti śaṃśaye,
GSP33brssgo1u:1351: kāryaliṅgenaivalāghavāt karturekasya sarvajñasya brahmaṇaḥ siddherna brūte iti prāpte vedapramāṇakatvāt brahmaṇo na pramāṇāntaravedyatvamiti siddhāntayati--śāstrayonitvāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:1354: atra pūrvapakṣe anumānasyaiva vicāryatāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ siddhānte vedāntānāmiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1375: ata eva 'so 'rodīt' ityevamādināmānarthakyaṃ mā bhūditi 'vidhinā tvekavākyatvātstutyarthena vidhinā syuḥ' /
GSP33brssgo1u:1377: mantrāṇāṃ ca 'iṣe tvā' ityādīnāṃ kriyātatsādhanābhidhāyitvena karmasamavāyitvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1378: na Dvacidapi vedavākyānāṃ vidhisaṃsparśamantareṇārthavattā dṛṣṭopapannā vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1379: na ca pariniṣṭhite vastusvarūpe vidhiḥ saṃbhavati, kriyāviṣayatvādvidheḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1388: tatteṣu vedavākyeṣu bhūtānāṃ siddārthapratipādakavākyānāṃ kriyārthena kriyāpratipādakavākyena 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1390: tathāca nindyatvādyarthapūraṇenānvaye kṛte kriyāparatvasiddhyā prāmāṇyaṃ siddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:1394: tadbrahma sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti jagadutpatti sthitilayakāraṇaṃ vedāntaśāstrādevāvagamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1396: sarveṣu hi vedānteṣu vākyāni tātparyeṇaitasyārthasya pratipādakatvena samanugatāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:1404: naca tadgatānāṃ padānāṃ brahmasvarūpaviṣaye niścite samanvaye 'vagamyamāner'thāntarakalpanā yuktā,
GSP33brssgo1u:1418: yadyapyanyatra vedavākyānāṃ vīdhisaṃsparśamantareṇa pramāṇatvaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1419: tathāpyātmavijñānasya phalaparyantatvānna tadviṣayasya śāstrasya prāmāṇyaṃ śakyaṃ pratyākhyātum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1420: na cānumānagamyaṃ śāstraprāmāṇyaṃ, yenānyatra dṛṣṭaṃ nidarśanamapekṣeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:1422: atrāpare pratyavatiphaṣṭhante- yadyapi śāstrapramāṇakaṃ brahma tathāpi pratipattividhiviṣayataiva śāstreṇa brahma samarpyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1423: yathā yūpāhavahanīyādīnyalaukikānyapi vidhiśaṣatayā śāstreṇa samarpyante tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:1426: tathāhi śāstratātparyavida āhuḥ- 'dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1435: sati ca vidhiparatve yathā svargādikāmasyāgnihotrādisādhanaṃ vidhīyata evamamṛtatvakāmasya brahmajñānaṃ vidhīyata iti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1436: nanviha jijñāsyavailakṣaṇyamuktam- karmakāṇḍe bhavyo dharmo jijñāsya iha tu bhūtaṃ nityanivṛttaṃ brahma jijñāsyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1445_0: ityādividhāneṣu satsu ko 'sāvātmā kiṃ tadbrahma ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tatsvarūpasamarpaṇena
GSP33brssgo1u:1445_1: sarve vedāntā upayuktāḥ- 'nityaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvagato nityatṛpto nityāśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvo
GSP33brssgo1u:1450_0: nanu vastumātrakathane 'pi rajuriyaṃ nāyaṃ sarpa ityādau bhrāntijanitabhītinivartanenārthavattvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:1461: śārīraṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca karma śrutismṛtisiddhaṃ dharmākhyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1463: iti sūtritā, adharmo 'pi hiṃsādiḥ pratiṣedhacodanālakṣaṇatvājjijñāsyaḥ parihārāya /
GSP33brssgo1u:1464: tayoścodanālakṣaṇayorarthānarthayordharmādharmayoḥ phale pratyakṣe sukhaduḥkhe śarīravāṅmanobhirevopabhujyamāne viṣayendriyasaṃyogajanye brahmādiṣu sthāvarānteṣu prasiddhe /
GSP33brssgo1u:1473: tathā manuṣyādiṣu nārakasthāvarānteṣu sukhalavaścodanālakṣaṇadharmasādhya eveti gamyate tāratamyena vartamānaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1474: tathordhvagateṣvadhogateṣu ca dehavatsu duḥkhatāratamyardānāttaddhetoradharmasya pratiṣedhacodanākṣaṇasya tadanuṣṭhāyināṃ ca tāratamye gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1475: evamavidyādidoṣavatāṃ dharmādharmatāratamyanimittaṃ śarīropādānapūrvakaṃ sukhaduḥkhatāratamyanimittaṃ saṃsārarūpaṃ śrutismṛtinyāyaprasiddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:1476: tathāca smṛtiḥ- 'na ha vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyayorapahatirasti' iti yathāvarṇitaṃ saṃsārarūpamanuvadati /
GSP33brssgo1u:1477: aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' (chāndo. 8.12.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:1482: mahāntaṃ vibhumātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati' (kāṭha. 1.2.21)
GSP33brssgo1u:1486: tatra kiñcitpariṇāmi nityaṃ yasminvikriyamāṇe 'pi tadevedamiti buddhirna vihanyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1496: yatra dharmādharmī saha kāryeṇa kālatrayaṃ ca nopāvartete /
GSP33brssgo1u:1503: tena ca kartavyena sādhyaścenmokṣo 'bhyupagamyeta, anitya eva syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:1504: tatraivaṃ sati yathoktakarmaphaleṣveva tāratamyāvasthiteṣvanityeṣu kaścidatiśayo mokṣa iti prasajyeta,
GSP33brssgo1u:1516: ityevamādyāḥ śrutayo brahmavidyānantaraṃ mokṣaṃ darśayantyo madhye kāryāntaraṃ vārayanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1519: yathā tiṣṭhangāyatīti tiṣṭhatigāyatyayormadhye tatkartṛkaṃ kāryāntaraṃ nāstīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1520: 'tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā yo 'smākamavidyāyāḥ paraṃ pāraṃ tārayasi' (pra. 6.8)
GSP33brssgo1u:1521: 'śrutaṃ hyeva me bhagavaddṛśebhyastarati śokamātmaviditi so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi tvaṃ mā bhagavacchokasya pāraṃ tārayatu' (chāndo. 7.1.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:1524: tathācāryapraṇītaṃ nyāyopabṛṃhitaṃ sūtram- 'duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānāmuttarottarāpāye tadanantarāpāyādapavargaḥ' (nyā. sū. 1.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1527: yathā 'anantaṃ vai mano 'nantā viśvedevā anantameva sa tena lokaṃ jayati' (bṛha. 3.1.9) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1532: nāpi viśiṣṭakriyāyoganimittaṃ 'vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ' 'prāṇo vāva saṃvargaḥ' (chāndo. 4.3.1) itivat /
GSP33brssgo1u:1541: iti caivamādīni tadbhāvāpattivacanāni saṃpadādipakṣe na sāmañjasyenopapadyeran /
GSP33brssgo1u:1545: evaṃbhūtasya brahmaṇastaj jñānasya ca na kayācidyuktyā śakyaḥ kāryānupraveśaḥ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1549: 'yenedaṃ sarvaṃ vijānāti taṃ kena vijānīyāt' (bṛha. 2.4.13) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:1550: tathopāstikriyākarmatvapratiṣedho 'pi bhavati- yadvācānabhyuditaṃ yena vāgabhyudyate ityaviṣayatvaṃ brahmaṇa upanyasya,
GSP33brssgo1u:1551: 'tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi nedaṃ yadidamupāsate' (kena. 1.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1558: tathāca śāstram- 'yasyāmataṃ tasya mataṃ, mataṃ yasya na veda saḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1560: 'na dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāraṃ paśyeḥ', 'na vijñātervijñātāraṃ vijānīyāḥ' (bṛha. 3.4.2) iti caivamādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:1562: yasya tūtpādyo mokṣastasya mānasaṃ, vācikaṃ, kāyikaṃ vā kāryamapekṣata iti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1563: tathā vikāryatve ca tayoḥ pakṣayormokṣasya dhruvamanityatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1564: nahi dadhyādi vikāryaṃ, utpādyaṃ vā dhaṭādi, nityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ loke /
GSP33brssgo1u:1569: saṃskāro hi nāma saṃskāryasya guṇādhānena vā syāddoṣāpanayanena vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1572: svātmadharma eva saṃsthirobhīto mokṣaḥ kriyayātmani saṃskriyamāṇe 'bhivyajyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:1573: yathā'darśe nigharṣaṇakriyayā saṃskrayamāṇe bhāsvaratvaṃ dharma iticet /
GSP33brssgo1u:1582: nanu dehāśrayayā snānācamanayajñopavītādikayā kriyayā dehī saṃskriyamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1586: tayā dehāśrayayā tatsaṃhata eva kaścidavidyayātmatvena parigṛhītaḥ saṃskriyata iti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1587: yathā dehāśrayacikitsānimittena dhātusāmyena tatsaṃhatasya tadabhimānina ārogyaphalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1589: evaṃ snānācamanayajñopavītādinā ahaṃ śuddhaḥ saṃskṛta iti yatra buddhirutpadyate sa saṃskriyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1591: tenaiva hyahaṅkartrāhaṃpratyayaviṣayeṇa pratyayinā sarvāḥ kriyā nirvartyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:1596: karmādhyakṣaḥ sarvabhūtādhivāsaḥ sākṣī cetā kevalo nirguṇaśca' (śvetā. 6.11) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1599: etau mantrāvanādheyātiśayatāṃ nityaśuddhatāṃ ca brahmaṇo darśayataḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1602: ato 'nyanmokṣaṃ prati kriyānupraveśadvāraṃ na śakyaṃ kenaciddarśayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1603: tasmāt jñānamekaṃ muktvā kriyāyā gandhamātrasyāpyanupraveśa iha nopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1607: kriyā hi nāma sā yatra vastusvarūpanirapekṣaiva codyate, puruṣacittavyāpārādhīnā ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:1608: yathā yasyai devatāyai havirgṛhītaṃ syāttāṃ manasā dhyāyedvṣaṭkariṣyan iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1610: dhyānaṃ cintanaṃ yadyapi mānasaṃ tathāpi puruṣeṇa kartumakartumanyathā vā kartuṃ śakyaṃ, puruṣatantratvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:1612: pramāṇaṃ ca yathābhūtavastuviṣayamato jñānaṃ kartumakartumanyathā vā kartumaśakyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1624: tatraivaṃ sati yathābhūtabrahmātmaviṣayamapi jñānaṃ na codanātantram /
GSP33brssgo1u:1627: kimarthāni tarhi 'ātmā vāre draṣyavyaḥ śrotavyaḥ' ityādīni vidhicchāyāni vacanāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:1629: yo hi bahirmukhaḥ pravartate puruṣaḥ iṣṭaṃ me bhūyādadaniṣṭaṃ mābhūditi,
GSP33brssgo1u:1631: tamātyantikapuruṣārthavāñchinaṃ svābhāvikakāryakaraṇasaṃghātapravṛttigocarādvimukhīkṛtya pratyagātmasrotastayā pravartayanti 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'
GSP33brssgo1u:1635: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet kena kaṃ vijānīyāt vījñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' (bṛha. 4.5.15)
GSP33brssgo1u:1637: yadapyakartavyapradhānamātmajñānaṃ hānāyopādānāya vā na bhavatīti, tattathaivetyabhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1638: alaṅkāro hyayamasmākaṃ yadbrahmātmāvagatau satyāṃ sarvakartavyatāhāniḥ kṛtakṛtyatā ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1645: yadapi kecidāhuḥ- 'pravṛttinivṛttividhitaccheṣavyatirekeṇa kevalavastuvādī vedabhāgo nāsti' iti tanna,
GSP33brssgo1u:1648: nāsau nāsti nādhigamyata iti vā śakyaṃ vaditum,
GSP33brssgo1u:1650: ityāmaśabdāt, ātmanaśca pratyākhyātumaśakyatvāt, ya eva nirākartā tasyaivātmatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:1654: nahyahaṃpratyayaviṣayakartṛvyatirekeṇa tatsākṣī sarvabhūtasthaḥ sama ekaḥ kūṭasthanityaḥ puruṣo vidhikāṇḍe tarkasamaye vā kenacidadhigataḥ sarvasyātmā,
GSP33brssgo1u:1655: ataḥ sa na kenacitpratyākhyātuṃ śakyo vidhiśeṣatvaṃ vā netum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1656: asmatvādeva ca sarveṣāṃ na heyo nāpyupādeyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1662: tasmāt 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭā sā parā gatiḥ' (kāṭha. 1.3.11)
GSP33brssgo1u:1664: iti caupaniṣadatvaviśeṣaṇaṃ puruṣasyopaniṣatsu prādhānyena prakāśyamānatva upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1665: ato bhūtavastuparo vedabhāgo nāstīti vacanaṃ sāhasamātram /
GSP33brssgo1u:1666: yadapi śāstratātparyavidāmanukramaṇam- 'dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanam' ityevamādi,
GSP33brssgo1u:1672: akriyātve 'pi bhūtasya kriyāsādhanatvātkriyārthaṃ eva bhūtopadeśa iti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:1677: yadi nāmopadiṣṭaṃ kiṃ tava tena syāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:1679: tadavagatyā mithyājñānasya saṃsārahetornivṛttiḥ prayojanaṃ kriyata ityavāśiṣṭamarthavattvaṃ kriyāsādhanavastūpadeśena /
GSP33brssgo1u:1680: apica 'brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ' iti caivamādyā nivṛttirupadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1690: tasmātprasaktakriyānivṛttyaudāsīnyameva 'brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ' ityādiṣu pratiṣedhārthaṃ manyāmahe,
GSP33brssgo1u:1693: yadapyuktaṃ- kartavyavidhyanupraveśamantareṇa vastumātramucyamānamānarthakaṃ syāt 'saptadvīpā vasumatī' tyādivaditi, tatparihṛtam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1694: rajuriyaṃ nāyaṃ sarpa iti vastumātrakathane 'pi prayojanasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:1696: atrocyate- nāvagatabrahmātmabhāvasya yathāpūrvaṃ saṃsāritvaṃ śakyaṃ darśayituṃ va vedapramāṇajanitabrahmātmabhāvavirodhāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:1697_0: nahi śarīrādyātmābhimānino duḥkhabhayādimattvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tasyaiva vedapramāṇajanitabrahmātmāvagame
GSP33brssgo1u:1697_1: tadabhimānanivṛttau tadeva mithyājñānanimittaṃ duḥkhabhayādimattvaṃ bhavatīti śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1698: nahi dhanino gṛhasthasya dhanābhimānino dhanāpahāranimittaṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tasyaiva pravrajitasya dhanābhimānarahitasya tadeva dhanāpahranimittaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:1699: naca kuṇḍalinaḥ kuṇḍalitvābhimānanimittaṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭamiti tasyaiva kuṇḍalaviyuktasya kuṇḍalitvābhimānanimittaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:1700: taduktaṃ śrutyā- 'ārīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' (chāndo. 8.12.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1701: śarīre patite 'śarīratvaṃ syāt, na jīvata iti cenna, saśarīratvasya mithyājñānanimittattvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:1702: na hyātmanaḥ śarīrātmābhimānalakṣaṇaṃ mithyājñānaṃ muktvānyataḥ saśarīratvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1710: na tvātmano dhanadānādivaccharīrādibhiḥ svasvāmisaṃbandhanimittaṃ kiñcicchakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1713: atrāhuḥ- dehādivyatiriktasyātmana ātmīye dehādāvabhimāno gauṇo na mithyeti cenna,
GSP33brssgo1u:1716: yathā kesarādimānākṛtiviśeṣo 'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ siṃhaśabdapratyayabhāṅmukhyo 'nyaḥ prasiddhaḥ tataścānyaḥ puruṣaḥ prāyikaiḥ krauryaśauryādibhiḥ siṃhaguṇaiḥ saṃpannaḥ siddhaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1717: tasya puruṣe siṃhaśabdapratyayau gauṇau bhavato nāprasiddhavastubhedasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:1718: tasya tvanyatrānyaśabdapratyayau bhrāntinimittāveva bhavato na gauṇau /
GSP33brssgo1u:1721: tadvaddehādisaṃghāte 'hamiti nirupacāreṇa śabdapratyayāvātmānātmāvivekenotpadyamānau kathaṃ gauṇau śakyau vaditum /
GSP33brssgo1u:1725: tathāca brahmavidviṣayā śrutiḥ- ' tadyathāhinirlvayanī valmīke mṛtā pratyastā śayītaivamevedaṃ śarīraṃ śete /
GSP33brssgo1u:1726: athāyamaśarīro 'mṛtaḥ prāṇo brahmaiva teja eva' (bṛha. 4.4.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1727: 'sacakṣuracakṣuriva sakarṇo 'karṇa iva savāgavāgiva samanā amanā iva saprāṇo 'prāṇa iva' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:1731: yasya tu yathāpūrvaṃ saṃsāritvaṃ nāsāvavagatabrahmātmabhāva ityanavadyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1735: yadi hyavagataṃ brahmānyatra viniyujyeta bhavettadā vidhiśeṣitvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1737: tasmānna pratapattividhiviṣayatayā śāstrapramāṇakatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ saṃbhavatītyataḥ svatantrameva brahma śāstrapramāṇakaṃ vedāntavākyasamanvayāditi siddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:1738: evañca sati 'athāto brahmajijñāsā' iti tadviṣayaḥ pṛthakśāstramārambha upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1740: ārabhyamāṇaṃ caivamārabhyeta - 'athātaḥ pariśiṣṭadharmajijñāseti' ' athātaḥ kratvarthapuruṣārthayorjijñāsā' (jai. 4.1.1) itivat /
GSP33brssgo1u:1741: brahmātmaikyāvagatistvapratijñāteti tadartho yuktaḥ śāstrārambhaḥ- 'athāto brahmajijñāsā' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1742: tasmādahaṃ brahmāsmītyetadavasānā eva sarve viṣayaḥ sarvāṇi cetarāṇi pramāṇāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:1753: FN: pūrvapakṣiṇā kriyāśeṣatayā brahma pratipādyata ityuktaṃ tadvyāvṛttyarthamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1754: pūrṇatayā juhūdvārā kratuśeṣatāvādātmano 'pi jñānadvārā karmaśeṣatvāttadarthā vedāntāstadvidhiśeṣā bhaviṣyantītyāśaṅkyāha tatkeneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1757: yathāvā śrāddhe piṇḍapradānapūjottaraṃ piṇḍānāṃ gaṅgādipravāhe prakṣepaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1765: valkalādivaccittarañjako rāgādikaṣāyo mṛditaḥ kṣālitaḥ vināśito yasya jñānavairāgyābhyāsakṣārajalena tasmai /
GSP33brssgo1u:1772: yadvācā śabdenānabhyuditamaprakāśitaṃ, yena bhmaṇā sā vāgabhyadyate prakāśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:1774: svātmano dharmānāśrayatve 'pi nityo dharmo mokṣākhyo bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyeṇa dharmaśabdaḥ, svarūpaparo vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1781: tathāca - 'māyā hyeṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yanmāṃ paśyasi nārada /
GSP33brssgo1u:1798: ahaṃpratyayaviṣayo yaḥ kartā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātopahito jīvātmā tadvyatirekeṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:1806: ahinirlvayanī sarpatvak valmīkādau pratyastā nikṣiptā mṛtā sarpeṇa tyaktābhimānā vartata evamityādyūhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1809: athāta iti tṛtīye śrutyādibhiḥ śeṣaśeṣitve siddhe satyanantaraṃ śeṣiṇaiva śeṣasya prayuktisaṃbhavātkonāma kratave kovā puruṣārtāyeti jijñāsā pravṛttā caturthādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:1816: tathāca lokayātrakāryaṃ sadbrahmāhamiti bodhakāryaṃ- advaitasākṣātkāraśca kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo1u:1821: vedāntāḥ siddhabrahmaparā uta kāryaparā iti niṣphalatvasāpekṣatvayoḥ prasaṅgāprasaṅgābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvasūtre dvitīyavarṇakenākṣepasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha--kathaṃ punarityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:1824: pūrvapakṣe vedānteṣu mumukṣupravṛttyasiddhiḥ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1826: yato jaiminisūtreṇa śāstrasya vedasya kriyāparatvaṃ darśitamato 'kriyārthatvādvedāntanāmānarthakyaṃ phalavadarthaśūnyatvaṃ prāptamityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1828: 'codanālakṣaṇor'tho dharmaḥ'iti dvitīyasūtre dharme kārye codanā pramāṇamiti vedaprāmāṇyavyāpakaṃ kāryaparatvamavasitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:1829_0: tatra'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā'ityādyarthavādānāṃ dharme prāmāṇyamasti na veti saṃśaye
GSP33brssgo1u:1829_1: āmnāyaprāmāṇyasya kriyārthatvena vyāptatvāt arthavādeṣu dharmasyāpratīteḥ akriyārthānāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:1830: na cādhyayanavidhyupāttānāṃ niṣphale siddher'the prāmāṇyaṃ yuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1833: evaṃ pūrvapakṣe 'pi 'vidhinā tvekavākyatvāt stutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syuḥ'iti sūtreṇa siddhāntamāha--kriyāparatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1835: vāyurvai kṣipratamagāminī devatā taddevatākaṃ karma kṣiprameva phalaṃ dāsyati,
GSP33brssgo1u:1836: ityevaṃ vidheyārthānāṃ stutirūpārthena dvāreṇa 'vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta'ityādi vidhivākyenaikavākyatvādarthavādāḥ saphalāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:1839_0: na vayaṃ vedāntānāmānarthakyaṃ sādhayāmaḥ kintu loke siddhasya mānābhāvāntaravedyatvānniṣphalatvācca
GSP33brssgo1u:1842: nanu karmaviśeṣamanārabhya prakaraṇāntarādhītānāṃ vedāntānāṃ kathaṃ taccheṣakatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:1846: nanu śrutaṃ brahma vihāyāśrutaṃ kāryaparatvaṃ kimarthaṃ vaktavyamiti tatrāha--nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:1854: siddho na vedārthaḥ, mānāntarayogyatvādghaṭavadityuktvā niṣphalatvācca tathetyāha-tatheti /

GSP33brssgo1u:2268: ātmano mūlāvidyāpratibimbitatvena gṛhītasya naro 'hamiti bhrāntyā dehatādātmyamāpannasya kriyāśrayatvabhrāntyā saṃskāryatvabhramānna vyabhicāra ityāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2272: nanu dehābhinnasya kathaṃ saṃskāraḥ, tasyāmuṣmikaphalabhoktṛtvāyogādityata āha-teneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2273: dehasaṃhatenaivāntaḥkaraṇapratibimbātmanā kartāhamiti bhāsamānena pratyayāḥ kāmādayo manastādātmyādasya santīti pratyayinā kriyāphalaṃ bhujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2275: viśiṣṭasya bhoktṛtvaṃ na kevalasya sākṣiṇa ityatra mānamāha-tayoriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2276: pramātṛsākṣiṇormadhye sattvasaṃsargamātreṇa kalpitakartṛtvādimān pramātā pippalaṃ karmaphalaṃ bhuṅkte,
GSP33brssgo1u:2277: sa eva śodhitatvenānyaḥ sākṣitayā prakāśata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2280: evaṃ sopādhikasya ciddhātormithyāsaṃskāryatvamuktvā nirupādhikasyāsaṃskāryatve mānamāha-eka iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2283: nanu jīvenāsaṃbandhādbhinnatvādvā devasyābhānaṃ na tu māyāgūhanāditi,
GSP33brssgo1u:2294: nirguṇatvānnirdeṣatvācca guṇo doṣanāśo vā saṃskāro notyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2296: sa eva ātmā pari sarvamagāt vyāptaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2312: tathā ca mokṣe kriyānupraveśo nāstīti vyāhṛtamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2316: yatra viṣaye tadanapekṣayaiva yā codyate tatra sā hi kriyeti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2320: sandhyāṃ devatāmiti caivamādhivākyeṣu yathā yādṛśī dhyānakriyā vastvānapekṣā,
GSP33brssgo1u:2325: dhyānakriyamuktvā tato vailakṣaṇyaṃ jñānasya sphuṭayati-jñānaṃ tviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2330: abhedasattve 'pi vidhito dhyānaṃ kartuṃ śakyaṃ, na jñānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2331: nanu pratyakṣajñānasya viṣayajanyatayā tattantratve 'pi śābdabodhasya tadabhāvādvidheyakriyātvamiti netyāha-evaṃ sarveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2337: nanu 'ātmānaṃ paśyeta' 'brahma tvaṃ viddhi' 'ātmā draṣṭavyaḥ'iti vijñāne liṅloṭtavyapratyayā vidhāyatāḥ śrūyante,
GSP33brssgo1u:2339: tasmin jñānarūpaviṣaye vidhayaḥ puruṣaṃ pravartayitumaśaktā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2340: aniyojyaṃ kṛtyasādhyaṃ niyojyaśūnyaṃ vā jñānaṃ tadviṣayakatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2341: mamāyaṃ niyoga iti boddhā niyojyo viṣayaśca vidhernāstīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2349: stutyā ātyantikeṣṭahetutvabhrāntyā yā viṣayeṣu pravṛttirātmaśravaṇādipratibandhikā tannivṛttiphalāni vidhipadānītyāha--svābhāviketi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2358: advitīyādṛśyātmabodhe vidhistapasvī dvaitavanopajīvanaḥ kva stāsyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2360: ayaṃ svayaṃ paramānandaḥ paramātmāhamasmi iti yadi kaścitpuruṣa ātmānaṃ jānīyāttadā kiṃ phalamicchan,
GSP33brssgo1u:2372_0: na ca pravṛttinivṛttiliṅgābhyāṃ śrotustadhetuṃ kāryabodhamanumāya vaktṛvākyasya kāryaparatvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:2372_1: niścitya vākyasthapadānāṃ kāryānvite śaktigrahānna siddhasyāpadārthasya vākyārthatvamiti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo1u:2373: putraste jāta iti vākyaśrotuḥ piturharṣaliṅgeneṣṭaṃ putrajanmānumāya putrādipadānāṃ siddhe saṃgatigrahāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2376: kiñca brahmaṇo nāstītvādeva kṛtsnavedasya kāryaparatvaṃ uta vedānteṣu tasyābhānāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2381: nāstītvābhāve hetuṃ vedāntamānasiddhatvamuktvā hetvantaramātmatvamāha--sa eṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2383: idaṃ na idaṃ na iti sarvadṛśyaniṣedhena ya ātmā upadiṣṭaḥ sa eṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2386: yaṃ tīrthakārā api na jānanti tasyālaikikatvaṃ kimu vācyamityāha--nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2401: paraprāptyarthaṃ ātmā heyā ityata āha-tasmāt, puruṣānna paraṃ kiñciditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2406: taṃ sakāraṇasūtrasyādhiṣṭhānaṃ puruṣaṃ pūrṇaṃ he śākalya, tvā tvāṃ pṛcchāmītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2410: vedasya nairarthakye śaṅkite tasyārthavattāparamidaṃ bhāṣyam--dṛṣṭo hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2411: tatra 'phalavadarthāvabodhanam'iti vaktavye dharmavicāraprakramāt 'karmāvabodhanaṃ'ityuktaṃ naitāvatā vedāntānāṃ brahmaparatvanirāsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2412: ata eva 'anupalabdher'the tatpramāṇam'iti sūtrakāro dharmasya phalavadajñātatvenaiva vedārthatāṃ darśayati taccāvaśiṣṭaṃ brahmaṇa iti na vṛddhavākyairvirodha ityāha-taddharmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2417_0: loke pravartakajñānagocaratvena kḷptaṃ yāgādikriyāgatamiṣṭasādhanatvameva na kriyāto
GSP33brssgo1u:2418: kiṃ ca vedāntāḥ siddhavastuparāḥ,phalavadbhūtaśabdatvāt, dadhyādi śabdavadityāha--api ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2422: iti nyāyena etadabhidheyarāhityaṃ niyamenāṅgīkurvatāṃ 'somena yajeta' 'dadhnā juhoti'ityādi vākyeṣu dadhisomādiśabdānāmarthaśūnyatvaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2424: kāryātirekeṇa bhavyārthatvena kāryaśeṣatvena dadhyādiśabdo bhūtaṃ vakti cet,
GSP33brssgo1u:2425: tarhi satyādiśadabdaḥ kūṭasthaṃ na vaktītyatra ko hetuḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2430: ato bhūtasya kāryādbhinnasya dadhyādeḥ śabdārthatvaṃ labdhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2433: bhūtasya kāryaśeṣatvaṃ śabdārthatvāya phalāya vā, nādya ityāha--naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2434: dadhyādeḥ kāryaśeṣatve satyapi śabdena vastumātramevopadiṣṭaṃ na kāryānvayī śabdārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2437: tasya bhūtaviśeṣasya dadhyādeḥ kriyāśeṣatvaṃ phalamuddiśyāṅgīkriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2439: nanu bhūtasya kāryaśeṣatvāṅgīkāre svātantryeṇa kathaṃ śabdārthateti, tatrāha--na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2440: phalārthaṃ śeṣatvāṅgīkāramātreṇa śabdārthatvabhaṅge nāsti śeṣatvasya śabdārthatāyāmapraveśādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2442: yadyapi dadhyādi svato niṣphalamapi kriyādvārā saphalatvādupadiṣṭaṃ tathāpi kūṭasthabrahmavādinaḥ kriyādvārābhāvāt tena dṛṣṭāntena ki phalaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2443: bhūtasya sāphalye kriyaiva dvāramiti na niyamaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2447: dadhyādeḥ kriyādvārā sāphalyaṃ brahmaṇastu svata iti viśeṣe satyapi vedāntānāṃ saphalabhūtārthakatvamātreṇa dadhyādyupadeśasāmyamityanavadyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2455: na ca hananābhāvarūpā nañvācyā nivṛttiḥ kriyā, abhāvatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2460: nanu svabhāvato rāgataḥ prāptena hantyarthenānurāgeṇa nañsaṃbandhena hetunā hananavirodhinī saṃkalpakrīyā bodhyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:2463: tathā ca kāryārthakamidaṃ vākyamityāśaṅkya niṣedhati-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2464: audāsīnyaṃ puruṣasya svarūpaṃ tacca hananakriyānivṛttyupalakṣitaṃ nivṛttyaudāsīnyaṃ hananābhāva iti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:2465: tadvyatirekeṇa nañaḥ kriyārthatvaṃ kalpayituṃ na ca śakyamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2466: mukhyārthasyābhāvasya nañarthatvasaṃbhave tadvirodhikriyālakṣaṇāyā anyāyyatvāt niṣedhavākyasyāpi kāryārthakatve vidhiniṣekabhedaviplavāpatteśceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2467: nanu tadabhāvavattadanyatadviruddhayorapi nañaḥ śaktiḥ kiṃ na syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2473: brāhmaṇādanyasmin kṣatriyādau, dharmaviruddhe vā pāpe brahmaṇādyabhāvasya nañśakyasya saṃbandhāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2474: prakṛte ca ākhyātayogānnañ prasajyapratiṣedhaka eva na paryudāsalakṣakaḥ iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2475: yadvā nañaḥ prakṛtyā na saṃbandhaḥ prakṛteḥ pratyayārtho 'saparjanatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2476: pradhānasaṃbandhāccāpradhānānāṃ kintu prakṛtyarthaniṣṭhena pratyayārtheneṣṭasādhanatvena saṃbandho nañaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2477: iṣṭaṃ ca svāpekṣayā balavadaniṣṭānanubandhi yattadeva na tātkālikasukhamātraṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2479: tathā ca na 'hantavyaḥ'hananaṃ balavadaniṣṭāsādhanatve sati iṣṭasādhanaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2480: atra ca 'hantavyaḥ'iti hanane viśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatvaṃ bhrāntiprāptamanūdya netyabhāvabodhane balavadaniṣṭasādhanaṃ hananamiti buddhirbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:2482: viśeṣaṇaṃ balavadaniṣṭāsādhanatvamiti tadabhāvo balavadaniṣṭasādhanatvaṃ nañarthaṃ iti paryavasannam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2486: buddheḥ kṣaṇikatvāttadabhāve satyaudāsīnyātpracyutirūpā hananādau pravṛttiḥ syāditi, atrāha-sā ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2487: yathāgnirindanaṃ dagdhvā śyāmyati evaṃ sā nañarthābhāvabuddhiḥ hananādāviṣṭasādhanatvabhrāntimūlaṃ rāgendhanaṃ dagdhvaiva śāmyatītyakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2489: yadvā rāgataḥ prāptā sā kriyā rāganāśe svayameva śāmyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2490: parapakṣe tu hananavirodhikriyā kāryetyukte 'pi hananasyeṣṭasādhanatvabhrāntyanirāsāt pracyutirdurvārā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2497: evamagaurasurā adharma ityādau nāmadhātvarthayuktasya nañaḥ pratiṣedhavācitvāyogāt anyaviruddhalakṣakatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2499: duḥkhābhāvaphalake nañarthe siddhe niṣedhaśāstramānatvavadvedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi mānatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2503: śravaṇajñānamātrātsaṃsārānivṛttāvapi sākṣātkārājjīvata eva muktirdurapahnayeti sadṛṣṭāntamāha-atrocyata ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2507: ātmano dehasaṃbandhasya bhrāntiprayuktatvāttatvadhiyā tannāśarūpamaśarīratvaṃ jīvato yuktamityāha-netyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2508: asaṅgātmarūpaṃ tvaśarīratvaṃ tatvadhiyā jīvato vyajyata ityāha-nityamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2515: pūrvadehaśca tatpūrvadehakṛtakarmaṇa iti bījāṅkuravadanāditvānnāyaṃ doṣa ityata āha-andheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2517: na hi bījāṅkuraḥ tato bījāntaraṃ ca yathā pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyate tadvadātmano dehasaṃbandhaḥ pūrvakarmakṛtaḥ pratyakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2522: svato niṣkriyasyāpi kārakasaṃnidhinā kartṛtvamiti śaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyeṇa nirasyati-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2523: rājādīnāṃ svakrītabhṛtya kartṛtvaṃ yuktaṃ nātmana ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2531: prasiddho jñāto vastunorbhedo yena tasya gauṇamukhyajñānāśrayatva prasiddherityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2532: yasya tasya puṃso gauṇau bhavatā ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2539: yadā saṃśayamūlayorna gauṇatvaṃ tadā bhrāntimūlayoḥ kiṃ vācyamityāha-yathā veti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2547: yathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ ahinirlvayanī sarpatvak vālmīkādau pratyastā nikṣiptā mṛtā sarpeṇa tyaktābhimānā vartate,
GSP33brssgo1u:2549: atha tathā tvacā nirmuktasarpavadevāyaṃ dehastho 'śarīraḥ viduṣo dehe sarpasya tvacīvābhimānābhāvādaśarīratvādamṛtaḥ prāṇitīti prāṇo jīvannapi brahmaiva,
GSP33brssgo1u:2555: brahmajñānamuddiśya śravaṇavanmanananididhyāsanayorapyavāntaravākyabhedena vidhyaṅgīkārānna brahmaṇo vidhiśeṣatvaṃ uddeśyajñānalabhyatayā prādhānyādityāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2559: tarhi jñāne vidhiḥ kimiti tyaktaḥ, tatrāha-yadi hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2560: yadi jñāne vidhimaṅgīkṛtya vedānatairavagataṃ brahma vidheyajñāne karmakārakatvena viniyujyeta tadā vidhiśeṣatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2561: na tvavagatasya viniyuktatvamasti, prāptāvagatyā phalalābhe vidhyayogādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2568: uktarītyā brahmaṇaḥ svātantrye satyeva bhagavato vyāsasya pṛthakśāstrakṛtiryuktā,
GSP33brssgo1u:2573: ato bāhyadharmasya śuddhidvārā mānasopāsanādharmahetutvātpariśiṣṭo mānasadharmo jijñāsya iti sūtraṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2575: tṛtīyādhyāye śrutyādibhiḥśeṣaśeṣitvanirṇayānantaraṃ śeṣiṇāśeṣasya prayogasaṃbhavāt kaḥ kratuśeṣaḥ ko vā puruṣaśeṣaḥ iti vijñāsyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2579: jaimininā brahma na vicāritamiti tajjijñāsyatvasūtraṇaṃ yuktamityarathaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2580: vedāntārthaścedadvaitaṃ tarhi dvaitasāpekṣavidhyādīnāṃ kā gatirityāśaṅkya jñānātprāgeva teṣāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na paścādityāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2582: brahma na kāryaśeṣaḥ, tadbodhātprāgeva sarvavyavahāra ityatra brahmavidāṃ gāthāmudāharati-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2583_0: sadabādhitaṃ brahma pūrvamātmā viṣayānādatta iti sarvasākṣyahamityevaṃbodhe jāte
GSP33brssgo1u:2583_2: naro 'haṃ kartā mūḍha iti mithyātmābhimānasya ca sarvavyavahārahetorasatve kāryaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:2587: jñātavyaparamātmavijñānātprāgevājñānācciddhātorātmānaḥ pramātṛtvaṃ pramātaiva jñātaḥ san pāpmarāgadveṣamaraṇavivarjitaḥ paramātmā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2588: pramātṛtvasya kalpitatve tadāśritānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ prāmāṇya kathamityata āha-deheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2589: dehātmatvapratyayaḥ kalpito bhramo 'pi vyavahārāṅgatayā mānatveneṣyate vaidikaiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2591: vedāntānāṃ tu kālatrayābādhyabodhitvāt tatvāvedakaṃ prāmāṇyamiti tu śabdārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2602: evaṃ tāvadvedāntavākyānāṃ brahmātmāvagatiprayojanānāṃ brahmātmani tātparyeṇa samanvitānāmantareṇāpi kāryānupraveśaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2605: sāṃkhyādayastu pariniṣṭhitaṃ vastu pramāṇāntaragamyameveti manyamānāḥ pradhānādīni kāraṇāntarāṇyanumimānāstatparatayaiva vedāntavākyāni yojayanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2606: sarveṣveva vedāntavākyeṣu sṛṣṭiviṣayeṣvanumānenaiva kāryeṇa kāraṇaṃ lilakṣayiṣitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2608: kāṇādāstvetebhya eva vākyebhya īśvaraṃ nimittakāraṇamanumimate aṇūṃśca samavāyikāraṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2610: tatra padavākyapramāṇajñenācāryeṇa vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmāvagatiparatvadarśanāya vākyābhāsayuktābhāsavipratipattayaḥ pūrvapakṣīkṛtya nirākriyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:2611_0: tatra sāṃkhyāḥ pradhānaṃ triguṇamacetanaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti manyamānā āhuḥ- yāni
GSP33brssgo1u:2615: yattu jñānaṃ manyase sa sattvadharmaḥ , 'sattvātsaṃjāyate jñānam' (gī. 14.17) iti smṛteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2616: tena ca sattvadharmeṇa jñānena kāryakāraṇavantaḥ puruṣāḥ sarvajñā yoginaḥ prasiddhāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2618: na kevalasyākāryakāraṇasya puruṣopalabdhimātrasya sarvajñatvaṃ kiñcijjñatvaṃ vā kalpayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2619: triguṇatvāttu pradhānasya sarvajñānakāraṇabhūtaṃ sattvaṃ pradhānāvasthāyāmapi vidyata iti pradhānasyācetanasyaiva sataḥ sarvajñatvamupacaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2620: vedāntavākyeṣvavaśyaṃ ca tvayāpi sarvajñaṃ brahmābhyupagacchatā sarvajñānāktimattvenaiva sarvajñatvamupagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2621: nahi sarvaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ kurvadeva brahma vartate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2622: tathāhi- jñānasya nityatve jñānakriyāṃ prati svātantryaṃ brahmaṇo hīyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:2628: nāsaṃhatasyaikātmakasya brahmaṇa ityevaṃ prāptaṃ idaṃ sūtramārabhyate-
