GSP33brssgo1u:2631: buddhau yaḥ pratibimbaḥ sa tādṛśabimbapūrvakaḥ pratibimbatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2640: na sāṃkhyaparikalpitamacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ śakyaṃ vedānteṣvāśrayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:2646: ityupakramya 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti tattejo 'sṛjata' (chāndo. 6.2.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2647: tatredaṃśabdavācyaṃ nāmarūpavyākṛtaṃ jagatprāgutpatteḥ sadātmanāvadhārya tasyaiva prakṛtasya sacchabdavācyasyekṣaṇapūrvakaṃ tejaḥprabhṛteḥ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:2659: yattūktaṃ sattvadharmeṇa jñānena sarvajñaṃ pradhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, tannopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2663: yadi guṇasāmye sati sattvavyapāśrayāṃ jñānāktimāśritya sarvajñaṃ pradhānamucyeta kāmaṃ rajastamovyapāśrayāmapi jñānapratibandhakaśaktimāśritya kiñcijjñamucyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:2669: tathāsati yannimittamīkṣitṛtvaṃ pradhānasya tadeva sarvajñaṃ mukhyaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇamiti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2672: atrocyate- idaṃ tāvadbhavānpraṣṭavyaḥ, kathaṃ nityajñānakriyatve sarvajñatvahāniriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2673: yasya hi sarvaviṣayāvabhāsanakṣamaṃ jñānaṃ nityamasti so 'sarvajña iti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:2674: anityatve hi jñānasya kadācijjānāti kadācinnajānātītyasarvajñatvamapi syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2675: nāsau jñānanityatve doṣo 'sti jñānanityatve jñānaviṣayaḥ svātantryavyapadeśo nopapadyata iti cenna,
GSP33brssgo1u:2677: nanu saviturdāhyaprakāśasaṃyoge sati dahati prakāśayatīti vyapadeśaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2680: asatyapi karmaṇi savitā prakāśata iti kartṛtvavyapadeśadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2681: evamasatyapi jñānakarmaṇi brahmaṇaḥ 'tadaikṣata' iti kartṛtvavyapadeśopapatterna vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2684: tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīye nāmarūpe avyākṛte vyācikīrṣite iti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2686: kimu vaktavyaṃ tasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasya sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhṛtiviṣayaṃ nityajñānaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2690: apicāvidyādimataḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ śarīrādyapekṣā jñānotpattiḥ syānna jñānapratibandhakāraṇarahitasyeśvarasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:2691: mantrau cemāvīśvarasya śarīrādyanapekṣatāmanāvaraṇajñānatāṃ ca darśayataḥ- 'na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate na tatsamaścābhyadhikaśca dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2692: parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca' (śvetā. 6.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2694: sa vetti vedyaṃ na ca tasyāsti vettā tamāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam' (śvetā. 3.19) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:2699: tathāpi dehādisaṃghātopādhisaṃbandha ityata eva, ghaṭakarakagiriguhādyupādhisaṃbandha iva vyomnaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2700: tatkṛtaśca śabdapratyayavyavahāro lokasya dṛṣṭo ghaṭacchidraṃ karakādicchidramityādirākāśāvyatireke 'pi tatkṛtā cākāśe ghaṭākāśādibhedamithyābuddhirdṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2702: dṛśyate cātmana eva sato dehādisaṃghāte 'nātmanyātmatvābhiniveśo mithyābuddhimātreṇa pūrveṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:2706: yathā tu tarkeṇāpi brahmaṇa eva kāraṇatvaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyate na pradhānādīnāṃ tathā prapañcayiṣyati- 'na vilakṣaṇatvādasya'- (bra. 2.1.4)
GSP33brssgo1u:2709: bhavatu siddhe vedāntānāṃ samanvayaḥ tathāpi mānāntarāyoge brahmaṇi śaktigrahāyogāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2713: ghaṭavat ityanumānagamye triguṇe pradhāne samanvaya ityākṣipantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2715: ata eva pradhānādavanumānopasthite śaktigrahasaṃbhavāt tatparatayā vākyāni yojayantītyuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2717: śuṅgena liṅgena kāraṇasya svato 'nveṣaṇaṃ darśayanto mānāntarasiddhameva jagatkāraṇaṃ vadantītyāha-sarveṣviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2721: yathā rathādiriti sāmānyatodṛṣṭānumānagamyāḥ pradhānapuruṣa saṃyogā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2723: sṛṣṭivākyebhya eva parārthānumānarūpebhyo yatkāryaṃ tadbuddhimatkartṛkamitīśvaraṃ kartāraṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2727: yadvastu tacchūnyāvasānaṃ, yathā dīpa iti yuktyābhāsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2736: acetanasatvasyaiva sarvajñatvaṃ, na cetanasyetyāha-tena ca satvadharmeṇeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2740: trayo guṇā eva pradhānaṃ tasyasāmyavasthā tadabhedapradhānamityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2742: nanu mayā kimiti śaktimatvarūpaṃ gauṇaṃ sarvajñatvamaṅgīkāryamiti, tatrāha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2743: anityajñānasya pralaye nāśācchaktimatvaṃ vācyaṃ kārakābhāvāccetyāha-api ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2753: evaṃ tatsadīkṣitvā ākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā tejaḥ sṛṣṭavadityāha-taditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2755_0: satvākrāntamiti yāvat sa jīvābhinnaḥ paramātmā 'prāṇamasṛjata prāṇācchraddhāṃ khaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:2755_1: vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivīndriyaṃ mano annamannādvīryaṃ tapo mantrāḥ karmalokālokeṣu
GSP33brssgo1u:2756: nanu 'ikśitapo dhātunirdeśe'iti kātyāyanasmaraṇādīkṣateriti padena śtibantena dhāturucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2757: tena dhātvarthaṃ īkṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ vyākhyāyata ityaśaṅkya lakṣaṇayetyāha-īkṣiteriticeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2758: 'itikartavyatāvidheryajateḥ pūrvavatvaṃ'iti jaiminisūtre yathā yajatipadena lakṣaṇayā dhātvartho yāga ucyate tadvidihāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2766: saṃprati na kevalajaḍavṛttirjñānaśabdārthaḥ kintu sākṣibodhaviśiṣṭā vṛttirvṛttivyaktabodho vā jñānam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2769: nanu sattvavṛttimātreṇa yogināṃ sarvajñatvamuktamityata āha-yogināṃt tviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2775: nityasyāpi jñānasya tattadarthopahitatvena brahmasvarūpādbhedaṃ kalpayitvā kāryatvopacārādbrahmaṇastatkartṛtvavyapadeśaḥ sādhuriti sadṛṣṭāntamāha-na pratateti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2778: nanu prakāśaterakarmakatvātsavitā prakāśata iti prayoge 'pi jānāteḥ sakarmakatvātkarmābhāve 'tadaikṣata'ityayuktamiti,
GSP33brssgo1u:2780: karmāvivakṣāyāmapi prakāśarūpe savitari prakāśata iti kathañcitprakāśakriyāśrayatvena kartṛtvopacāravaccidātmanyapi cidrūpekṣaṇakartṛtvopacārānna vaiṣamyamityuktaṃ pūrvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2784: nanu māyopādhikabimbacinmātrasyeśvarasya kathamīkṣaṇaṃ prati mukhyaṃ kartṛtvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2790: avyākṛte sūkṣmātmanā sthite vyākartuṃ sthūlīkartumiṣṭe ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2791: avyākṛtakāryoparaktacaitanyarūpekṣaṇasya kārakānapekṣatve 'pi vṛttirūpekṣaṇasya kārakaṃ vācyamityāśaṅkyāha-apicāvidyādimata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2792: yathaikasya jñānaṃ tathānyasyāpīti niyamābhāvānmāyino 'śarīrasyāpi janyekṣaṇakārakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2793: nanu yajjanyajñānaṃ taccharīrasādhyamiti vyāptirastītyāśaṅkya śrutibādhamāha-mantrau ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2798: jñānarūpeṇa balena yā sṛṣṭikriyā sā svābhāvikī /
GSP33brssgo1u:2800: jñānasya caitanyasya balaṃ māyāvṛttipratibimbitattvena sphuṭatvaṃ tasya kriyānāma bimbatvena brahmaṇo janakatā jñātṛtāpi svābhāvikīti vārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2819: vastuto dehādibhinnasvaprakāśasyaiva sata ātmano naro 'hamiti bhramodṛṣṭatvāddurapahnavaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2820: sa ca mithyābuddhyā mīyata iti mithyābuddhimātreṇa bhrāntisiddhājñānena kalpita iti cakārārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2824: pūrvapūrvabhrāntimātreṇa dṛśyate na ca prameyatayeti vārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2831: atrāha- yaduktaṃ nācetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagatkāraṇamīkṣitṛtvāditi tadanyathāpyupapadyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:2833: yathā pratyāsannapatanatāṃ nadyāḥ kūlasyālakṣya kūlaṃ pipātiṣatītyacetane 'pi kūle cetanavadupacāro dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2834: tadvadacetano 'pi pradhāne pratyāsannasarge cetanavadupacāro bhaviṣyati 'tadaikṣata' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2835: yathā loke kaściccetanaḥ snātvā bhuktvā cāparāhne grāmaṃ rathena gamiṣyāmītīkṣitvānantaraṃ tathaiva niyamena pravartate,
GSP33brssgo1u:2857: yaduktaṃ pradhānamacetanaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ tasminnaupacārika īkṣatiḥ, aptejasoriveti, tadasat /
GSP33brssgo1u:2860: iti ca tejo 'bannānāṃ sṛṣṭimuktvā tadeva prakṛtaṃ sadīkṣitṛ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2862: devatāśabdena parāmṛśyāha- 'seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupravaśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi' (chāndo. 6.3.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2863: tatra yadi pradhānamacetanaṃ guṇavṛttyekṣitṛ kalpyeta tadeva prakṛtatvātseyaṃ devateti parāmṛśyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:2865: jīvo hi nāma cetanaḥ śarīrādhyakṣaḥ prāṇānāṃ dhārayitā, tatprasiddhernirvacanācca /
GSP33brssgo1u:2868: nācetanasya pradhānasya cetano jīvaḥ svarūpaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:2869: atha tu cetanaṃ brahma mukhyamīkṣitṛ parigṛhyate tasya jīvaviṣaya ātmaśabdaprayoga upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2870: tathā 'sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' (chāndo. 6.14.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:2871: ityatra 'sa ātmā' iti prakṛtaṃ sadaṇimānamātmānamātmaśabdenopadiśya 'tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti cetanasya śvetaketorātmatvenopadiśati,
GSP33brssgo1u:2879: nanu pradhānasya cetanena kiṃ sāmyaṃ yena gauṇamīkṣaṇamiti tatrāha-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2884: sā prakṛtā sacchabdavācyā iyamīkṣitrī devatā parokṣā hanta idānīṃ bhūtasṛṣṭyanantaraṃ imāḥ sṛṣṭāstisrastejo 'bannarūpāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2886: anena pūrvakalpānubhūtenajīvenātmanā mama svarūpeṇa tā anupraviśya tāsāṃ bhogyatvāya nāma ca rūpaṃ ca sthūlaṃ kariṣyāmītyaikṣatetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2889: svapakṣe tu bimbapratibimbayorloke bhedasyakalpitatvadarśanājjīvo brāhmaṇaḥ sata ātmeti yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2890: jīvasya sacchabdārthaṃ pratyātmaśabdāt sanna pradhānamityuktvā satau jīvaṃ pratyātmaśabdānna pradhānamiti vidhāntareṇa hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2896: he śvetaketo, tvaṃ ca nāsi saṃsārī, kintu tadeva sadabhādhitaṃ sarvātmakaṃ brahmāsīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2902: āptejasodṛgviṣayatvātsṛjyatvānniyamyatvāccācetanatvamīkṣaṇasya mukhyatve bādhakamasti sādhakaṃ ca nāstīti hetoryuktamīkṣaṇasya gauṇatvamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2906: syādetadyadi sata īkṣaṇaṃ mukhyaṃ syāttadeva kuta ityata āha-satastviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2913: yathā rājñaḥ sarvārthakāriṇi bhṛtye bhavatyātmaśabdo mamātmā bhadrasena iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2922: anena pūrvasṛṣṭyanubhūtena prāṇadhṛtihetunāmātmanā sadrūpeṇa yathoktā devatāḥ sargānantaraṃ praviśya nāma rūpaṃ ceti vispaṣṭamāsamantātkaravāṇīti parā devatekṣitavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2926_0: 'sa ātmā' iti prakṛtaṃ sadaṇimānamādāya 'tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti cetanasya śvetaketormokṣayitavyasya
GSP33brssgo1u:2926_1: tanniṣṭhamupadiśya 'ācāryavānpuruṣo veda' 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye
GSP33brssgo1u:2927: yadi hyacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ tadasīti grāhayenmumukṣuṃ cetanaṃ santamacetano 'sīti tadā viparītavādī śāstraṃ puruṣasyānarthāyetyapramāṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2929: yadi cājñasya sato mumukṣoracetanamanātmānamātmetyupadiśetpramāṇabhūtaṃ śāstraṃ sa śraddhadhānatayāndhagolāṅgūlanyāyena tadātmadṛṣṭiṃ na parityajet,
GSP33brssgo1u:2932: tasmādyathā svargādyarthino 'gnihotrādisādhanaṃ yathābhūtamupadiśati tathā mumukṣorapi 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti yathābhūtamevātmānamupaduśatīti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2933: evañca sati taptaparaśugrahaṇamokṣadṛṣṭāntena satyābhisandhasya mokṣopadeśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2938: bhṛtye tu svāmibhṛtyabhedasya pratyakṣatvādupapanno gauṇa ātmaśabdo mamātmā bhadrasena iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2939: apica Dvacidgauṇaḥ śabdo dṛṣṭa iti naitāvatā śabdapramāṇaker'tho gauṇī kalpanā nyāyyā,
GSP33brssgo1u:2941: yattūktaṃ cetanācetanayoḥ sādhāraṇa ātmābdaḥ kratujvalanayoriva jyotiḥśabda iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:2944: tasmāccetanaviṣaya eva mukhya ātmaśabdaścetanatvopacārādbhūtādiṣu prayujyate bhūtātmendriyātmeti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:2945: sādhāraṇatve 'pyātmaśabdasya na prakaraṇamupapadaṃ vā kiñcinniścāyakamantareṇānyataravṛttitā nirdhārayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2948: saṃnihitaścetanaḥ śvetaketuḥ nahi cetanasya śvetaketoracetana ātmā saṃbhavatītyavocāma /
GSP33brssgo1u:2950: jyotiḥśabdo 'pi laukikena prayogeṇa jvalana eva rūḍhor'thavādakalpitena tu jvalanasādṛśyena kratau pravṛtta ityadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2951: athavā pūrvasūtra evātmaśabdaṃ nirastasamastagauṇatvasādhāraṇatvaśaṅkatayā vyākhyāya tataḥ svatantra eva pradhānakāraṇanirākaraṇaheturvyākhyeyaḥ 'tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2955: tadā cetanaṃ santaṃ mumukṣumacetano 'sītibruvacchāstraṃ viparītavādibhūtvā puṃso 'narthāyetikṛtvā syādapramāṇamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2957: 'yathā satyābhisaṃdhastaptaṃ paraśuṃ sa na dahyate 'tha mucyate' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2963: 'athaiṣa jyotiḥ'śrutyā sahasradakṣiṇāke kratau jyotiṣṭome lokaprayogādagnau ca jyotiḥśabdo yathā mukhyastadvadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2964: tasminsatpadārthe niṣṭā abhedajñānaṃ yasya sa sanniṣṭhastasya muktiśravaṇāditi sūtrārthamāha-netyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2967: kaścitkila duṣṭātmā mahāraṇyamārge patitamandhaṃ svabandhunagaramaṃ jagamiṣuṃ babhāṣe,
GSP33brssgo1u:2969: sa cāndhaḥ sukhāṃ vāṇīmākarṇya tamāptaṃ matvovāca,
GSP33brssgo1u:2971: yadatra bhavānmāṃ dīnaṃ svābhīṣṭanagaraprāpyasamarthaṃ bhāṣata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2973: upadideśa ca enamandhaṃ, eṣa goyuvā tvāṃ nagaraṃ neṣyati, mā tyaja lāṅgūlamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2977: ātmajñānābhāve sati vihanyeta mokṣaṃ na prāpnuyāt pratyutānarthaṃ saṃsāraṃ ca prāpnuyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2978: nanu jīvasya pradhānaikyasaṃpadupāsanārthamidaṃ vākyāmastviti, tatrāha-evaṃ ca satīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2980: kasyacidāropitacoratvasya satyena taptaṃ paraśuṃ gṛhṇato mokṣo dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2981: taddṛṣṭāntena satye brahmaṇi ahamityabhisaṃdhimato mokṣo yathā 'satyābhisaṃdhastaptaṃ paraśuṃ gṛhṇāti sa na dahyate 'tha mucyate'iti śrutyopadiṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2982: sa upadeśaḥ saṃpatpakṣe na yuktaḥ ityāha-anyatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2984: tasmānmokṣopadeśānmukhye saṃbhavati gauṇatvasyānyāyyatvāccātmaśabdaḥ sati mukhya ityāha-api ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2990: astuvāvyāpivastūnāṃ sādhāraṇastathāpi tasyātra śrutau pradhānaparatve 'pi niścāyakābhāvānna pradhānavṛttitetyāha-sādhāraṇatve 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2991: cetanavācitve tu prakaraṇaṃ śetaketupadaṃ ca niścāyakamastītyāha-prakṛtaṃ tviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2995: kathaṃ tarhi 'jyotiṣā yajeta'iti jyotiṣṭome prayogaḥ, tatrāha-arthavādeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2996: 'etāni vāva tāni jyotīṃṣi ya etasya stomāḥ'ityarthavādena kalpitaṃ jvalanena sādṛśyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2998: tathā ca jyotīṃṣi stomā asyeti jyotiṣṭoma ityatra jyotiḥśabdo gauṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2999: nanvātmaśabdāditi pūrvasūtra evātmaśabdasya pradhāne gauṇatvasādhāraṇatvaśaṅkānirāsaḥ kartumucitaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3000: mukhyārthasya lāghavenoktisaṃbhave gauṇatvanānārthakatvāśaṅkāyā durbalatvena tannirāsārthaṃ pṛthaksūtrāyāsānapekṣaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3001: tathā ca śaṅkottaratvenāsūtrākhyānaṃ nātīva śobhata ityarucerāha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3002: nirastā samastā gauṇatvanānārthakatvaśaṅkā yasyātmaśabdasya sa tacchaṅkastasya bhāvastattā tayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3004: sata ātmaśabde jīvābhinnatvāditi hetvapekṣayā mokṣopadeśaḥ svatantra eva pradhānakāraṇatvanirāse heturityarthaḥ //7//
GSP33brssgo1u:3010_0: yadyānātmaiva pradhānaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ 'sa ātmā tattvamasi' itīhopadiṣṭaṃ syātsa
GSP33brssgo1u:3010_1: tadupadeśaśravaṇādanātmajñatayā tanniṣṭho mā bhūditi mukhyamātmānamupadidikṣustasya heyatvaṃ brūyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3011: yathārundhatīṃ didarśayiṣustatsamīpasthāṃ sthūlāṃ tārāmamukhyāṃ prathamamarundhatiti grāhayitvā tāṃ pratyākhyāya paścādarundhatīmeva grāhayati tadvannāyamātmeti brūyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3019_0: 'uta tamādeśamaprākṣyo yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:3019_1: kathaṃ nu bhagavaḥ sa ādeśo bhavatīti yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:3019_2: vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam' /
GSP33brssgo1u:3020: 'evaṃ somya sa ādeśo bhavati' (chāndo. 6.1.1,3) iti vākyopakrame śravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3021: naca sacchabdavācye pradhāne bhogyavargakāraṇe heyatvenāheyatvena vā vijñāte bhoktṛvargo vijñāto bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:3024: nanu yathā kaścidarundhatīṃ darśayituṃ nikaṭasthāṃ sthūlāṃ tārāmarundhatītvenopadiśati,
GSP33brssgo1u:3025: tadvadanātmana eva pradhānasya satpadārthasyātmatvopadeśa iti śaṅkate-kutaśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3030: vedānadhītyāgataṃ stabdhaṃ putraṃ pitovāca-he putra uta api,
GSP33brssgo1u:3031: ādiśyata ityādeśa upadeśaikalabhyaḥ sdātmā tamapyaprākṣyaḥ gurunikaṭepṛṣṭavānasi,
GSP33brssgo1u:3032: yasya śravaṇena mananena vijñānenānyasya śravaṇādikaṃ bhavatītyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3033: nanvanyena jñātena kathamanyadajñātamapi jñātaṃ syāditi putraḥ śaṅkate-kathamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3034: he bhagavaḥ, kathaṃ nu khalu sa bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3040: nanu vācā nāmaivārabhyate, na ghaṭādirityāśaṅkya nāmamātrameva vikāra ityāha-nāmadheyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3046: ataḥ kāraṇātiriktasya kāryasvarūpasyābhāvātkāraṇajñānena tajjñānaṃ bhavatīti sthite dārṣṭāntikamāha-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3047: mṛdvadbrahmaiva satyaṃ viyadādivikāro mṛṣeti brahmajñāne sati jñeyaṃ kiñcinnāvaśiṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3048: yadyapi pradhāne jñāte tādātmyādvikārāṇāṃ jñānaṃ bhavati tathāpi na puruṣāṇāṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3055: he śvetaketo, uta api ādisyata ityādeśastaṃ śāstrācāryoktigamyaṃ vastvaprākṣyaḥ pṛṣṭavānasyācāryam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3056: vācārabhyamāṇamuccāryamāṇaṃ nāmadheyameva vikāro na tu ghaṭaśarāvādināmātirikto mṛdi vikāro vastuto 'sti paramārthato mṛttikaiva tu satyaṃ vastvastīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3058_0: tadeva sacchabdavācyaṃ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate- 'yatraitatpuruṣaḥ svapiti nāma satā
GSP33brssgo1u:3058_1: somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati tasmādenaṃ svapitītyācakṣate svaṃ hyapīto
GSP33brssgo1u:3059: eṣā śrutiḥ svapitītyetatpuruṣasya lokaprasiddhaṃ nāma nirvakti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3065: sa upādhidvayoparame suṣuptāvasthāmupādhikṛtaviśeṣābhāvātsvātmani pralīna iveti 'svaṃ hyapīto bhavati' ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3066: yathā hṛdayaśabdanirvacanaṃ śrutvā darśitam- 'sa vā eṣa ātmā hṛdi tasyaitadeva niruktaṃ hṛdyayamiti tasmādhṛdayamiti' (chāndo. 8.3.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3067: yathāvāśanāyodanyāśabdapravṛttimūlaṃ darśayati śrutiḥ- 'āpa eva tadaśitaṃ nayante' 'teja eva tatpītaṃ nayante' (chā. 6. 8. 3,5) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:3068: evaṃ svamātmānaṃ sacchabdavācyamapīto bhavatītīmamarthaṃ svapitināmanirvacanena darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3069: naca cetana ātmācetanaṃ pradhānaṃ svarūpatvena pratipadyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:3072: śrutyantaraṃ ca - 'prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaram' /
GSP33brssgo1u:3074: ato yasminnapyayaḥ sarveṣāṃ cetanānāṃ taccetanaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ na pradhānam // 9 //
GSP33brssgo1u:3077: yatra suptau puṃsaḥ svapitītyetannāma bhavati tadā puruṣaḥ satā saṃpannastenaikībhūta iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3081: etatsvapanaṃ yathā syāttathā yatra suṣuptau svapitīti nāma bhavati tadā puruṣaḥ satā saṃpanna ekībhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3087: eterdhātorgatyarthasyāpipūrvasya layārthatve 'pi kathaṃ nityasya jīvasya laya ityāśaṅkya upādhilayāditi vaktuṃ jāgratsvapnayorupādhimāha-mana iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3089: tairghaṭādisthūlārthaviśeṣāṇāmātmanā saṃbandhādātmā tānindriyārthānpaśyansthūlaviśeṣeṇa dehenaikyabhrāntimāpanno viśvasaṃjño jāgarti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3090: jāgradvāsanāśrayamanoviśiṣṭaḥ saṃstaijasasaṃjñaḥ svapne vicitravāsanāsahakṛtamāyāpariṇāmānpaśyan 'somya tanmanaḥ'iti śrutisthamanaḥśabdavācyo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3091: sa ātmā sthūlasūkṣmopādhidvayoparame 'haṃ naraḥ karteti viśeṣābhimānābhavāllīna ityupacaryata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3098: idaṃ ca pradhānapakṣe na yuktamityāha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3106: yadi tārkikasamaya iva vedānteṣvapi bhinnā kāraṇāvagatirabhaviṣyatkvaciccetanaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ Dvacidanyadeveti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3110: 'yathāgnerjvalataḥ sarvā diśo visphuliṅgā vipratiṣṭherannevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyo devā devebhyo lokāḥ' (kau. 3.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3113: 'ātmana eṣa prāṇo jāyate' (pra. 3.3) iti cātmanaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ darśayanti sarve vedāntāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3120: vipratiṣṭheran nānāgatitvena diśo daśāpi prasṛtāḥ syurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3122: tattadvedāntajanyānāmavagatīnāṃ cetanakāraṇaviṣayakatvena sāmānyānnācetanaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti sūtrārthaṃ vyatirekamukhenāha-yadi tārkiketyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3129: tadanantaraṃ lokyanta iti lokā viṣayā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3130: nanu vedāntānāṃ svataprāmāṇyatvena pratyakaṃ svārthaniścāyakatvasaṃbhavātkiṃ gatisāmānyenetyata āha-mahacceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3134: evaṃ brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ gatisāmānyaṃ prāmāṇyadārḍhye heturityarthaḥ //10//
GSP33brssgo1u:3140_0: svaśabdenaiva ca sarvajña īśvaro jagataḥ kāraṇamiti śrūyate śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ mantropaniṣadi
GSP33brssgo1u:3140_1: sarvajñamīśvaraṃ prakṛtya 'sa kāraṇaṃ karaṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaścijjanitā na cādhipaḥ' (śve. 6.9) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3141: tasmāt sarvajñaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ, nācetanaṃ pradhānamanyadveti siddham // 11 //
GSP33brssgo1u:3146: evamīkṣatyādiliṅgairacetane vedāntānāṃ samanvayaṃ nirasya cetanavācakaśabdenāpi nirasyati-śrutatvācceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3149: 'jñaḥ kālakālo guṇī sarvavidyaḥ'iti sarvajñaṃ parameśvaraṃ prakṛtya 'sa sarvavitkāraṇam'iti śrutatvānnācetanaṃ kāraṇamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3157_1: teṣāṃ sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktirīśvaro jagato janmasthitilayakāraṇamityetasyārthasya pratipādakatvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:3158: gatisāmānyopanyāsena ca sarve vedāntāścetanakāraṇavādina iti vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3163: 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' (bṛha. 4.5.15)
GSP33brssgo1u:3164: 'yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmātha yatrānyatpaśyatyanyacchṛṇotyanyadvijānāti tadalpaṃ vo vai bhūmā tadamṛtamatha yadalpaṃ tanmartyam' (chāndo. 7.24.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:3170: 'nyūnamanyatsthānaṃ saṃpūrṇamanyat' iti caivaṃ sahasraśo vidyāvidyāviṣayabhedena brahmaṇo dvirūpatāṃ darśayanti vākyāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:3176: eka eva tu paramātmeśvarastaistairguṇaviśeṣairviśiṣṭa upāsyo yadyapi bhavati tathāpi yathāguṇopāsanameva phalāni bhidyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:3177: 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti śruteḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3178: 'yathākraturasmiṃloke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati' (chā. 3.14.1) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:3179: smṛteśca- 'yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaranbhāvaṃ tyajatyante kalevaram /
GSP33brssgo1u:3180: taṃ tamevaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ //' (gī. 8.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3181_0: yadyapyeka ātmā sarvabhūteṣu sthāvarajaṅgameṣu gūḍhastathāpi cittopādhiviśeṣatāratamyādātmanaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3184: yatra yatra vibhūtyādyatiśayaḥ sa sa īśvara ityupāsyatayā codyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3185: evamihāpyādityamaṇḍale hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvapāpmodayaliṅgātpara eveti vakṣyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3187: evaṃ sadyomuktikāraṇamapyātmajñānamupādhiviśeṣadvāreṇopadiśyamānamapyavivakṣitopādhisaṃbandhaviśeṣaṃ parāparaviṣayatvena saṃdihyamānaṃ vākyagatiparyālocanayā nirṇetavyaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3189: evamekamapi brahmāpekṣitopādhisaṃbandhaṃ nirastopādhisaṃbandhaṃ copāsyatvena jñeyatvena ca vedānteṣūpadiśyata iti pradarśayituṃ paro grantha ārabhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3190: yacca 'gatisāmānyāt' ityacetanakāraṇanirākaraṇamuktaṃ tadapi vākyāntarāṇi brahmaviṣayāṇi vyācakṣāṇena brahmaviparītakāraṇaniṣedhena prapañcyate-
GSP33brssgo1u:3198: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimihānandamayaśabdena parameva brahmocyate yatprakṛtam 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma' (tai. 2.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:3206: iha tu 'tasya priyameva śiraḥ' ityādi śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3207: śārīratvaṃ ca śrūyate- 'tasyaiṣa eva śārīra ātmā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3209: tasya pūrvasya vijñānamayasyaiṣa eva śārīra ātmā ya eṣa ānandamaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3210: naca saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyasaṃspārśo vārayituṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3216: ānandamayaṃ prastutya 'raso vai saḥ' iti tasyaiva rasatvamuktvocyate- 'rasaṃhyevāyaṃ labdhvā'nandī bhavati' iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3223: 'ānandaṃ brahmaṇo vidvān na bibheti kutaścana' (tai. 2.8,9) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3225: śrutyantare ca 'vijñānamānandaṃ brahma' (bṛ. 3.9.28) iti brahmaṇyevānandaśabdo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3226: evamānandaśabdasya bahukṛtvo brahmaṇyabhyāsādānandamaya ātmā brahmeti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3232: yathārundhatīnidarśane barhvīṣvapi tārāsvamukhyāsvarundhatīṣu darśitāsu yāntyā pradarśyate sā mukhyaivārundhatī bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:3249: sarvavedāntānāṃ kārye pradhānādyacetane ca samanvayanirāsena brahmaparatvaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3252: tatra kasya vākyasya saguṇopāsanāvidhidvārā niguṇe samanvayaḥ kasya vā guṇavivakṣāṃ vinā sākṣādeva brahmaṇi samanvaya ityākāṅkṣaiva kāraṇamityāha-ucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3254: nāmarūpātmako vikāraḥ sarvaṃ jagat, tadbhedo hiraṇyaśmaśrutvādiviśeṣa iti vākyārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3256: yasyāṃ khalvajñānāvasthāyāṃ dvaitamiva kalpitaṃ bhavati tattadetaraḥ sannitaraṃ paśyatīti dṛśyopādhikaṃ vastu bhāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3257: yatra jñānakāle viduṣaḥ sarvaṃ jagadātmamātramabhūttattadā tu kena kaṃ paśyedityākṣepānnirupādhikaṃ tattvaṃ bhāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3258: yatra bhumni niścito vidvān dvitīyaṃ kimapi na vetti so 'dvitīyo bhūmā paramātmā nirguṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3260: yatra saguṇe sthito dvitīyaṃ vetti tadalpaṃ paricchinnaṃ, yastu bhūmā tadamṛtaṃ nityam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3263: dhīraḥ paramātmaiva sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya sṛṣṭvā nāmāni ca kṛtvā buddhyādau praviśya jīvasaṃjño vyavaharanyo vartate sa saguṇastaṃ nirguṇatvena vidvānapyamṛto bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3268: añjanaṃ mūlatamaḥsaṃbandho dharmādikaṃ vā tacchūnyaṃ nirañjanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3269: kiñcāmṛtasya mokṣasya svayameva vākyotthavṛttisthatvena paramutkṛṣṭaṃ setuṃ laukikasetuvatprāpakam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3270: yathā dagdhendhano 'nalaḥ śāmyati tamivāvidyāṃ tajjaṃ ca dagdhvā praśāntaṃ nirguṇamātmānaṃ vidyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3278: vidyāviṣayo jñeyaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ satyaṃ avidyāviṣaya upāsyaṃ saguṇatvaṃ kalpitamityavirodhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3281: teṣāṃ cittaikāgryadvārā jñānaṃ mukhyaṃ phalamiti tadvākyānāmapi mahātātparyaṃ brahmaṇīti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3286: dhyānānāṃ mānasatvāt, jñānāntaraṅgatvācca, jñānakāṇḍe vidhānamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3291: paramātmasvarūpābhede 'pyupādhibhedenopahitopāsyarūpabhedādupāsananāṃ bhede sati phalabheda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3292: taṃ paramātmānaṃ yadyadguṇatvena lokā rājānamivopāsate tattadguṇavatvameva teṣāṃ phalaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3294: iha yādṛśadhyānavān bhavati mṛtvā tādṛśopāsyarūpo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3296: nanu sarvabhūteṣu niratiśayātmana ekatvādupāsyopāsakayostāratamyaśrutayaḥ kathamityāśaṅkya pariharati-yadyapyeka iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3298: tasyātmana ātmānaṃ svarūpamāvistarāṃ prakaṭataraṃ yo veda upāste so 'śnute taditi tarappratyayādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3302: atra sūryāderapi na jīvatvenopāsyatā kintvīśvaratvenetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3305_1: ityuktvā yatra na vivakṣitaḥ tadvākyaṃ jñeyabrahmaparamiti nirṇayārthamārambha ityāha-evaṃ sadya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3310: annaṃ prasiddhaṃ, prāṇamanobuddhyaḥ hiraṇyagarbharūpāḥ bimbacaitanyāmīśvara ānandaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3311: teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ vikārā ādhyātmikā dehaprāṇamanobuddhijīvā annamayādayaḥ pañcakośāḥ iti śruteḥ paramārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3312_1: ityuktaṃ tarhi mayaṭo vikāre prācurye ca mukhyatvātsaṃśaye vikāraprāyapāṭhādānandādhikāro
GSP33brssgo1u:3312_2: jīva ānandamaya iti niśacayo 'stīti pratyudāharamasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha kiṃ tāvadityākāṅkṣāpūrvakam-kimiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3316: pūrvapakṣe vṛttikāramatejīvopāstyā priyādiprāptiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte tu brahmopāstyeti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3328: yadyapi eṣa ākāśaḥ pūrṇaḥ ānandaḥ sākṣiprerako na syāttadā ko vānyāccalet,
GSP33brssgo1u:3332: 'yuvā syātsādhuyuvā'ityādinā vakṣyamāṇā manuṣyayuvānanadamārabhya brahmānandāvasānā eṣā saṃnihitā ānandasya tāratamyamīmāṃsā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3334: mukhyasiddhānte tūpasaṃkramaṇaṃ viduṣaḥ kośānāṃ pratyaṅmātratvena vilāpanamiti jñeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3338: sarvāntaratvaṃ na śrutamityāśaṅkya tato 'nyasyānuktestasya sarvāntaratvamiti vivṛṇoti-mukhyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3349: vikāraśabdān neti cen na prācuryāt | BBs_1,1.13 |
GSP33brssgo1u:3352: prakṛtivacanādayamanyaḥ śabdo vikāravacanaḥ samadhigataḥ, ānandamaya iti mayaṭo vikārthatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3355: 'tatprakṛtavacane mayaṭ' (pā. 5.4.21) iti hi pracuratāyāmapi mayaṭ smaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3356: yathā 'annamayo yajñaḥ' ityannapracura ucyate, evamānandapracuraṃ brahmānandamaya ucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3357: ānandapracuratvaṃ ca brahmaṇo manuṣyatvādārabhyottarasminnuttarasminsthāne śataguṇa ānanda ityuktvā brahmānandasya niratiśayatvāvadhāraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3359: vikārārthakamayaṭ śrutisahāya ityāśaṅkya mayaṭaḥ prācurye 'pi vidhānānmaivamityāha-vikāretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3361: taditiprathamāsamarthācchabdātprācuryaviśiṣṭasya prastutasya vacane 'bhidhāne gamyamāne mayaṭpratyayo bhavatīti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3365: atra hyannaṃ pracuramasminnityannaśabdaḥ prathamāvibhaktiśaktastasmānmayaṭ yajñasya prakṛtyarthānnaprācuryavācī dṛśyate na śuddhaprakṛtavacana iti dhyeyam //13//
GSP33brssgo1u:3371: yasmādānandahetutvaṃ brahmaṇo vyapadiśati śrutiḥ- 'eṣa hyevānandayāti' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3373: yo hyanyānānandayati sa pracurānanda iti prasiddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3374: yathā loke yo 'nyeṣāṃ dhanikatvamāpādayati sa pracuradhana iti gamyate, tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:3388: yasya vijñānāya 'anyo 'ntara ātmānyo 'ntara ātmā' iti prakrāntaṃ tanmāntravarṇikameva brahmeha gīyate 'anyo 'ntara ātmānandamayaḥ' (tai. 2.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3392: etanniṣṭhaiva ca 'saiṣā bhārgavī vāruṇī vidyā' (tai. 3.6) tasmādānandamayaḥ para evātmā //15 //
GSP33brssgo1u:3398: yasmādevaṃ prakṛtaṃ tasmāttanmāntrāvarṇikameva brahmānandamaya iti vākye gīyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3399: nanu mantroktamevātra grāhmamiti ko nirbandhaḥ, tatrāha-mantreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3403: kiñca bhṛgave proktā, varuṇenopadiṣṭā bhṛguvallī pañcamaparyāyasthānande pratiṣṭhitā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3421: tatra prākśarīrādyutpatterabhidhyānaṃ sṛjyamānānāṃ ca vikārāṇāṃ sraṣṭuravyatirekaḥ sarvavikārasṛṣṭiśca,
GSP33brssgo1u:3432: rasaṃhyevāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavati' (tai. 2.7) iti jīvānandamayau bhedena vyapadiśati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3439: tena dehādibhūtasyātmano 'pyātmānanviṣṭo 'nveṣṭavyo 'labdho labdhavyo 'śrutaḥ śrotavyo 'mato mantavyo 'vijñāto vijñātavya ityādibhedavyapadeśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3440: pratiṣidhyata eva tu paramārthataḥ sarvajñātparameśvarādanyo draṣṭā śrotā vā 'nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā' (bṛ. 3.7.23) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3442: yathā māyāvinaścarmakhaḍgadharātsūtreṇākāśamadhirohataḥ sa eva māyāvī paramārtharūpo bhūmiṣṭho 'nyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3453: nanu labdhṛlabdhavyabhāve 'pyabhedaḥ kiṃ na syadata āha-nahi labdhaiveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3457: tarhyātmana evātmanā labhyatvoktibādhaḥ abhedādityāśaṅkya kalpitabhedānna bādha ityāha-tathāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3460: ātmanaḥ svājñānajabhrameṇa dehādyabhinnasya bhedabhrāntyā paramātmano jñeyatvādyuktirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3465: nanu bhedaḥ satya evāstu, tatrāha-pratiṣidhyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3466: ata īśvarāddraṣṭā jīvo 'nyo nāstīti cejjīvabhedādīśvarasyāpi mithyātvaṃ syādata āha-parameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3467: avidyāpratibimbatvena kalpitājjīvāccinmātra īśvaraḥ pṛthagastīti na mithyātvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3469: sūtrārūḍhaḥ svato 'pi mithyā, na jīva ityarucyābhedamātramidhyātve dṛṣṭāntāntaramāha-yathāveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3470: nanu sūtrabalādbhedaḥ satya ityata āha-īdṛśaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3472: sūtre bhedaḥ satya iti padābhāvāt, 'tadananyatva'ādisūtrāṇācchrutyanusārācceti bhāvaḥ //17//
GSP33brssgo1u:3478: iti kāmayitṛtvanirdeśānnānumānikamapi sāṃkhyaparikalpitamacetanaṃ pradhānamānandamayatvena kāraṇatvena vāpekṣitavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3480: iti nirākṛtamapi pradhānaṃ pūrvasūtrodāhṛtāṃ kāmayitṛtvaśrutimāśritya prasaṅgātpunarnirākriyate gatisāmānyaprapañcanāya // 18 //
GSP33brssgo1u:3487: asminn asya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti | BBs_1,1.19 |
GSP33brssgo1u:3489: yasmādasminnānandamaye prakṛta ātmani pratibuddhasyāsya jīvasya tadyogaṃ śāsti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3492: tadyogaṃ śāsti śāstraṃ- 'yadā hyevaiṣa etasminnadṛśye 'nātmye 'nirukte 'nilayane 'bhayaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ vindate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3498: yadā tvetasminnānandamaye nirantaraṃ tādātmyena pratitiṣṭhati tadā saṃsārabhayānnivartata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3499: tacca paramātmaparigrahe ghaṭate, na pradhānaparigrahe jīvaparigrahe vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3501: idaṃ tviha vaktavyam- 'sa vā eṣa puruṣo 'nnarasamayaḥ' /
GSP33brssgo1u:3503: anyo 'ntara ātmā prāṇamayaḥ' tasmāt 'anyo 'ntara ātmā manomayaḥ' tasmāt 'anyo 'ntara ātmā vijñānamayaḥ' (tai. 2.1,
GSP33brssgo1u:3505: iti ca vikārārthe mayaṭpravāhe satyānandamaya evākasmādardhajaratīyanyāyena kathamiva mayaṭaḥ prācuryarthātvaṃ brahmaviṣayatvaṃ cāśrīyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3509: tasmāttasmādāntarasyāntarasyānyasyānyasyātmana ucyamānatvāt ānandamayāttu na kaścidanya āntara ātmocyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:3512: atrocyate- yadyapyannamayādibhya ivānandamayādanyo 'ntara ātmeti na śrūyate tathāpi nānandamayasya brahmatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3513: yata ānandamayaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate- 'tasya priyameva śiraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3518: tatra yadbrahma mantravarṇe prakṛtam- 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma' iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3524: tatra kathaṃ brahmaṇaḥ svapradhānatvaṃ śakyaṃ vijñātum /
GSP33brssgo1u:3526: nanvānandamayāvayavatvenāpi brahmaṇi vijñāyamāne na prakṛtatvaṃ hīyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:3528: atrocyate- tathā sati tadeva brahmānandamaya ātmāvayavī tadeva ca brahmapucchaṃ pratiṣṭhāvayava ityasāmañjasyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3529: anyataraparigrahe tu yuktaṃ 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityatraiva brahmanirdeśa āśrayituṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3532: apica brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā ityuktatvedamucyate- 'tadapyeṣa śloko bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3538: brahmaṇa eva bhāvābhāvavedanayorguṇadoṣābhidhānādgamyate 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityatra brahmaṇa eva svapradhānatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3542: ānandamayasya pucchatvena nirdiśyate- 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3545: pratiṣṭhā parāyaṇamekanīḍaṃ laukikasyānandajātasya brahmānanda ityetadanena vivakṣyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:3548: apica ānandamayasya brahmatve priyādyavayavatvena saviśeṣaṃ brahmābhyupagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3549: nirviśeṣaṃ tu brahma vākyaśeṣe śrūyate, vāṅmanasayoragocaratvābhidhānāt- ' yato vāco nivartante /
GSP33brssgo1u:3553: apica ānandapracura ityukte duḥkhāstitvamapi gamyate prācuryasya loke pratiyogyalpatvāpekṣatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3554: tathāca sati, 'yatra nānyatpaśti nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmā' (chā. 7.24.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:3557: brahma tu na pratiśarīraṃ bhidyate, 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma' (taitti. 2.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:3558: ityānantaśruteḥ, 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī sarvabhūtāntarātmā' (śve. 6.11)
GSP33brssgo1u:3573: 'yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt' ityādirbrahmaviṣayaḥ prayogo na tvānandamayābhyāsa ityavagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3578: nanvānandamayasyopasaṃkramitavyasyānnamayādivadbrahmatve sati naiva viduṣo brahmaprāptiphalaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo1u:3582: yato vāco nivartante' ityadinā ca prapañcyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3583_0: yā tvānandamayasaṃnidhāne 'so 'kāmayata bahusyāṃ prajāyeyeti' iyaṃ śrutirudāhṛtā
GSP33brssgo1u:3583_1: sā 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityanena saṃnihitatareṇa brahmaṇā saṃbadhyamānā nānandamayasya
GSP33brssgo1u:3587: 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' ityatra puṃliṅgenāpyātmaśabdena brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3588: yā tu bhārgavī vāruṇī vidyā 'ānando brahmeti vyajānāt' iti tasyāṃ mayaḍaśravaṇāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:3590: tasmādaṇumātramapi viśeṣamanāśritya na svata eva priyaśirastvādi brahmaṇa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3592: tasmādannamayādiṣvivānandamaye 'pi vikārārtha eva mayaḍvijñeyo na prācuryārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3593: sūtrāṇi tvevaṃ vyākhyeyāni- 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityatra kimānandamayāvayavatvena brahma vivakṣyata uta svapradhānatveneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3594: pucchaśabdādavayavatveneti prāpta ucyate- 'ānandamayo 'bhyāsāt' ānandamaya ātmetyatra 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' iti svapradhānameva brahmopadiśyate, abhyasāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3595: 'asanneva sa bhavati' ityasminnigamanāśloke brahmaṇa eva kevalasyābhyasyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3598: pucchamityavayavaśabdānna svapradhānatvaṃ brahmaṇa iti yaduktaṃ, tasya parihāro vaktavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3601: annamayādīnāṃ hi śiraādiṣu pucchāntevavayaveḥṣūkte tvānandamayasyāpi śiraādīnyavayavāntarāṇyuktvāvayavaprāyāpattyā 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityāha,
GSP33brssgo1u:3605: sarvasya vikārajātasya sānandamayasya kāraṇatvena brahma vyapadiśyate- idaṃ sarvamasṛjata /
GSP33brssgo1u:3607: naca kāraṇaṃ sat brahma svavikārasyānandamayasya mukhyayā vṛttyāvayava upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3608: aparāṇyapi sūtrāṇi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pucchavākyanirdiṣṭasyaiva brahmaṇa upapādakāni draṣṭavyāni // 19//
GSP33brssgo1u:3611: anirukte nikṛṣyocyanta iti niruktāni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi taiścābhedavarjite,
GSP33brssgo1u:3613: udaramiti ut api aramalpam antaraṃ bhedam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3617: yato yasmāt vācaḥ śaktivṛttyā tamaprakāśyaiva nivartante /
GSP33brssgo1u:3623: asminniti viṣayasaptamī ānandamayaviṣayakaprabodhavato jīvasya tadyogaṃ yasmācchāsti tasmānna pradhānamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3630: abhayaṃ yathā syattathā yadaiva pratiṣṭhāṃ manasaḥ prakṛṣṭāṃ vṛttimeṣa vidvāṃllabhate atha tadaivābhayaṃ brahma prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3631: ut api aramalpamapyantaraṃ bhedaṃ yadaivaiṣa naraḥ paśyati atha tadā tasya bhayamiti yojanā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3633: iha paravyākhyāyāṃ vikārārthake mayaṭibuddhisthe satyakasmātkāraṇaṃ vinā ekaprakaraṇasthasya mayaṭaḥ pūrvaṃ vikārārthakatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3634: ante prācuryārthakatvamityardhajaratīyaṃ kathamiva kena dṛṣṭāntenāśrīyata itīdaṃ vaktavyamityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3638: kiṃvā vastuto 'pyāntaraṃ brahma na śrūyata iti vikalpya ādyamaṅgīkaroti-atrocyate-yadyapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3650: tatra tātparyaṃ nāstīti vaktuṃ kalpyanta ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3651: evaṃ pucchavākye prakṛtasvapradhānabrahmapare sati na prakṛtahānyādidoṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3658: tatra virodhanirāsāyānyatarasmanvākye brahmasvīkāre pucchavākye brahma svīkāryamityāha-anyatareti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3662: tvayāpi pucchaśabdasya mukhyārtho vaktumaśakyaḥ, brahmaṇa ānandamayalāṅgūlatvābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3663: pucchadṛṣṭilakṣaṇāyāṃ cādhāralakṣaṇā yuktā, pratiṣṭhāpadayogāt, brahmaśabdasya mukhyārthalābhācca /
GSP33brssgo1u:3667: ekaṃ mukhyaṃ nīḍamadhiṣṭhānaṃ sopādānasya jagata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3670: yatra saviśeṣatvaṃ tatra vāṅmanasagocaratvamiti vyāpteratra vyāpakābhāvoktyā nirviśeṣamucyata ityāha-nirviśeṣamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3680: prakṛtyarthaprādhānye tvayaṃ doṣo nāsti, pracuraprakāśaḥ savitetyatra tamaso 'lpasyāpyābhānāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3685: tatsiddhau tannirṇaya iti parasparāśraya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3688: nanu 'sa ya evaṃvit'iti brahmavidaṃ prakramyopasaṃkramaṇavākyena phalaṃ nirdiśyate tattasyābrahmatve na sidhyatīti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3690: jñānena kośānāṃ bādhastaditi siddhānte bādhāvadhipratyagānandalābhor'thādukta uttaraślokena sphuṭīkṛta ityāha-tadapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3693: yaduktaṃ pañcamasthānasthatvādānandamaye brahmavallī samāptā, bhṛguvallīvaditi, tatrāha-yattviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3695: mayaṭśrutyā sāvayavatvādiliṅgena ca sthānaṃ bādhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3698: pūrvamīkṣateḥ saṃśayābhāvāditi yuktyā prāyapāṭho na niścāyaka ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3707: atra hi prakṛtasya brahmaṇo jñānārthaṃ kośāḥ pakṣitvena kalpyante, nātra tātparyamasti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3708: tatrānandamayasyāpi avayavāntaroktyanantaraṃ kasmiṃścitpucche vaktavye prakṛtaṃ brahma pucchapadenoktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3712: priyādiviśiṣṭatvākāreṇānandamayasya jīvasya kāryatvāttaṃ prati śeṣatvaṃ brahmaṇo na yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3722: ayamānandamayo brahmarasaṃ labdhvānandī bhavatīti bhedokteśca tasyāpratipādyatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3725: kāmyata iti kāmānandaḥ tasya bhṛguvallyāṃ pañcamasya brahmatvadṛṣṭerānandamayasyāpi brahmatvānumānāpekṣā na kārya,
GSP33brssgo1u:3727: bhedavyapadeśāccetsaguṇaṃ brahmātra vedyaṃ syādityāśaṅkyāha-asminnasya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti //19//
GSP33brssgo1u:3728: guhānihitatvena pratīci 'sa ekaḥ'ityupasaṃhṛte pucchāvākyokte brahmaṇyahameva paraṃ brahmeti prabodhavata ānandamayasya 'yadā hi 'iti śāstraṃ brahmabhāvaṃ śāsti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3736_0: idamāmnāyate- 'atha ya eṣo 'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate hiraṇyaśmaśrurhiraṇyakeśa
GSP33brssgo1u:3736_1: āpraṇakhātsarvaṃ eva suvarṇaḥ' 'tasya yathā kapyāsaṃ puṇḍarīkamevamakṣiṇī tasyoditi
GSP33brssgo1u:3736_2: nāma sa sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhya udita udeti ha vai sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhyo ya evaṃ veda'
GSP33brssgo1u:3738: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kiṃ vidyākarmātiśayavaśātprāptotkarṣaḥ kaścitsaṃsārī sūryamaṇḍale cakṣuṣi copāsyātvena śrūyate kiṃvā nityasiddhaḥ parameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3742: akṣipuruṣe 'pi tadevātideśena prāpyate- 'tasyaitasya tadeva rūpaṃ yadamuṣya rūpam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3744: iti śruteḥ, ādhāraśravaṇācca- 'ya eṣo 'ntarāditye', 'ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇi' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3746: 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhita iti sve mahimni' (chā. 7.24.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3749: ' sa eṣa ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakāmānāṃ ca' (chāṃ 1.6.8)
GSP33brssgo1u:3751: 'sa eṣa ye caitasmādarvāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe manuṣyakāmānāṃ ca' ityakṣipuruṣasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:3753: 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidhāraṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasaṃbhedāya' (bṛ. 4.4.22) ityaviśeṣaśruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3754: tasmānnākṣyādityayorantaḥ parameśvara ityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- 'antastaddharmopadeśāt' iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3755: 'ya eṣo 'ntarāditye' 'ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇi' iti ca śrūyamāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ parameśvara eva, na saṃsārī /
GSP33brssgo1u:3758: tadyathā- 'tasyoditi nāma' iti śrāvayitvā asyādityapuruṣasya nāma 'sa eṣa sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhya uditaḥ' iti sarvapāpmāpagamena nirvakti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3759: tadeva ca kṛtanirvacanaṃ nāmākṣipuruṣasyāpyatidiśati- 'yannāma tannāma' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3760: sarvapāpmāpagamaśca paramātmana eva śrūyate- 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā' (chāṃ. 8.7.1) ityādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:3761: tathā cākṣuṣe puruṣe 'saivarktatsamāsa tadukthaṃ tadyajustadbrahma' ityṛksamāsādyātmakatāṃ nirdhārayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3765: vākprāṇādyātmake cādhyātmamanukramyāha- 'tasyarkca sāma ca geṣṇau' ityadhidaivatam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3766: tathādhyātmamapi- ' yāvamuṣya geṣṇau tau geṣṇau' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3768: tadya ime vīṇāyāṃ gāyantyetaṃ te gāyanti tasmātte dhanasanayaḥ' (chā. 1.7.6)
GSP33brssgo1u:3769: iti ca laukikeṣvapi gāneṣvasyaiva gīyamānatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3773: lokakāmeśititṛtvamapi niraṅ kuśaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ parameśvaraṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3776: 'māyā hyeṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yanmāṃ paśyasi nārada /
GSP33brssgo1u:3777: sarvabhūtaguṇairyuktaṃ maivaṃ māṃ jñātumarhasi' iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3778: apica yatra tu nirastasarvaviśeṣaṃ pārameśvaraṃ rūpamupadiśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:3780: sarvakāraṇattvāttu vikāradharmairapi kaiścidviśiṣṭaḥ parameśvara upāsyatvena nirdiśyate- 'sarvakarmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ' (chāṃ 3.14.2) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3792: bhāgo 'tyantatejasvī tattulyaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ yathātyantadīptimattathāsya devasyākṣiṇī prakṛṣṭadīptimatī,
GSP33brssgo1u:3793: tasya uditīti udita udgataḥ sakāryasarvapāpāspṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3795: amuṣmādādityādūrdhvagā ye lokāsteṣāmīśitā ye ca devānāṃ kāmā bhogāsteṣāṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3804: kapermarkaṭasya āsaḥ pucchabhāgo 'tyantatejasvī tattulyaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ yathā dīptimadevaṃ tasya puruṣasyākṣiṇī,
GSP33brssgo1u:3806: upāsanārthamādityamaṇḍalaṃ sthānaṃ, rūpaṃ coktvā nāma karoti-tasyoditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:3813: rūpavattvādibahupramāṇavaśājjīvo hiraṇmaya itipūrvadṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pūrvamutsargataḥ siddhanirguṇasamanvayasyāpavādārthaṃ pūrvapakṣayati-saṃsārīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3817: ādityasthaḥ puruṣaḥ, amuṣmādādityādūrdhvagā ye kecana lokāsteṣāmīśvaro devabhogānāṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3818: sa eṣo 'kṣisthaḥ puruṣa etasmādakṣṇo 'dhastanā ye lokāḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3819: ye ca manuṣyakāmā bhogāsteṣāmīśvara iti maryādā śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3823: kiñca jalānāmasaṃkarāya loke vidhārako yathā setuḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3830: sarvapāpmāsaṅgitvaṃ sarvātmaikatvaṃ tu saphalaṃ, jīve netumaśakyañceti prabalaṃm /
GSP33brssgo1u:3831: naca 'na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacchati'iti śruterādityajīvasyāpi pāpmāsparśitvamiti vācyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3832: śruteradhunā karmānadhikāriṇāṃ devānāṃ kriyamāṇapāpmāsaṃmbandhe tatphalāsparśe vā tātaparyāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:3833: teṣāṃ saṃcitapāpābhāve 'kṣīṇe puṇye martyalokaṃ viśanti 'ityayogātyabhipretyāha--sarvapāpmāpagamaśca paramātmana eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3849: yau sarvātmakarksāmātmakau geṣṇāvamuṣyādityasthasyai, tāvevākṣisthasya geṣṇau parvaṇītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3853: tattatra loke, dhanasya sanirlābho yeṣāṃ dhanasanayaḥ, vibhūtimanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3854: nanu loke rājāno gīyante neśvara ityata āha-yadyaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:3858: tadyuktaṃ satvaṃ rajādikaṃ madaṃśa eveti tadgānamīśvarasyaivetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3863: yatra tūpāsyatvenocyate tatretyadhyāhṛtya sarvakāraṇatvātprāptarūpavatvaṃ 'sarvakarmā'ityādiśrutyā nirdiśyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3872: 'ya āditye tiṣṭhannādityāntaro yamādityo na veda yasyādityaḥ śarīraṃ ya ādityamantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' (bṛ. 3.7.9)
GSP33brssgo1u:3874: tatra hi 'ādityādantaro yamādityo na veda' iti vediturādityādvijñānātmano 'ntaryāmī spaṣṭaṃ nirdiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3878: ādityajīvādīśvarasya bhedokteḥ śrutyantare jīvādanya īśvaraḥ siddha iti sūtrārthamāha-astīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3885: tasmātpara evādityādisthānaka udgīthe upāsya iti siddham //21//
GSP33brssgo1u:3891_0: idamāmananti- 'asya lokasya kā gatirityākāśa iti hovāca sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva
GSP33brssgo1u:3891_1: samutpadyanta ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yantyākāśo hyevaibhyo jyāyānākāśaḥ parāyaṇam' (chāndo. 1.9.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3892: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimākāśaśabdena paraṃ brahmābhidhīyata uta bhūtākāśamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3898: iti 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma' (chā. 8.14.1) iti caivamādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:3901: kutaḥ, taddhi prasiddhatareṇa prayogeṇa śīghraṃ buddhimārohati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3902: nacāyamākāśaśabda ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇaḥ śakyo vijñātuṃ, anekārthatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3907: nanu bhūtākāśaparigrahe vākyaśeṣo nopapadyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante' ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3914: tasmādākāśaśabdena bhūtākāśasya grahaṇamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- 'ākāśastalliṅgāt' ākāśaśabdena brahmaṇo grahaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3916: parasya hi brahmaṇa idaṃ liṅgam- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3922: tathā 'ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yanti' iti brahmaliṅgaṃ 'ākāśo hyevaibhyo jyāyānākāśaḥ parāyaṇam' iti ca jyāyastvaparāyaṇatve /
GSP33brssgo1u:3923: jyāyastvaṃ hyānāpekṣikaṃ paramātmanyevaikasminnāmnātam- 'jyāyānpṛthivyā jyāyamantarikṣājjyāyāndivo jyāyānebhyo lokebhyaḥ' (chāṃ 3.14.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3925: śrutiśca bhavati- 'vijñānamānandaṃ brahma rāterdātuḥ parāyaṇam' (bṛ. 3.9.28) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3928: taṃ cākāśamudgīthe saṃpādyopasaṃharati- 'sa eṣa parovarīyānudgīthaḥ sa eṣo 'nantaḥ' (chāṃ 1.9.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3930: yatpunaruktaṃ bhūtākāśaṃ prasiddhibalena prathamataraṃ pratīyata iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3931: atra brūmaḥ- prathamataraṃ pratītamapi sat vākyaśeṣagatānbrahmaguṇāndṛṣṭvā na parigṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3932: darśitaśca brahmaṇyapyākāśaśabdaḥ- 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā' ityādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:3933: tathākāśaparyāyavācināmapi brahmaṇi prayogo dṛśyate- 'ṛco akṣare parame vyomandevā adhi viśve niṣeduḥ' (ṛ.saṃ 1.164.39)
GSP33brssgo1u:3944: te nāmarūpe yadantarā yasmādanye yasya vā madhye staḥ tannāmarūpāspṛṣṭaṃ brahmeti vākyoṣādatrākāśo brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3953: ṛco ṛgupakṣitāḥ sarve vedā jñāpakāḥ santi /
GSP33brssgo1u:3958: śālāvatyo brāhmaṇo jaivaliṃ rājānaṃ pṛcchati, asya pṛthvilokasyānyasya ca ka ādhāra iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3965: yatra kalpitatvena madhye sta iti vārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3966: akṣa pūrvapakṣe bhūtākāśātmanodgīthopāstiḥ, siddhānte brahmātmanā iti phalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3978: dālbhyaśālāvatyau brāhmaṇau rājā ceti traya udgīthavidyākuśalā vicārayāmāsuḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:3980_0: tatra svargādāgatābhiradbhirjīvitena prāṇena kriyamāṇodgīthasya svarga eva parāyaṇamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:3980_1: dālbhyapakṣamapratiṣṭhādoṣeṇa śālāvatyo ninditvā svargasyāpi karmadvārā heturayaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:3981: taṃ śālāvatyasya pakṣaṃ 'antavadvai te kila śālāvatyasāma'iti rājā ninditvānantamevākāśaṃ vakti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3984: udgītha ākāśa eveti saṃpādanādudgīthasyānantatvādikaṃ na svata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3990: paraḥ ityavyayaṃ sakārāntaṃ vā, paraḥ kṛtsnamiti prayogāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3994: evakārasarvaśabdānugṛhītānantyādibahuliṅgānāmanugrahāya 'tyajedekaṃ kulasyārthe'iti nyāyenaikasyāḥ śruterbādho yukta ityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3998: tasya tatparyāyāṇāṃ ca brahmaṇi prayogaprācuryāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3999: akṣare kūṭasthe vyoman vyomni ṛco vedāḥ santi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4000: pramāṇatvena yasminnakṣare viśve devā adhiṣṭhitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4001: oṅkāraḥ kaṃ sukhaṃ brahma khaṃ vyāpakamityupāsīta /
GSP33brssgo1u:4004: 'kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma'iti chāndogyam, 'oṃ khaṃ brahma khaṃ purāṇam'iti bṛhadāraṇyakamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4005: kiñca tatraiva prathamānusāreṇottaraṃ neyaṃ, yatra tannetuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4013_0: udgīthe- 'prastotaryā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā' ityupakramya śrūyate- katamā sā
GSP33brssgo1u:4013_1: devateti prāṇā iti hovāca sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni prāṇamevābhisaṃviśanti prāṇamabhyujjihate
GSP33brssgo1u:4018: ata iha prāṇaśabdena katarasyopādānaṃ yuktamiti bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4022: nanu pūrvavadihāpi talliṅgādbrahmaṇa eva grahaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4023: ihāpi vākyaśeṣe bhūtānāṃ saṃveśanodgamanaṃ pārameśvaraṃ karma pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4026: evaṃ hyāmnāyate- 'yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyete prāṇaṃ cakṣuḥ prāṇaṃ manaḥ sa yadā prabudhyate prāṇadevādhi punarjāyante' (śa.brā. 10.3.3.6)
GSP33brssgo1u:4027: iti. pratyakṣaṃ caitatsvāpakāle prāṇavṛttāvaparilupyamānāyāmindriyavṛttayaḥ parilupyante prabodhakāle ca prādurbhavantīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4028: indriyasāratvācca bhūtānāmaviruddho mukhye prāṇe 'pi bhūtasaṃveśanodgamanavādī vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4031: tatsāmānyācca prāṇasyāpi na brahmatvamityevaṃ prāpte sūtrakāra āha- 'ata eva prāṇaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4033: ata eva talliṅgātprāṇaśabdamapi paraṃ brahma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4034: prāṇasyāpi hi brahmaliṅgasaṃbandhaḥ śrūyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni prāṇamevābhisaṃviśanti prāṇamabhyujjihate' (chāṃ 1.115) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4035: prāṇanimittau sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmutpattipralayāvucyamānau prāṇasya brahmatāṃ gamayataḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4037: atrocyate- svāpaprabodhayorindriyāṇāmeva kevalānāṃ prāṇāśrayaṃ saṃveśanodgamanaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4039: ihatu sendriyāṇāṃ saśarīrāṇāṃ ca jīvāviṣṭānāṃ bhūtānāṃ, 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4041_0: nanu sahāpi viṣayairindriyāṇāṃ svāpaprabodhayoḥ prāṇe 'pyayaṃ prāṇācca prabhavaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4041_1: śṛṇumaḥ- 'yadā suptaḥsvapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati tadainaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4045: yatpunaḥ prāṇaśabdasya pañcavṛttau prasiddhataratvaṃ, tadākāśaśabdasyeva pratividheyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4047: atra kecidudāharanti- 'prāṇasya prāṇam', 'prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:4050: yathā pituḥ piteti prayoge 'nyaḥ pitā ṣaṣṭīnirdiṣṭo 'nyaḥ prathamānirdiṣṭaḥ pituḥ piteti gamyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4051: tadvat 'prāṇasya prāṇam' iti śabdabhedātprasiddhātprāṇādanyaḥ prāṇasya prāṇa iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4052: nahi sa eva tasyeti bhedanirdeśārhe bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4053: yasya ca prakaraṇe yo nirdiśyate nāmāntareṇāpi sa eva tatra prakaraṇī nirdiṣṭa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4054: yathā jyotiṣṭomādhikāre- 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta' ityatra jyotiḥśabdo jyotiṣṭomaviṣayo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:4055: tathā parasya brahmaṇaḥ prakaraṇe 'prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ' iti śrutaḥ prāṇaśabdo vāyuvikāramātraṃ kathamavagamayet /
GSP33brssgo1u:4059: FN: cākrāyaṇarṣirdhanārthī rājño yajñaṃ gatvovāca- he prastotaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4066: bhūteṣvindriyāṇi sūkṣmatvādbhoktṛsāmīpyācca sārāṇi atasteṣāṃ layodayoktyetareṣāmapi tatsiddheḥ śeṣaghaṭanetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4068: prāṇaḥ paramātmā bandhanamāśrayaḥ svarūpaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4075: tāṃ cedajñātvā mama viduṣo nikaṭe prastoṣyasi mūrdhā te patiṣyatīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4076: tato bhītaḥ san papraccha, katamā sā devateti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4078: prāṇamabhilakṣya samyagviśanti līyante, tamabhilakṣyojjihate utpadyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4080: manaupādhiko jīvaḥ prāṇena brahmaṇā badhyate suṣuptāvekībhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4081: prāṇasya vāyoḥ prāṇaṃprerakaṃ tasya sattāsphūrtipradamātmānaṃ ye viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4089: indriyāṇi liṅgātmarūpāṇi apañcīkṛtabhūtānāṃ sārāṇi teṣāṃ layādyuktyā bhūtānāmapi prāṇe layādisiddheḥ vākyaśeṣopapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4091: udgātṛpratihartṛbhyāmudgīthe pratihāre ca kā devateti pṛṣṭena cākrāyaṇenādityo 'nnaṃ ca nirdiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4097_0: bhavantīti bhūtānīti vyutpatyā yatkiñcidbhavanadharmakaṃ kāryamātraṃ tasya layodayau
GSP33brssgo1u:4097_1: vāyuvikāre prāṇe na yuktāvityuktvā bhūtaśabdasya rūḍhārthagrahe 'pi layāderbrahmanirṇāyakatvamityāha-yadāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4100: atha yadā suṣupto jīvaḥ prāṇe brahamaṇyekībhavati tadā enaṃ prāṇaṃ saviṣayavāgadayo 'piyantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4101: atra jīvābhannatve sarvalayādhāratvaliṅgānna mukhyaḥ prāṇa ityāha-tatrāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4103: ekavākyatvaṃ vākyaśeṣaḥ tasya balaṃ tadgataṃ liṅgaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4104: prāṇamevetyavadhāraṇena sarvabhūtaprakṛtitvaliṅgana ca prāṇapadena tatkāraṇaṃ brahma lakṣyamityāha-tadākāśaśabdasyeveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4112: idamāmananti- 'atha yadataḥ paro jyotirdīpyate viśvataḥpṛṣṭeṣu sarvataḥpṛṣṭeṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥpuruṣe jyotiḥ' (chā. 3.13.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4113: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimiha jyotiḥśabdenādityādi jyotirabhidhīyate kiṃvā paramātmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4119: tamo jyotiriti hīmau śabdau parasparapratidvandvī vīṣayau prasiddhau /
GSP33brssgo1u:4123: nahi rūpādihīnaṃ brahma 'dīpyate' iti mukhyāṃ śrutirmahati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4125: nahi carācarabījasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmakasya dyaurmaryādā yuktā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4126: kāryasya tu jyotiṣaḥ paricchinnasya dyaurmaryādā syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4140: sarvatrāpi gamyamānasya jyotiṣaḥ 'paro divaḥ' ityupāsanārthaḥ pradeśaviśeṣaparigraho na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4144: iti ca kaukṣeye jyotiraṣi paraṃ jyotiradhyasyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4149: 'tadetaddṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ cepyupāsīta' iti ca śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4150: 'cakṣuṣyaḥ śruto bhavati ya evaṃ veda' (chā. 3.13.8) iti cālpaphalaśravaṇādabrahmatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4153: naca pūrvasminnapi vākye brahma nirdiṣṭamasti, 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtam' iti chandonirdeśāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4154: athāpi kathañcitpūrvasminvākye brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ syādevamapi na tasyeha pratyabhijñānamasti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4155: tatra hi 'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' (3.12.1,6) iti dyauradhikaraṇatvena śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4156: atra punaḥ 'paro divo jyotiḥ' iti dyaurmaryādātvena /
GSP33brssgo1u:4157: tasmātprākṛtaṃ jyotiriha grāhyamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ-jyotiriha brahma grāhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4160: pūrvasminhi vākye catuṣpādbrahma nirdiṣṭam- 'tāvānasya mahimā tato jyāyāṃśca pūruṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4161: pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' (chā. 3.12.6) ityanena mantreṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:4162: tatra yaccatuṣpādo brahmaṇastripādamṛtaṃ dyusaṃbandhirūpaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ tadeveha dyusaṃbandhānnirdiṣṭamiti pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4163: tatparityajya prākṛtaṃ jyotiḥ kalpayataḥ prakṛtahānāprakṛtaprakriye prasajyeyātām /
GSP33brssgo1u:4167: yattūktam- 'jyotiradīpyate' iti caitau śabdau kārye jyotiṣi prasiddhāviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4172: yadvā nāyaṃ jyotiḥśabdaścakṣurvṛtterevānugrāhake tejasi vartate, anyatrāpi prayogadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4176: tathā sati brahmaṇo 'pi caitanyarūpasya samastajagadavabhāsahetutvādupapanno jyotiḥśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4177: 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' (kau. 2.5.15)
GSP33brssgo1u:4180: yadapyuktaṃ dyumaryādatvaṃ sarvagatasya brahmaṇo nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4181: atrocyate- sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upāsanārthaḥ pradeśaviśeṣaparigraho na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4182: nanuktaṃ niṣpradeśasya brahmaṇaḥ pradeśaviśeṣakalpanā nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4185: tathāhi- ādityo, cakṣuṣi, hṛdaye, iti pradeśaviśeṣasaṃbandhāni brahmaṇa upāsanāni śrūyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:4188: auṣṇyaghoṣānumite kaukṣeye kārye jyotiṣyadhyasyamānatvātparamapi divaḥ kāryaṃ jyotireveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4191: 'dṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ cetyupāsīta' iti tu pratīkadvārakaṃ dṛṣṭatvaṃ śrutatvaṃ ca bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4193: nahīyate phalāya brahmāśrayaṇīyaṃ, iyate neti niyamaheturasti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4196: yatra tu guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ pratīkaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ vā brahmopadiśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4197: tatra saṃsāragocarāṇyevoccāvacāni phalāni dṛśyante- 'annādo vasudāno vidante vasu ya evaṃ veda' (bṛ. 4.4.24)
GSP33brssgo1u:4199: yadyapi na svavākye kiñcijjyotiṣo brahmaliṅgamasti tathāpi pūrvasminvākye dṛśyamānaṃ grahītavyaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4200: taduktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa- 'jyotiścaraṇābhidhānāt' iti kathaṃ punarvākyāntaragatena brahmasaṃnidhānena jyotiḥśrutiḥ svaviṣayācchakyā pracyāvayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:4202_0: 'yadataḥ paro jyotiḥ' iti prathamatarapaṭhitena yacchabdena sarvanāmnā dyusaṃbnandhātpratyabhijñāyamāne
GSP33brssgo1u:4202_1: pūrvavākyanirdiṣṭe brahmaṇi svasāmārthyena parāmṛṣṭe satyarthājjyotiḥśabdasyāpi brahmaviṣayatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4211: tāsāṃ tejobannānāmekaikaṃ dvidhā vibhajya punaścekaikaṃ bhāgaṃ dvedhā kṛtvā svabhāgāditarabhāgayornikṣipya trivṛtkaraṇaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4213: ekatvasāmyādbhūrityasminnakṣare prajāpateḥ śirodṛṣṭiruktā tathātrāpi sārūpyaṃ vācyaṃ anyathādhyāsāsiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4223: kaukṣeyakaṃ hi jyotirjīvabhāvenānupraviṣṭasya paramātmano vikāraḥ jīvābhāve dehasya śaithilyāt jīvataścauṣṇyājjāyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4226: vasu hiraṇyaṃ karmaphalaṃ dadātīti vasudāna iti guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4227: sarvanāmnā svasāmarthyena svasya sarvanāmnaḥ sāmartyaṃ saṃnihitavācitvaṃ tadbalena parāmṛṣṭe satīti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4231: ato divo dyulokātparaḥ parastādyajjyotirdīpyate tadyatadidamiti jāṭharāgnāvadhyasyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4233: viśvasmātprāṇivargādupari sarvasmādbhūrādilokādupari ye lokāsteṣūttameṣu na vidyante uttamā yebhya ityanuttameṣu sarvasaṃsāramaṇḍalātītaṃ paraṃ jyotiridameva,
GSP33brssgo1u:4236: atra svavākye spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgābhāve 'pi 'pādosya'iti pūrvavākye bhūtapādatvaṃ liṅgamastīti pādasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4248: svargādau jātaṃ kiñcidatīndriyaṃ tejo divaḥ parastādasti, śrutiprāmāṇyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4250: dhyānaṃ phalamityāśaṅkya niṣphalasya kvāpi dhyānaṃ nāstītyāha-idamevetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4253_0: tejo 'bannānāṃ devatānāmekaikaṃ dvidhā vibhajya punaścaikaikaṃ bhāgaṃ dvedhā kṛtvā
GSP33brssgo1u:4254: kiñcātra 'yadataḥ paraḥ'iti yacchabdenānyataḥ prasiddhaṃ dyumaryādatvaṃ dhyānāyānūdyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4258: tasya parigraha upasanārtho na viruddhata ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4262: niṣpradeśasya niravayavasya viśeṣe 'pi divaḥ parastāddedīpyamānabrahmāvayavakalpanā bhāginī yuktā na tvityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4265: yathā ekatvasāmyādbhūritivyāhṛtau prajāpateḥ śirodṛṣṭiḥ śrutā tathā jāṭharāgnāvabrahmatvaṃ ghoṣādiśrutyā prasiddhamiti jaḍajyotiṣṭvaṃ sāmyaṃ vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4274: nanu 'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi'iti pūrvavākyoktaṃ brahmātra jyotiḥpadena gṛhyatāmityāśaṅkyāha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4280_0: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtam' 'vāgvai gāyatrī' 'yeyaṃ pṛthivī' 'yadidaṃ śarīram'
GSP33brssgo1u:4281: yaduktaṃ tāvān tatparimāṇaḥ sarvaḥ prapañco 'sya gāyatryanugatasya brahmaṇo mahimā vibhūtiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4285: sarvaṃ jagadekaḥ pādo 'ṃśaḥ, 'viṣṭabhyāhamidaṃ kṛtsnamekāṃśena sthito jagat'iti smṛteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4286: asya puruṣasya divi svaprakāśasvarūpe tripādamṛtaṃ rūpamasti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4289: yathā loke pādātpādatrayamadhikaṃ tathedamadhikamiti bodhanārthaṃ tripādamṛtamityuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4294: iha tu pūrvavākyaprasiddhasya brahmaṇo dyusaṃbandhena pratyabhijñātasya yadarthatvaniśacayādyatpadaikārthakajyotiḥpadasyāpi sa evārtha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4299: ataḥ prakaraṇājjyotiḥśrutibādho na yukta iti nirastam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4302: yena cetasā caitanyeneddhaḥ prakāśitaḥ sūryastapati prakāśayati taṃ bṛhantamavedavinna manuta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4303: jyotiḥśabdasya kāryajyotiṣyeva śaktirityaṅgīkṛtya kāraṇabrahmalakṣakatvamuktvā brahmaṇyapi śaktimāha-yadveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4304: gāḍhāndhakāre vācaiva jyotiṣā loka āsanādivyavahāraṃ karotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4305: ājyaṃ juṣatāṃ pibatāṃ mano jyotiḥ prakāśakaṃ bhavati ityājyastutiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4306: yathā gacchantamanugacchataḥ svasyāpi gatirasti tathā sarvasya svaniṣṭhaṃ bhānaṃ syādityata āha-tasya bhāseti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4307: tat kālānavacchinnaṃ brahma sūryādijyotiṣāṃ sākṣibhūtamāyuramṛtamiti ca devā upāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4308: yoṣito 'gnitvavat dyumaryādatvādikaṃ dhyānārthaṃ kalpitaṃ brahmaṇo yuktamityāha-atrocyata ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4312: 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tathā tathā phalaṃ bhavati'iti śruterityāha-na hīyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4313: jñānaphalavadupāstīphalamekarūpaṃ kiṃ na syādata āha-yatra hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4316: īśvaro jīvarūpeṇānnamattītyannādaḥ annasyāsamantāddātā vā vasu hiraṇyaṃ dadātīti vasudāna iti guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ yo veda sa dhanaṃ vindate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4318: nāmno vāguttamā, mano vā pratīkaṃ vāco bhūya iti pratīkaviśeṣadhyānaśrutisaṃgrahārthamādyapadam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4321: sarvanāmnā svasāmarthyena svasya sarvanāmnaḥ sāmarthyaṃ saṃnihitavācitvaṃ tadbalena parāmṛṣṭe satīti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4326: chando 'bhidhānān neti cen na tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāt tathā hi darśanam | BBs_1,1.25 |
GSP33brssgo1u:4327: atha yaduktaṃ pūrvasminnapi vākye na brahmabhihitamiti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4328: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yadidaṃ kiñca' (chāṃ. 3.12.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:4333_0: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' iti gāyatrīmupakramya tāmeva bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākyapramāṇabhedairvyakhyāya
GSP33brssgo1u:4333_1: 'saiṣā catuṣpādā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī tadetadṛcābhyanuktaṃ tāvānasya mahimā' iti tasyāmeva
GSP33brssgo1u:4335: iti brahmaśabdaḥ so 'pi chandasaḥ prakṛtatvācchandoviṣaya eva 'ya etāmevaṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ veda' (chāṃ 3.11.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:4336: ityatra hi vedopaniṣadamiti vyācakṣate, tasmācchandobhidhānānna brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtatvamiticet /
GSP33brssgo1u:4338: 'tathā cetorpaṇanigahāt' tathā gāyatryākhyacchandodvāreṇa tadanugate brahmaṇi cetasor'paṇaṃ cittasamādhānamanena brahmaṇavākyena nigadyate- 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4343: tathānyatrāpi vikāradvāreṇa brahmaṇa upāsanaṃ dṛśyate- 'etaṃ hyeva bahvṛcā mahatyukthe mīmāṃsanta etamagnāvadhvaryava etaṃ mahāvrate chandogāḥ' (ai.ā. 3.23.12) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4346: apara āha- sākṣādeva gāyatrīśabdena brahma pratipādyate, saṃkhyāsāmānyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4347: yathā gāyatrī catuṣpadā ṣaḍakṣaraiḥ pādaistathā brahma catuṣpāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4349: tadyathā- 'te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santastatkṛtam' ityupakramyāha 'saiṣā virāḍannādi' (chā. 4.3.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4354: ya etāṃ prakṛtāṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ vedarahasyaṃ madhuvidyārūpaṃ veda tasyodayāstamayarahitabrahmaprāptirbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4356: adhvaryavo yajurvedinaḥ kratau chandogāḥ sāmavedino mahāvrate kratau /
GSP33brssgo1u:4359: te vā ete pañcānye ādhidaivikāḥ, pañcānye ādhyātmikāste militvā daśa santaḥ kṛtamityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4365: vedarahasyabhūtāṃ madhuvidyāmevamuktarītyā yaḥ kaścidveda tasyodayāstamayarahitabrahmā prāptirbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4366: tathāca vedatvādgāyatryāṃ brahmaśabdo yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4369: naca gāyatryā dhyānārthaṃ sarvātmatvāropa iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4374: etaṃ paramātmānaṃ bahvṛcā ṛgvedino mahatyukthe śastre tadanugatamupāsate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4376: etameva chantogāḥ sāmavedino mahāvrate kratau upāsata ityaitareyake dṛṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4377: gāyatrīśabdo brahmalakṣaka iti vyākhyāya gauṇa ityāha-apara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4380: pūrvaṃ tūpāsyatayā gāyatrīpadenājahallakṣaṇayā gāyatrībrahmaṇī dve api lakṣite /
GSP33brssgo1u:4383: gāyatrīpadārthaikadeśe gāyatryanugate brahmaṇi pradhāne sarvātmakatvānvayasaṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4385: ceto brahmaṇi samarpyate yena sa cetorpaṇo gāyatrīśabdastena brahmaṇa eva nigadādabhidhānāt chandobhidhānamasiddhamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4390: pañcānye ādhyātmikāste militvā daśasaṃkhyākāḥ santaḥ kṛtamityucyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:4391: santi hi kṛtatretādvāparakalisaṃjñakāni catvāri dyutāni krameṇa caturaṅkatryaṅkadvyaṅkaikāṅkāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:4392: tatra kṛtaṃ daśātmakaṃ bhavati, caturṣvaṅkeṣu trayāṇāṃ triṣu dvayordvayorekasya cāntarbhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4398: evañca daśatvadvārā vāyvādiṣu kṛtatvaṃ virāṭtvaṃ ca dhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4404: kṛtasaṃjño 'yaḥ kṛtāyaḥ sa vijito yena tasmai,
GSP33brssgo1u:4407: evañca sā vāyvādidaśātmikā eṣā kṛtaśabditā virāḍannaṃ, kṛtatvādannādinītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4410: atrāpara āhetyaparapadena gauṇatve svamataṃ neti dyotayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4411: ajahallakṣaṇāpakṣe hi 'vāgvai gāyatrī'iti vāgātmatvaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca iti niruktanāmakatvaṃ ca gāyatryā upādhitvenopāsyatvādupapannataram /
GSP33brssgo1u:4421: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayāni hi nirdiśyāha- 'saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4422: nahi brahmānāśrayaṇe kevalasya chandaso bhūtādayaḥ pādā upapadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:4428: smṛtiśca brahmaṇa evaṃrūpatāṃ darśayati- 'viṣṭabhyāhamidaṃ kṛtsnamekāṃśena sthito jagat' (bhaga. 10.42) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4429: 'yadvai tadbrahma' (chā. 3.12.7) iti ca nirdeśa evaṃ sati mukhyārtha upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4431: iti ca hṛdayasuṣiṣu brahmapuruṣaśrutirbrahmasaṃbandhitāyāṃ vivakṣitāyāṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4433: tadeva brahma jyotirvākye dyusaṃbandhātpratyabhijñāyamānaṃ parāmṛśyata iti sthitam // 26 //
GSP33brssgo1u:4435: FN: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākprāṇa iti ṣaṭprakārā gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ śrūyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:4437_0: nanu 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam'iti prathama gāyatrīśruteḥ kathaṃ lakṣaṇetyāśaṅkya vākyaśeṣagatasarvātmakatvādyanekabalavatpramāṇasaṃvādena
GSP33brssgo1u:4446: hṛdayasya caturdikṣūrdhvaṃ ca pañca suṣayaḥ santi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4447: teṣu brahmasthānahṛnnagarasya prāgādidvāreṣu krameṇa prāṇavyānāpānasamānodānāḥ pañcadvārapālā iti dhyānārthaṃ śrutyā kalpitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4448: tatra hṛdayacchidrasthaprāṇeṣu brahmapuruṣatvaśrutirhṛdi gāyatryākhyabrāhmaṇa upāsanāsaṃbandhitāyāṃ brahmaṇo dvārapālatvādbrahmapuruṣā iti saṃbhavatītyāha-pañca brahmeti //26//
GSP33brssgo1u:4452: upadeśabhedān neti cen nobhayasminn apy avirodhāt | BBs_1,1.27 |
GSP33brssgo1u:4453: yadapyetaduktaṃ pūrvatra- 'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' iti saptamyā dyaurādhāratvenopadiṣṭā iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4454: punaḥ 'atha yadataḥ paro divaḥ' iti pañcamyā maryādātvena,
GSP33brssgo1u:4457: ubhayasminnapi saptamyante pañcamyante copadeśe na pratyabhijñānaṃ virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4458: yathā loke vṛkṣāgrasaṃbaddho 'pi śyena ubhayathopadiśyamāno dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4459: vṛkṣāgre śyeno vṛkṣāgrātparataḥ śyena iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:4461: apara āha- yathā loke vṛkṣāgreṇāsaṃbaddho 'pi śyena ubhayathopadiśyamāno dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4462: vṛkṣāgre śyeno vṛkṣāgrātpurataḥ śyena iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:4463: evaṃ ca divaḥ paramapi sadbrahma divītyupadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4466: divi diva iti vibhaktibhedātprakṛtapratyabhijñā nāstītyuktaṃ nopakṣaṇīyamityāha-tatparihartavyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4472: yathā vṛkṣāgraṃ svalagnabhagāvacchinnaśyenasyādhāraḥ sanneva svālagnabhāgāvacchinnasya tasyaiva maryādā bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:4473: evaṃ divi sūrye hārdākāśe vā mukhye ādhāre sabrahmadivo maryadātvaṃ tadalagnākāśāvacchinnaṃ brahma prati kalpayitvā divaḥ paramityucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4474: yadyākāśena anavacchinnaṃ brahma gṛhītvā pañcamyā divo maryādātvameva mukhyaṃ tadā gaṅgāyāṃ gheṣa itivatsaptamyā sāmīpyalakṣaṇayādhāratvaṃ vyākhyeyamityāha-apara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4475: sabaddhaṃ pratyādhāratvaṃ mukhyaṃ pūrvamuktaṃ divyeva saditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4476: asaṃbaddhaṃ prati maryādātvaṃ mukhyamadhunocyate divaḥ paramapīti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4483: asti kauṣītakibrāhmaṇopaniṣadīndrapratardanākhyāyikā- 'pratardano ha vai daivodāsirindrasya priyaṃ dhāmopajagāma yuddhena ca pauruṣeṇa ca' ityārabhyāmnātā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4484: tasyāṃ śrūyate- 'sa hovāca praṇo 'smi prajñātmā taṃ māmāyuramṛtamityupāḥsva' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4485: tathottaratrāpi 'atha khalu prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' (ko. 1.1,2,3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4486: tathā 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4487: ante ca 'sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmānando 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ' (ko. 3.8) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4488: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimiha prāṇaśabdena vāyumātramabhidhīyata upa devatātmeti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4490: nanu 'ata eva prāṇaḥ' ityatra varṇitaṃ prāṇaśabdasya brahmaparatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4498: 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādi jīvaliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4500: tatra prasiddhervāyuḥ prāṇa iti prāpta ucyate-prāṇaśabdaṃ brahma vijñeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4502: tathāhi- paurvāparyeṇa paryalocyamāne vākye padārthānāṃ samanvayo brahmapratipādanapara upalabhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4504: 'varaṃ vṛṇīṣva' itīndreṇoktaḥ pratardanaḥ paramaṃ puruṣārthaṃ varamupacikṣepa- 'tvameva me vṛṇīśva yaṃ tvaṃ manuṣyāya hitatamaṃ manyase' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4505: tasmai hitatamatvenopadiśyamānaḥ prāṇaḥ kathaṃ paramātmā na syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4508: tathā 'sa yo māṃ veda na ha vai tasya kenacana karmaṇā loko mīyate na steyena na bhrūṇahatyayā' (kau. 3.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:4510: brahmavijñānena hi sarvakarmakṣayaḥ prasiddhaḥ- 'kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare' (mu. 2.2.8)
GSP33brssgo1u:4514: tathopasaṃhāre 'pi 'ānando 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ' ityānandatvādīni na brahmaṇo 'nyatra samyak saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4515: 'sa na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānbhavati no evāsādhunā karmaṇā kanīyāneṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokasya unninīṣate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4516: eṣa u bhavāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhyo 'dho ninīṣate' iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4522: sa netyādinā dharmādyaspṛṣṭatvaṃ tatkārayitṛtvaṃ tadīśitṛtvaṃ ca sarvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4524: divodāsyāpatyaṃ daivodāsiḥ pratardano nāma rājā yuddhena puruṣakāreṇa ca karaṇenendrasya premāspadaṃ gṛhaṃ jagāma /
GSP33brssgo1u:4525: taṃ ha indra uvāca, pratardana varaṃ te dadānīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4526: sa hovāca pratardanaḥ, yaṃ tvaṃ martyāya hitatamaṃ manyase taṃ varaṃ tvamevālocya mahyaṃ dehīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4533: prāṇasya dehadhārakatvamutthāpakatvaṃ ca prasiddhamiti vaktuṃ khalvityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4540: pūrvaṃ pradhānaprātipadikārthabalāt vibhaktyarthabādhavadvākyārthajñānaṃ prati hetutvena pradhānānekapadārthabalādekavākyatābhaṅga iti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatirvāstu /
GSP33brssgo1u:4543: hitatamatvakarmakṣayādipadārthānāṃ saṃbandho brahmaṇi tātparyaniścāyaka upalabhyata ityuktaṃ vivṛṇoti-upakrama ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4544: yaṃ manyase taṃ varaṃ tvameva prayacchetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4546: tasya viduṣo loko mokṣo mahatāpi pātakena na ha mīyate naiva hiṃsyate na pratibadhyate jñānāgninā karmatūlarāśerdagdhatvādityāha-sa ya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4552: na vaktur ātmopadeśād iti ced adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hy asmin | BBs_1,1.29 |
GSP33brssgo1u:4556: vaktā hīndro nāma kaścidvigrahavāndevatāviśeṣaḥ svamātmānaṃ pratardanāyācacakṣe- 'māmeva vijānīhi' ityupakramya 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā' ityahaṅkāravādena /
GSP33brssgo1u:4557: sa eṣa vakturātmatvenopadiśyamānaḥ prāṇaḥ kathaṃ brahma syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4560: tathā vigrahasaṃbandhibhireva brahmaṇyasaṃbhavadbhirdharmairātmānaṃ tuṣṭāva- 'triśīrṣāṇaṃ tvāṣṭramahanamarunmukhānyatīñśālāvṛkebhyaḥ prāyaccham' ityevamādibhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4564: 'yā ca kācidbalakṛtirindrakarmaiva ta' diti hi vadanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4567: niścite caivaṃ devatātmopadeśe hitatamatvādivacanāni yathāsaṃbhavaṃ tadviṣayāṇyeva yojayitavyāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:4568: tasmādukturindrasyātmopadeśānna prāṇo brahmetyākṣipya pratisamādhīyate- 'adhyātmasaṃbhandhabhūmā hyasmin' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4570: 'yāvaddhyasmiñsarīre prāṇo vasati tāvadāyuḥ' iti prāṇasyaiva prajñātmanaḥ pratyagbhūtasyāyuṣyapradhānopasaṃhārayoḥ svātantryaṃ darśayati na devatāviśeṣasya parācīnasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:4571: tathāstitve ca prāṇānāṃ niḥśreyasamityadhyātmamevendriyāśrayaṃ prāṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4574_0: 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' iti cepakramya 'tadyathā rathasyāreṣu nemirarpitā
GSP33brssgo1u:4574_1: nābhāvarā arpitā evamevaitā bhūtamātrāḥ prajñāmātrāsvarpitāḥ prajñāmātrāḥ prāṇe 'rpitāḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4574_2: sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmānando 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ' iti viṣayondriyavyavahārānabhibhūtaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4575: 'sa ma ātmeti vidyāt' iti copasaṃhāraḥ pratyagātmaparigrahe sādhurna parācīnaparigrahe /
GSP33brssgo1u:4581: arunmukhān rauti yathārthaṃ śabdayatīti rut vedāntavākyaṃ tanmukhe yeṣāṃ te runmukhāstebhyo 'nyānvedāntabahirmukhānyatīn sālāvṛkebhyo 'raṇyaśvabhyo dattavānasmi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4583: nābhau cakrapiṇḍikāyāmarā arpitāḥ evaṃ bhūtāni pṛthivyādīni pañca mīyanta iti mātrā bhogyāḥ śabdādayaḥ pañceti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4586: trīṇi śīrṣāṇi yasyeti triśīrṣā tvaṣṭuḥ putro viśvarūpo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ taṃ hatavānasmi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4588: tanmukhe yeṣāṃ te runmukhāstebhyo 'nyānvedāntabahirmukhān yatīnaraṇyaśvabhyo dattavānasmītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4591: balavācinā prāṇaśabdena baladevatā lakṣyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4592: indro hitapradātṛtvādhitatamaḥ, karmānadhikārādapāpa ityevaṃ vyākhyeyānītyāha-niścite ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4599: astitve prāṇasthitau prāṇānāmindriyāṇāṃ sthitirityarthataḥ śrutimāha-astitva iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4604: loke prasiddhasya rathasyāreṣu neminābhyormadhyasthaśalākāsu cakropāntarūpā nemirarpitā,
GSP33brssgo1u:4606: evaṃ bhūtāni pañca pṛthivyādīni mīyanta iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4607: mātrāḥ bhogyāḥ śabdādayaḥ pañceti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ prajñāmātrāsu daśasvarpitāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4608: indriyajāḥ pañca śabdādiviṣayaprajñāḥ mīyante ābhiriti mātrāḥ pañca dhīndriyāṇi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4609: nemivadgrāhyaṃ grāhakeṣu areṣu kalpitamityuktvā nābhisthānīye prāṇe sarvaṃ kalpitamityāha-prāṇe 'rpitā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4610: sa prāṇo mama svarūpamityāha-sa ma iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4611: tarhi pratyagātmani samanvayo na tu brahmaṇi, tatrāha-ayamiti //29//
GSP33brssgo1u:4616: indro nāma devatātmānaṃ svamātmānaṃ paramātmatvenāhameva paraṃ brahmetyārṣeṇa darśanena yathāśāstraṃ paśyannupadiśati sma- 'māmeva vijānīhi' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4617: yathā 'taddhaitatpaśyannṛṣirvāmadevaḥ pratipede 'haṃ manurabhavaṃ sūryaśca' iti tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:4618: 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavat' (bṛ. 1.4.10) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4619: yatpunaruktaṃ 'māmeva vijānīhi' ityuktvā vigrahadharmairindra ātmānaṃ tuṣṭāva tvāṣṭravadhādibhiriti, tatparihartavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4620: atrocyate- na tvāṣṭravadhādīnāṃ vijñeyendrastutyarthatvenopanyāso yasmādevaṅkarmāhaṃ tasmānmāṃ vijānīhīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4623_1: 'tasya me tatra lobha ca na mīyate sa yo māṃ veda na ha vai tasya kena ca karmaṇā
GSP33brssgo1u:4625: yasmādīdṛśānyapi krūrāṇi karmāṇi kṛtavato mama brahmabhūtasya lomāpi na hiṃsyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4626: sa yo 'nyo 'pi māṃ veda na tasya kenacidapi karmaṇā loko hiṃsyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4627: vijñeyaṃ tu brahmaiva 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā' iti vakṣyamāṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4633: vijñeyendrastutyartha upanyāso na cetkathaṃ tarhi sa iti pṛcchati-kathamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4644: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt | BBs_1,1.31 |
GSP33brssgo1u:4645: yadyapyadhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmadarśanānna parācīnasya devatātmana upadeśaḥ tathāpi na brahmavākyaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4647: jīvasya tāvadasminvākye vispaṣṭaṃ liṅgamupalabhyate 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4648: atra hi vāgādibhiḥ karaṇairvyāpṛtasya kāryakaraṇādhyakṣasya jīvasya vijñeyatvamabhidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4649: tathā mukhyaprāṇaliṅgamapi- 'atha khalu prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4651: prāṇasaṃvāde vāgādīnprāṇānprakṛtya- 'tānvariṣṭhaḥ prāṇa uvāca mā mohamāpadyathāhamevaitatpañcadhātmānaṃ pravibhajyaitadprāṇamavaṣṭabhya vidhārayāmi' (pra. 2.3) iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4652: ye tu imaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhya iti paṭhanti teṣāmimaṃ jīvamindriyagrāmaṃ vā parigṛhya śarīramutthāpayatīti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4655_1: ca bhedanirdeśa ityubhayayā nirdeśa upapadyate- 'yo vai prāṇaḥ sā prajñā yā vai prajñā
GSP33brssgo1u:4655_2: sa prāṇaḥ saha hyetāvasmiñśarīre vasataḥ sahotkrāmataḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4657: tasmādihajīvamukhyaprāṇayorantara ubhau vā pratīyeyātāṃ na brahmeti cet,
GSP33brssgo1u:4659: evaṃ sati trividhamupāsanaṃ prasajyeta- jīvopāsane mukhyaprāṇopāsanaṃ brahmopāsanaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4662: 'māmeva vijānīhi' ityupakramya 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā taṃ māmāyuramṛtamityupāḥsva' ityuktvānte 'sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmānando 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ' ityekarūpāvupakramopasaṃhārau dṛśyete /
GSP33brssgo1u:4668: yattu mukhyaprāṇaliṅgaṃ darśitam- 'idaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' iti, tadasat /
GSP33brssgo1u:4671: itareṇa tu jīvanti yasminnetāvupāśritau' (kāṭha. 2.5.5) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4672: yadapi na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt ityādi jīvaliṅgaṃ darśitaṃ tadapi na brahmapakṣaṃ nivārayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4673: nahi jīvo nāmātyantabhinno brahmaṇaḥ, 'tattvamasi', 'ahaṃ brahmāsmi' ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4674: buddhyādyupādhikṛtaṃ tu viśeṣamāśritya brahmaiva sañjīvaḥ kartā bhoktā cetyucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4675: tasyopādhikṛtaviśeṣaparityāgena svarūpaṃ brahma darśayituṃ 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādinā pratyagātmābhimukhīkaraṇārthamupadeśo na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4677: tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi nedaṃ yadidamupāsate //
GSP33brssgo1u:4678: ' (ke. 1.4) ityādi ca śrutyantaraṃ vacanādikriyāvyāpṛtasyaivātmano brahmatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4679: yatpunaretaduktam- 'saha hyetāvasmiñśarīre vasataḥ sahotkrāmataḥ' iti prāṇaprajñātmanorbhedadarśanaṃ brahmavāde nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4681_1: upādhidvayopahitasya tu pratyagātmanaḥ svarūpeṇābheda ityataḥ prāṇa eva prajñātmetyekīkaraṇamaviruddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:4682: athavā nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvādiha tadyogāt ityasyāyamanyor'thaḥ- na brahmavākyo 'pi jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgaṃ virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4684: trividhamiha brahmopāsane vivakṣitaṃ prāṇadharmeṇa prajñādharmeṇa svadharmeṇa ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:4688_0: 'atha yathāsyai prajñāyai sarvāṇi bhūtānyekībhavanti tadvyākhyāsyāmaḥ' ityupakramya
GSP33brssgo1u:4688_1: 'vāgevāsyā ekamaṅgamadūduhattasyai nāma parastātprativihitā bhūtamātrā prajñayā vācaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4688_2: samāruhya vācā sarvāṇi nāmānyāpnoti' ityādiḥ prajñādharmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4689: tā vā etā daśaiva bhūtamātrā adhiprajñaṃ daśa prajñāmātrā adhibhūtam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4690: yaddhi bhūtamātrā na syurna prajñāmātrāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4691: yaddhi prajñāmātrā na syurna bhūtamātrāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4694: 'tadyathā rathasyāreṣu nemirarpitā nābhāvarā arpitā evamevaitā bhūtamātrāḥ prajñāmātrāsvarpitāḥ prajñāmātrāḥ prāṇe 'rpitāḥ sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmā' ityādirbrahmadharmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4695: tasmādbrahma evaitadupādhidvayadharmeṇa svadharmeṇa caikamupāsanaṃ trividhaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4699: iti śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye śrīśaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtau prathamādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ // 1 //
GSP33brssgo1u:4701: FN: yathāyogaṃ kiñcidatra jīvavākyaṃ kiñcinmukhyaprāṇavākyaṃ kiñcidbrahmavākyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4702: prāṇasaṃvāde- vāgādayaḥ sarve pratyekamātmanaḥ śraiṣṭhyaṃ manyamānāstannirdidhārayiṣayā prajāpatimupajagmuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4703: sa tānuvāca yasminnutkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataramiva bhavati sa vaḥ śreṣṭha iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4706: variṣṭhaḥ prāṇo 'bravīdahameva pañcadhā prāṇāpānādibhāvenātmānaṃ vibhajya etadbhāti gacchatīti vānaṃ tadeva bāṇamasthiraṃ śarīramavaṣṭabhyāśrityeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4707: pañca śabdādayaḥ pañca pṛthivyādaya iti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4708: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca buddhaya iti daśa prajñāmātrāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4710: yena caitanyena vāgabhyudyate preryate vadanasāmarthyamāpadyate tadeva vāgāderagamyaṃ brahma /
GSP33brssgo1u:4711: upāseti svatantrāṇāṃ trayāṇāmupāstau vākyabhedaḥ, natvekasyaiva brahmaṇastaddharmeṇetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4715: dehotthāpanaṃ jīvaliṅgaṃ kiṃ na syāt, tatrāha-śarīradhāraṇaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4716: sarve vāgādayaḥ prāṇā ahamahaṃ śreṣṭha iti vivadamānāḥ prajāpatimupajagmuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4718: yasminnutkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataraṃ patiṣyati sa vaḥ śreṣṭha iti tathākrameṇa vāgādipūtkrānteṣvapi mūkādibhāvena śarīraṃ svasthamasthāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4719: mukhyaprāṇasya tu uccikramiṣāyāṃ sarveṣāṃ vyākulatvāptau tānvāgādīnvariṣṭhaḥ prāṇa uvāca,
GSP33brssgo1u:4722: pañcadhā prāṇāpānādibhāvenātmānaṃ vibhajya etadvāti gacchatīti vānaṃ tadeva bāṇamasthiraṃ śarīramavaṣṭabhyāśritya dhārayāmītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4726: yadi jīvamukhyaprāṇayorliṅgādupāstatvaṃ tarhi brahmaṇo 'pi liṅgānāmuktatvādupāsanaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4728: naca svatantrapadārthabhedādvākyabhedaḥ kiṃ na syāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4731: nahi pradhānavākyārthabrahmaliṅgamanyathā netuṃ śakyaṃ, na vā taducitamityāha-naca brahmaliṅgamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4733: anyatra 'ata eva prāṇaḥ'ityādau vṛtterāśritvādihāpi tasya brahmaliṅgasya yogādbrahmapara eva prāṇaśabda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4735: yasminnetau preryatvena sthitau tenetareṇa brahmaṇā sarve prāṇādivyāpāraṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ /
