GSP33brssgo1u:4741: yena caitanyena vāgabhyudyate svakāryābhimukhyena preryate tadeva vāgādiragamyaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4742: tattvaṃpadavācyayoḥ svarūpato bhedasthābhyāmupalakṣyātmasvarūpābhedādekatvaṃ nirdiśyata ityāha-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4752: tasyāḥ saṃbhandhīni dṛśyāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni yathaikaṃ bhavantyadhiṣṭhānacidātmanā tathā vyākhyāsyāma ityupakramyoktam-'vāgeva'ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4755: arthātmakarūpaprapañcaviṣayitvamardhaṃ śarīramiti militvā viṣayitvākhyaṃ pūrṇaṃ śarīramindriyasādhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4756: tatra karmendriyeṣu vāgevāsyāḥ prajñāyā ekamaṅgaṃ dehārdhamadūduhat pūrayāmāsa /
GSP33brssgo1u:4759: tasyāḥ punarnāma kila cakṣurādinā prativihitā jñāpitābhūtamātrā rūpādyartharūpā parastādaparārdhe kāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4761: evaṃ buddheḥ sarvārthadraṣṭṛtvamupapādya tanniṣṭhacitpratibimbadvārā sākṣiṇi draṣṭṛtvādhyāsamāha-prajñayeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4762: buddhidvārā cidātmā vācamindriyaṃsamāruhya tasyāḥ prerako bhūtvā vācā karaṇena sarvāṇi nāmāni vaktavyatvenāpnoti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4763: cakṣuṣā sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśyatītyevaṃ draṣṭā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4764: tathāca sarvadraṣṭṛtvaṃ cidātmani draṣṭṛtvādhyāsanimittatvaṃ ca buddherdharma ityuktaṃ bhavati sarvādhāratvāndatvādiḥ brahmadharma ityāha-tā vā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4766: prajñā indriyajātyā adhikṛtya grāhyā bhūtamātrā vartante,
GSP33brssgo1u:4767: prajñāmātrā indriyāṇi grāhyaṃ bhūtajātamadhikṛtya vartanta iti grāhya grāhakayormithaḥ sāpekṣatvamuktaṃ sādhayati-yaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4769: grāhyeṇa grāhyasvarūpaṃ na sidhyati kintu grāhakeṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:4771: tasmātsāpekṣatvādetadgrāhyagrāhakadvayaṃ vastuto na bhinnaṃ kintu cidātmanyaropitamityāha-
GSP33brssgo1u:4782: naca nānādharmaviśiṣṭamekamupāsanaṃ vidhīyata iti vācyaṃ, tādṛśavidhivākyasyātrāśravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4788: ata upāsanāvidhilubdhena 'vaktāraṃ vidyāt' 'etadevokthamupāsīta' 'sa ma ātmeti vidyāt'iti jīvaprāṇabrahmopāsanavidhayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4794: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhāyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1//
GSP33brssgo1u:4801: prathame pāde 'janmādyasya yataḥ' ityākāśādeḥ samastasya jagato janmādikāraṇaṃ brahmetyuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4807: arthāntaraprasiddhānāṃ ca keṣāñcicchabdānāṃ brahmaviṣayatvahetupratipādanena kānicidvākyāni spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgāni saṃdihyamānāni brahmaparatayā nirṇītīni /
GSP33brssgo1u:4808: punarapyanyāni vākyānyaspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgāni saṃdihyante- kiṃ paraṃ brahma pratipādayantyāhosvidarthāntaraṃ kiñcidasti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4816: idamāmnāyate- 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma tajjalāniti śānta upāsīta /
GSP33brssgo1u:4817: atha khalu kratumayaḥ puruṣo yathākraturasmiṃlloke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati sa kratuṃ kurvīta',
GSP33brssgo1u:4819: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimiha manomayatvādibhirdharmaiḥ śārīra ātmopāsyatvenopadiśyata āhosvitparaṃ brahmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4823: tasya hi kāryakaraṇādhipateḥ prasiddho manaādibhiḥ saṃbandho na parasya brahmaṇaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4825: nanu 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti svaśabdenaiva brahmopāttaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4828: nedaṃ vākyaṃ brahmopāsanāvidhiparaṃ kiṃ tarhi śamavidhiparam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4829: yatkāraṇaṃ 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma tajjalāniti śānta upāsīta' ityāha /
GSP33brssgo1u:4830: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yasmātsarvamidaṃ vikārajātaṃ brahmaiva, tajjatvāttallatvāttadanatvācca /
GSP33brssgo1u:4831: naca sarvasyaikātmatve rāgādayaḥ saṃbhavanti, tasmācchānta upāsīteti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4832: naca śamavidhiparatve satyanena vākyena brahmopāsanaṃ niyantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4833: upāsanaṃ tu 'sa kratuṃ kurvīta' ityanena vidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4835: tasya ca viṣayatvaṃna śrūyate- 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīraḥ' iti jīvaliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4838: 'eṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaye 'ṇīyānvrīhervā yavādvā' iti ca hṛdayāyatanatvamaṇīyastvaṃ cārāgramātrasya jīvasyāvakalpate nāparicchinnasya brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4840: atra brūmaḥ- na tāvadaṇīyastvaṃ jyāyastvaṃ cobhayamekasminsamāśrayituṃ śakyaṃ, virodhāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4847: yatsarveṣu vedānteṣu prasiddhaṃ brahmaśabdasyālambanaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃsa iha ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti vākyopakrame śrute,
GSP33brssgo1u:4850: nanu vākyopakrame śamavidhivivakṣayā brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ na svavivakṣayetyuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4851: atrocyate- yadyapi śamavidhivivakṣayā brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ tathāpi manomayatvādiṣūpadiśyamāneṣu tadeva brahma saṃnihitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4852: jīstu na saṃnihito naca svaśabdenopātta iti vaiṣamyam // 1 //
GSP33brssgo1u:4856: tasminnaniti ceṣṭata iti tadanaṃ tajjaṃ catallaṃ ca tadanaṃ ceti tajjalān /
GSP33brssgo1u:4862: prāṇaḥ śarīramasyeti samāsagatasarvanāmnā saṃnihitārthena prakṛtaṃ brahma hitvā jīvamaprakṛtamicchataḥ prakṛtahāniraprakṛtaprakriyācetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4866: tadupajīvyottaraṃ pādadvayaṃ pravartata iti hetuhetumadvāvaḥ saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4875: tajjaṃ ca tallaṃ ca tadanaṃ ceti tajjalān /
GSP33brssgo1u:4884: iha yadhyāyati, mṛtvā dhyānamahimnā tadhyeyarūpeṇa jāyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4889: na tathehopakrame brahmaṇo liṅgamasti, kintu prakaraṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4891: ato jīvaliṅgaṃ balīya iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣayati-śārīra ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4896: atra prayojanābhāve 'pi yatra prayojanaṃ tatra bhavatyeva jagadviśeṣaṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4898: atra bādhāyāṃ samānādhikaraṇadārḍhyārthaṃ viśeṣaṇamāvaśyakaṃ, tadvākyasya jñeyabrahmaviṣayatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4908: sarvatra prasidvabrahmaṇa evātropāsyatvopadeśānna jīva upāsya iti sūtrārthamāha-sarvatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4909: yatra phalaṃ nocyate tatra pūrvottarapakṣasidviḥ phalamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4912: 'syonaṃ te sadanaṃ karomi'iti saṃskārārthasadanasya nirākāṅkṣasyāpi 'tasminsīda'iti sākāṅkṣatacchabdena parāmarśadarśanādityāha-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4915: idaṃ hi liṅgadvayaṃ lokasidvaṃ jīvaṃ na saṃnidhāpayati,
GSP33brssgo1u:4925: yadyapyapauruṣeye vede vakturabhāvānneccārthaḥ saṃbhavati tathāpyupādānena phalenopacaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4926: loke hi yacchabdābhihitamupādeyaṃ bhavati tadvivakṣitamityucyate, yadanupādeyaṃ tadavivakṣitamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4929: tadiha ye vivakṣitā guṇā upāsanāyāmupādeyatvenopadiṣṭāḥ satyasaṃkalpaprabhṛtayaste parasminbrahmaṇyupapadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:4937: tadapi saṃbhavati sarvajagatkāraṇasya sarvātmano brahma ākāśātmatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4940: yattūktaṃ 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīraḥ' iti jīvaliṅgaṃ na tadbrahmaṇyupapadyata iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4942: sarvātmatvāddhi brahmaṇo jīvasaṃbandhīni manomayatvādīni brahmasaṃbandhīni bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4943: tathāca brahmaviṣaye śrutismṛtī bhavataḥ- 'tvaṃ strī tvaṃ kumāra uta vā kumārī /
GSP33brssgo1u:4944: tvaṃ jīrṇo daṇḍena vañcasi tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ' (śve. 4.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:4948: iyaṃ tu 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīraḥ' iti saguṇabrahmaviṣayeti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4954: jīrṇaḥ sthaviro bhūtvā yodaṇḍena vañcati gacchati, tathā yo jātaḥ bālaḥ so 'pi tvameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:4956: sa ca prakṛteṣu guṇeṣvastīti vivakṣopacāra ityāha-tathāpyupādāneneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4957: nanvidaṃ grāhyamidaṃ tyājyamiti dhīrvivakṣādīnā vede kutaḥ syādityata āha-upādānānupādāne tviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4964: jīrṇaḥ sthaviro yo daṇḍena vañcati gacchati so 'pi tvameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:4966: sarvataḥ sarvāsu dikṣu śrutayaḥ śrotrāṇyasyeti sarvataḥ śrutimat /
GSP33brssgo1u:4975: brahmaivoktena nyāyena manomayatvādiguṇaṃ, natu śārīro jīvo manomayatvādiguṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4980: jyāyānpṛthivyā' iti caivañjātīyakā guṇā na śārīra āñjasyenopapadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:4984: śarīre bhavati natu śarīra eva bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:4987: jīvastu śarīra eva bhavati, tasya bhogādhiṣṭhānāccharīrādanyatra vṛttyabhāvāt // 3 //
GSP33brssgo1u:4989: FN: vāgeva vākaḥ so 'syāstīti vākī na vākī avākī vāgādisarvendriyarahitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4991: nanu jīvadharmaścebrahmaṇi yojyante tarhi brahmadharmā eva jīve kimiti na yojyante,
GSP33brssgo1u:4995: kalpitasya dharmā adhiṣṭhāne saṃbadhyante, nādhiṣṭhānadharmāḥ kalpita iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4997: ṭavāgeva vākaḥ so 'syāstīti vākī, na vākī avākī /
GSP33brssgo1u:5001: jyāyastvādyanupapattau śārīra iti paricchedo hetuḥ sūtroktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5009: etamiti prakṛtaṃ manomayatvādiguṇamupāsyamātmānaṃ karmatvena prāpyatvena vyapadiśati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5025: yasmācchabdaviśeṣo bhavati samānaprakaraṇe śrutyantari- 'yathāvrīhirvā yavo vā śyamako vā śyamākataṇḍulo vaivamayamantarātmanpuruṣo hiraṇmayaḥ' (śata. brā. 10.6.3.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5026: śārīrasyatno yaḥ śabdo 'bhidhāyakaḥ saptamyanto 'ntarātmanniti tasmādviśiṣṭo 'nyaḥ prathamāntaḥ puruṣaśabdo manomayatvādiviśiṣṭasyātmano 'bhidhāyakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5040: smṛtiśca śārīraparamātmanorbhedaṃ darśayati- 'īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛddeśer'juna tiṣṭati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5043: atrāha- kaḥ punarayaṃ śārīro nāma paramātmano 'nyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5047: tathā smṛtirapi- 'kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhārata' (gī. 13.2) ityevañjātīyaketi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5049: para evātmā dehendriyamanobuddhyupādhibhiḥ paricchidyamāno bālaiḥ śārīra ityupacaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5051: tadapekṣayā ca karmakartṛtvādibhedavyavahāro na virudhyate prāk 'tattvamasi' ityātmaikatvopadeśaghaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5055: smṛtau hṛdisthasya jīvādbhedokterannāpi hṛdistho manomaya īśvara ityāha-smṛteśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5058: atra sūtrakṛtā satyabheda ukta iti bhrāntinirāsāyekṣatyadhikaraṇe nirastamapi codyamudbhāvya nirasyati-atrāhetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5059: tvaduktarītyā vastuta ekatvameva, bhedastu kalpitaḥ sūtreṣvanūdyata ityāha-satyamiti //6//
GSP33brssgo1u:5063: arbhakaustvāt tadvyapadeśāc ca neti cen na nicāyyatvād evaṃ vyomavac ca | BBs_1,2.7 |
GSP33brssgo1u:5071: sarvagatasya tu sarvadeśeṣu vidyamānatvātparicchinnadeśavyapadeśo 'pi kayācidapekṣayā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5072: yathā samastavasudhādhipatirapi hi sannayodhyādhipatiriti vyapadiśyate kayā punarapekṣayā sarvagataḥ sannīśvaror'bhakaukā aṇīyāṃśca vyapadiśyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5074: evamaṇīyastvādiguṇagaṇopeta īśvarastatra hṛdayapuṇḍarīke nicāyyo draṣṭavya upadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5079: yathā sarvagatamapi sadvyoma sūcīpāśādyapekṣāyārbhakauko 'ṇīyaśca vyapadiśyate, evaṃ brahmāpi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5080: tadevaṃ nicāyyatvāpekṣaṃ brahmaṇor'bhakaukastvamaṇīyastvaṃ ca na pāramārthikam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5082: hṛdayāyatanatvādbrahmaṇo hṛdayāyatanānāṃ ca pratiśarīraṃ bhinnatvādbhinnāyatanānāṃ ca śukādīnāmanekatvasāvayavatvānityatvādidoṣadarśanādbrahmaṇo 'pi tatprasaṅga iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:5088: arbhakamoko yasya sor'bhakaukāḥ tasya bhāvastattvaṃ tasmādārthikamalpatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5093: paricechedatyāgaṃ vinā brahmatvāsaṃbhavāt tattyāge ca brahmaṇa evopāsyatvamāyātīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5104: saṃbhogaprāptir iti cen na vaiśeṣyāt | BBs_1,2.8 |
GSP33brssgo1u:5120: yadapyekatvādbrahmaṇa ātmāntarābhāvāccharīrasya bhogena brahṇo bhogaprasaṅga iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5124: yathāśāstraṃ tarhi śāstrīyor'thaḥ pratipattavyo na tatrārdhajaratīyaṃ labhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5125: śāstraṃ ca tattvamasi ityapahatapāpmatvādiviśeṣaṇaṃ brahma śārīrasyātmatvenopadiśacchārīrasyaiva tāvadupabhoktṛtvaṃ vārayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5127: athāgṛhītaṃ śārīrasya brahmaṇaikatvaṃ tadā mithyājñānanimittaḥ śārīrasyopabhogaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5129: nahi bālaistalamalinatādibhirvyomni vikalpyamāne talamalitādiviśiṣṭameva paramārthato vyoma bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5144: ardhaṃmukhamātraṃ jaratyā buddhāyāḥ kāmayate nāṅāgānīti so 'yamardhajaratīnyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5145: manomayatvādiviśiṣṭasyaiveśvarasya dhyānārthaṃ hārdatve 'pi nirdeṣatvāttasminneva śāṇḍilyavidyāvidye sarvaṃ ityādivākyaṃ samanvitamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5146: brahmaṇo hārdatve 'niṣṭasaṃbhogāpatterjīva eva hārda upāsya iti śaṅkāṃ vyācaṣṭe-vyomavaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5147: brahma bhoktṛ syāta, hārdatve sati cetanatvāt, jīvābhinnatvācca jīvavadityuktaṃ nirasyati-na /
GSP33brssgo1u:5154: kiñca vibhavo bahava ātmāna iti vādināmekasmindehe sarvātmanāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5155: svakarmārjita eva dehe bhoga iti parihāraśca tulya iti na vayaṃ paryanuyojyā ityāha-sarvagateti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5157: brahmaṇo jīvābhinnatvaṃ śrutyā niścitya tena bhoktṛtvānumāne upajīvyaśrutibādhamāha-yathāśāstramiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5158: arthaṃ mukhamātraṃ jaratyā vṛddhāyāḥ kāmayate nāṅgānīti so 'yamardhajaratīyanyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5162: nanvekatvaṃ mayā śrutyā na gṛhītaṃ, yonopajīvyabādhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5163: kintu tvaduktyā gṛhītamityāśaṅkya bimbapratibimbayoḥ kalpitabhedena bhoktṛtvābhoktṛtvavyavasthopapatteraprayojako heturityāha-athāgṛhītamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5165: brahmaṇo hārdatve bādhakābhāvacchāṇḍilyavidyāvākyaṃ brahmaṇyupāsye samanvitamiti sidvam //8//
GSP33brssgo1u:5172: kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate- 'yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odanaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5173: mṛtyūryasyopasevanaṃ ka ityā veda yatra saḥ' (1.2.24) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5175: tatra kimagnirattā syāt, uta jīvaḥ, athavā paramātmeti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5181: jīvo vāttā syāt, 'tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādvatti' iti darśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5183: iti darśanādityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- attātra paramātmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5186: tādṛśasya cādyasya na paramātmano 'nyaḥ kārtsyenāttā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5188: nanviha carācaragrahaṇaṃ nopalabhyate, kathaṃ siddhavaccarācaragrahaṇaṃ hetutvenopādīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5192: yattu paramātmano 'pi nāttṛtvaṃ saṃbhavati, 'anaśnannanyo 'abhicākaśīti' iti darśanāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5198: FN: yasya paramātmano brahma kṣatraṃ cobhe jātī prasiddhānnavadodanau bhavataḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5201: taṃ nirviśeṣamātmānaṃ 'nāvirato duścaritāt' iti mantroktopāyavānyathā veda itthā itthamanyastadrahito na vedetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5203: naca brahkṣatre evātra vivakṣite, mṛtyūpasecanena prāṇabhṛnmātropasthāpanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5211: 'ka itthā veda yatra saḥ' iti ca durvijñānatvaṃ paramātmaliṅgam // 10 //
GSP33brssgo1u:5215: so 'ttā yatra śuddhe cinmātre 'bhedakalpanayā vartate tacchudvaṃ brahma itthā itthaṃ īśvarasyāpyadhiṣṭhānabhūtaṃ ko veda /
GSP33brssgo1u:5223: pūrvatra brahmaṇo bhoktṛtvaṃ nāstītyuktaṃ, tadupajīvya pūrvapakṣayati-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5228: guṇaścātra mṛtyūpasecanapadena saṃnidhāpitaṃ prasidvaudanagataṃ vināśyatvaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:5230: tathāca sarvasya vināśyatvena bhānālliṅgādīśvaro 'ttetyāhanaiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5237: guhāṃ praviṣṭāv ātmānau hi taddarśanāt | BBs_1,2.11 |
GSP33brssgo1u:5238: kaṭhavallīṣveva paṭhyate- 'ṛtaṃ pibantau loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhe /
GSP33brssgo1u:5239: chāyātapau brahmavido vadanti pañṭagnayo ye ca triṇāciketāḥ' (kāṭha. 1.3.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5240: tatra saṃśayaḥ, kimiha buddhijīvau nirdiṣṭāvuta jīvaparamātmānāviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5241: yadi buddhijīvau, tato buddhipradhānātkāryakaraṇasaṃghātādvilakṣaṇo jīvaḥ pratipādito bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5242: tadapīha pratipāditavyaṃ, 'yeyaṃ prete vicikitsā manuṣye 'stītyeke nāyamastīti caike /
GSP33brssgo1u:5244: atha jīvaparamātmānau tato jīvādvilakṣaṇaḥ paramātmā pratipādito bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5246: anyatra bhūtācca bhavyācca yattatpaśyasi tadvada' (kāṭha. 1.2.14) iti pṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5251: iti ca dvivacanena dvayoḥ pānaṃ darśayati śrutiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5253: ata eva kṣetrajñaparamātmapakṣo 'pi na saṃbhavati, cetane 'pi paramātmani ṛtapānāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5267: yadi śarīraṃ guhā, yadi vā hṛdayaṃ, ubhayathāpi buddhikṣetrajñau guhāṃ praviṣṭāvupapadyete /
GSP33brssgo1u:5268: naca sati saṃbhavesarvagatasya brahmaṇo viśiṣṭadeśatvaṃ yuktaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:5270: paramātmā tu na sukṛtasya vā duṣkṛtasya vā gocare vartate,
GSP33brssgo1u:5271: 'na karmaṇā vardhate no kanīyān' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5275: kasmāt, ātmānau hi tāvubhāvapi cetanau samānasvabhāvau /
GSP33brssgo1u:5277: asya gordvitīyo 'nveṣṭavya ityukte gaureva dvitīyo 'nviṣyate, nāśvaḥ puruṣo vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5278: tadiha ṛtapānena liṅgena niścite vijñānātmani dvitīyānveṣaṇāyāṃ samānasvabhāvaścetanaḥ paramātmaiva pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5281: guhāhitatvaṃ tu śrutismṛtiṣvasakṛtparamātmana eva dṛśyate- 'guhāhitaṃ gahvareṣṭhaṃ purāṇam' (kāṭha. 1.2.12)
GSP33brssgo1u:5284: sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upalabdhyartho deśaviśeṣopadeśo na virudhyata ityedapyuktameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:5294_0: bhuñjānau sukṛtasya loke samyagarjitasyādṛṣṭasya kārye dehe vartamāno parasya brahmaṇor'dhaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5294_1: sthānamarhatīti parārdhaṃ hṛdayaṃ tasminparame śreṣṭhe yā guhā nabhokṣaṇā tāṃ praviśya
GSP33brssgo1u:5297: manuṣye prete mṛtesati yeyaṃ vicikitsā saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5304: svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ tacca pāturiva pāyayiturapyastīti so 'pi kartā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5306: guhāhitaṃ buddhau sthitaṃ gahvare 'nekānarthasaṃkule dehe sthitaṃ, purāṇamādipuruṣam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5307: parame vyoman śreṣṭhe hārdākāśe tatra guhāyāṃ buddau /
GSP33brssgo1u:5311_0: sukṛtasya karmaṇo loke kārye dehe parasya brahmaṇor'dhaṃ sthānamarhatīti parārdhaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5311_1: hṛdayaṃ paramaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tasminyā guhā nabhorūpā vudvirūpā vā tāṃ praviśya sthitau
GSP33brssgo1u:5311_2: chāyātapavat mitho virudvau tau brahmavidaḥ karmiṇaśca vadanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5313: nāciketavākyānāmadhyayanaṃ, tadarthajñānaṃ, tadanuṣṭhānaṃ ceti tritvaṃ bodhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5317: manuṣye prete mṛte sati yeyaṃ vicikitsā saṃśayaḥ paraloke bhoktāstītyeke, nāstītyanye /
GSP33brssgo1u:5321: chatripadena gantāra iva pibatpadenājahallakṣaṇayā praviṣṭāvucyete ityāha-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5324: yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeveti nyāyāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5329: edhāṃsi kāṣṭhāni pacantītyākhyātena kārakatvaṃ lakṣyaṃ, prakṛtistu mukhyaiveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5331: brahmakṣatrapadasya saṃnihitamṛtyupadādanityavastuparatvavadihāpi pibatpadasya saṃnihitaguhāpadāhudvijīvaparateti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5333: ekasmiñjātimati kḷpte sajātīyameva dvitīyaṃ grāhyaṃ, vyaktimātragrahe lāghavāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5335: na cāstu kārakatvena sajātīyā budvireva jīvasya dvitīyeti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5337: tathāca loke dvitīyasyāntaraṅgajātimattvadarśanājjīvasya dvitīyaścetana eveti sūtrārthamāha-saṃkhyāśravaṇe ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5339: gahvare 'nekānarthasaṃkule dehe sthitaṃ purāṇamanādipuruṣaṃ viditvā harṣaśokau jahāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5341: vyoman hārdākāśe yā guhā buddhiḥ tasyāṃ nihitaṃ brahma yo veda so 'śnute sarvānkāmānityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5349: ityādinā pareṇa granthena rathirathādirūpakakalpanayā vijñānātnāṃ rathinaṃ saṃsāramokṣayorgantāraṃ kalpayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5353: adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti' (kā. 1.2.12)
GSP33brssgo1u:5356: brahmavido vadanti iti ca vaktṛviśeṣopādanaṃ paramātmaparigrahe ghaṭate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5358: eṣa eva nyāyaḥ 'dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā' (muṇḍa. 3.1.1) ityevamādiṣvapi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5362: anantare ca mantre tāveva draṣṭṛdraṣṭavyabhāvena viśinaṣṭi- 'samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagno 'nīśayā śocati muhyamānaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5363: juṣṭaṃ yadā paśyatyanyamīśamasya mahimānamiti vītaśokaḥ' (muṇḍa. 3.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5364: apara āha- 'dvā suparṇā' iti neyamṛgasyādhikaraṇasya siddhāntaṃ bhajate,
GSP33brssgo1u:5366: 'tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādittīti sattvamanaś nannanyo 'bhicākaśītītyanaś nannanyo 'bhipaśyati jñastāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5370: tatraiva ca vyākhyātatvāt- 'tadetatsattvaṃ yena svapnaṃ paśyati,
GSP33brssgo1u:5371: atha yo 'yaṃ śārīra upadraṣṭā sa kṣetrajñastāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5373: nahyatra śārīraḥ kṣetrajñaḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvādinā saṃsāradharmeṇopeto vivakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5378: tāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcana raca ādhvaṃsate ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5379: kathaṃ punarasminpakṣe tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādittīti sattvam ityacetane sattve bhoktṛtvāvacanamti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5380: ucyate- neyaṃ śrutiracetanasya sattvasya bhoktṛtvaṃ vakṣyāmīti pravṛttā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5381: kiṃ tarhi cetanasya kṣetrajñasyābhoktṛtvaṃ brahmasbhāvatāṃ ca vakṣyāmīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5383: idaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ta sattvakṣetrajñayoritaretisvabhāvāvivekakṛtaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5384: paramārthatastu nānyatarasyāpi saṃbhavati, acetanatvātsattvasya, avikriyatvācca kṣetrajñasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:5386: tathāca śrutiḥ- 'yatra vā anyadiva syāttatrānyo 'nyatpaśyet' ityādinā svapnadṛṣṭahastyādivyavahāravadavidyāviṣaya eva kartṛtvādivyavahāraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5393: tata eva gūḍhamanupraviṣṭaṃ gahanatāṃ gatamīśvaram adhyātmaprayogaḥ pratyagātmanyeva cittasamādhānaṃ tenādhigamo mahāvākyajā vṛttistayā viditvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5396: juṣṭaṃ dhyānādinā sevitaṃ yadā dhyānaparipākadaśāyāmīśamanyaṃ viśiṣṭarūpādbhinnaṃ pasyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5400: anyadivābhāsabhūtaṃ nānātvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ syāttatra avidyakabuddhyādisaṃbandhādanyo bhūtvānyacakṣuṣā paśyet /
GSP33brssgo1u:5408: tatra heturgūḍhaṃ māyāvṛtaṃ māyānupraviṣṭaṃ paścādguhāhitaṃ guhādvārā gahvareṣṭhaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5410: adhyātmayogaḥ sthūlasūkṣmakāraṇadehalayakrameṇa pratyagātmani cittasamādhānaṃ tenādhigamo mahāvākyajā vṛttistayā viditvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5411: ṛtapānamatre jīvānuvādena vākyārthajñānāya tatpadārtho brahma pratipādyata ityupasaṃharati-tasmādiheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5421: anīśayā svasyeśvaratvāpratītyā dehe nimagnaḥ puruṣo jīvaḥ śocati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5424: juṣṭaṃ dhyānādinā sevitaṃ yadā dhyānaparipākadaśāyāmīśamanyaṃ viśiṣṭarūpādbhinnaṃ śodhitacinmātraṃ pratyaktvena paśyati tadāsya mahimānaṃ svarūpameti prāpnotīva /
GSP33brssgo1u:5431: pūrvapakṣārthastadā syāt, yadyatra buddhibhinnaḥ saṃsārī pratipadyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:5432: nahyatra saṃsārī vivikṣyate kintu śodhitastvamartho brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5436: nāhi jīvo buddhibhinna iti vivekamātreṇopasaṃhāro yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5438: avidyā viduṣi kimapi svakāryaṃ nādhvaṃsate na saṃpādayati,
GSP33brssgo1u:5444: vastuto jīvasyābhoktṛtve bhoktṛtvadhīḥ kathamityata āha-idaṃ hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5450: tasmāt 'ṛtaṃ pibantau'iti vākyameva guhādhikaraṇaviṣaya iti sthitam //12//
GSP33brssgo1u:5456: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovācaitadamṛtamabhayametadbrahmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5457: etadyapyasminsarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmani eva gacchati' (chā. 4.15.1) ityādi śra8yate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5458: tatra saṃśayaḥ kimayaṃ pratibimbātmakṣyadhikaraṇo nirdiśyate 'thavā vijñānātmā uta devatātmendriyasyādhiṣṭhātāthaveśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5461: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' iti ca prasiddavadupadeśāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5463: sa hi cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ paśyaṃścakṣuṣi saṃnihito bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5478: 'tadyadyapyasminsarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmani eva gacchati' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5480: 'etaṃ saṃyaddhāma ityācakṣate etaṃ hi sarvāṇi vāmānyabhisaṃyanti' /
GSP33brssgo1u:5481: 'eṣa u eva vāmanīreṣa hi sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati' /
GSP33brssgo1u:5482: ' eṣa u eva bhāmānīreṣa hi sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti' (chā. 4.15.2,3,4) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:5494: tadakṣisthānamasaṅgatvena brahmaṇo 'nurūpaṃ yato 'sminkṣiptaṃ vartmanī pakṣmaṇī eva gacchatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5497: tadvadihāpi dṛśyata iti cākṣuṣatvānusāreṇamṛtatvādayo dhyānārthaṃ kalpitatvena neyā iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-chāyātmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5517: atrocyate- bhavedeṣānavakḷptiḥ, yadyetadevaikaṃ sthānamasya nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo1u:5518: santi hyanyānyapi pṛthivyādīni sthānānyasya nirdiṣṭāni- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan' (bṛ. 3.7.3) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5519: teṣu hi cakṣurapi nirdiṣṭam- 'yaścakṣuṣi tiṣṭhan' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5520: 'sthānādivyapadeśāt' ityādigrahaṇenaitaddarśayati- na kevalaṃ sthānamevaikamanucitaṃ brahmaṇo nirdiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:5521: kiṃ tarhi nāmarūpamityevañjātīyakamapyanāmarūpasya brahmaṇo 'nucitaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate- 'tasyoditi nāma' 'hiraṇyaśmaśruḥ' (chā. 1.6.7,6) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5522: nirguṇamapi sadbrahma nāmarūpagatairguṇaiḥ saguṇamupāsanārthaṃ tatra tatropadiśyata ityetadapyuktameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:5523: sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upalabdhyarthaṃ sthānaviśeṣo na virudhyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:5527: sthānādanyādayo yeṣāṃ te sthānādayo nāmarūpaprakārāsteṣāṃ vyapadeśātsarvaṅgatasyaikasthānaniyamo nāvakalpate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5528: sthānanāmarūpāṇāṃ dhyānārthaṃ śrutyantare 'pyupadeśādakṣisthānatvoktiratra na doṣa iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5529: anavakḷptiḥ akḷptakalpanā tadā bhavet, yadyatraiva nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavedityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5535: apica naivātra vivaditavyaṃ, kiṃ brahmāsminvākye 'bhidhīyate na veti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5537: sukhaviśiṣṭaṃ hi brahma yadvākyopakrame prakrāntaṃ 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti tadevehābhihitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5539: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' (chā. 4 14.1) iti ca gatimātrābhidhānapratijñānāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5540: kathaṃ punarvākyopakrame sukhaviśiṣṭaṃ brahma vijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5541: ucyate- 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' ityetadagnīnāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvopakosala uvāca- 'vijānāmyahaṃ yatprāṇo brahma kaṃ ca tu khaṃ ca na vijānāmi' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5542: tatredaṃ prativacanam- 'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kaṃ' (chā. 4.10.5)
GSP33brssgo1u:5545: yadi tasya viśeṣaṇatvena kaṃśabdaḥ sukhavācī nopādīyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:5546: tathā sati kevale bhūtākāśe brahmaśabdo nāmādiṣviva pratīkābhiprāyeṇa prayukta iti pratītiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5547: tathā kaṃśabdasya viṣayendriyasaṃparkajanite sāmaye sukhe prasiddhatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:5550: itaretaraviśeṣatau tu kaṅkhaṃśabdau sukhātmakaṃ brahma gamayataḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5551: tatra dvitīye brahmaśabde 'nupādīyamāne kaṃ khaṃ brahmetyevocyamāne kaṃśabdasya viśeṣaṇatvenaivopayuktatvātasukhasya guṇasyādhyeyatvaṃ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:5552: tanmā bhūdityubhayoḥ kaṅkhaṃśabdayorbrahmaśabdaśirastvaṃ 'kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5555: pratyekaṃ ca gārhapatyādayo 'gnayaḥ svaṃ svaṃ mahimānamupadiśya 'eṣā somya te 'smadvidyātmavidyā ca' ityupasaṃharantaḥ pūrvatra brahma nirdiṣṭamiti jñāpayanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5556: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' iti ca gatimātrābhidhānapratijñānamarthāntaravivakṣāṃ vārayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5557: 'yathā puṣkarapalāśā āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate' (chā. 4.14.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:5558: iti cākṣisthānaṃ puruṣaṃ vijānataḥ pāpenānupaghātaṃ bruvannakṣisthānasya puruṣasya brahmatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5559_1: tadvido gatiṃ vakṣyāmītyupakramate- 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca'
GSP33brssgo1u:5565: brahmapadaṃ śiro yayoste brahmaśirasī tayorbhāvo brahmaśirastvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5567: dhyānārthaṃ bhedakalpanayā sukhaguṇaviśiṣṭasya brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtasya ya eṣa iti sarvanāmnābhidhānādantaraḥ paramātmā syāditi sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5568: nanu prakaraṇātprabalena dṛśyatvaliṅgenopasthāpitaśchāyātmā sarvanāmārtha ityata āha-ācāryastviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5574: sā ca sarvanāmnā prakṛtātmagrahe nirvahatītyekavākyatānirvāhakaṃ prakaraṇaṃ vākyabhedakālliṅgadbalavaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5577: kaṃ viṣayasukhaṃ khaṃ ca bhūtākāśaṃ brahmatvena jñātuṃ na śaknomītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5578: khaṃ kathaṃbhūtaṃ, yatkaṃ tadeva khamiti sukhena viśeṣitasya khasya bhūtatvanirāsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5580: yatkhaṃ tadeva kamiti vibhutvena viśeṣitasya kasya janyatvanirāsa iti vyatirekamukhenāha-tatra khamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5586: nanvekaṃ brahmaivātra dhyeyaṃ cedbrahmapadāntaraṃ kimarthamityata āha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5592: pṛthivyagnirannamāditya iti mama catasrastanavo vibhūtiriti gārhapatya upadideśa /
GSP33brssgo1u:5593: āpo diśo nakṣatrāṇi candramā ityanvāhāryapacana uvāca /
GSP33brssgo1u:5594: prāṇa ākāśo dyaurvidyuditi svamahimānamāhavanīyo jagādeti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5604_0: yasmācchrutopaniṣatkasya śrutarahasyavijñānasya brahmavido yā gatirdevayānākhyā prasiddhā
GSP33brssgo1u:5606: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ' (gī. 8.24) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5608_0: 'atha yadu caivāsmiñchavyaṃ kurvanti yadi ca nārciṣamevābhisaṃbhavanti' ityupakramya
GSP33brssgo1u:5608_1: 'ādityāccandramasaṃ candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa enānbrahma gamayatyeva
GSP33brssgo1u:5608_2: devapatho brahmapatha etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavamāvarte nāvartante' (chā. 4.17.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5609: tadiha brahmavidviṣayā prasiddhayā gatyākṣisthānasya brahmatvaṃ niścīyate // 16 //
GSP33brssgo1u:5613: asminnupāsake mṛte putrādayaḥ śavyaṃ śavasaṃbandhi saṃskārādikarma kurvanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5615: śrutā anuṣṭhitā upaniṣat rahasyaṃ saguṇabrahmopāsanaṃ yena tasya yā gatiḥ śrutau smṛtau ca prasidvā tasyā atrābhidhānālliṅgaditi sūtrārthamāha-itaśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5619: svadharmastapaḥ tapobrahmacaryaśraddhāvidyābhirātmānaṃ dhyātvā tayā dhyānavidyayottaraṃ devayānamārgaṃ prāpyate nottareṇa pathā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5621: etadvai brahma prāṇānāṃ vyaṣṭisamaṣṭirūpāṇāmāyatanaṃ liṅgātmakaṃ hiraṇyagarbharūpaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5623: ataḥ kāryaṃ brahma prāpya tatsvarūpaṃ nirguṇaṃ jñātvā mucyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5624: agnireva jyotirdevatā evamaharādyā devatā eva smṛtāvuktāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5625: asminnupāsake mṛte sati yadi putrādayaḥ śavyaṃ śavasaṃskārādikaṃ kurvanti yadi ca na kurvanti ubhayathāpyupāstimahimnā arcirādidevānkrameṇa gacchanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5635: candrādvidyutaṃ gatvā tatra vidyulloke sthitānupāsakānamānavaḥ puruṣo brahmalokādāgatya kāryaṃ brahmalokaṃ prāpayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5637: ta etatkāryaṃ brahma pratipadyamānā upāsakā imaṃ mānavaṃ manoḥ sargaṃ āvartaṃ janmamaraṇāvṛttiyuktaṃ nāvartante nāgacchantītyarthaḥ //16//
GSP33brssgo1u:5642: yatpunaruktaṃ chāyātmā, vijñānātmā, devatātmā vā syādakṣisthāna iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5646: yadaiva hi kaścitpuruṣaścakṣurāsīdati tadā cakṣuṣi puruṣacchāyā dṛśyate, apagate tasminna dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5647: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣaḥ' iti ca śrutiḥ saṃnidhānātsvacakṣuṣi dṛśyamānaṃ puruṣamupāsyatvenopadiśati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5648: nacopāsanākāle chāyākaraṃ kañcitpuruṣaṃ cakṣuḥsamīpe saṃnidhāpyopāsta iti yuktaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:5651: asaṃbhavācca tasminnamṛtatvādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ na chāyātmani pratītiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5652: tathā vijñānātmano 'pi sādhāraṇe kṛtsnaśarīrendriyasaṃbandhe sati cakṣuṣyevāvasthitatvaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5658: devatātmanastu 'raśmibhireṣo 'sminpratiṣṭhitaḥ' iti śruteryadyapi cakṣuṣyavasthānaṃ syāttathāpyātmatvaṃ tāvanna saṃbhavati, parāgrūpatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5665: asmiṃśca pakṣe dṛśyata iti prasiddhavadupādānaṃ śāstrādyapekṣaṃ vidvadviṣayaṃ prarocanārthamiti vyākhyeyam // 17 //
GSP33brssgo1u:5669: bhīṣā bhayena, asmāt brahmaṇaḥ, pavate calati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5670: uktāpekṣayā pañcamo mṛtyuḥ samāptāyuṣāṃ nikaṭe dhāvatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5675: naca tasya svacakṣuṣā darśanaṃ saṃbhavatītyāha-ya eṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5684: nanu 'cakṣoḥ sūryo ajāyata''sūryo 'stameti'iti vākyaṃ amarā devā iti prasiddhibādhitamityāśaṅkyāha-amaratvamapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5687: uktāpekṣayā pañcamo mṛtyuḥ samāptāyuṣāṃ nikaṭe dhāvatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5690: tasyaśāstre śrutasya śāstrameva karaṇaṃ kalpyaṃ, saṃnidhānāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5691: tathāca śāstrakaraṇako vidvadanubhava upāsanāstutyartha ucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5698_0: 'ya imaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni yo 'ntaro yamayati' ityupakramya
GSP33brssgo1u:5698_1: śrūyate- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhanpṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī
GSP33brssgo1u:5698_2: śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' (bṛha. 3.7.1,2) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5700: sa kimadhidaivādyabhimānī devatātmā kaścitkiṃvā prāptāṇimādyaiśvaryaḥ kaścidyogī kiṃvā paramātmā kiṃvārthāntaraṃ kiñcidityapūrvasaṃjñādarśanātmasaṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5706: tathāca śrūyate- 'pṛthivyeva yasyāyatanamagnirloko mano jyotiḥ' (bṛ. 3.9.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5708: yogino vā kasyacitsiddhasya sarvānupraveśena yamayitṛtvaṃ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:5710: akāryakaraṇatvādityevaṃ prāpta idamucyate- yo 'ntaryāmyadhidaivādiṣu śrūyate sa paramātmaiva syānnānya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5712: tasya hi paramātmano dharmā iha nirdiśyamānā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:5713: pṛthivyādi tāvadadhidaivatādibhedabhinnaṃ samastaṃ vikārajātamantastiṣṭanyamayatīti paramātmano yamayitṛtvaṃ dharma upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5715: eṣa ta 'ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' iti cātmatvāmṛtatve mukhye paramātmana upapadyete /
GSP33brssgo1u:5716: 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda' iti ca pṛthivīdevatāyā avijñeyamantaryāmiṇaṃ bruvandevatātmano 'nyamantaryāmiṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5726: FN: āyatanaṃ śarīraṃ, lokyate 'neneti lokacakṣuḥ, jyotirmanaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5730: 'yaḥ pṛthivyām'ityādinā devatāḥ pṛthivyādyā adhikṛtya yamayitā śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5740: avāntaraphalaṃ tu pūrvapakṣe anīśvaropāstiḥ, sidvānte pratyagbrahmajñānamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5750: īśvaro na niyantā, aśarīratvāt, ghaṭavadiyuktaṃ nirasyati-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5755: vastutastu cetanasāṃnidhyājjaḍasya vyāpāro niyamanaṃ tacchaktimattvaṃ niyantṛtvaṃ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5757: nanu dehaniyanturjīvasyānyo niyantā cettasyāpyanya ityanavasthetyata āha-tasyāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5769: iti hi smaranti, tasyāpi niyantṛtvaṃ sarvavikārakāraṇatvādupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5773: ata uttaramucyate- naca smārte pradhānamantaryāmiśabdaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5775: yadyapyadṛṣṭatvādivyapadeśaḥ pradhānasyasaṃbhavati tathāpi na draṣṭṛtvādivyapeśaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:5777: 'adṛṣṭo draṣṭāśrutaḥ śrotāmato mantāvijñāto vijñātā' (bṛha. 3.7.23) iti hi vākyaśeṣa iha bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5781: śārīro hi cetanatvāddraṣṭā śrotā mantā vijñātā ca bhavati, ātmā ca pratyaktvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5783: adṛṣṭatvādayaśca dharmāḥ śārīre parasiddhāḥ darśanādikriyāyāḥ kartari pravṛttivirodhāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5792: pradhānaṃ mahadādikrameṇa kathaṃ pravartata iti tarkasyāviṣaya ityāha-apratarkyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5793: rūpādihīnatvādavijñeyaṃ, sarvato dikṣu prasuptamiva tiṣṭhati jaḍatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5794: atat apradhānaṃ cetanaṃ, tasya dharmāṇāmabhidhānāditi hetvarthaḥ //19//
GSP33brssgo1u:5798: śarīraś cobhaye 'pi hi bhedenainam adhīyate | BBs_1,2.20 |
GSP33brssgo1u:5802: yadyapi draṣṭṛtvādayo dharmastasya saṃbhavanti tathāpi ghaṭākāśavadupādhiparicchinnatvānna kārtsyena pṛthivyādiṣvantaravasthātuṃ niyantuṃ ca śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5803: apicobhaye 'pi hi śākhinaḥ kāṇvā mādhyandinānāścāntaryāmiṇo bhedenainaṃ śārīraṃ pṛthivyādivadadhiṣṭhānatvena niyamyatvena cādhīyate- 'yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan' (bṛ. 3.7.22) iti kāṇvāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5805: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' ityasminstāvatpāṭhe bhavatyātmaśabdaḥ śārīrasya vācakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5806: 'yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan' ityasminnapi pāṭhe vijñānaśabdena śārīra ucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5809: kathaṃ punarekasmindehe dvau draṣṭāravupapadyete, yaścāyamīśvaro 'ntaryāmī yaścāyamitaraḥ śārīraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5812: atra hi prakṛtādantaryāmiṇo 'nyaṃ draṣṭāraṃ, śrotāraṃ, mantāraṃ, vijñātāraṃ cātmānaṃ pratiṣedhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5816: eko hi pratyagātmā bhavati, na dvau pratyagātmānau saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5817: ekasyaiva tu bhedavyavahāra upādhikṛto yathā ghaṭākāśo mahākāśa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5818: tataśca jñātṛjñeyādibhedaśrutayaḥ pratyakṣādīni ca pramāṇāni saṃsārānubhavo vidhipratiṣedhaśāstraṃ ceti sarvametadupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5819: tathāca śrutiḥ 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati' itvavidyāviṣaye sarve vyavahāraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5820: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' iti vidyāviṣaye sarve vyavahāraṃ vārayati // 20 //
GSP33brssgo1u:5824: yathā devadattakartṛkagamanakriyāyā grāmaḥ karma na devadattaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5830: dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāramātmānaṃ tayā dṛśyayā dṛṣṭyā na viṣayīkuryā ityādiśruteścādṛṣṭatvādidharmāḥ śārīrasyetyāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5833: nanvatraiko bhoktā jīvaḥ, īśvarastvabhokteti na virodha iti śaṅkate-kā punariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5842: bheda upādhikalpitaḥ śrutisūtrābhyāmanūdyata iti samādhatte-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5843: bhedaḥ satyaḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-eko hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5855: 'yattadadreśyamagrāhyamagotramavarṇamacakṣuḥśrotraṃ tadapāṇipādaṃ nityaṃ vibhuṃ sarvagataṃ susūkṣmaṃ tadavyayaṃ yadbhūtayoniṃ paripaśyanti dhīrāḥ' (muṇḍa. 1.1.5,6) iti śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5856: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimayamadreśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayoniḥ pradhānaṃ syāduta śārīra āhosvitparameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5857: tatra pradhānamacetanaṃ bhūtayoniriti yuktaṃ, acetanānāmeva taddṛṣṭāntatvenopādānāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5858: 'yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhyate ca yathā pṛthivyāmoṣadhaḥ saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5859: yathā sataḥ puruṣotkeśalomāni tathākṣarātsaṃbhavatīha viśvam' (muṇḍa. 1.1.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5862: nahi kevalasya cetanasya tatra sūtrayonitvaṃ keśalomayonitvaṃ cāsti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5869: ityayaṃ vākyaśeṣo 'cetane pradhāne na saṃbhavanti, kathaṃ pradhānaṃ bhūtayoniḥ pratijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5870: atrocyate- 'yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate' 'yattadadreśyam' ityakṣaraśabdenādṛśyatvādiguṇakaṃ bhūtayoniṃ śrāvayitvā punarante śrāvayiṣyati- 'akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' (muṇḍa. 2.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5871: tatra yaḥ paro 'kṣarācchrutaḥ sa sarvajñaḥ sarvavitsaṃbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5873: yadā tu yoniśabdo nimittavācī tadā śārīro 'pi bhūtayoniḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:5875: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate- yoyamadṛśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayoniḥ sa parameśvara eva syānnānya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5878: parameśvarasya hi dharma ihocyamāno dṛśyate- 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5879: nahi pradhānasyācetanasya śārīrasya vopādhiparicchinnadṛṣṭeḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvavittvaṃ vā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5880: nanvakṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭādbhūtayoneḥ parasyaiva tatsarvajñatvaṃ ca na bhūtayoniviṣayamityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5882_0: yatkāraṇaṃ 'akṣarātsaṃbhavatīha viśvam' iti prakṛtaṃ bhūtayonimiha jāyamānaprakṛtitvena
GSP33brssgo1u:5882_1: nirdiśyānantaramapi jāyamānaprakṛtitvenaiva sarvajñaṃ nirdiśati- 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavidyasya jñānamayaṃ tapaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5883: tasmādetadbrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ ca jāyate' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5884: tasmānnirdeśasāmyena pratyabhijñāyamānatvātprakṛtasyaivākṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvavittvaṃ ca dharma ucyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5887: 'yenākṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ veda satyaṃ provāca tāṃ tattvato brahmavidyām' (muṇḍa. 1.2.13)
GSP33brssgo1u:5888: iti prakṛtya tasyaivākṣarasya bhūtayoneradṛśyatvādiguṇakasya vaktavyatvena pratijñātatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5889: kathaṃ tarhi 'akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' iti vyapadiśyata iti, uttarasūtre tadvakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5890: apicātra dve vidye veditavye ukte- 'parā caivāparā ca' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5891: tatrāparāmṛgvedādilakṣaṇāṃ vidyāmuktvā bravīti- 'atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5893: yadi punaḥ parameśvarādanyadadṛśyatvādiguṇakamakṣaraṃ parikalpyeta neyaṃ parā vidyā syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5896: tisraśca vidyāḥ pratijñāyeran, tvatpakṣe 'kṣarādbhūtayoneḥ parasya paramātmanaḥ pratipādyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5897: dve eva tu vidye veditavye iha nirdiṣṭe /
GSP33brssgo1u:5899: iti caikavijñānena sarvavijñānāpekṣaṇaṃ sarvātmake brahmaṇi vivakṣyamāṇe 'vakalpyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:5903: iti brahmavidyāṃ prādhānyenopakramya parāparavibhāgena parāṃ vidyāmakṣarādhigamanīṃ darśayaṃstayā brahmavidyātvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5904: sā ca brahmavidyāsamākhyā tadadhigamyasyākṣarasyābrahmatve bādhitā syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5906: 'plavā hyete adṛḍhā yajñarūpā aṣṭādaśoktamavaraṃ yeṣu karma /
GSP33brssgo1u:5907: etacchreyo yo 'bhinandanti mūḍhā jarāmṛtyuṃ te punarevāpiyanti' (muṇḍa. 1.2.7)
GSP33brssgo1u:5909: ninditvā cāparāṃ vidyāṃ tato viraktasya paravidyādhikāraṃ darśayati- 'parīkṣya lokānkarmacitānbrāhmaṇo nirvedamāyānnāstyakṛtaḥ kṛtena /
GSP33brssgo1u:5910: tadvijñānārthaṃ sa gurumevābhigacchetsamitpāṇiḥ śretriyaṃ brahmaniṣṭham' (muṇḍa. 1.2.12) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5914: apica sthūlāḥ pṛthivyādayo dṛṣṭāntatvenopāttā iti na sthūla eva dārṣṭāntiko bhūtayonirabhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5921: 'aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhātī' tyatra 'tejo vai ghṛtaṃ' iti śeṣānnirṇayavadatrāpi adṛśyavādeḥ śeṣānnirṇayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5922: yena jñānenākṣaraṃ prakṛtaṃ bhūtayoniṃ puruṣaṃ satyaṃ veda /
GSP33brssgo1u:5928: pratyakṣādinā karmasādhyāṃllokānanityatayā jñātvā nirvedaṃ vairāgyaṃ gacchet /
GSP33brssgo1u:5929: kutaḥ, kṛtena karmaṇā akṛto mokṣo nāsti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5932: karma vidyārūpāparavidyoktyanantaraṃ yayā nirguṇaṃ jñāyate parā socyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5943: bhūtānāṃ yoniṃ prakṛtiṃ yatpaśyanti dhīrāḥ paṇḍitāstadakṣaraṃ tadvidyā paretyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5949: nanu pūrvaṃ nirastaṃ pradhānaṃ kathamutthāpyate, tatrāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5950: atra pradhāne virudhyamāno 'saṃbhāvito vākyaśeṣaḥ śruta iti śaṅkate-nanu ya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5951: pañcamyantākṣaraśrutyā bhūtaprakṛteḥ pratyabhijñānātprathamāntaparaśabdoktasya jagannimitteśvarasya sarvajñatvādikamityāha-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5952: 'saṃdigdhe tu vākyaśeṣāt'iti nyāyena siddhāntayati-evaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5953: cetanācetanatvena saṃdigdhe bhūtayonau 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ'iti vākyaśeṣādīśvaratvanirṇaya ityayuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5956: etatkāryaṃ brahma sūkṣmātmakaṃ nāma rūpaṃ, sthūlaṃ tato 'nnaṃ vrīhyādītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5960: paravidyādhigamyatvenoktasyākṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ 'akṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ vedā'ityakṣaraśrutyā vedyatvaliṅgavatyā pūrvameva brahmatvena parāmarśādityāha-yeneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5961_0: yena jñānenākṣaraṃ bhūtayoniṃ sarvajñaṃ puruṣaṃ veda tāṃ brahmavidyāṃ yogyāya śiṣyāya
GSP33brssgo1u:5962: tarhi pañcamyantākṣaraśabdārthaḥ ka ityāśaṅkyājñānamiti vakṣyata ityāha-kathamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5965: anityaphalatvenāparavidyāṃ ninditvā muktyarthine brahmavidyāṃ provāceti vākyaśeṣokterityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5970: acetanamātrasyaikāyatanamupādānaṃ tajjñānātkāryajñāne 'pi tadakāryāṇāmātmanāṃ jñānaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5971: evaṃ jīve jñāte tadakāryasya bhogyasya jñānaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5973: sa brahmavidyāṃ sarvavidyānāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ samāptibhūmiṃ brahmavidyāmuvāca /
GSP33brssgo1u:5982: 'patyurno yajñasaṃyoge'iti sūtreṇa patiśabdasya nakāro 'ntādeśo yajñasaṃbandhe vihita iti patnī,
GSP33brssgo1u:5985: etadeva karma śreyo nānyadātmajñānamiti ye mūḍhāstuṣyanti te punaḥ punarjanmamaraṇamāpnuvantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5994: itaśca parameśvara eva bhūtayonirnetarau śārīraḥ pradhānaṃ vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5997: viśinaṣṭi hi prakṛtaṃ bhūtayoniṃ śārīrādvilakṣaṇatvena- ' divyo hyamūrtaḥ puruṣaḥ sabāhyābhyantaro hyajaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6001: tathā pradhānādapi prakṛtaṃ bhūtayoniṃ bhedena vyapadiśati- 'akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6002_1: sarvasmādvikārātparo yo 'vikārastasmātparataḥ para iti bhedena vyapadeśātparamātmānamiha
GSP33brssgo1u:6003: nātra pradhānaṃ nāma kiñcitsvatantraṃ tattvamabhyupagamya tasmādbhedavyapadeśa ucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6004: kiṃ tarhi yadi pradhānamapi kalpyamānaṃ śrutyavirodhenāvyākṛtādiśabdavācyaṃ bhūtasūkṣmaṃ parikalpyeta parikalpyatām /
GSP33brssgo1u:6011: viśeṣaṇānna jīvo bhedokterna pradhānamiti hetudvayaṃ vibhajya vyācaṣṭe-viśinaṣṭi hītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6015: bāhyaṃ sthūlamābhyantaraṃ kāraṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tābhyāṃ sahādhiṣṭhānatvena tiṣṭhatīti sabāhyābhyantaraḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6026: bhūtānāṃ sūkṣmāḥ saṃskārā yatra tadbhūtasūkṣmaṃ īśvaraścinmātra āśrayo yasya tattathā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6028: yattu īśvara āśrayo viṣayo yasyeti nānājīvavādināṃ vyākhyānaṃ tadbāṣyabahirbhūtaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6029: 'etasminkhalvakṣare gārgi ākāśa otaśca protaśca'ityotaprotabhāvenāvyākṛtasya cidāśrayatvaśruterāśrayapadalakṣaṇāyā nirmūlatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6038: ucyate-ye hyavidyānānātvamicchanti tairapi pariṇāmitvena sāṃśatvamavidyāyā aṅgīkāryaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6040: yasya jñānamantaḥkaraṇe jāyate tasyāntaḥ karaṇapariṇāmyajñānāṃśanaśo muktiriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6047: nanu sūtrakṛtā śrutau pradhānādbhedavyapadeśa uktastatra kathamajñānādbhedoktirvyākhyāyate, tatrāha-nātreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6056_0: apica 'akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' ityasyānantaram 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ' iti prāṇaprabhṛtīnāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6056_1: pṛthivīparyantānāṃ tatvānāṃ sargamuktvā tasyaiva bhūtayoneḥ sarvavikārātmakaṃ rūpamupanyasyamānaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6056_2: paśyāmaḥ- 'agnirmūrdhā cakṣuṣī candrasūryau diśaḥ śrotre vāgvivṛtāśca vedāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6057: vāyuḥ prāṇo hṛdayaṃ viśvamasya padbhyāṃ pṛthivī hyeṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmā' (muṇḍa. 2.1.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6062: kathaṃ punarbhūtayonerayaṃ rūpopanyāsa iti gamyate, prakaraṇāt, 'eṣaḥ' iti ca prakṛtānukarṣaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6065: yathopādhyāyaṃ prakṛtyaitasmādadhīṣvaiṣa vedavedāṅgapāraga iti vacanamupādhyāyaviṣayaṃ bhavati tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:6069: anye punarmanyante- nāyaṃ bhūtayone rūpopanyāsaḥ, jāyamānatvenopanyāsāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6071: khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī' iti hi pūrvatra prāṇādipṛthivyantaṃ tattvajātaṃ jāyamānatvena niradikṣat /
GSP33brssgo1u:6072: uttaratrāpi ca 'tasmādagniḥ samidho yaśca sūryaḥ' ityevamādi,
GSP33brssgo1u:6073: 'ataśca sarvā oṣadhayo rasāśca' ityevamantaṃ jāyamānatvenaiva nirdekṣyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6075: sarvātmatvamapi sṛṣṭiṃ parisamāpyopadekṣyati- 'puruṣa evedaṃ viśvaṃ karma' (muṇḍa. 2.1.10) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6076: śrutismṛtyośca trailokyaśarīrasya prajāpaterjanmādi nirdiśyamānamupalabhāmahe- 'hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartatāgne bhūtasya jātaḥ patireka āsīt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6077: sa dādhāra pṛthivī dyāmutemāṃ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema' (ṛ.sa. 10.121.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6080: ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ brahmāgre samavartata' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:6082: asminpakṣe 'puruṣa evedaṃ viśvaṃ karma' ityādi sarvarūpopanyāsaḥ parameśvarapratipattiheturiti vyākhyeyam // 23 //
GSP33brssgo1u:6084: FN: agnirdyulokaḥ vivṛtā veda vāk, padbhyāṃ pādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:6086: yaśca sūryo dyulokāgneḥ samidha iva bhāsakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6092: 'prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī'iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6099: yathā kaścibrahmavitsvasya sarvātmatvaprakaṭanārthamahamannamiti sāma gāyati na tvannatvādikamātmano vivakṣati,
GSP33brssgo1u:6103: eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmā sūtrātmā etasmādbhūtayonerjāyata iti śrutyanvayena hiraṇyagarbhasyātra jāyamānatvenopanyāsādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6105: agnirdyuloko yasya, yasya samidrūpaḥ sūryaḥ so 'pidyulokāgnistasmādajāyatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6107: ato madhye 'pi sṛṣṭireva vācyā na rūpamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6109: nanu hiraṇyagarbhasya janmānyatrānuktaṃ kathamatra vaktavyaṃ, tatrāha-śrutīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6111: sa sūtrātmā dyāmimāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca sthūlaṃ sarvamadhārayat /
GSP33brssgo1u:6112: kaśabdasya prajāpatisaṃjñātve sarvanāmatvābhāvena smā ityayogādekāralopenaikasmai devāya prāṇātmane haviṣā vidhema paricaremeti vyākhyeyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6119: karma saphalaṃ sarvaṃ śrautasmārtādikaṃ tapaśca puruṣa eveti sarvāntaratvarūpopanyāsācca bhūtayonau jñeye vākyaṃ samanvitamityarthaḥ //23//
GSP33brssgo1u:6127: iti copakramya dyusūryavāyvākāśavāripṛthivīnāṃ sutejastvādiguṇayogamekaikopāsananindayā ca vaiśvānaraṃ pratyeṣāṃ mūrdhādibhāvamupadiśyāmnāyate-
GSP33brssgo1u:6128_1: bhūteṣu sarveṣvātmasvannamatti tasya ha vā etasyātmano vaiśvānarasya mūrdhaiva sutejāścakṣurviśvarūpaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:6128_2: prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmātmā saṃdeho bahulo bastireva rayiḥ pṛthivyeva pādāvura eva vedirlomāni
GSP33brssgo1u:6129: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kiṃ vaiśvānaraśabdena jāṭharo 'gnirupadiśyata uta bhūtāgniratha tadabhimāninī devatā athavā śārīra āhosvitparameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6131: vaiśvānara iti jāṭharabhūtāgnidevatānāṃ sādhāraṇaśabdaprayogādātmeti ca śārīraparameśvarayoḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6132: tatra kasyopādānaṃ nyāyyaṃ kasya vā hānamiti bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6135: tatra hi viśeṣaṇa kvacitprayogo dṛśyate- 'ayamagnirvaiśvānaro yo 'yamantaḥ puruṣe yenedamannaṃ pacyate yadidamadyate' (bṛha. 5.9) ityādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:6137: sāmānyenāpi prayogadarśanāt 'viśvasmā agniṃ bhuvanāya devā vaiśvānaraṃ ketumahnāmakṛṇvan' (ṛ.saṃ. 10.88.12) ityādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:6139: tasyāmapi prayogadarśanāt 'vaiśvānarasya sumatau syāma rājā hi kaṃ bhuvanānāmabhiśrīḥ' (ṛ.saṃ. 1.18.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:6141: athātmaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyādupakrame ca 'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma' iti kevalātmaśabdaprayogādātmaśabdavaśena ca vaiśvānaraśabdaḥ pariṇeya ityucyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:6145: tasmānneśvaro vaiśvānara ityevaṃ prāpte tata idamucyate- vaiśvānaraḥ paramātmā bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6152: 'tasya ha vā etasyāmātmano vaiśvānarasya mūrdhaiva sutejāḥ' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6153: atra hi parameśvara eva dyumūrdhatvādiviśiṣṭo 'vasthāntaragataḥ pratyagātmatvenopanyasta ādhyānāyeti gamyate, kāraṇatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6155: 'sa sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu sarveṣvātmasvannamatti' iti ca sarvalokādyāśrayaṃ phalaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ paramakāraṇaparigrahe saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6156: 'evaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante' (chā. 5.24.3) iti ca tadvidaḥ sarvapāpmapradāhaśravaṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6157: 'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma' iti cātmabrahmaśabdābhyāmupakrama ityevametāni liṅgāni parameśvaramevāvagamayanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6166: viśvasmai bhuvanāya vaiśvānaramagnimahnāṃ ketuṃ cihnaṃ sūryamakṛṇvandevāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6168: vaiśvānarasya devasya sumatau śobhanabuddhau vayaṃ syāma bhavema /
GSP33brssgo1u:6171: yathāgnau nikṣiptamiṣīkātūlaṃ dahyate evaṃ hāsya viduṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6174: prācīnaśālasatyayajñendradyumnajanabuḍilā militvā mīmāṃsāṃ cakruḥ-'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma'iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6177: so 'pi samyaṅna vedeti tenoddālakena saha ṣaḍapyaśvapatiṃ kaikeyaṃ rājānamāgatyocuḥ-ātmānamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6179: rājā tu teṣāṃ bhrāntinirāsārthaṃ tānpratyekamapṛcchat-'kaṃ tvamātmānamupāḥse'iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6180: te ca prācīnaśālādayaḥ krameṇa pratyekamūcuḥ-divamevāhaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedmi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6186_1: bhavanto yadi māmapṛṣṭvā dyusūryādiṣu bhagavato vaiśvānarasyāṅgeṣveva pratyekaṃ vaiśvānaratvadṛṣṭayo
GSP33brssgo1u:6190: taṃ sarvajñaṃ sa tadupāsakaḥ sarvatra bhogaṃ bhuṅkta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6191: lokā bhūrādayaḥ, bhūtāni śarīrāṇi, ātmāno jīvā iti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6192: suṣṭhu tejaḥ kāntiryasya dyulokasya sa sutejāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6193: viśvāni rūpāṇyasya sūryasya, 'eṣa śukla eṣa nīlaḥ'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6194: pṛthak nānāvidhaṃ vartma gamanaṃ ātmā svabhāvo yasya vāyoḥ sa nānāgatitvaguṇako 'sya prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6195: bahulatvaṃ vyāpitvaṃ tadguṇa ākāśo 'sya saṃdeho dehamadhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6196: rayitvaṃ dhanatvaṃ tadguṇā āpo yasya bastirmūtrasthānam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6202: yadadyate tadannaṃ, yena pacyate so 'yaṃ puruṣaśarīre 'ntarastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6204: viśvasmai bhuvanāya vaiśvānaramagnimahnāṃ ketuṃ cihnaṃ sūryaṃ devā akṛṇvan kṛtavantaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6207: hi yasmātkaṃ sukhaprado bhuvanānāṃ rājā vaiśvānaro 'bhimukhā śrīrasyetyabhiśrīrīśvaraḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6208: tasmāttasya vaiśvānarasya sumatau vayaṃ syāma tasyāsmadviṣayā śubhamatirbhavatvityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6212: atra jāṭharo vaiśvānara iti mukhyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ, prāṇāgnihotrahomādhāratvaliṅgat /
GSP33brssgo1u:6213: tasya dehavyāpitvādātmatvaṃ śrutyā dyumūrdhatvādikalpanayā bṛhattvādbrahmatvamiti dhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6217: nanu nirviśeṣasya kuto viśeṣa ityata āha-atra hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6219: jāṭharasyāpi dhyānārthaṃ viśeṣakalpaneti cet, na, asatkalpanāpatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6222: yathāgnau nikṣiptamiṣīkātūlaṃ dahyate evaṃ hāsya viduṣa ityarthaḥ //24//
GSP33brssgo1u:6228: yasmātparameśvarasyaivāgnirāsyaṃ dyaurmūrdhetīdṛśaṃ trailokyātmakaṃ rūpaṃ smaryate- 'yasyāgnirāsyaṃ dyaurmūrdhā khaṃ nābhiścaraṇau kṣitiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6231: etatsmaryamāṇaṃ rūpaṃ mūlabhūtāṃ śrutimanumāpayadasya vauśvānaraśabdasya parameśvaraparatve 'numānaṃ liṅgaṃ gamakaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6235: stutitvamapi nāsati mūlabhūte vedavākye samāyagīdṛśena rūpeṇa saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6236: 'dyāṃ mūrdhānaṃ yasya viprā vadanti khaṃ vai nābhiṃ candrasūryau ca netre /
GSP33brssgo1u:6237: diśaḥ śrotre viddhi pādau kṣitiṃ ca so 'cintyātmā sarvabhūtapraṇetā //
GSP33brssgo1u:6242: satā rūpeṇa stuti saṃbhavānnāsadāropa iti bhāvaḥ //25//
GSP33brssgo1u:6246: śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhānāc ca neti cen na tathā dṛṣṭyupadeśād asambhavāt puruṣamapi cainam adhīyate | BBs_1,2.26 |
GSP33brssgo1u:6249: śabdastāvadvaiśvānaraśabdo na parameśvare saṃbhavati, arthāntare rūḍhatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6257: yadapyuktaṃ- mūrdhaiva sutejā ityāderviśeṣātkāraṇātparamātmā vaiśvānara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6259: yadubhayathāpi viśeṣapratibhāne sati parameśvaraviṣaya eva viśeṣa āśrayaṇīyo na jāṭharaviṣaya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6261: tasyāpi hi dyulokādisaṃbandho mantravarṇādavagamyate- 'yo bhānunā pṛthivī dyāmutemāmātatāna rodasī antarikṣam' (ṛ.sa. 10.88.3) ityādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:6265: na śabdādibhyaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ parameśvarasya pratyākhyānaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6271: yadi ceha parameśvaro na vivakṣyeta kevala eva jāṭharo 'gnirvivakṣyeta tato mūrdhaiva sutejā ityādirviśeṣasyāsaṃbhava eva syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6272: yathā tu devatābhūtāgnivyapāśrayeṇāpyayaṃ viśeṣa upapādayituṃ na śakyate tathottarasūtre vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6273: yadi ca kevala eva jāṭharo vivakṣyeta,
GSP33brssgo1u:6274: puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitatvaṃ kevalaṃ tasya syānna tu puruṣatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6275: puruṣamapi cainamadhīyate vājasaneyinaḥ- 'sa eṣo 'gnirvaiśvānaro yatpuruṣaḥ sa yo haitamevamagniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda' (śa.brā. 10.6.1.11) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6277: ye tu 'puruṣavidhamapi cainamadhīyate' iti sūtrāvayavaṃ paṭhanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:6278: teṣāmeṣor'thaḥ- kevalajāṭharaparigrahe puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitatvaṃ kevalaṃ syānna puruṣavidhatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6279: puruṣavidhamapi cainamadhīyate vājasaneyinaḥ- 'puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6283: FN: bhaktamannaṃ homīyaṃ homasādhanaṃ tena prāṇāgnihotraṃ kāryamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6284: imāṃ pṛthivīmuta dyāmapi dyāvāpṛthivyāveva rodasī yo bhānurūpeṇātatāna vyāptavān /
GSP33brssgo1u:6285: antarikṣaṃ ca tayormadhyamātatāna sa devo dyulokādyavayavo dhyeya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6290: 'sa eṣo 'gnirvaiśvānaraḥ'ityagnirahasye vaiśvānaravidyāyāṃ śruto 'gniśabda īśvare na saṃbhavatītyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6292: bhaktamannaṃ, homīyaṃ homasādhanaṃ, tena prāṇāgnihotraṃ kāryamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6293_0: vājasaneyināmagnirahasye saprapañcāṃ vaiśvānaravidyāmuktvā 'sa yo haitamagniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6293_1: puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda sa sarvatrānnamatti'ityuktaṃ dehāntaḥsthatvaṃ jāṭhare saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:6295: atra sūtre ādipadenaivāntaḥpratiṣṭhānasya grahe saṃbhavati pṛthaguktiḥ sādhāraṇaliṅgatvadyotanārthā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6297: yadyapi dyumūrdhatvādiviśeṣa īśvarapakṣapātī homādhāratvādirjāṭharapakṣapātīti pratibhānaṃ samaṃ tathāpi pārameśvaro viśeṣo jāṭhare na saṃbhavatīti balavānityata āha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6299: imāṃ pṛthivīṃ dyāmapi te eva dyāvāpṛthivyau rodasī tathormadhyamantarikṣaṃ ca yo bhūtāgnirbhānurūpeṇātatāna vyāptavān sa dhyātavya ityarthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo1u:6338: idānīṃ tu vinaiva pratīkopādhikalpanābhyāṃ sākṣādapi parameśvaropāsanaparigrahe na kaścidvirodha iti jaiminirācāryo manyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:6339: nanu jāṭharāgnyaparigrahe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitatvavacanaṃ śabdadīni ca kāraṇāni virudhyeranniti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6343: kathaṃ tarhi yatprakṛtaṃ mūrdhādicubukānteṣu puruṣāvayaveṣu puruṣavidhitvaṃ kalpitaṃ tadabhiprāyeṇedamucyate- 'puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6344: yathā vṛkṣe śākhāṃ pratiṣṭhitāṃ paśyatīti tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:6345: athavā yaḥ prakṛtaḥ paramātmādhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca puruṣavidhitvopādhistasya yatkevalaṃ sākṣirūpaṃ tadabhiprāyeṇedamucyate- 'puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6346: niścite ca pūrvāparālocanavaśena paramātmaparigrahe tadviṣaya eva vaiśvānaraśabdaḥ kenacidyogena vartiṣyate /

GSP33brssgo1u:6367: ato yathā śākhāsthasya pakṣiṇo vṛkṣāntaḥsthatvaṃ tathā vaiśvānarasya puruṣāntaḥsthatvamityāha-na hīha puruṣavidhamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6376: viśve sarve narā jīvā asyātmatvena niyamyatvena vā santīti viśvānaraḥ /

GSP33brssgo1u:6425: cakṣuṣī upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai sutejā vaiśvānara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6426: nāsike upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai pṛthagvartmātmā vaiśvānara iti /

GSP33brssgo1u:6448: mukhasthaṃ mukhyaṃ tasminnadhidaivaṃ bahulākaśadṛṣṭiḥ mukhasthalālārūpāsvapsu raiśabditatadīyabastisthodakadṛṣṭiḥ cibuke pratiṣṭhā pādarūpā pṛthivī draṣṭavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6449: nanu guṇāvaiṣamyeṇa vidyayorbhedādagnirahasye śrutyanusāreṇa chāndogyasthaprādeśamātrakṣutiḥ kathaṃ vyākhyeyetyāśaṅkyāha-yadyapītyādinā /

GSP33brssgo1u:6463: kā vai varaṇā kā ca nāsīti' /

GSP33brssgo1u:6474: iti śrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // 2 //

GSP33brssgo1u:6492: ābhimukhyenāhaṃ brahmeti vimīyate jñāyate ityabhivimānaḥ pratyagātmā /

GSP33brssgo1u:6528: tasyāpi bhoktṛtvādbhogyaṃ prapañcaṃ pratyāyatanatvopapatterityevaṃ prāpta idamāha- dyubhvādyāyatanamiti /

GSP33brssgo1u:6533: ātmaśabdo hīha bhavati- 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6535: kvacicca svaśabdenaiva brahmaṇa āyatanatvaṃ śrūyate-' sanmūlāḥ somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sadāyatanāḥ satpratiṣṭhāḥ' (chā. 6.8.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6536: svaśabdenaiva ceha purastādupariṣṭācca brahma saṃkīrtyate- 'puruṣa evedaṃ viśvaṃ karma tapo brahma parāmṛtam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6540: yathānekātmako vṛkṣaḥ śākhā skandho mūlaṃ cetyevaṃ nānāraso vicitra ātmetyāśaṅkā saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:6541: tāṃ nivartayituṃ sāvadhāraṇamāha- 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6542: etaduktaṃ bhavati- na kāryaprapañcaviśiṣṭo vicitra ātmā vijñeyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6544: yathā yasmānnāste devadattastadānayetyukta āsanamevānayati na devadattam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6546: vikārānṛtābhisaṃdhasya cāpavādaḥ śrūyate- 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (kā. 2.4.11) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6547: sarvaṃ brahmeti tu sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prapañcapravilāpanārthaṃ nānekarasatāpratipādanārtham /
GSP33brssgo1u:6548: 'sa yathā saindhavaghano 'nantaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsno rasaghana evaivaṃ vā are 'yamātmānantaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ prajñānaghana eva' (bṛha. 4.5.13)
GSP33brssgo1u:6553: atrocyate- vidhāraṇatvamātramatra setuśrutyā vivakṣyate na pāravattvādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6554: nahi mṛddārumayo loke seturdṛṣṭa ityatrāpi mṛddārumaya evaseturabhyupagamyate /

GSP33brssgo1u:6569: evaṃ rūḍhipadabahulānāṃ prāyeṇa saviśeṣavākyānāṃ samanvayo dvitīyapāde darśitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6570: adhunā yaugikapadabahulānāṃ nirviśeṣapradhānānāṃ vākyānāṃ samanvayaṃ vaktuṃ tṛtīyaḥ pāda ārabhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6573: tadvadatrāpyupakramasthasādhāraṇāyatanatvasya vākyaśeṣasthasetuśrutyā vastutaḥ paricchinne pradhānādau vyavastheti dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇādhikaraṇasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6578: cakārādavyākṛtaṃ kāraṇamotaṃ kalpitaṃ tadapavādena tamevādhiṣṭhānātmānaṃ pratyagabhinnaṃ jānatha śravaṇādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6579: anyā anātmavāco vimuñcatha viśeṣeṇa niḥśeṣaṃ tyajatha /

GSP33brssgo1u:6582: amṛtasya brahmaṇaḥ seturiti ṣaṣṭhyā brahmaṇo bhinnatvena setoḥ śrutatvādeṣaśabdaparāmṛṣṭaṃ dyubhvādyāyatanamabrahmaiva seturiva seturityāha-amṛtasyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6590: yathā loke maṇayaḥ sūtreṇa grathitā evaṃ he gautama,
GSP33brssgo1u:6591: samaṣṭiliṅgātmakavāyunā sthūlāni sarvāṇi saṃdṛbdhāni grathitāni bhavantīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6595: upādhiparicchinnasya jīvasya sarvavastu pratyekaṃ mukhyaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo1u:6602: 'yasmin dyauḥ'iti vākyātpūrvottaravākyayoḥ puruṣabrahmādiśabdena brahmasaṃkīrtanānmadhye 'pi brahma grāhyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6603: puruṣa iti pūrvavākyaṃ, brahmaivetyuttaravākyaṃ, sarvāsu dikṣu sthitaṃ sarvaṃ brahmaivetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6607: yasmin sarvamotaṃ tamevaikamityevakāraikaśabdābhyāṃ nirviśeṣaṃ jñeyamityuktvā hetvantaramāha-vikārānṛteti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6608: vikāre 'nṛte kalpite abhisaṃdho 'bhimāno yasya tasyānarthabhāktvena nindāśruteśca kūṭasthasatyaṃ jñeyamityarthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo1u:6637: ityuktvā bravīti- 'tathā vidvānnāmarūpādvimuktaḥ parātparaṃ puruṣamupaiti divyam' (muṇḍa. 3.2.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6638: brahmaṇaśca muktopasṛpyatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ śāstre- 'yadā sarve pramucyante kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6639: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavatyatra brahma samaśnute' (bṛha. 4.4.7) ityevamādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:6641: apica 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānamanyā vāco vimuñcathāmṛtasyaiva setuḥ' iti vāgvimokapūrvakaṃ vijñeyatvamiha dyubhvādyāyatanasyocyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6642: tacca śrutyantare brahmaṇo dṛṣṭam- 'tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvati brāhmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6648: muktairūpasṛpyaṃ pratyaktvena prāpyaṃ yadbrahma tasyātrokteriti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6652_0: yathā nadyo gaṅgādyā nāmarūpe vihāya samudrātmanā tiṣṭhanti tathā brahmātmavidapi

GSP33brssgo1u:6653: idaṃ pradhānādeḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-brahmaṇaśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6654: asya mumukṣoḥ, hṛdīti padenātmadharmatvaṃ kāmānāṃ nirastam /
