GSP33brssgo1u:6669: yathā brahmaṇaḥ pratipādakaḥ vaiśeṣiko heturukto naivamarthāntarasya vaiśeṣiko hetuḥ pratipādako 'stītyāha /
GSP33brssgo1u:6672: tasyācetanasya pradhānasya pratipādakaḥ śabdastacchabdaḥ, na tacchabdo 'tacchabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6675: tadviparītasya cetanasya pratipādakaśabdo 'trāsti- 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit' (muṇḍa.1.1.9) ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6685_0: yadyapi prāṇabhṛto vijñānātmana ātmatvaṃ cetanatvaṃ ca saṃbhavati tathāpyupādhiparicchinnajñānasya
GSP33brssgo1u:6691: nanu 'nānumānaprāṇabhṛtāvatacchabdāt'ityekameva sūtraṃ kimarthaṃ na kṛtaṃ ubhayanirāsahetorekatvādityata āha-pṛthagiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6699: bhedavyapadeśaśceha bhavati- 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam' iti jñeyajñātṛbhāvena /
GSP33brssgo1u:6709: paramātmani hi sarvātmake vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ syānna kevale prāṇabhṛti // 6 //
GSP33brssgo1u:6711: yadyapi viśuddhaḥ pratyagātmaivātra jñeyaḥ tathāpi jīvatvākāreṇa jñāturjñeyādbhedānna jñeyarūpatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6712: evaṃ ca jīvatvaliṅgaviśiṣṭatvena jīvasya dyubhvādivākyarthatvaṃ nirasyate na śuddharūpeṇeti mantavyam //5 // //6//
GSP33brssgo1u:6718: dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ ca prakṛtya 'dvā supraṇā sayujā sakhāyā' (mu. 3.1.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:6723: yadi ceśvaro dyubhvādyāyatanatvena vivakṣitastatastasya prakṛtasyeśvarasya kṣetrajñātpṛthagvacanamavakalpate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6728: kṣetrajñau hi kartṛtvena bhoktṛtvena ca pratiśarīraṃ buddhyādyupādhisaṃbaddho lokata eva prasijaddho nāsau śrutyā tātparyeṇa vivakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6729: īśvarastu lokato 'prasiddhatvācchrutyā tātparyeṇa vivakṣyata iti na tasyākasmikaṃ vacanaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6730: 'guhāṃ praviṣṭāvātmānau hi' ityatrāpyetaddarśitaṃ 'dvā suparṇā' ityasyāmṛcīśvarakṣetrajñāvucyete iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6731: yadāpi paiṅgyupaniṣatkṛtena vyākhyānenāsyāmṛci sattvakṣetrajñāvucyete tadāpi na virodhaḥ kaścit /
GSP33brssgo1u:6733: prāṇabhṛddhīha ghaṭādicchidravatsattvādyupādhyabhimānitvena pratiśarīraṃ gṛhyamāṇo dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ na bhavatīti niṣidhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6736: yathā ghaṭādicchidrāṇi ghaṭādibhirupādhibhirvinopalakṣyamāṇāni mahākāśa eva bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:6741: tasyaiva hi bhūtayonivākyasya madhya idaṃ paṭhitam 'yasmindyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6743: nanu sthityeśvarasyādanājīvasya 'dvā suparṇā'ityatroktāvapi īśvara āyatanavākyena kimarthaṃ grāhya ityata āha-yadi ceśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6744: atra ceśvaraḥ śuddhacinmātro grāhyaḥ, na sarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭaḥ, tasyātrāpratipādyatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6748: nanu 'dvā suparṇā'ityatra buddhijīvayorukteḥ kathamidaṃ sūtramityata iti-guhāmiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6750: nanvatra jīveśau nānuvādyau, paiṅgivyākhyāvirodhādataḥ sūtrāsaṃgatirityata āha-yadāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6752: adanavākyena buddhimanūdya sthitivākyena buddhyādivilakṣaṇaśuddhapratyagbrahmaṇo jñeyasyokterdyubhvādivākye tadeva grāhyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6754: nanvatrānupahito jīva ukto na paraṃ brahmetyata āha-yastviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6765: idaṃ samāmananti- 'bhūmā tveva vidijñāsitavya iti bhūmānaṃ bhagavo vijijñāsa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6766: yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmātha yatrānyatpaśyatyanyacchṛṇotyanyadvijānāti tadalpam' (chā. 7.23,24) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6772: tathā 'śrutaṃ hyeva me bhagavaddṛśebhyastarati śokamātmaviditi so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi taṃ mā bhagavāñśokasya pāraṃ tārayatu' (chāṃ. 7.1.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:6774: tatra kasyopādanaṃ nyāyyaṃ kasya vā hānamiti bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6779: yathā hi 'asti bhagavo nāmno bhūyaḥ' iti, 'vāgvāva nāmno bhūyasī' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6781: mano vāva vāco bhūyaḥ' iti ca nāmādibhyo hyā prāṇādbhūyaḥpraśnaprativacanapravāhaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6782: naivaṃ prāṇātparaṃ bhūyaḥpraśnaprativacanaṃ dṛśyate 'sti bhagavaḥ prāṇādbhūya ityādo vāva prāṇādbhūya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6783_0: prāṇameva tu nāmādibhya āśāntebhyo bhūyāsaṃ 'prāṇo vā āśāyā bhūyān' ityādinā saprapañcamuktvā
GSP33brssgo1u:6783_2: 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti prāṇavratamativāditvamanukṛṣyāparityajyaiva
GSP33brssgo1u:6783_3: prāṇaṃ satyādiparamparayā bhūmānamavatārayanprāṇameva bhūmānaṃ manyanta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6784: kathaṃ punaḥ prāṇe bhūmani vyākhyāyamāne 'yatra nānyatpaśyati' ityetadbhūmno lakṣaṇaparaṃ vacanaṃ vyākhyāyeteti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6785: ucyate- suṣuptyavasthāyāṃ prāṇagrasteṣu karaṇeṣu darśanādivyavahāranivṛttidarśanātsaṃbhavati prāṇasyāpi 'yatra nānyatpaśyati' ityetallakṣaṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6786: tathāca śrutiḥ 'na śṛṇoti na paśyati' ityādinā sarvakaraṇavyāpārapratyastamayarūpāṃ suṣuptyavasthāmuktvā 'prāṇāgnaya evaitasminpure jāgrati' (pra. 4.2.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:6787: iti tasyāmevāvasthāyāṃ pañcavṛtteḥ prāṇasya jāgaraṇaṃ bruvatī prāṇapradhānāṃ suṣuptyavasthāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6788: yaccaitadbhūmnaḥ sukhatvaṃ śrutam- 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukham' (chā. 7.23) iti, tadapyaviruddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:6789: 'atraiṣa devaḥ svapnānna paśyatyatha yadetasmiñśarīre sukhaṃ bhavati' (pra. 4.6)
GSP33brssgo1u:6792: iti tadapi prāṇasyāviruddhaṃ, 'prāṇo vā amṛtam' (kau. 3.2) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6793: kathaṃ punaḥ prāṇaṃ bhūmānaṃ manyamānasya tarati śokamātmavit ityātmavividiṣayā prakaraṇasyotthānamupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6795: tathāhi-' prāṇo ha pitā prāṇo mātā prāṇo bhrātā prāṇaḥ svasā prāṇa ācāryaḥ prāṇo brāhmaṇaḥ' (chā. 7.15.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:6797: 'yathā vā arā nābhau samarpitā evamasminprāṇe sarvaṃ samarpitam' iti ca sarvātmatvāranābhinidarśanābhyāṃ ca saṃbhavati vaipulyātmikā bhūmarūpatā prāṇasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:6799: tata idamucyate- paramātmaiveha bhūmā bhavitumarhati na prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6802: saṃprasāda iti suṣuptaṃ sthānamucyate, samyakprasīdatyasminniti nirvacanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6803: bṛhadāraṇyake ca svapnajāgaritasthānābhyāṃ saha pāṭhāt tasyāṃ ca saṃprasādāvasthāyāṃ prāṇo jāgartīti prāṇo 'tra saṃprasādo 'bhipreyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6806: nahi nāmaiva nāmno bhūya iti nāmna ūrdhvamupadiṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6807: kiṃ tarhi nāmno 'nyadarthāntaramupadiṣṭaṃ vāgākhyam- 'vāgvāva nāmno bhūyasī' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6810: nanviha nāsti praśno 'sti bhagavaḥ prāṇādbhūya iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:6813: prāṇaviṣayameva cātivāditvāmuttaratrānukṛṣyamāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ- 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6819: yathaiṣo 'gnihotrī yaḥ satyaṃ vadatītyukte na satyavadanenāgnihotritvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6822: tathā 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' ityukte na satyavadanenātivāditvam,
GSP33brssgo1u:6825: satyavadanaṃ tu prāṇavido viśeṣo vivakṣyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6828: śrutyā hyatra satyavadanenātivāditvaṃ pratīyate- 'yaḥsatyenātivadati so 'tivadati' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6832: prakṛtavyāvṛttyarthaśca tuśabdo na saṃgacchate 'eṣa tu vā ativadati' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6833: 'satyaṃ tveva vijijñāsitavyam' (chā. 7.16) iti ca prayatnāntarakaraṇamarthāntaravivakṣāṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6834: tasmādyathaikavedapraśaṃsāyāṃ prakṛtāyāmeṣa tu mahābrāhmaṇo yaścaturo vedānadhīta ityekavedebhyor'thāntarabhūtaścaturvedaḥ praśasyate tādṛgetaddraṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6837: tatra prāṇāntamanuśāsanaṃ śrutvā tūṣṇībhūtaṃ nāradaṃ svayameva sanatkumāro vyutpādayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6838: yatprāṇavijñānena vikārānṛtaviṣayeṇātivāditvamanativāditvameva tat 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6841: tathā vyutpāditāya nāradāya 'so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ satyenātivadāni' ityevaṃ pravṛttāya vijñānādisādhanaparamparayā bhūmānamupadiśati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6842: tatra yatprāṇādadhi satyaṃ vaktavyaṃ pratijñātaṃ tadeveha bhūmetyucyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6843: tasmādasti prāṇādadhi bhūmna upadeśa ityataḥ prāṇādanyaḥ paramātmā bhūmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6850: iti copakramyopasaṃharati- 'tasmai mṛditakaṣāyāya tamasaḥ pāraṃ darśayati bhagavānsanatkumāraḥ' (chā. 7.26.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6854: prakaraṇānte paramātmavivakṣā bhaviṣyati, 'bhūmā tu prāṇa eveti cet' na /
GSP33brssgo1u:6868: tasmānniratiśayasukhārthinā bhūmaiva vicārya iti nāradaṃ prati sanatkumāreṇokte sati nārado brūte-bhūmānamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6872: bahorbhāva iti vigrahe 'pṛthvādibhyā imanic'itīmanpratyaye kṛte 'bahorlopo bhū ca bahoḥ'iti sūtreṇa bahoḥ parasyemanicpratyayasyāderikārasya lepaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:6873: bahoḥ sthāne bhūrityādeśaśca syādityukterbhūmanniti śabdo niṣpannaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6876: vākyopakramastha ātmāpi svapratipādanāpekṣo dharmitvena bhātīti saṃnihitavyavahitaprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃśaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6881: pūrvottarapakṣayoḥ prāṇopāstiḥ brahmajñānaṃ ca phalaṃ krameṇa mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6883: bhūmā tu prāṇātparaṃ bhūyaḥprakṣaṃ vinaivoktaliṅgena prāṇādabhinna ityāha-kasmādityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6884: prāṇādbhūya iti na dṛśyata iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6885: nanu 'eṣa tu vā ativadati'iti tuśabdena prāṇaprakaraṇavicchedānna prāṇo bhūmetyata āha-prāṇameveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6886: nāmādyaśāntānupāsyānatītya prāṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vadatītyativādi prāṇavid taṃ prati ativādyasīti kenacitpraśne kṛte asmīti brūyāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:6888: prāṇavidameṣa iti parāmṛśya satyavacanadhyānamananaśraddhādidharmaparamparāṃ vidhāya bhūmopadeśānna prakaraṇavicchedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6890: bhūmno lakṣaṇavacanaṃ sukhatvamamṛtatvaṃ ca prāṇe praśnapūrvakaṃ yojayatikathaṃ punarityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6891: prāṇagrasteṣu prāṇe līneṣu na śṛṇoti suṣuptapuruṣa iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6892: 'gārhapatyo ha vā eṣo 'pāno vyāno 'nvāhāryapacana āhavanīyaḥ prāṇaḥ'iti śruteḥ prāṇā agnaya iha pure śarīre jāgrati savyāpārā eva tiṣṭhantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6897: sarvaṃ samarpitamiti ca sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ prāṇaṃ svīkaroti śrutirityanvayaḥ ata ātmatvaṃ mukhyārthaṃ darśayati-saṃprasāda iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6898: sa vā eṣa etasminsaṃprasāde sthitvā punarādravatīti prayogācca /
GSP33brssgo1u:6906: prakṛtaprāṇavitparāmarśaka eṣaśabdo na bhavati, tasya yacchabdaparatantratvena satyavādajivācitvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6908: satyenātivāditvaṃ viśeṣaḥ, tadvato ya eṣa ityukterna pūrvānukarṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6909: ya eṣa prāṇavidativadatītyanūdya sa satyaṃ vadediti vidhānānna prāṇaprakaraṇaviccheda iti dṛṣṭāntena śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6910: satyaśabdo hyabādhite rūḍho brahmavācakaḥ, tadanyasya mithyātvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6911: satyavacane tvabādhitārthasaṃbandhāllākṣaṇika iti nātra lakṣyavacanavidhirityāha-neti brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6912: kiñca satyena brahmaṇātivadatīti tṛtīyāśrutyā brahmakaraṇakamativāditvaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6913: tasya prakaraṇādbādho na yukta ityāha-śrutyā hītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6916: evaṃ satyeneti śrutyā prakaraṇaṃ bādhyamityuktvā tuśabdenāpi bādhyamāha-prakṛteti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6921: yattu praśnaṃ vinoktatvaliṅgādbhūmā prāṇa iti, tanna, tasyāprayojakatvādityāha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6922: praśnabhedādarthabheda iti na niyamaḥ, ekasyātmano maitreyyā bahuśaḥ pṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6924: tatra yathā caturvedatvasya prakṛtāsaṃbandhādarthabhedaḥ, evamihāpīti sphuṭayati-tatretyadinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6928: imānyati śravaṇādīni jñeyasya satyasya brahmatve liṅgāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:6929: evaṃ śrutiliṅgaiḥ prāṇasyāvāntaraprakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā prastutaṃ satyaṃ brahma bhūmapadoktabahutvadharmītyāha-tatra yaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6930_0: kiñca 'saṃnihitādapi vyavahitaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ balīyaḥ'iti nyāyena saṃnihitaṃ nirākāṅkṣaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6930_1: prāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā vākyopakramastha ātmā svapratipādanāya bhūmavākyāpekṣa iha bhūmā grāhya ityāha-evaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6937: tataḥ prāgukto bhūmā prāṇa iti śaṅkate-prakaraṇānta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6943: apica ye bhūmni śrūyante dharmāste paramātmanyupapadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:6944: 'yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvajānāti sa bhūmā' iti darśanādivyavahārābhāvaṃ bhūmānyavagamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6947: yo 'pyasau suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ darśanādivyavahārābhāva uktaḥ so 'pyātmana evāsaṅgatvavivakṣayokto na prāṇasvabhāvavivakṣayā,
GSP33brssgo1u:6949: yadapi tasyāmavasthāyāṃ sukhamuktaṃ, tadapyātmana eva sukharūpatvavivakṣayoktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6950: yata āha- 'eṣo 'sya parama ānanda etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni mātrāmupajīvanti' (bṛ. 4.3.32) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6951: ihāpi 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukhaṃ nālpe sukhamasti bhūmaiva sukham' iti sāmayasukhanirākaraṇena brahmaiva sukhaṃ bhūmānaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6952: 'yo vai bhūmā tadamṛtam' ityamṛtatvamapīha śrūyamāṇaṃ paramakāraṇaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6954: tathāca satyatvaṃ svamahimapratiṣṭhitatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ sarvāttmatvamiti caite dharmāḥ śrūyamāṇāḥ paramātmanyevopapadyante nānyatra /
GSP33brssgo1u:6962: yaduktaṃ bhūmno lakṣaṇaṃ sukhatvamamṛtatvaṃ ca prāṇeṣu yojyamiti tadanūdya vighaṭayati-yo 'pyasāvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6964: tadabhāve suṣuptau tadabhāva ityasaṅgatvajñānārthaṃ praśnopaniṣadi 'na śṛṇoti na paśyati'iti paramātmānaṃ prakṛtyoktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6978: sa hovācaitadvai tadakṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantyasthūlamanaṇu' (bṛ. 3.8.7,8)ityādi śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6979: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimakṣaraśabdena varṇa ucyate kiṃvā parameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6980: tatrākṣarasamāmnāya ityādāvakṣaraśabdasya varṇe prasiddhatvāt prasiddhyatikramasya cāyuktatvāt 'oṅkāra evedaṃ sarvam' (chā. 2.23.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:6986_0: tatra hi pṛthivyādeḥ samastavikārajātasya kālatrayavibhaktasya 'ākāśa eva tadotaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6986_1: ca protaṃ ca' ityākāśe pratiṣṭhitatvamuktvā 'kasminnu khalvākāśa otaśca protaśca'
GSP33brssgo1u:6987: tathācopasaṃhṛtam- 'etasminnu khalvakṣare gārgyākāśa otaśca protaśca' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6989: yadapi 'oṅkāra evedaṃ sarvam' iti tadapi brahmapratipattisādhanatvātstutyarthaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6990: tasmānna kṣaratyaśnute ceti nityatvāvyāpitatvābhyāmakṣaraṃ parameva brahma // 10 //
GSP33brssgo1u:6995: yadbhūtaṃ bhavacca bhaviṣyacca tatsarvaṃ kasminnotamiti gārgyā pṛṣṭhena muninā yājñavalkyenāvyākṛtākāśaḥ kāryamātrāśraya uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6996: ākāśaḥ kasminnota iti dvitīyapraśne sa muniruvāca,
GSP33brssgo1u:6999: yathā satyaśabdo brahmaṇi rūḍha iti brahma bhūmetyuktaṃ tathākṣaraśabdo varṇe rūḍha iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7000: tatra oṅkāropāstiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte nirguṇabrahmadhīriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7003: varṇasya oṅkārasya sarvāśrayatvaṃ kathamityāśaṅkya dhyānārthamidaṃ yathā śrutyantare sarvātmatvamityāha-oṅkāra iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7017: praśāsanaṃ hīha śrūyate- 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ' (bṛ. 3.8.9) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7020: na hyacetanānāṃ ghaṭādikāraṇānāṃ mṛdādīnāṃ ghaṭādiviṣayaṃ praśāsanamasti // 11 //
GSP33brssgo1u:7025: bhūtākāśasya kāryantaḥpātinaḥ śrutasarvakāryāśrayatvāyogādavyākṛtamajñānamevākāśaḥ pradhānaśabdita iti tadāśrayatvāccākṣaraṃ na pradhānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7036_1: vyāvartayati śrutiḥ- 'tadvā etadakṣaraṃ gārgyadṛṣṭaṃ daṣṭraśrutaṃ śrotramataṃ mantravijñātaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7039: tathā 'nānyadato 'sti draṣṭṛ nānyadatosti śrotṛ nānyadato 'sti mantṛ nānyadato 'sti vijñātṛ' ityātmabhedapratiṣedhāt na śārīrasyāpyupādhimato 'kṣaraśabdavācyatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7048: tarhi śodhito jīva evākṣaraṃ na para ityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7056_1: iti prakṛtya śrūyate- 'yaḥ punaretaṃ trimātreṇomithyetenaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyāyīta' (pra. 5.2,5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7061: 'sa tejasi sūrye saṃpannaḥ'' 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam' iti ca tadvido deśaparicchinnasya phalasyocyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7062: nahi parabrahmaviddeśaparicchinnaṃ phalamaśnuvīteti yuktam, sarvagatatvātparasya brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7071: īkṣatikarmatvenāsyābhidhyātavyasya puruṣasya vākyaśeṣe vyapadeśo bhavati- 'sa etasmājjīvaghanātparātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puraṣamīkṣate' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7074: īkṣatestu tathābhūtameva vastu loke karma dṛṣṭamityataḥ paramātmaivāyaṃ samyagdarśanaviṣayabhūta īkṣatikarmatvena vyadiṣṭa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7076: nanvabhidhyāne paraḥ puruṣa uktaḥ, īkṣaṇe tu parātparaḥ, kathamitara itaratra pratyabhijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7078: nacātra jīvanaghanaśabdena prakṛto 'bhidhyātavyaḥ paraḥ puruṣaḥ parāmṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:7083: saindhavakhilyavadyaḥ paramātmano jīvarūpaḥ khilyabhāva upādhikṛtaḥ paraśca viṣayendriyebhyaḥ so 'tra jīvaghana iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7084: apara āha- 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam' ityatītānantaravākyanirdiṣṭo yo brahmalokaḥ paraśca lokāntarebhyaḥ so 'trajīvaghana ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7085: jīvānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ karaṇaparivṛtānāṃ sarvakaraṇātmani hiraṇyagarbhe brahmalokanivāsini saṃghātopapatterbhavati brahmaloko jīvaghanaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7086: tasmātparo yaḥ paramātmekṣaṇakarmabhūtaḥ sa evābhidhyāne 'pi karmabhūta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7087: paraṃ puruṣamiti ca viśeṣaṇaṃ paramātmaparigraha evāvakalpate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7088: paro hi puruṣaḥ paramātmaiva bhavati yasmātparaṃ kiñcidanyannāsti,
GSP33brssgo1u:7089: 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' iti ca śrutyantarāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7090: 'paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yadoṅkāraḥ' iti ca vibhajyānantaramoṅkāreṇa paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyātavyaṃ bruvanparameva brahmaparaṃ puruṣaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7091: 'yathā pādodarastvacā vinirmucyata evaṃ ha vai sa pāpmanā vinirmucyate' iti pāpmavinirmokaphalavacanaṃ paramātmānamihābhidhyātavyaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7092: atha yaduktaṃ paramātmābhidhyāyino na deśaparicchinnaphalaṃ yujyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7093: atrocyate- trimātreṇoṅkāreṇālambanena paramātmānamabhidhyāyataḥ phalaṃ brahmalokaprāptiḥ krameṇa ca samyagdarśanotpattiriti kramamuktyabhiprāyametadbhaviṣyatītyadoṣaḥ // 13 //
GSP33brssgo1u:7095: FN: paraṃ nirviśeṣam, aparaṃ kāryaṃ, āyatanena prāptisādhanena, anveti prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7097: piṇḍaḥ sthūlo virāṭ tadapekṣayā sūtrasya paratvamti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7105: paraṃ nirguṇamaparaṃ saguṇaṃ brahmaitadeva yo 'yaṃ oṅkāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7107_1: yathādhyānaṃ paramaparaṃ vānveti prāpnotīti prakṛtya madhye ekamātradvimātroṅkārayordhyānamuktvā
GSP33brssgo1u:7109: yo hyakārādimātrātraye ekasyā mātrāyā akārasya ṛṣyādikaṃ jāgradādivibhūtiṃ ca jānāti tena samyagjñātā ekā mātrā yasyoṅkārasya sa ekamātraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7111: tamoṅkāraṃ puruṣaṃ yo 'bhidhyāyīta sa oṅkāravibhūtitvena dhyātaiḥ sāmabhiḥ sūryadvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā paramātmānaṃ puruṣamīkṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7114: pūrvatra pūrvapakṣatvenokte oṅkāre buddhisthaṃ dhyātavyaṃ niścīyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7115: yadvā pūrvatra varṇe rūḍhasyākṣaraśabdasya liṅgādbrahmaṇi vṛttiruktā,
GSP33brssgo1u:7116: tadvadatrāpi brahmalokaprāptiliṅgatparaśabdasya hiraṇyagarbhe vṛttiriti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-tatrāparamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7119: sūrye saṃpannaḥ praviṣṭaḥ nanu vasudāna īśvara iti dhyānādvindate vasvityalpamapi phalaṃ brahmopāsakasya śrutamityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7125: piṇḍaḥ sthūlo virāṭ tadapekṣayā sūtrasya paratvamiti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7126: sūtre saśabda īśvarapara iti pratijñatatvena taṃ vyācaṣṭe-parameveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7127: sa upāsaka etasmādviraṇyagarbhātparaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmāhamitīkṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7129: nanvīkṣaṇaṃ pramātvādviṣayasatyatāmapekṣata iti bhavatu satyaḥ para īkṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7130: dhyātavyastvasatyo 'paraḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-sa eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7131: śrutibhyāṃ pratyabhijñānātsa evāyamiti sautraḥ saśabdo vyākhyātaḥ atraivaṃ sūtrayojanā-oṅkāre yo dhyeyaḥ sa para evātmā,
GSP33brssgo1u:7138: dhyānasya tatphalekṣaṇasya ca loke samānaviṣayatvāddhyeya evekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7140: 'sa sāmabhirūnnīyate brahmalokam''sa etasmājjīvaghanāt'ityetatpadena saṃnihitataro brahmalokasvāmī parāmṛśyata iti praśnapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe-kastarhītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7143: khilyavadalpo bhāvaḥ paricchedo yasya sa khilyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7144: etatpadena brahmaloko vā parāmṛśyata ityāha-apara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7146: vyaṣṭikaraṇābhimānināṃ jīvānāṃ ghanaḥ saṃghāto yasminsarvakaraṇābhimānini sa jīvaghanaḥ tatsvāmikatvātparaṃparāsaṃbandhena loko lakṣya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7148: parapuruṣaśabdasya paramātmani mukhyatvācca sa eva dhyeya ityāha-paramiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7149: yasmātparaṃ nāparamasti kiñcit sa evaṃ mukhyaḥ paraḥ na tu piṇḍātparaḥ sūtrātmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7150: kiñca paraśabdenopakrame niścitaṃ paraṃ brahmaivātra vākyaśeṣe dhyātavyamityāha-paraṃ cāparaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7153: oṅkāre parabrahmopāsanayā sūryadvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā parabrahmekṣitvā tadeva śāntamabhayaṃ paraṃ prāpnotītyavirodhamāha-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7154: evamekavākyatāsamarthanaprakaraṇānugṛhītaparapuruṣaśrutibhyāṃ parabrahmapratyabhijñayā brahmalokaprāptiliṅgaṃ bādhitvā vākyaṃ praṇavadhyeye brahmaṇi samanvitamiti siddham //13//
GSP33brssgo1u:7160: 'atha yadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśastasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadbhāva vijijñāsitavyam' /
GSP33brssgo1u:7162: tatra yo 'yaṃ dahare hṛdayapuṇrīke dahara ākāśaḥ śrutaḥ sa kiṃ bhūtākāśo 'thavā vijñānātmā'thavā paramātmeti saṃśayyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7165: ākāśaśabdo hyayaṃ bhūtākāśe parasmiṃśca prayujyamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7166: tatra kiṃ bhūtākāśa eva daharaḥ syātkiṃvā para iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7167: tathā brahmapuramiti kiṃ jīvo 'tra brahmanāmā tasyedaṃ puraṃ śarīraṃ brahmapuramathavā parasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ puraṃ brahmapuramiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7168: tatra jīvasya parasya vānyatarasya purasvāmino daharākāśatve saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7169: tatrākāśaśabdasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvādbhūtākāśa eva daharaśabda iti prāptam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7171: 'yāvānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhadaya ākāśaḥ' iti ca bāhyāyantarabhāvakṛtabhedasyopamānopameyabhāvaḥ dyāvāpṛthivyādi ca tasminnantaḥ samāhitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7173: athavā jīvo dahara iti prāptam, brahmapuraśabdāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7177: nahi parasya brahmaṇaḥ śarīreṇa svasvāmibhāvaḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7178: tatra purasvāminaḥ puraikadeśe 'vasthānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā rājñaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7180: manaśca prāyeṇa hṛdaye pratiṣṭhitamityato jīvasyaivedaṃ hṛdaye 'ntaravasthānaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7185: ata uttaraṃ brūmaḥ- parameśvara evātra daharākāśo bhavitumarhati na bhūtākāśo jīvo vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7188_0: tathāhi- anveṣṭavyatayā vihitasya daharasyākāśasya 'taṃ cedbrūyuḥ' ityupakramya 'kiṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7188_1: tadatra vidyate yadanveṣṭavyaṃ yadbhāva vijijñāsitavyam' ityevamākṣepapūrvakaṃ pratisamādhānavacanaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7189: 'sa brūyādyavānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśa ubhe asmindyāvāpṛthivī antareva samāhite' (chā. 8.1.3) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7190: tatra puṇḍarīkadaharatvena prāptadaharatvasyākāśasya prasiddhākāśaupamyena daharatvaṃ nivartayanbhūtākāśatvaṃ daharasyākāśasya nivartayatīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7191: yadyapyākāśaśabdo bhūtākāśe rūḍhastathāpi tenaiva tasyopamā nopapadyata iti bhūtākāśaśaṅkā nivartitā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7195: apica kalpayitvāpi bhedamupamānopameyabhāvaṃ varṇayataḥ paricchinnatvādabhyantarākāśasya na bāhyākāśaparimāṇatvamupapadyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:7202: 'eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyurvīśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ' iti cātmatvāpahatapāpmatvādayaśca guṇā na bhūtākāśe saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7203: yadyapyātmaśabdo jīve saṃbhavati tathāpītarebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyo jīvāśaṅkāpi nivartitā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7204: nahyupādhiparicchinnasyārāgropamitasya jīvasya puṇḍarīkaveṣṭhanakṛtaṃ daharatvaṃ śakyaṃ nivartayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:7206: yadātmatayā jīvasya sarvagatatvādi vivakṣyeta tasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ sākṣātsarvagatatvādivivakṣyatāmiti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7207: yadapyuktaṃ brahmapuramiti jīvena parasyopalakṣitatvādrājña iva jīvasyaivedaṃ purasvāminaḥ puraikadeśavartitvamastviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7208: atra brūmaḥ- parasyaivedaṃ brahmaṇaḥ puraṃ saccharīraṃ brahmapuramityucyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:7212: 'sa vā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvāsu pūrṣu puriśayaḥ' (bṛ. 2.5.18) ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7214: yathā śālagrāme viṣṇaḥ saṃnihita iti tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:7215: 'tadyatheha karmacito lokaḥ kṣīyata evamevāmutra puṇyacito lokaḥ kṣīyate' (chā. 8.1.6)
GSP33brssgo1u:7216_0: iti ca karmaṇāmantavatphalamuktvā 'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajatyetāṃśca satyānkāmānsteṣāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7216_1: sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati' iti prakṛtadaharākāśavijñānasyānantaphalatvaṃ vadanparamātmatvamasya sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7219: paraviśeṣaṇatvenopādānāditi atra brūmaḥ- yadyākāśo nānveṣṭavyatvenoktaḥ syāt 'yāvānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhadaya ākāśaḥ' ityādyākāśasvarūpapradarśanaṃ nopayujyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7221_1: kiṃ tadatra vidyate yadanveṣṭavyaṃ yadbhāva vijijñāsitavyam' ityākṣipya parihārāvasara
GSP33brssgo1u:7223: evaṃ hi sati yadantaḥsamāhitaṃ dyāvāpṛthivyādi tadanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ cokta syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7225_1: 'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajantyetāṃśca satyānkāmān' iti samuccayārthena caśabdenātmānaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7226: tasmādvākyopakrame 'pi dahara evākāśo hṛdayapuṇḍarīkādhiṣṭhānaḥ sahāntaḥsthaiḥ samāhitaiḥ pṛthivyādibhiḥ satyaiśca kāmairvijñeya ukta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7229: FN: brahmapuraṃ śarīraṃ, daharaṃ sūkṣmaṃ, puṇḍarīkaṃ tadākāratvātprakṛtaṃ hṛdayameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:7236: pūrṣu śarīreṣu, puri hṛdaye vā śete iti puruṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7243: asmin yatprasiddhaṃ daharamalpaṃ hṛtpadmaṃ tasminhṛdaye yadantarākāśaśabditaṃ brahma tadanveṣṭavyaṃ vicārya jñeyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7244: atrākāśo jijñāsyaḥ, tadantaḥsthaṃ veti prathamaṃ saṃśayaḥ kalpyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7251: tathehāpyākāśapadasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvādbhūtākāśo dhyeya iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-tatrākāśetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7252: daharavākyasyānantaraprajāpativākyasya ca saguṇe nirguṇe ca samanvayokteḥ śrutyādisaṃgatayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7253: pūrvapakṣe bhūtākāśādyupāstiḥ, siddhānte saguṇabrahmopāstyā nirguṇadhīriti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7255: atra tasmin 'yadantastadanveṣṭavyam'ityākāśāntaḥ sthasyānveṣṭavyatvādiliṅganvayena daharākāśasya brahmatve spaṣṭaliṅgābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7259: ubhāvagniśca vāyuśca'ityādinā śrutasarvāśrayatvaṃ ca kathamityāśaṅkya krameṇa pariharati-tasyetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7260: hṛdayāpekṣayā alpatvaṃ, dhyānārthaṃ kalpitabhedātsādṛśyaṃ, svata ekatvātsarvāśrayatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7261: nanu 'eṣa ātmā'ityātmaśabdo bhūte na yukta ityarūcerāha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7269: nanu jīvasyākāśapadārthatvamayuktamityāśaṅkya tarhi bhūtākāśa eva daharo 'stu tasminnantaḥsthaṃ kiñciddhyeyamiti pakṣāntaramāha-na cātreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7271: yadvā anveṣyatvādiliṅgāddaharasya brahmatvaniścayāt 'ākāśastalliṅgāt'ityanena gatārthatvamiti śaṅkātra nirasanīyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7272: anveṣyatvādeḥ paraviśeṇatvena grahaṇāddarahasya brahmatve liṅgaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7276: hṛdayameva tāvadalpaṃ tatratyākāśo 'lpataraḥ kiṃ tadatrālpe vidyate yadvicāryā jñeyamiti,
GSP33brssgo1u:7283: na abhede sādṛśyasyānanvayena yuddhasya nirūpamatve tātparyādayamananvayālaṅkāra iti kāvyavidaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7288: kiñca hārdākāśasyāntaratvātyāge alpatvena vyāpakabāhyākāśasādṛśyaṃ na yuktamityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7290: nanu hārdākāśasyālpatvanivṛttau tāvattve ca tātparyaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-ubhayeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7294: vigatā jighatsā jagdhumicchā yasya so 'yaṃ vijighatsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7297: na tu brahmaṇaḥ puramiti ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ svasvāmibhāvo grāhyaḥ 'nirapekṣeṇa tatsāpekṣaṃ bādhyam'iti nyāyādityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7298: śarīrasya brahmaṇa tadupalabdhisthānatvarūpe saṃbandhe mānamāha-sa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7299: pūrṣu śarīreṣu, puri hṛdaye śaya iti puruṣa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7300: nanu brahmaśabdasya jīve 'pyannādinā śarīravṛddhihetau mukhyatvānna ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ kathañcinneya ityata āha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7301: bṛṃhayati dehamiti brahma jīvaḥ tatsvāmike pure hṛdayaṃ brahmaveśma bhavatu,
GSP33brssgo1u:7304_0: atha karmaphalādvaurāgyānantaramiha jīvadaśāyāmātmānaṃ daharaṃ tadāśritāṃśca satyakāmādiguṇān
GSP33brssgo1u:7304_1: ācāryopadeśamanuvidya dhyānenānubhūya ye paralokaṃ gacchanti teṣāṃ sarvalokeṣvanantamaiśvaryaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7305: dahare uktaliṅgānyanyathāsiddhāni teṣāṃ tadantaḥsthaguṇatvādiyuktaṃ smārayitvā dūṣayati-yadapītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7311: sarvanāmabhyāṃ daharākāśamākṛṣyātmatvādiguṇānuktvā guṇaiḥ saha tasyaiva dhyeyatvaṃ vākyaśeṣo brūte tadvirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7312: 'tasmin yadantaḥ'iti tatpadena vyavahitamapi hṛdayaṃ yogyatayā grāhyamityāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7317: gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca | BBs_1,3.15 |
GSP33brssgo1u:7321: yasmāddaharavākyaśeṣe parameśvarasyaiva pratipādakau gatiśabdau bhavataḥ- 'imāḥ sarvāḥ prajā aharahargacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanti' (chā. 8.3.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7322: tatra prakṛtaṃ daharaṃ brahmalokaśabdenābhidhāya tadviṣayā gatiḥ prajāśabdavācyānāṃ jīvānāmabhidhīyamānā daharasya brahmatāṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7323: tathā hyaharaharjīvānāṃ suṣuptavasthāyāṃ brahmaviṣayaṃ gamanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutyantare- 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1) ityevamādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:7324: loke 'pi kila gāḍhaṃ suṣuptamācakṣate brahmībhūto brahmatāṃ gata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7325: tathā brahmalokaśabdo 'pi prakṛte dahare prayujyamāno jīvabhūtākāśaśaṅkāṃ nivartayanbrahmatāmasya gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7327: gamayedyadi brahmaṇo loka iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsavṛttyā vyutpādyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:7328: sāmānādhikaraṇavṛttyā tu vyutpādyamāno brahmaiva loko brahmaloka iti parameva brahma gamayiṣyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7329: etadeva cāhararbrahmalokagamanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brahmaśabdasya sāmānādhikaraṇyavṛttiparigrahe liṅgam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7330: nahyaharaharimāḥ prajāḥ kāryabrahmalokaṃ satyalokākhyaṃ gacchantīti śakyaṃ kalpayitum // 15 //
GSP33brssgo1u:7332: prajā jīvā etaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ daharaṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ lokamaharahaḥ pratyahaṃ svāpe gacchantyastadātmanā sthitā apyanṛtājñānenāvṛtāstaṃ na jānanti ataḥ punaruttiṣṭhantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7333: nanvetatpadaparāmṛṣṭadaharasya svāpe jīvagamyatve 'pi brahmatve kimāyātamityaśaṅkya 'tathā hi dṛṣṭam'iti vyācaṣṭe-tathā hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7341: tatra niṣādānāṃ sthapatiḥ svāmīti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsena traivarṇiko grāhyaḥ, agnividyādisāmarthyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7342: na tu niṣādaścāsau sthapatiriti karmadhārayeṇa niṣādo grāhyaḥ, asāmarthyāditi prāpte siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7343: niṣāda eva sthapatiḥ syāt, niṣādaśabdasya niṣāde śaktatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:7355_1: tāṃ sminneva cātmaśabdaṃ prayujyāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇayogaṃ copaduśya tamevānativṛttaprakaraṇaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7355_2: nirdiśati- 'atha ya ātmā sa seturvidhṛtireṣalokānāmasaṃbhedāya' (chā. 8.4.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7359: evamiha prakṛte dahare vidhāraṇalakṣaṇaṃ mahimānaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7360: ayaṃ ca mahimā parameśvara eva śrutyantarādupalabhyate 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ' ityādeḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7361: tathānyatrāpi niścite parameśvaravākye śrūyate- 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidhāraṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasaṃbhedāya' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7362: evaṃ dhṛteśca hetoḥ parameśvara evāyaṃ daharaḥ // 16 //
GSP33brssgo1u:7366: nanvathaśabdāddaharaprakaraṇaṃ vicchidya śrutā dhṛtirna daharaliṅgamiti śaṅkate-kathamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7369: sūtre tu mahimaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyāddhṛtiśabdaḥ ktinnanto vidhāraṇaṃ brūte,
GSP33brssgo1u:7373: dhṛteśca daharaḥ paraḥ asya dhṛtirūpasya niyamanasya ca mahimno 'sminparamātmanyeva śrutyantara upalabdheriti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7386: jīve tu na kvacidākāśaśabdaḥ prayujyamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7389: FN: ā samāntātkāśate dīpyata ityākāśaḥ svayañjyotirīśvaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7390: ā samantātkāśate dīpyata iti svayañjyotiṣi brahmaṇyākāśaśabdasya vibhutvaguṇato vā prasiddhiḥ prayogaprācuryam //17//
GSP33brssgo1u:7394: itaraparāmarśāt sa iti cen nāsaṃbhavāt | BBs_1,3.18 |
GSP33brssgo1u:7395_0: yadi vākyaśeṣabalena dahara iti parameśvaraḥ parigṛhyetāstītarasyāpi jīvasya vākyaśeṣe
GSP33brssgo1u:7395_1: parāmarśaḥ - 'atha ya eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirūpasaṃpadya
GSP33brssgo1u:7395_2: svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca' (chā. 8.3.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7396: atra hi saṃprasādaśabdaḥ śrutyantare suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ dṛṣṭatvāttadavasthāvantaṃ jīvaṃ śaknotyupasthāpayituṃ nārthāntaram /
GSP33brssgo1u:7399_0: yathā cādṛṣṭo 'pi loke parameśvaraviṣaya ākāśaśabdaḥ parameśvaradharmasamabhivyāhārāt
GSP33brssgo1u:7399_1: 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā' ityevamādau parameśvaraviṣayo 'bhyupagata evaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7400: tasmāditaraparāmarśāt 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśa' ityatra sa eva jīva ucyate iti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:7410: samyakprasīdatyasmiñjīvo viṣayendriyasaṃyogajanitaṃ kāluṣyaṃ jahātīti suṣuptiḥ saṃprasādo jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7413: yadi 'eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā'ityādivākyaśeṣabalena daharaḥ parastarhi jīvo 'pītyāśaṅkya niṣedhati-itareti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7416_0: ya eṣa saṃprasādo jīvo 'smātkāryakaraṇasaṃghātātsamyagutthāya ātmānaṃ tasmādvivicya
GSP33brssgo1u:7416_1: viviktamātmānaṃ svena brahmarūpeṇābhiniṣpadya sākṣātkṛtya tadeva pratyakparaṃ jyotirūpasaṃpadyate
GSP33brssgo1u:7417: yathā mukhaṃ vyādāya svapitīti vākyaṃ suptvā mukhaṃ vyādatte iti vyākhyāyate tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:7422: nanu kvāpyākāśaśabdo jīve na dṛṣṭa ityāśaṅkyoktāvasthotthānaliṅgabalātkalpya ityāha-yathā ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7423: niyāmakābhāvājjīvo daharaḥ kiṃ na syāditi prāpte niyāmakamāha-naitadityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7434: athedānīṃ mṛtasyevāmṛtasekātpunaḥ samutthānaṃ jīvāśaṅkāyāḥ kriyate uttarasmātprajāpatyādvākyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7435: tatrahi 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā' ityapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakamātmānamanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ ca pratijñāya 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmā'
GSP33brssgo1u:7438: iti ca tameva punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛśya 'ya eṣa svapne mahīyamānaścaratyeṣa ātmā' (chā. 8.10.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:7439: iti 'tadyatraitatsuptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyeṣa ātmā' iti ca jīvamevāvasthāntaragataṃ vyācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssgo1u:7441: nāhaṃ khalvayamevaṃ saṃpratyātmānaṃ jānātyayamahamasmīti no evemāni bhūtāni' (chā. 8.11.1,2)
GSP33brssgo1u:7442_0: iti ca suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ doṣamupalabhya 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmi no evānyatraitasmāt
GSP33brssgo1u:7442_2: paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ' iti jīvameva
GSP33brssgo1u:7444: ataḥ 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ' iti jīva evokta iti cetkaścidbrūyāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:7452_0: etaduktaṃ bhavati- 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi ityakṣilakṣitaṃ draṣṭāraṃ nirdiśyodaśarāvabrāhmaṇenainaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7452_1: śarīrātmatāyā vyutthāpya 'etaṃ tveva te' iti punaḥpunastameva vyākhyāyeyatvenākṛṣya
GSP33brssgo1u:7452_3: yadasya pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ paraṃ brahma tadrūpatayainaṃ jīvaṃ vyācaṣṭe na jaivena rūpeṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:7455: tadeva ca jīvasya pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ 'tattvamasi' ityādiśāstrebhyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7457: yāvadeva hi sthāṇāviva puruṣabuddhiṃ dvaitalakṣaṇāmavidyāṃ nivartayankūṭasthanityadṛksvarūpamātmānamahaṃ brahmāsmīti na pratipadyate tāvajjīvasya jīvatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7461: kiṃ tarhi tadyatsatyaṃ sa ātmā caitanyamātrasvarūpastattvamasīti,
GSP33brssgo1u:7462: tadā kūcasthanityadṛksvarūpamātmānaṃ pratibudadhyāsmāccharīrādyabhimānātsamuttiṣṭhansa eva kūṭasthanityadṛksvarūpa ātmā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7463: 'sa yo ha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' (muṇḍa. 3.2.1) ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7464: tadeva cāsya pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ yena śarīrātsamutthāya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7465_0: kathaṃ punaḥ svaṃ ca rūpaṃ svenaiva niṣpadyata iti saṃbhavati kūṭasthanityasya suvarṇādīnāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7467: natu tathātmacaitanyajyotiṣo nityasya kenacidabhibhavaḥ saṃbhavatyasaṃsargitvādvyomna iva, dṛṣṭavirodhācca /
GSP33brssgo1u:7469: tacca śarīrādasamutthitasyāpi jīvasya sadā niṣpannameva dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7470: sarvo hi jīvaḥ paśyanśṛṇvanmanvāno vijānanvyavaharatyanyathā vyavahārānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7472: ataḥ kimātmakamidaṃ śarīrātsamutthānaṃ, kimātmikā vā svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7474: yathā śuddhasya sphaṭikasya svācchyaṃ śauklyaṃ ca svarūpaṃ prāgvivekagrahaṇādraktanīlādyupādhibhiraviviktamiva bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7475: pramāṇajanitavivekagrahaṇāttu parācīnaḥ sphaṭikaḥ svācchyena śauklyena ca svenarūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata ityucyate prāgapi tathaiva san /
GSP33brssgo1u:7476: tathā dehādyupādhyaviviktasyaiva sato jīvasya śrutikṛtaṃ vivekavijñānaṃ śarīrātsamutthānaṃ vivekavijñānaphalaṃ svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiḥ kevalātmasvarūpāvagatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7479: iti, 'śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate' (gī.13.31)
GSP33brssgo1u:7483: evaṃ mithyājñānakṛta eva jīvaparameśvarayorbhedo na vastukṛtaḥ, vyomavadasaṅgatvāviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7485: yato 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' ityupadiśya 'etadamṛtamabhayametadbrahma' ityupadiśati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7486: yo 'kṣiṇi prasiddho draṣṭā draṣṭṛtvena vibhāvyate so 'mṛtābhayalakṣaṇādbrahmaṇo 'nyaścetsyāttato 'mṛtābhayabrahmasāmānādh ikaraṇyaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7488: tathā dvitīye 'pi paryāye 'ya eṣaḥ svapne mahīyamānaścarati' iti na prathamaparyāyanirdiṣṭādakṣipuruṣāddraṣṭuranyo nirdiṣṭaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7490: kiñcāhamadya svapne hastinamadrākṣaṃ nedānīṃ taṃ paśyāmīti dṛṣṭameva pratibuddhaḥ pratyācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssgo1u:7491: draṣṭāraṃ tu tameva pratyabhijānāti ya evāhaṃ svapnamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhaṃ jāgaritaṃ paśyamīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7492_0: tathā tṛtīye 'pi paryāye 'nahi khalvayamevaṃ saṃpratyātmānaṃ jānātyayamahamasmīti
GSP33brssgo1u:7492_1: no evemāni bhūtāni iti suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ viśeṣavijñānābhāvameva darśayati na vijñātāraṃ pratiṣedhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7493: yattu tatra 'vināśamevāpīto bhavati' iti tadapi viśeṣavijñānavināśābhiprāyameva na vijñātṛvināśābhiprāyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7495_0: tathā caturthe 'pi paryāye 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmi no evānyatraitasmāt'
GSP33brssgo1u:7495_1: ityupakramya 'maghavanmartyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīram' ityādinā prapañcena śarīrādupādhisaṃbandhapratyākhyānena
GSP33brssgo1u:7495_2: saṃprasādaśabdoditaṃ jīvaṃ 'svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate' iti brahmasvarūpāpannaṃ darśayanna
GSP33brssgo1u:7496: kecittu paramātmavivakṣāyāṃ 'etaṃ tveva te' iti jīvākarṣaṇamanyāyyaṃ manyamānā etameva vākyopakramasūcitamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakamātmānaṃ te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmīti kalpayanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7499: 'etaṃ tveva te' iti ca pratijñāya prākcaturthātparyāyādanyamanyaṃ vyācakṣāṇasya prajāpateḥ pratārakatvaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:7500_1: tadvilayanena tadviparītamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaṃ pārameśvaraṃ svarūpaṃ vidyayā pratipādyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:7502: apare tu vādinaḥ pāramārthikameva jaivaṃ rūpamiti manyante 'smadīyāśca kecit /
GSP33brssgo1u:7504: eka eva parameśvaraḥ kūṭasthanityo vijñānadhāturavidyayā māyayā māyāvivadanekadhā vibhāvyate nānyo vijñānadhāturastīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7505: yattvidaṃ parameśvaravākye jīvamāśaṅkhya pratiṣedhati sūtrakāraḥ - 'nāsaṃbhavāt' (bra.1.3.18) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7506: tatrāyamabhiprāyaḥ - nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāve kūṭasthanitye ekasminnasaṅge paramātmani tadviparītaṃ jaivaṃ rūpaṃ vyomnīva talamalādiparikalpitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7508: jīvasya tu na parasmādanyatvaṃ pratipipādayiṣati kiṃ tvanuvadatyevāvidyākalpitaṃ lokaprasiddhaṃ jīvabhedam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7509: evaṃ hi svābhāvikakartṛtvabhoktṛtvānuvādena pravṛttāḥ karmavidhayo na virudhyanta iti manyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7510: pratipādyaṃ tu śāstrārthamātmaikatvameva darśayati- 'śāstradṛṣṭyā tūpadeśo vāmadevavat' (bra. 1.1.30)
GSP33brssgo1u:7513: FN: mahīyamāno vāsanāmayairviṣayaiḥ pūjyamāna iti svapnaparyāye,
GSP33brssgo1u:7514: tadyatreti suṣuptiparyāye ca jīvameva prajāpatirvyācaṣṭa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7517: udaśarāveti udakapūrṇe śarāve pratibimbātmānaṃ dehaṃ svasyājñātaṃ yattanmahyaṃ vācyamityuktaḥ śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7525: ayaṃ suṣuptaḥ, saṃprati suṣuptau, ahaṃ ātmānaṃ ahaṅkārāspadamātmānaṃ na jānāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7539: yadyatreti suṣuptiparyāye ca jīvameva prajāpatirvyācaṣṭa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7540: tatra kāle tadetatsvapanaṃ yathā syāttathā suptaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7541: samyak asto nirastaḥ karaṇagrāmo yasya sa samastaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7543: svapnaṃ prapañcamajñānamātratvena vilāpayati ato 'jñānasattvāt muktādvilakṣaṇaḥ prājña eṣa svacaitanyena kāraṇaśarīrasākṣī tasya sākṣyasya sattāsphūrtipradatvādātmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7544: caturthaparyāye brahmoktestasyaivāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇā ityāśaṅkya tasyāpi paryāyasya jīvatvamāha-nāheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7547: na khalu suptaḥ pumānayaṃ saṃprati suṣuptyavasthāyāmayaṃ devadatto 'hamityevamātmānaṃ jānāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7548: no eva naivemāni bhūtāni jānāti kintu vināśameva prāpto bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:7549: nāhamatra bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti doṣamupalabhya punaḥ prajāpatimupasasāra /

GSP33brssgo1u:7610: etadbhedasya satyatvameva nāstīti kuta ityanvayaḥ chāyāyāṃ brahmadṛṣṭiparamidaṃ vākyaṃ nābhedaparamityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7611: yasya jñānātkṛtakṛtyatā sarvakāmaprāptistamātmānamanvicchāva iti pravṛttayorindravirocanayoryadyanātmacchāyāṃ prajāpatirbrūyāttadā mṛṣāvādi syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7612: prathamavat dvitīyādiparyāye vyāvṛttāsvavasthāsu unusyūtātmā brahmatvenokta ityāha-tatheti /

GSP33brssgo1u:7669: evaṃ daharavākyaṃ prajāpativākyaṃ ca saguṇe nirguṇe ca samanvitamiti siddham //21//
GSP33brssgo1u:7675: 'na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yamāgniḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7676: tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' (mu. 2.210) iti samāmananti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7677: yatra yaṃ bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ yasya ca bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti sa kiṃ tejodhātuḥ kaściduta prājña ātmeti vicikitsāyāṃ tejodhāturiti tāvatprāptam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7679: tejaḥsvabhāvakaṃ hi candratārakādi tejaḥsvabhāvaka eva suryo bhāsamāne 'hani na bhāsata iti prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:7680: tathā saha sūryeṇa sarvamidaṃ candratārakādi yasminna bhāsate so 'pi tejaḥsvabhāva eva kaścidityavagamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7683: tasmāttejodhātuḥ kaścidityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prājña evātmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7691: samatvācca tejodhātūnāṃ sūryādīnāṃ na tejodhātumanyaṃ pratyapekṣāsti yaṃ bhāntamanubhāyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7699: tasya ceti caturthaṃ pādamasya ślokasya sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7700: 'tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti tadhetukaṃ bhānaṃ sūryāderucyamānaṃ prājñamātmānaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7702: tejontareṇa suryāditejo vibhātītyaprasiddhaṃ viruddhaṃ ca, tejontareṇa tejontarasya pratidhātāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7703: athavā na sūryādīnameva ślokaparipaṭhitānāmidaṃ taddhetukaṃ vibhānamucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7704: kiṃ tarhi 'sarvamidam' ityaviśeṣaśruteḥ sarvasyaivāsya nāmarūpakriyākārakaphalajātasya yābhivyaktiḥ sā brahmajyotiḥsattānimittā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7706: 'na tatra sūryo bhāti' iti ca tatraśabdamāharanprakṛtagrahaṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7707: prakṛtaṃ ca brahma 'yasmindyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotam' (mu. 2.2.5) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7708: anantaraṃ ca 'hiraṇmaye pare kośe virajaṃ brahma niṣphalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7710: kathaṃ tajjyotiṣāṃ jyotirityata idamutthitam-'na tatra sūryo bhāti' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7712: tatra tu sa eva tejodhāturanyo na saṃbhavatītyupapāditam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7715: brahma tu nānyena jyotiṣopalabhyate svayaṃ jyotiḥsvarūpatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:7720: FN: tatra tārakāntarāṇi candrādi ca na bhāti taṃ na bhāsayatīti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:7727: tasmin brahmaṇi viṣaye na bhāti, taṃ na bhāsayatīti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:7728: yadā candrabhāskarādirna bhāsayati tadā alpadīpteragneḥ kā kathetyāha-kuta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7731: tatreti saptamyāḥ sati viṣaye ca sādhāraṇyātsaṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7733: tathehāpi satisaptamībalādvartamānārthatyāgena yasminsati sūryādayo na bhāsyanti sa tejoviśeṣa upāsya iti bhaviṣyadarthe vṛttirāśrayaṇīyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7734: adhunā bhāsamāne sūryādau na bhātīti virodhāditi dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-tejodhāturiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7738: yasminsati yanna bhāti tadanu tadbhātīti viruddhamityata āha-anubhānamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7740: mukhyasaṃbhave vivakṣānupapatteḥ mukhyānubhānaliṅgātsarvabhāsakaḥ paramātmā svaprakāśako 'tra grāhya iti siddhāntamāha-prājña iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7744: kiñca sūryādayastejontarabhānamanu na bhānti, tejastvāt, pradīpavadityāha-samatvācceti /

GSP33brssgo1u:7754: hiraṇmaye jyotirmaye annamayādyapekṣayā pare kośe ānandamayākhye pucchaśabditaṃ brahma virajaṃ āgantukamalaśūnyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7762: satisaptamīpakṣe na bhātīti śrutaṃ vartamānatvaṃ tyaktvā tasminsati na bhāsyantītyaśrutabhaviṣyattvaṃ kalpanīyaṃ pratyakṣavirodhanirāsāya /
GSP33brssgo1u:7763: viṣayasaptamīpakṣe tu na bhāsayatītyaśrutaṇijadhyāhāramātraṃ kalpyaṃ na śrutatyāga iti lāghavaṃ,

GSP33brssgo1u:7797_0: nahi parameśvaro balādyamena niṣkraṣṭuṃ śakyastena tatra saṃsāryaṅguṣṭhamātro niścitaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7797_1: sa evehāpītyevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - paramātmaivāyamaṅguṣṭhamātraparimitaḥ puruṣo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7804: iti śabdādevetyabhidhānaśrutereveśāna iti parameśvaro 'yaṃ gamyata ityarthaḥ // 24 //
GSP33brssgo1u:7805: kathaṃ punaḥ sarvagatasya paramātmanaḥ parimāṇopadeśa ityatra brūmaḥ -
GSP33brssgo1u:7812: puruṣaḥ pūrṇo 'pyātmani dehamadhye aṅguṣṭhamātre hṛdaye tiṣṭhatītyaṅguṣṭhamātra ityucyate,

GSP33brssgo1u:7820_1: 'smīti dhyāyediti vidhyadhyāhareṇa dhyānaparaṃ vākyamiti pūrvapakṣayati-tatra parimāṇeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7821: pūrvapakṣe brahmadṛṣṭyā jīvopāstiḥ, siddhānte tu pratyagbrahmaikyajñānaṃ phalamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7829: bhūtabhavyasvetyupapadādbādhakābhāvācca īśāna itīśatvaśabdānniraṅkuśamīśitā bhātīti śrutyā liṅgaṃ bādhyāmiti siddhāntayati-paramātmaiveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7839: na cānyaḥ paramātmana iha grahaṇamarhatīśānaśabdādibhya ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7840: nanu pratiprāṇibhedaṃ hṛdayānāmanavasthitatvādapekṣamapyaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ nopapadyata ityata uttaramucyate- manuṣyādhikāratvāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7847: tatpratyucyate- 'sa ātmā tattvamasi' ityādivatsaṃsāriṇa eva sato 'ṅguṣṭhamātrasya brahmatvamidamupadiśyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7851: etamevārthaṃ pareṇa sphuṭīkariṣyati- 'aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo 'ntarātmā sadā janānāṃ hṛdaye saṃniviṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7857: 'śūdro yajñe 'navakḷptaḥ' iti paryudāsāt, upanīyata, tamadhyāpayīta, iti śūdrādhikāravāraṇam /

GSP33brssgo1u:7863: atra tu śrutivirodhādasaṃbhava iti gauṇagraha ityartha /
GSP33brssgo1u:7870: arthitvādityanena niṣkāmānāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ cādhikāro vāritaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7871: tatra mumukṣūṇāṃ śudyarthitve nityādiṣvadhikāro na kāmyeṣu /
GSP33brssgo1u:7872: śuddhacittānāṃ mokṣārthitve śravaṇādiṣu vyañjakeṣvadhikāro na karmasviti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7875: upanayīta tamadhyāpayīta iti śāstrācca na śūdrasya vaidike karmaṇyadhikāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7879_0: prāṇimātrasya sukhārthitvācca phalārthe karmaṇi paśvādīnāmapyadhikāra ityāśaṅkyoktarityāteṣāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7883: saṃprati tacchabdenāṅguṣṭhamātraṃ jīvamanūdyāyamīśāna iti brahmābhedo bodhya iti vaktumanuvadati-yadapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7888: dvividhetyādibhāṣyāttu jīvamuddiśya brahmatvabodhanamiti pratīyata iti sūtrārthāsparśitvādbhāṣyamanupapannamiti cet,
GSP33brssgo1u:7892: tatrāvāntaratātparyamupāsye brahmaṇi, mahātātparyaṃ ca jñeye brahmaṇi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7894: ata evopāsanāphalaṃ kaṭhavallyāmeva-'śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ'ityādinā bodhitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7895: ata eva caturthādhyāye dvitīyacaraṇe 'tadokaḥ'iti sūtre hārdavidyāṃ prakṛtya samāmananti iti bhāṣyakāraiḥ prathamavākyasya upāsye brahmaṇi tātparyamiti prakaṭīkṛtam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7902: taṃ viviktamātmānaṃ śuklaṃ svaprakāśamamṛtaṃ kūṭasthaṃ brahma jānīyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7913: teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmupariṣṭādye devādayastānapyadhikaroti śāstramiti bādarāyaṇa ācāryo manyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:7918: tathā sāmarthyamapi teṣāṃ saṃbhavati, mantrārthavādetihāsapurāṇalokebhyo vigrahavattvādyavagamāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7922: apicaiṣāṃ vidyāgrahaṇārthaṃ brahmacaryādi darśayati- 'ekaśataṃ ha vai varṣāṇi maghavānprajāpatau brahmacaryamuvāsa' (chā. 8.11.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:7934: FN: devānāṃ karmasu nādhikāraḥ, devatāntarāṇāmuddeśyānāmabhāvāditi prathamasūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7937: śāstrasya manuṣyādhikāratve devādīnāṃ brahmavidyāyamāpyanadhikāraḥ syādityāśaṅkyāha-taduparyapi bādarāyaṇaḥ saṃbhavāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7940: atra manuṣyādhikāratvoktyā smṛtānāṃ devādināṃ vedāntaśravaṇādāvadhikāro 'sti na veti saṃdehe bhogāsaktānāṃ vairāgyādyasaṃbhavānneti prāpte siddhāntamāha-bāḍhamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7942: atra pūrvapakṣe devādināṃ jñānānadhikārāddevatvaprāptidvārā kramamuktiphalāsu daharādyupāsanāsu kramamuktyarthināṃ manuṣyāṇāmapravṛttiḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7944: upāsanābhirdevatvaṃ prāptānāṃ śravaṇādinā jñānānmuktisaṃbhavāditi saphalo 'yaṃ vicāraḥ nanu bhogāsaktānāṃ teṣāṃ mokṣārthitvābhāvānnādhikāra ityata āha-arthitvaṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7945: vikāratvenānṛtaviṣayasukhasya kṣayāsūyādidoṣaddaṣṭyā niratiśayasukhamokṣārthitvaṃ sattvaprakṛtīnāṃ devānāṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7946: nanvindrāya svāhetyādau caturthyantaśabdātiriktā vigrahavatī devatā nāsti,

GSP33brssgo1u:7952: janmāntarādhyayanabalātsvayameva pratibhātāḥ smṛtā vedā yeṣāṃ te tathā tadbhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7953: bālādiṣu praviṣṭapiśācādīnāṃ vedodghoṣadarśanāddevayonīnāṃ janmāntarasmaraṇamastīti smṛtavedāntānāmarthavicāro yukta ityarthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo1u:8024: ṣaṭ devāstriṣu lokeṣu trayaśca dvayorannaprāṇayordvai ca ekasminprāṇe hiraṇyagarbhe 'ntarbhavata iti darśitamityarthaḥ /

GSP33brssgo1u:8046: mā nāma vigrahavattve devādīnāmabhyupagamyamāne karmaṇi kaścidvirodhaḥ prasañji /
GSP33brssgo1u:8049: autpattikaṃ hi śabdasyārthena saṃbandhamāśritya 'anapekṣatvāt' iti vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ sthāpitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8050_1: havīṃṣi bhuñjīta tathāpi vigrahayogādasmadādivajjananamaraṇavatī seti nityasya śabdasya

GSP33brssgo1u:8058: kathametāvatā virodhaḥ śabde parihṛtaḥ yāvatā vasavo rudrā ādityā viśvedevā maruta ityeter'thā anityā evotpattimattvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8059: tadanityatve ca tadvācināṃ vaidikānāṃ vasvādiśabdānāmanityatvaṃ kena nivāryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8060: prasiddhaṃ hi loke devadattasya putra utpanne yajñadatta iti tasya nāma kriyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8069: tathā devādivyaktiprabhavābhyupagame 'pyākṛtinityatvānna kaścidvasvādiśabdeṣu virodha iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8072: tataśca yo yastattatsthānamadhirohati sa sa indrādiśabdairabhidhīyata iti na doṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8074: kathaṃ tarhi sthite vācakātmanā nitye śabde nityārthasaṃbandhini śabdavyavahārayogyārthavyaktiniṣpattirataḥ prabhava ityucyate kathaṃ punaravagamyate śabdātprabhavati jagaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:8079: 'ete iti vai prajāpatirdevānasṛjatāsṛgramiti manuṣyānindava iti pitṛṃstiraḥ pavitramiti grahānāśava iti stotraṃ viśvānīti śastramabhisaubhagetyanyāḥ prajāḥ' iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8083: ādau vedamayī divyā yataḥ sarvā pravṛttayaḥ' //
GSP33brssgo1u:8087: tathā 'nāma rūpaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca pravartanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8090: ' sarveṣāṃ tu sa nāmāni karmāṇi ca pṛthakpṛthak /
GSP33brssgo1u:8093: apica cikīrṣitamarthamanutiṣṭhaṃstasya vācakaṃ śabdaṃ pūrvaṃ smṛtvā paścāttamarthamanuṣṭhatīti sarveṣāṃ naḥ pratyakṣametat /
GSP33brssgo1u:8094: tathā prajāpaterapi sraṣṭuḥ sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ vaidikāḥ śabdā manasi prādurbabhūvuḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8097: ityevamādikā bhūrādiśabdebhya eva manasi prādurbhūtebhyo bhūrādilokānsṛṣṭāndarśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8100: varṇapakṣe hi teṣāmutpannapradhvaṃsitvānnityebhyaḥ śabdebhyo devādivyaktīnāṃ prabhava ityanupapannaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8101: utpannadhvaṃsinaśca varṇāḥ, pratyuccāraṇamanyathā cānyathā ca pratīyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8102: tathāhi- adṛśyamāno 'pi puruṣaviśeṣo 'dhyayanadhvaniśravaṇādeva viśeṣato nirdhāryate devadatto 'yamadhīte yajñadatto 'yamadhīte iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8109: saṃbandhagrahaṇāpekṣo hi śabdaḥ svayaṃ pratīyamānor'thaṃ pratyāyayeddhūmādivat /
GSP33brssgo1u:8112: kāryapratyāyitaiḥ saṃskāraiḥ sahito 'ntyo varṇorthaṃ pratyāyayiṣyatīti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:8116: sa caicaikavarṇapratyayāhitasaṃskārabīje 'ntyavarṇapratyayajanitapari pāke pratyayinyekapratyayaviṣayatayā jhaṭiti pratyavabhāsate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8122: varṇā eva tu na śabdaḥ iti bhagavānupavarṣaḥ.
GSP33brssgo1u:8131: yadi hi pratyuccāraṇaṃ gavādivyaktivadanyā anyā varṇavyaktayaḥ pratīyeraṃstata ākṛtinimittaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8134: dvirgośabda uccārita iti hi pratipattirna tu dvau gośabdāviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8135: nanu varṇā apyuccāraṇabhedena bhinnaḥ pratīyante devadattayajñadattayoradhyayanadhvaniśravaṇādeva bhedapratīterityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8136: atrābhidhīyate- sati varṇaviṣaye niścite pratyabhijñāne saṃyogavibhāgābhivyaṅgyatvādvarṇānāmabhivyañjakavaicitryanimitto 'yaṃ varṇaviṣayo vicitraḥ pratyayo na svarūpanimittaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8139: tadvaraṃ varṇavyaktiṣveva paropādhiko bhedapratyayaḥ svarūpanimittaṃ ca pratyabhijñānamiti kalpanālāghavam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8140: eṣa eva ca varṇaviṣayasya bhedapratyayasya bādhakaḥ pratyayo yatpratyabhijñānam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8141: kathaṃ hyekasminkālaṃ bahūnāmuccārayatāmeka eva sangakāro yugapadanekarūpaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8143: athavā dhvanikṛto 'yaṃ pratyayabhedo na varṇakṛta ityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8150: itaradhā hi varṇānāṃ pratyabhijñāyamānānāṃ nirbhedatvātsaṃyogavibhāgakṛtā udāttādiviśeṣāḥ kalperan /
GSP33brssgo1u:8151: saṃyogavibhāgānāṃ cāpratyakṣatvācca tadāśrayā viśeṣā varṇeṣvadhyavasituṃ śakyanta ityato nirālambanā evaita udāttādipratyayāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8152: apica naivaitadabhiniveṣṭavyamudāttādibhedena varṇānāṃ pratyabhijñāyamānānāṃ bhedo bhavediti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8157: ekaikavarṇagrahaṇāhitasaṃskārāyāṃ buddhau jhaṭiti pratyava ūbhāsanāditi cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:8162: yato 'syāmapi buddhau gakārādayo varṇā anuvartante natu dakārādayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8163: yadi hyasyā buddhergakārādibhyor'thāntaraṃ sphoṭo viṣayaḥ syāttato dakārādaya iva gakārādayo 'pyasyā buddhervyāvarteran /
GSP33brssgo1u:8168: paṅ ktirvanaṃ senā daśa śataṃ sahasramityādidarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8169: yā tu gaurityeko 'yaṃ śabda iti buddhiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8171: atrāha- yadi varṇā eva sāmastyenaikabuddhiviṣayatāmāpadyamānāḥ padaṃ syustato jārā rājā kapiḥ pikaḥ ityādiṣu padaviśeṣapratipattirna syāt /

GSP33brssgo1u:8173: atra vadāmaḥ - satyapi samastavarṇapratyavamarśe yathā kramānurodhinya eva pipīlikāḥ paṅ ktibuddhimārohanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:8176_0: vṛddhavyavahāre ceme varṇāḥ kramādyanugṛhītā gṛhītārthaviśeṣasaṃbandhāḥ santaḥ svavyavahāro

GSP33brssgo1u:8181: tataśca nityebhyaḥ śabdebhyo devādivyaktīnāṃ prabhava ityaviruddham // 28 //
GSP33brssgo1u:8184: vasutvādijātivācakācchabdāttajjātīyāṃ cikīrṣitāṃ vyakti buddhāvālikhya tasyāḥ prabhavanaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8190: tatra saṃnihitavācakaitacchabdo devānāṃ karaṇeṣvanugrāhakatvena saṃnihitānāṃ smārakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8193: pavitraṃ somaṃ svāntavistaraskurvatāṃ grahāṇāṃ tiraḥpavitraśabdaḥ smārakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8194: ṛ.(?).ucośnuvatāṃ stotrāṇāmāśuśabdaḥ stotrānantaraṃ prayogaṃ viśatāṃ śastrāṇāṃ viśvaśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8198: sphuṭate varṇairvyajyata iti sphoṭo varṇābhivyaṅgyor'thastasya vyañjako gavādiśabdo nityastamabhipretyedamucyata iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8200_0: ekaiketi yathā ratnatattvaṃ bahubhiścākṣuṣapratyayaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāsate tathā gavādipadasphoṭo
GSP33brssgo1u:8200_1: gakārādyekaikavarṇakṛtapratyayaiḥ sphoṭaviṣayairāhitāḥ saṃskārā bījaṃ yasmin citte
