GSP33brssgo1u:8200_3: citte ekaṃ gauriti padamiti pratyayaḥ pratyakṣastadviṣayatayā spaṣṭamavabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8201: vapanānantaraṃ ta eveme keśā iti dhīrbhrāntiriti yuktam, bhedadhīvirodhāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8205: pratyuccāraṇaṃ varṇā anuvartante dhvanirvyāvartata iti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8207: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviruddhānekavyaktiṣvabhinnaṃ gotvaṃ tathā dhvaniṣu varṇā abhinnā evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8219: autpattikasūtre śabdārthayoranādyoḥ saṃbandhasyānāditvādvedasya svārthe mānāntarānapekṣatvena prāmāṇyamuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8220_1: jñātvā śabdasya saṃketaḥ puṃsā kartavya iti mānāntarāpekṣatvātprāmāṇyasya virodhaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8226: śabdasya nimittatvena brahmasahakāritvādavirodha ityāśaṅkya dvitīyaṃ kalpamutthāpayati-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8230: naca vyaktināmanityatve 'pi ghaṭatvādijātisamavāyavacchabdasaṃbandho 'pi nityaḥ syāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8232: yathā gotvādayo gavādiśabdavācyāstathā vasutvādyākṛtayo vasvādiśabdārthā na vyaktya iti pariharati-netyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8233: śabdānāṃ tadarthānāṃ jātīnāṃ ca nityatvāttatsaṃbandho 'pi nitya iti pratipādayati-nahītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8235: naca gotvāvacchedena vyaktiṣu śaktiḥ sugraheti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8237: gotvaṃ śakyatāvacchedakamiti grahāpekṣayā gotvaṃ śakyamiti lāghavāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:8243: ata eva vākyavṛttau tattvamasyādivākye bhāgalakṣaṇoktā yujyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:8246_0: kevalavyaktivacanāḥ khalu ḍitthādiśabdā arthānantarabhāvinaḥ sāṃketikāḥ gavādiśabdāstu
GSP33brssgo1u:8246_1: vyaktiprabhavahetutvena prāgevasandhīti na vyaktimātravacanāḥ sāṃketikāḥ kintu sthūlasūkṣmabhāvenānusyūtavyaktyavinābhūtasāmānyavacanā iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8250: nanu kā sā vyaktiḥ, yadanugatendratvādijātiḥ śabdārthaḥ syādityata āha-ākṛtiviśeṣastviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8261: asṛgrudhiraṃ tatpradhāne dehe ramanta iti asṛgrā manuṣyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8263: pavitraṃ somaṃ svāntastiraskurvatāṃ grahāṇāṃ tiraḥ pavitraśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8268: sa prajāpatirmanasā vācaṃ trayīṃ mithunaṃ samabhavat manovāgrūpaṃ mithunaṃ saṃbhāvitavān /
GSP33brssgo1u:8278: tatra varṇānāmanityatvātsphoṭasya cāsattvānna jagaddhetutvamityākṣepe dvitīyapakṣaṃ vaiyākaraṇo gṛhṇāti-sphoṭamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8279: sphuṭyate varṇairvyajyata iti sphoṭovarṇābhivyaṅgyor'thastasya vyañjako gavādiśabdo nityastamabhipretyedamucyata iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8281: so 'yaṃ gakāra iti pratyabhijñayā varṇanityatvasiddhernānupapattirityata āha-utpanneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8282: tāratvamandratvādiviruddhadharmavattvena tāro gakāro mandro gakāra iti pratīyamānagakārasya bhedānumānātpratyabhijñāgatvajātiviṣayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8283: nanu viruddhadharmajñānaṃ dhvanyupādhikaṃ bhrama ityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8284: tathāca varṇānāmanityatvānna jagaddhetutvamiti bhāvaḥ kiñca teṣāmarthabodhakatvāyogātsphoṭo 'ṅgīkārya ityāha-naca varṇebhya ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8286: tarhi varṇānāṃ samudāyo bodhaka ityāśaṅkya kṣaṇikānāṃ sa nāstītyāha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8287: varṇānāṃ svataḥ sāhityābhāve 'pi saṃskāralakṣaṇāpūrvadvārā sāhityamāgneyādiyāgānāmiveti śaṅkate-pūrveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8288: kimayaṃ saṃskāro varṇairjanito 'pūrvākhyaḥ kaścit, uta varṇānubhavajanito bhāvanākhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8295: dvitīye kiṃ pratyakṣeṇa jñāta uta kāryaliṅgena /
GSP33brssgo1u:8298: kāryamarthadhīstasyāṃ jātāyāṃ saṃskārapratyayaḥ tasmiñjāte seti parasparāśrayeṇa dūṣayati-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8299: padārthasmaraṇasyāpi padajñānāntarabhāvitvāttena saṃskārasahitāntyavarṇātmakapadasya jñānaṃ na yuktamityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8309: sphoṭe 'pi kiṃ mānamityāśaṅkyaikaṃ padamiti pratyakṣapramāṇamityāha-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8310_0: yathā ratnatattvaṃ bahubhiścākṣuṣapratyayaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāsate tathā gavādipadasphoṭo
GSP33brssgo1u:8310_1: gakāradyekaikavarṇakṛtapratyayaiḥ sphoṭaviṣayairāhitāḥ saṃskārā bījaṃ yasmin citte
GSP33brssgo1u:8310_3: citte ekaṃ gauritipadamiti pratyayaḥ pratyakṣastadviṣayatayā spaṣṭamavabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8313: yena varṇāntaravaiyarthyaṃ kintu ratnavadbahupratyayasaṃskṛte citte samyaksphoṭābhivyaktirityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8317: nanu tadevedaṃ padamiti pratyabhijñā bhramaḥ, udāttādibhedapratyayādityata āha-bhedeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8321: vapanānantaraṃ ta eveme keśā iti dhīrbhrāntiriti yuktaṃ, bhedadhīvirodhāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8322: sa evāyaṃ varṇa iti dhīstu pramaiva, bādhakābhāvādityāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8325: yattvayā pītaṃ jalaṃ tadeva mayā pītamityādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:8326: na tatheha vyaktibhedaḥ siddha iti pariharati-na /
GSP33brssgo1u:8336: astu tarhi pratyayadvayaprāmāṇyāya bhedābhedayoḥ satyatvaṃ, tatrāha-kathaṃ hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8338: nanu vāyusaṃyogāderatīndriyatvānna tadgatavaicitryasyodāttatvādervarṇeṣu pratyakṣāropaḥ saṃbhavatītyaruciṃ vadiṣyansvamatamāha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8346: pratyuccāraṇaṃ varṇā anuvartante dhvanirvyāvartata iti bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8347: anyathā vācike jape varṇeṣvavyakteṣu dhvanibuddhiḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:8348: dundubhyādidhvanau śabdatvamātreṇa gṛhyamāṇe ayamavyakto varṇa iti dhīḥ syāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8349: evaṃ dhvanyupādhikatve svamate guṇaṃ vadanvāyūpādhikatve pūrvoktāmaruciṃ darśayati-evañcetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8353: evaṃ viruddhadharmakadhvanīnāṃ bhede 'pi na teṣvanugatā varṇā bhidyanta ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8355: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviruddhānekavyaktiṣvabhinnaṃ gotvaṃ tathā dhvaniṣu varṇā abhinnā evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8358: yadvā udāttatvādibhedaviśiṣṭatayā pratyabhijñāyamānatvādvarṇānāṃ bheda ityāśaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntena nirasyati-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8359: varṇānāṃ sthāyitvaṃ prasādhya teṣāmeva vācakatvaṃ vaktuṃ sphoṭaṃ vighaṭayati-varṇebhyaśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8361: cakṣuṣā darpaṇayuktāyāṃ buddhau mukhavacchrotreṇa varṇayuktāyāṃ buddhau vinaiva hetvantaraṃ sphoṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityāha-jhaṭitīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8362: yasyāṃ saṃvidi yor'tho bhāsate sā tatra pramāṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8363: ekapadamiti buddhau varṇā eva sphuranti nātiriktasphoṭa iti na sā sphoṭe pramāṇamityāha--na /
GSP33brssgo1u:8365: nanu gopadabuddheḥ sphoṭo viṣayo gakārādīnāṃ tu vyañjakatvādanuvṛttirityata āha--yadi hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8369: nanu tatraikadeśādirūpādhirasti, prakṛte ka upādhirityata āha--yā tviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8374: uttamavṛddhoktānām varṇānāṃ krameṇāntyavarṇaśravaṇānantaraṃ bālasyaikasmṛtyārūḍhānāṃ madhyamavṛddhasya pravṛttyādiliṅgānumitaikārthadhīhetutvaniścaye satyekapadavākyatvaniścayāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8377: nanu nityavibhūnāṃ varṇānāṃ kathaṃ kramaḥ kathaṃ vā padatvajñānenārthadhīhetutvaṃ, tatrāha-vṛddheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8378_1: etatkramaitatsaṃkhyāvanta etadarthaśaktā iti gṛhītāḥ santaḥ śrotuḥ pravṛttikāle tathaiva
GSP33brssgo1u:8382: sthirāṇi gatyādisāmānyāni kramaviśeṣavanti gṛhītasaṃgatikānyarthabodhakānīti kḷpteṣu sāmānyeṣu prakriyā saṃcārayitavyā na tvakḷptaḥ sphoṭaḥ kalpanīya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8388_0: svatantrasya karturasmaraṇādibhiḥ sthite vedasya nityatve devādivyaktiprabhavābhyupagamena
GSP33brssgo1u:8388_1: tasya virodhamāśaṅkya 'ataḥ prabhavāt' iti parihṛtyedānīṃ tadeva vedanityatvaṃ sthitaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8389: ata eva niyatākṛterdevāderjagato vedaśabdaprabhavatvādvedaśabde nityatvamapi pratyetavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8396: yajñena pūrvasukṛtena karmaṇā vāco vedasya padavīyaṃ mārgayogyatāṃ grahaṇayogyatāṃ āyannāptavantaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8397: tataḥstāṃ vācamṛṣiṣu praviṣṭāṃ vidyamānāṃ anvavindannanulabdhavanto yājñikā itiyāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:8401_0: pūrvatantrasiddhameva vedasya nityatvaṃ devādivyaktisṛṣṭau tadvācakaśabdasyāpi sṛṣṭerasiddhamityāśaṅkya
GSP33brssgo1u:8402: yajñena pūrvasukṛtena vāco vedasya lābhayogyatāṃ prāptāḥ santo yājñikāstāmṛṣiṣu sthitāṃ labdhavanta iti mantrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8410: yadi paśvādivyaktivaddevādivyaktayo 'pi saṃtatyaivotpadyerannirudhyeraṃśca tato 'bhidhānābhidheyābhidhātṛvyavahārāvicchedātsaṃbandhanityatvena virodhaḥ śabde parihriyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:8411: yadā tu khalu sakalaṃ trailokyaṃ parityaktanāmarūpaṃ nirlepaṃ pralīyate prabhavati cābhinavamiti śrutismṛtivādā vadanti tadā kathamavirodha iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8413: pratipādayiṣyati cācāryaḥ saṃsārasyānāditvaṃ - 'upapadyate cāpyupalabhyate' ca (bra. 2.1.36) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8414: anādau ca saṃsāre yathā svāpaprabodhayoḥ pralayaprabhavaśravaṇe 'pi pūrvaprabodhavaduktaprabodhe 'pi vyavahārānna kaścidvirodhaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8416_0: svāpaprabodhayośca pralayaprabhavau śrūyete- 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa
GSP33brssgo1u:8416_1: evaikadhā bhavati tadenaṃ vāksarvairnābhiḥ sahāpyeti cakṣuḥ sarvai rūpaiḥ sahāpyeti
GSP33brssgo1u:8416_2: śrotraṃ sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ sahāpyeti manaḥ sarvairdhyānaiḥ sahāphayeti sa yadā pratibudhyate
GSP33brssgo1u:8416_3: yathāgnerjjvalataḥ sarvā diśo visphuliṅgā vipratiṣṭherannevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve
GSP33brssgo1u:8416_4: prāṇā yathātanaṃ vipratiṣṭante prāṇebhyo devā devebhyo lokāḥ (kau. 3.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8421: satyapi sarvavyavahārocchedini mahāpralaye parameśvarānugrahādīśvarāṇāṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ kalpāntaravyavahārānusaṃdhānopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8422: yadyapi prākṛtāḥ prāṇino na janmāntaravyavahāramanusamadadhānā dṛśyanta iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:8424: tathāhi prāṇitvāviśeṣe 'pi manuṣyādistambaparyanteṣu jñānaiśvaryādipratibandhaḥ pareṇa pareṇa bhūyānbhavandṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:8425: tathā manuṣyādistambaparyanteṣu hiraṇyagarbhaparyanteṣu jñānaiśvaryādyabhivyaktirapi pareṇa pareṇa bhūyasī bhavatītyetacchrutismṛtivādeṣvasakṛdanuśrūyamāṇaṃ na śakyaṃ vaditum /
GSP33brssgo1u:8427: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'yo brahmaṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃśca prahiṇoti tasmai /
GSP33brssgo1u:8428: taṃ ha devamātmabuddhiprakāśaṃ mumukṣurvai śaraṇamahaṃ prapadye' (śve, 6.18) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8431_1: mantreṇa yajayati vādhyāpayati vā sthāṇuṃ vacrchati gartaṃ vā pratipadyate'' (sarvānu. pari.)
GSP33brssgo1u:8432: ityupakramya tasmādetāni mantre mantre vidyāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8435: dṛṣṭānuśravikasukhaduḥkhaviṣayau ca rāgadveṣau bhavato na vilakṣaṇaviṣayāvityato dharmādharmaphalabhūtottarā sṛṣṭirniṣpadyamānā pūrvasṛṣṭisadṛśyeva niṣpadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8436: smṛtiśca bhavati- 'teṣāṃ ye yāni karmāṇi prāksṛṣṭyāṃ pratipedire /
GSP33brssgo1u:8437: tānyeva te prapadyante sṛjyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ //
GSP33brssgo1u:8449: ataśca sarvakalpānāṃ tulyavyavahāratvātkalpāntavyavahārānusaṃdhānakṣamatvācceśvarāṇāṃ samānanāmarūpā eva pratisargaṃ viśeṣāḥ prādurbhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8451: samānanāmarūpatāṃ ca śrutismṛtī darśayataḥ - 'sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvamakalpayat /
GSP33brssgo1u:8452: divaṃ ca pṛthivī cāntarikṣamatho svaḥ' (ṛ.saṃ. 10. 190.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8453: yathā pūrvasminkalpe sūryācandramaḥprabhṛti jagatkḷptaṃ tathāsminnapi kalpe parameśvaro 'kalpayadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8456: iti nakṣatreṣṭividhau yo 'gnirniravapadyasmai vāgnaye niravapattayoḥ samānanāmarūpatāṃ darśayatītyevañjātīyakā śrutirihodāhartavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8460: dṛśyante tāni tānyeva tathā bhāvā yugādiṣu //
GSP33brssgo1u:8468: prāṇaḥ paramātmā tatra jīva ekībhavati enaṃ prāṇaṃ sa jīvaḥ tadaitīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8473: ṛgvedo daśamaṇḍalātmakaḥ maṇḍalānāṃ daśatayamātrāstīti tatra bhavā ṛco dāśatayyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8482: nakṣatrabahutvādbahuvacanam kṛttikādevāyāgnaye, aṣṭasu kapāleṣu pacanīyaṃ havirniruptavān /
GSP33brssgo1u:8491: vyavahārāvicchedājjñāyate ceti vedasyānapekṣatvena prāmāṇye na kaścidvirodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8492: nirlepalaye tu saṃbandhanāśāt punaḥ sṛṣṭau kenacitpuṃsā saṃketaḥ kartavya iti puruṣabuddhisāpekṣatvena vedasyāprāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8495: tathāca saṃskārātmanā śabdārthatatsaṃbandhānāṃ satāmeva punaḥ sṛṣṭāvabhivyakternānityatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8497: viṣamasṛṣṭau hi saṃketāpekṣā na tulyasṛṣṭāviti pariharati-tatredamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8500: nanvastvanādisaṃsāre saṃbandhasyānāditvaṃ tathāpi mahāpralayavyavadhānādasmaraṇe kathaṃ vedārthavyavahāraḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8504: atha tadā suṣuptau prāṇe paramātmani jīva ekībhavati enaṃ prāṇaṃ sa jīvaḥ tadaitīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8508: svapnavatkalpitasyājñātasattvābhāvāt darśanaṃ sṛṣṭiḥ adarśanaṃ laya iti dṛṣṭisṛṣṭipakṣaḥ śrutyabhipreta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8513: iti yadyapi tathāpi na prākṛtavaditi yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8515: bādhābhāvāditi nyāyānugṛhītaśrutyādibhiḥ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānaṃ bādhyamityāha-yathā hītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8516: nanu tathāpi pūrvakalpeśvarāṇāṃ muktatvādasminkalpe ko 'nusaṃdhātetyata āha-tataśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8520_0: pūrvaṃ kalpādau sṛjati tasmai brahmaṇe prahiṇoti gamayati tasya buddhau vedānāvirbhāvayati
GSP33brssgo1u:8520_1: yastaṃ devaṃ svātmākāraṃ mahāvākyotthabuddhau prakāśamānaṃ śaraṇaṃ paramamabhayasthānaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8521: na kevalamekasyaiva jñānātiśayaḥ kintu bahūnāṃ śākhādraṣṭṛṇāmiti viśvāsārthamāha-smarantīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8523: vedāntare 'pi kāṇḍasūktamantrāṇāṃ draṣṭāro baudhāyanādibhiḥ smṛtā ityāha-pratīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8531: tathāca jñānādhikaiḥ kalpāntaritaṃ vedaṃ smṛtvā vyavahārasya pravartitatvādvedasyānāditvamanapekṣatvaṃ cāvirūddhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8542: karmaṇi vihitaniṣiddhatvākāreṇāpūrvaṃ, kriyātvena saṃskāraṃ ca janayanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8547: sa eva svabhāvaḥ prakṛtirvāsaneti ca gīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8548: evaṃ karmaṇāṃ sṛṣṭisādṛśyamuktvā svopādāne līnakāryasaṃskārarūpaśaktibalādapi sādṛśyamāha-pralīyamānamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8551: avidyāyāṃ līnakāryātmakasaṃskārādanyāḥ śaktayo na kalpyāḥ manābhāvādrauravācca /
GSP33brssgo1u:8553: ato 'vidyātatkāryādanyāḥ śaktayo na santi ātmāvidyaiva tacchaktiriti siddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8556: yathā suptotthitasya pūrvacakṣurjātīyameva cakṣurjāyate tacca pūrvarūpajātīyameva rūpaṃ gṛhṇāti na rasādikaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8557: evaṃ bhogya lokā bhogāśrayāḥ prāṇinikāyā bhogahetukarmāṇi saṃskārabalātpūrvalokāditulyānyeveti niyama ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8567: bhāvidṛṣṭyā yajamāno 'gniḥ annādo 'ragnirahaṃ syāmiti kāmayitvā kṛttikānakṣatrābhimānidevāyāgnaye aṣṭasu kapāleṣu pacanīyaṃ havirniruptavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8569: jhrnanu yajamāno 'gnirbhāvī uddeśyāgninā samānanāmarūpaḥ kalpāntare bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8570: evaṃ 'rudro vā akāmayata''viṣṇurvā akāmayata'ityatrāpi tathā vaktavyaṃ, tadayuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8578: tasmājjanmanāśavadvigrahāṅgīkāre 'pi karmaṇi śabde ca virodhābhāvāddevānāmasti vidyādhikāra iti sthitam //30//
GSP33brssgo1u:8583: iha devādīnāmapi brahmavidyāyāmastyadhikāra iti yatpratijñātaṃ tatparyāvartyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8590: 'asau vā ādityo devamadhu' (chā. 3.1.1) ityatra manuṣyā ādityaṃ madhvadhyāsenopasīran /
GSP33brssgo1u:8592_0: punaścādityavyapāśrayāṇi pañca rohitādīnyamṛtānyupakramya vasavo rudrā ādityā marutaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8592_1: sādhyāśca pañca devagaṇāḥ krameṇa tattatamṛtamupajīvantītyupadiśya 'sa ya etadevamamṛtaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8592_2: veda vasūnāmevaiko bhūtvāgninaiva mukhenaitadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati' ityādinā vasvādyupajīvyānyamṛtāni
GSP33brssgo1u:8595: 'tathā agniḥ pādo vāyuḥ pāda ādityaḥ pādo diśaḥ pādaḥ' (chā. 3.18.2)
GSP33brssgo1u:8598: ityādiṣu devatātmopāsaneṣu na teṣāmeva devatātmānamadhikāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8603: pañceti caturvedokarmāṇi praṇavaścati pañca kusumāni tebhyaḥ somājyādidravyāṇi hutāni rohitādīni lohitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8612: dyulokākhyavaṃśadaṇḍe antarikṣarūpe madhvapūpe sthita ādityo devānāṃ modanānmadhviva madhvityāropya dhyānaṃ kāryam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8614: astu vasvādīnāṃ tatrādhikāra ityāśaṅkya teṣāmapi tatra dhyeyatvātprāpyatvācca na dhyātṛtvamityāha-punaśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8616_0: tebhyaḥ somājyādidravyāṇi hutāni lohitaśuklakṛṣṇaparaḥ kṛṣṇagopyākhyāni pañcāmṛtāni
GSP33brssgo1u:8622: ekā vāgiti saptasvindriyeṣu śiraścamasatīrastheṣu saptarṣidhyānaṃ kāryamityāha-tathemāveveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8634: yadidaṃ jyotirmaṇḍalaṃ dyusthānamahorātrābhyāṃ bambhramajjagadavabhāsayati tasminnādityādayo devatāvacanāḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:8636: naca jyotirmaṇḍalasya hṛdayādinā vigraheṣu cetanayārthitvādinā vā yogo 'vagantuṃ śakyate mṛtādivadacetanatvāvagamāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8642: pratyakṣādibhya eva hyavicāritaviśeṣebhyaḥ pramāṇebhyaḥ prasiddhyanartho lokātprasidhyatītyucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8645: arthavādā api vidhinaikavākyatvātstutyarthāḥ santo na pārthagarthyena devādīnāṃ vigrahādisadbhāve kāraṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:8646: mantrā api śrutyādiviniyuktāḥ prayogasamavāyino 'bhidhānārthā na kasyacidarthasya pramāṇamityācakṣate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8656: kiñca vigrahābhāvāddevādīnāṃ na kvāpyadhikāra ityāha-jyotiṣi bhāvācceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8657: ādityaḥ sūryaścandraḥ śukro 'ṅgāraka ityādiśabdānāṃ jyotiḥpiṇḍeṣu prayogasya bhāvātsattvānna vigrahavāndevaḥ kaścidastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8670: vigraho haviṣāṃ bhoga aiśvaryaṃ ca prasannatā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8676: vrīhyādivadprayogavidhigṛhītā mantrāḥ prayogasaṃbanddhābhidhānārthā nājñātavigrahādiparā iti mīmāṃsakā ācakṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8684: yadyapi madhvādividyāsu devatādivyāmiśrāsvāsaṃbhavo 'dhikārasya tathāpyasti hi śuddhāyāṃ brahmavidyāyāṃ saṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8687: manuṣyāṇāmapi na sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ sarveṣu rājasūyādiṣvadhikāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8689: brahmavidyāṃ ca prakṛtya bhavati darśanaṃ śrautaṃ devādyadhikārasya sūcakam- 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavattatharṣīṇāṃ tathā manuṣyāṇām' (bṛ. 1.4.10) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8690: 'te hocurhanta tamātmānamanvicchāmo yamātmānamanviṣya sarvāṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāṃśca kāmān' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8691: 'indro ha vai devānāmabhipravrāja virocana'surāṇām' (chā. 8.7.2) ityādi ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:8694: atra brūmaḥ jyotirādiviṣayā api ādityādayo devatāvacanāḥ śabdāścetanāvantamaiśvaryādyupetaṃ taṃ taṃ devatātmānaṃ samarpayanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:8696: asti hyaiśvaryayogāddevatānāṃ jyotirādyātmabhiścāvasthātuṃ yatheṣṭaṃ ca taṃ taṃ vigrahaṃ grahītuṃ sāmarthyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8698: 'medhātithiṃ ha kāṇvāyanamindro meṣo bhūtvā jahāra' (ṣaḍviṃśa. brā. 1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8699: smaryate ca- 'ādityaḥ puruṣo bhūtvā kuntīmupajagāma ha' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8704: atra brūmaḥ - pratyayāpratyayau hi sadbhāvāsadbhāvayoḥ kāraṇaṃ, nānyarthatvamananyārthatvaṃ vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8705: tathāhyanyārthamapi prasthitaḥ pathi patitaṃ tṛṇaparṇādyastītyeva pratipadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8707: tatra hi tṛṇaparṇādiviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pravṛttamasti yena tadastitvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8708: atra punarvidhyuddeśaikavākyabhāvena stutyarther'thavādena pārthagarthyena vṛttāntaviṣayā pravṛttiḥ śakyādhyavasātum /
GSP33brssgo1u:8709: nahi 'na surāṃ pibet' iti nañvati vākye padatrayasaṃbandhātsurāpānapratiṣedha evaikor'tho 'vagamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8713: vidhyuddeśārthavādayostvarthavādasthāni padāni pṛthaganvayavṛttāntaviṣayaṃ pratipadyānantaraṃ kaimarthyavaśena kāmaṃ vidheḥ stāvakatvaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:8714: yathāhi- 'vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta bhūtikāmaḥ' ityatra vidhyuddeśavartināṃ vāyavyādipadānāṃ vidhinā saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8715: naivaṃ 'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati' ityeṣāmarthavādagatānāṃ padānām /
GSP33brssgo1u:8716: nahi bhavati vāyurvā ālabheteti kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vā ālabhetetyādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:8717: vāyusvabhāvasaṃkīrtanena tvavāntaramanvayaṃ pratipadyaivaṃ viśiṣṭadaivatyamidaṃ karmeti vidhiṃ stuvanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8718: tadyatra so 'vāntaravākyārthaḥ pramāṇāntaragocaro bhavati tatra tadanuvādenarthavādaḥ pravartate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8720: yatra tu tadubhayaṃ nāsti tatra kiṃ pramāṇāntarābhāvādguṇavādaḥ syādāhosvitpramāṇāntarāvirodhādvidyamānavāda iti pratītiśaraṇairvidyamānavāda āśrayaṇīyo na guṇavādaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8724: naca cetasyanārūḍhāyai tasyai tasyai devatāyai haviḥ pradātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8725: śrāvayati ca- 'yasyai devatāyai havirgṛhītaṃ syāttāṃ dhyāyedvaṣaṭkariṣyan' (ai.brā. 3.8.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8727: tatra yādṛśaṃ mantrārthavādayorindrādīnāṃ svarūpamavagataṃ na tattādṛśaṃ śabdapramāṇakena pratyākhyatuṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8728: itihāsapurāṇamapi vyākhyātena mārgeṇa saṃbhavanmantrārthavādamūlatvātprabhavati devatāvigrahādi sādhayitim /
GSP33brssgo1u:8731: tathāca vyāsādayo devādibhiḥ pratyakṣaṃ vyavaharantīti smaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8732: yastu brūyādidānīntanānāmiva pūrveṣāmapi nāsti devādibhirvyavahartuṃ sāmarthyamiti sa jagadvaicitryaṃ pratiṣedhet /
GSP33brssgo1u:8733: idānīmiva ca nānyadapi sārvabhaumaḥ kṣatriyo 'stīti brūyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8739: yogo 'pyaṇimādyaiśvaryarprāptiphalaḥ smaryamāṇo na śakyate sāhasamātreṇa pratyākhyātum /
GSP33brssgo1u:8740: śrutiśca yogamāhātmyaṃ prakhyāpayati- 'pṛthivyaptejo 'nilakhe samutthite pañcātmake yogaguṇe pravṛtte /
GSP33brssgo1u:8741: na tasya rogo na jarā na mṛtyuḥ prāptasya yogāgnimayaṃ śarīram'' (śvaṃ. 2.12) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8742: ṛṣīṇāmapi mantrabrāhmaṇadarśināṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāsmadīyena sāmarthyenopamātuṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8744: lokaprasiddhirapi na sati saṃbhave nirālambanādhyavasātuṃ yuktā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8749: FN: yataḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvatrādhikāro na saṃbhavati tato na cāpodyetetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8764: yatra yasyādhikāraḥ saṃbhavati sa tatrādhikārīti nyāyastulya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8765: yataḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvatrādhikāro na saṃbhavati tato na cāpodyetatyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8766: tadbrahma yo yo devādīnāṃ madhye pratyaktvenābudhyata sa tadbrahmābhavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8768: tata indravirocanau surāsurarājau prajāpatiṃ brahmavidyāpradaṃ jagmaturiti ca liṅgamastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8769: kimatra brahmāmṛtamiti gandharvapraśne yājñavalkya uvāca tamiti mokṣadharmeṣu śrutaṃ devādīnāmadhikāraliṅgamityāha-smārtamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8770: yathā bālānāṃ golakeṣu cakṣurādipadaprayoge 'pi śāstrajñairgolakātiriktendriyāṇi svīkriyante,
GSP33brssgo1u:8771: yathā jyotirādau sūryādiśabdaprayoge 'pi vigrahavaddevatā svīkāryā ityāha-jyotirādīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8775: subrahmaṇya udgātṛgaṇastha ṛtvik tatsaṃbandhī yor'thavādaḥ 'indra, agaccha'ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8777: muniṃ meṣo bhūtvā jahāreti jñāpanārthaṃ meṣa, itīndrasaṃbodhanamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8778: yaduktamādityādayo mṛdādivadacetanā eveti, tanna, sarvatra jaḍajaḍāṃśadvayasattvādityāha-mṛditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:8779: ādityādau ko jaḍabhāgaḥ kaścetanāṃśa iti, tatrāha-jyotirādestviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8780: mantrādikaṃ padaśaktyā bhāsamānavigrahādau svārthe na pramāṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8783: anyaparādapi vākyādbādhābhāve svārtho grāhya ityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8785: tṛṇādau pratyayo 'sti vigrahādau sa nāstīti vaiṣamyaṃ śaṅkate-atrāheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8786: vidhyuddeśo vidhivākyaṃ, tadekavākyatayā praśasto vidhirityevārthavādeṣu pratyayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8792: nañpadamekaṃ yadā surāṃ pibediti padābhyāmanveti tadā padaikavākyamekamevārthānubhavaṃ karoti natu padadvayaṃ pṛthaksurāpānaṃ bodhayati,
GSP33brssgo1u:8794: arthavādastu bhūtārthasaṃsargaṃ stutidvāraṃ bodhayanvidhinā vākyaikavākyatāṃ bhajata ityasti vigrahādyanubhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8800: yatra 'vajrahastaḥ purandaraḥ'ityādau mānāntarasaṃvādavisaṃvādau na stastatra bhūtārthavāda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8805: na cobhyaparatve vākyabhedaḥ, avāntarārthasya mahāvākyārthatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8807: nanu kleśātmake karmaṇi vidhiḥ phalaṃ vinānupapanna iti bhavatu 'yanna duḥkhena saṃbhinnam'ityarthavādasiddhaḥ svargo vidhipramāṇakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8808: vigrahaṃ vinā vidheḥ kānupapattiḥ, tāmāha-na hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8809: uddiśya tyāgānupapattyā cetasyāroho 'ṅgīkārya ityatra śrutimapyāha-yasyā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8813: kiñca suprasannavigrahavaddevatāṃ tyaktvā śabdamātraṃ devateti bhaktirayuktetyāha-naca śabdeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8814: na cākṛtimātraṃ śabdaśakyamastu kiṃ vigraheṇeti vācyaṃ, nirvyaktyākṛtyayogāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8822: sarvaṃ ghaṭābhinnaṃ, vastutvāt, ghaṭavaditi jagadvaicitryaṃ nāstītyapi sa brūyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8823: tathā kṣatriyābhāvaṃ varṇāśramābhāvaṃ varṇāśramādyavyavasthāṃ ca brūyāt, niraṅkuśabuddhitvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8828_1: pṛthivyādipañcake samutthite dhāraṇayā jite yogaguṇe cāṇimādike pravṛtte yogābhivyaktaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8828_2: tejomayaṃ śarīraṃ prāptasya yogino na rogādisparśa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8832: ekameva devādīnāṃ brahmavidyādhikāre satyeva devatyaprāptidvārā kramamuktiphalānyupāsanāni yujyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:8839: śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāt tadādravaṇāt sūcyate hi | BBs_1,3.34 |
GSP33brssgo1u:8840_0: yathā manuṣyādhikāraniyamamapodya devādīnāmapi vidyāsvadhikāra uktastathaiva dvijātyadhikāraniyamāpavādena
GSP33brssgo1u:8845: yacca karmasvanadhikārakāraṇaṃ śūdrasyānagnitvaṃ na tadvidyāsvavikārasyāpavādakaṃ liṅgam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8848: saṃvargavidyāyāṃ hi jānaśrutiṃ pautrāyaṇaṃ śuśrūṣuṃ śūdraśabdena parāmṛśati- 'aha hāretvā śūdra tavaiva saha gobhirastu' (chāṃ 4.2.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8851: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ, vedādhyayanābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8861: yatpunaḥ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ śūdraśabdaśravaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ manyase, na talliṅgaṃ nyāyābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8873: kathaṃ punaḥ śūdraśabdena śugutpannā sūcyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8875: śucamabhidudrāva, śucā vābhidudruve, śucā vā raikvamabhidudrāveti śūdraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8881: hāreṇa niṣkeṇa itvāgantā ratho hāretvā saca gobhiḥ saha he śūdra,
GSP33brssgo1u:8887: yugvā gantrī śakaṭī tathā saha sthitaṃ raikvamivaitadvacanamāttha /
GSP33brssgo1u:8890: pūrvatra devādīnāmadhikārasidhyaryaṃ mantrādīnāṃ bhūtārthe vigrahādau samanvayoktyā vedāntānāmapi bhūtārthe brahmaṇi samanvayo dṛḍhīkṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8891: atrāpi śūdraśabdasya śrautasya kṣatriye samanvayoktyā sa dṛḍhīkriyata ityadhikaraṇadvayasya prāsaṅgikasyāsminsamanvayādhyāye 'ntarbhāva iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8892: pūrvapakṣe śūdrasyāpi dvijavadvedāntaśravaṇe pravṛttiḥ, siddhānte tadabhāva iti phalam //
GSP33brssgo1u:8894: sa kiṃ śūdramadhikīroti na veti saṃbhavāsaṃbhavābhyāṃ saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha-tatra śūdrasyāpītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8897: jānaśrutiḥ kila ṣaṭ śatāni gavāṃ rathaṃ ca raikāya gurave nivedya māṃ śikṣayetyuvāca /
GSP33brssgo1u:8900: hāreṇa niṣkeṇa yukta itvā gantā ratho hāretvā sa ca gobhiḥ saha he śūdra,
GSP33brssgo1u:8905: adhyayanavidhinā saṃskṛto vedastadutthamāpātajñānaṃ ca vedārthavicāreṣu śāstrīyaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tadabhāvācchūdrasyārthitvādisaṃbhavanyāyāsiddhernāsti vedāntavicārādhikāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8906: yadvādhyayanasaṃskṛtena vedena vidito niścito vedārtho yena tasya vedārtheṣu vidhiṣvadhikāro nānyasya,
GSP33brssgo1u:8919: tarhi śūdraśabdasyātra śrutasya kor'tha ityāśaṅkya sūtreṇārthamāha-śakyate cetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8920: jānaśrutirnāma rājā nidāghasamaye rātrau prāsādatale suṣvāpa,
GSP33brssgo1u:8921: tadā tadīyānnadānādiguṇagaṇatoṣitā ṛṣayo 'sya hitārthaṃ haṃsā bhūtvā mālārūpeṇa tasyoparyājagmuḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8924: kiṃ na paśyasi jānaśruterasya tejaḥ svargaṃ vyāpya sthitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8929: sayugvānaṃ yugva gantrī śakaṭī tayā saha sthitaṃ raikvamivaitadvacanamāttha /
GSP33brssgo1u:8930: raikvasya hi brahmiṣṭhasya tejo duratikramaṃ nāsyānātmajñasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8931: asmadvacanakhinno rājā śakaṭaliṅgena raikaṃ jñātvā vidyāvānbhaviṣyatīti haṃsānāmabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8935: sā śūdraśabdena raikveṇa sūcyate hīti sūtrānvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8936: śrutayaugikārthalābhe sati ananvitarūḍhyarthastyājya iti nyāyadyotanārtho hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8946: yatkāraṇaṃ prakaraṇanirūpaṇena kṣatriyatvamasyottaratra caitrarathenābhipratāriṇā kṣatriyeṇa samabhivyāhārādgamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8947_0: uttaratra hi saṃvargavidyāvākyaśeṣe caitrarathirabhipratārī kṣatriyaḥ saṃkīrtyate-
GSP33brssgo1u:8947_1: ' atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kapoyamabhipratāraṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī
GSP33brssgo1u:8949: kāpeyayogo hi citrarathasyāvagataḥ 'etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayan' (tāṇḍa.brā. 20.12.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8950: samānānvayānāṃ ca prāyeṇa samānānvayā yājakā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8952: tena kṣatriyeṇābhipratāriṇā saha samānāyāṃ vidyayāyāṃ saṃkīrtanaṃ jānaśruterapi kṣatriyatvaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8963: śunakasyāpatyaṃ kapigotraṃ purohitamabhipratārināmakaṃ rājānaṃ ca kakṣasenasyāpatyaṃ sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau tau bhoktumupaviṣṭau baṭurbhikṣitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8964: nanvasya caitrarathitvaṃ na śrutamityata āha-caitrarathitvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8965: etena dvirātreṇeti chāndogyaśrutyaiva pūrvaṃ citrarathasya kāpeyayoga uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8967: rājavaṃśyānāṃ hi prāyeṇa purohitavaṃśyā yājakā bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8970: kṣattā sūtastasya raikvānveṣaṇāya preṣaṇaṃ annagodānādikaṃ ca jānaśruteḥ kṣatriyatve liṅgam //35//
GSP33brssgo1u:8978: ' brahmaparā brahmaniṣṭhāḥ paraṃ brahmānveṣamāṇā eṣa ha vai tatsarvaṃ vakṣyatīti te ha samitpāṇayo bhagavantaṃ pippalādamupasannāḥ' (pra. 1.1) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:8982: 'na śūdro pātakaṃ kiñcinna ca saṃskāramarhati' (manu. 10.12.6) ityādibhiśca // 36 //
GSP33brssgo1u:8990: atra śūdraśabdo yaugika eveti na śūdrasyādhikāra iti sthitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8993: iha vidyāgrahaṇāṅgasyopanayanasaṃskārasya sarvatra parāmarśācchūdrasya tadabhāvānna vidyādhikāraḥ ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8998: brahmaparā vedapāragāḥ saguṇabrahmaniṣṭhāḥ paraṃ nirguṇaṃ brahmānveṣamāṇā eṣa pippalādastajjijñāsitaṃ sarvaṃ vakṣyatīti niścitya te bharadvājādayaḥ ṣaḍ ṛṣayastamupagatā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8999: nanu vaiśvānaravidyāyāmṛṣīnrājānupanīyaiva vidyāmuvāceti śruteranupanītasyāpyasti vidyādhikāra ityata āha-tānheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9000: te ha samitpāṇayaḥ pūrvāhne praticakramira iti pūrvavākye brāhmaṇā upanayanārthamāgatā iti upanayanaprāptiṃ darśayitvā niṣidhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9009: yatsatyavacanena śūdratvābhāve nirdhārite jābālaṃ gautama upanetumanuśāsituṃ ca pravavṛte 'naitadbrāhmaṇo vivaktumarhati samidhaṃ somyāharopa tvā neṣye na satyādagāḥ' (chā. 4.4.5)
GSP33brssgo1u:9013: nāhaṃ gotraṃ vedmi na mātā vetti parantu tathoktam upanayanārthamācāryaṃ gatvā satyakāmo jābālo 'smīti brūhītyanena satyavacanena /
GSP33brssgo1u:9015: taṃ mātovāca bhartṛsevāvyagratayāhamapi tava piturgotraṃ na jānāmi,
GSP33brssgo1u:9016: jabālā tu nāmāhamasmi satyakāmo nāma tvamasīti etāvajjānāmīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9017: tataḥ sa jābālo gautamamāgatya tena kiṅgotro 'sīti pṛṣṭa uvāca,
GSP33brssgo1u:9018: nāhaṃ gotraṃ vedmi na mātā vetti parantu me mātrā kathitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9026: tadarthaṃ samidhamāhareti gautamasya pravṛtteśca liṅgānna śūdrasyādhikāra ityāha-tadabhāveti //37//
GSP33brssgo1u:9035: 'padyu ha vā etacchmaśānaṃ yacchūdrastasmācchūdrasamīpe nādhyetavyam' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:9037: yasya hi samīpe 'pi nādhyetavyaṃ bhavati sa kathamaśrutamadhīyīta /
GSP33brssgo1u:9038: bhavati ca vedoccāraṇe jihvācchedo dhāraṇe śarīrabheda iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9039: ata eva cārthādarthajñānānuṣṭhānayoḥ pratiṣedho bhavati 'na śūdrasya matiṃ dadyāt' iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:9041: yeṣāṃ punaḥ pūrvakṛtasaṃskāravaśādviduradharmavyādhaprabhṛtīnāṃ jñānotpattisteṣāṃ na śakyate phalaprāptiḥ pratiṣeddhuṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9051: asya śūdrasya dvijaiḥ paṭhyamānaṃ vedaṃ pramādācchṛṇvataḥ sīsalākṣābhyāṃ taptābhyāṃ śrotradvayapūraṇaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kāryamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9059: siddhānāṃ siddherdurapahnavatve 'pi sādhakaiḥ śūdraiḥ kathaṃ jñānaṃ labdhavyamityata āha-śrāvayediti //38//
GSP33brssgo1u:9068: mahadbhayaṃ vajramudyataṃ ya etadviduramṛtāste bhavanti' (kā. 2.6.2) iti /

GSP33brssgo1u:9102_1: bhayena jano niyamena rājādiśāsane pravartata evamidamagnivāyusūryādikaṃ jagadasmādeva
GSP33brssgo1u:9102_2: brahmaṇo bibhyanniyamena svavyāpāre pravartata iti bhayānakaṃ vajropamitaṃ brahma /
GSP33brssgo1u:9109: 'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' (śve. 6.15) iti mantravarṇāt /

GSP33brssgo1u:9138: atrāpi sarvaceṣṭābhayahetutvaṃ brahmaliṅgamastīti nāsti pūrvapakṣāvasaro gatārthatvāditi,

GSP33brssgo1u:9160: 'eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate' (chā. 8.12.3) iti śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9161: tatra saṃśayyate, kiṃ jyotiḥśabdaṃ cakṣurviṣayatamopahaṃ tejaḥ kiṃvā paraṃ brahmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9167: 1.1.24) ityatra hi prakaraṇājyotiḥśabdaḥ svārthaṃ parityajya brahmaṇi vartate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9172: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - parameva brahma jyotiḥśabdam /

GSP33brssgo1u:9180: brahmabhāvāccānyatrāśarīratānupapatteḥ 'paraṃ jyotiḥ' 'sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ' (chā. 8.12.3) iti ca viśeṣaṇāt /

GSP33brssgo1u:9191: na tathātra 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā'iti prakaraṇasyānugrāhakaṃ paśyāma iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣamāha-prasiddhamevetyādinā /

GSP33brssgo1u:9197_0: 'tā vā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ'iti kaṇḍikayā nāḍīnāṃ raśmīnāṃ ca mithaḥ saṃśleṣamuktvā
GSP33brssgo1u:9197_1: atha saṃjñālopānantaraṃ yatra kāle etanmaraṇaṃ yathā syāttathotkrāmati atha tadā
GSP33brssgo1u:9199: tathaivātrāpi śarīrātsamutthāya mṛtvā paraṃ jyotirādityākhyamupasaṃpadya taddvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā svasvarūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vaktavyam /

GSP33brssgo1u:9255: bṛhadāraṇyake ṣaṣṭe prapāṭhake 'katama ātmeti yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 4.3.7)

GSP33brssgo1u:9281: tathopasaṃhāre 'pi yathopakramamevopasaṃharati- 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu' iti /

GSP33brssgo1u:9479_0: tatkiṃ pradhānaparaṃ pūrvoktaśarīraparaṃ veti smṛtiprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvamaprasiddhabrahmaparatvaṃ
