GSP33brssgo1u:9493: nanu śabdapratyabhijñāyāmartho 'pi pratyabhijñāyata ityāśaṅkya yaugikācchabdāsati niyāmake nārthaviśeṣadhīrityāha-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9494: rūḍhyā taddhīrityāśaṅkya rūḍhiḥ kiṃ laukikī smārtā vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9498: yattu smārtakramapratyabhijñayā kramikārthaḥ smārta eveti, tatrāha-naca krameti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9500: pūrvajñātarūpārthasya sthāne tadviruddhārthajñāne sati tasya dhīrnāstītyatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-na hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9503: tasya pūrvavākye ātmabuddhyormadhyasthānapaṭhitasyātrāpi madhyasthenāvyaktaśabdena grahaṇānna pradhānasya vaidikatvamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9504: smārtakramaḥ kimiti tyaktavya ityāśaṅkya śrautakramasya prakaraṇādyanugraheṇa balavattvādityāha-kuta ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9509: yadyavivekī tadā manoraśanābaddhāṃstān pravartayatīti manasaḥ pragrahatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9512: nanu svataścidātmano bhogasaṃbhavāt kiṃ rathādinetyata āha-ātmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9513: ātmā dehaḥ, dehādisaṅkakalpanayā bhoktṛtvaṃ na svato 'saṅgatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9515: śarīrasya prakṛtatve 'pyavyaktapadena pradhānaṃ gṛhyatāmityata āha-tatra ya eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9521: tato grahebhyaḥ śreṣṭhā atigrahā viṣayā iti bṛhadāraṇyake śravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9539: nanvaprakṛtā sā kathamucyate, taduktau ca pradhānena kimaparāddhamityata āha-sā ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9541: pūrvaṃ vyaṣṭibuddhyabhedenoktātra tato bhedena paratvamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9542: tarhi ratharathinau dvau pariśiṣṭau syātāṃ, netyāha-etasmiṃstviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9548: kiñca brahmātmaikatvaparatve granthe bhedavādināṃ pradhānasyāvakāśo nāstītyāha-śarīretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9550: kāṭhakagranthasyaikyatātparye gūḍhatvajñeyatvajñānahetuyogavidhaye liṅgāni santītyāha-tathā caiṣa ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9560: ata uttaramucyate- sūkṣmaṃ tviha kāraṇātmanā śarīraṃ vivakṣyate sūkṣmasyāvyaktaśabdārhatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9566: itīdameva vyākṛtanāmarūpavibhinnaṃ jagatprāgavasthāyāṃ parityaktavyākṛtanāmarūpaṃ bījaśaktyavasthamavyaktaśabdayogaṃ darśayati // 2 //
GSP33brssgo1u:9569: gobhirgovikāraiḥ payobhiḥ matsaraṃ somaṃ śrīṇīta miśritaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9570: tat ha kila tarhi prāgavasthāyāmidaṃ jagadavyākṛtaṃ avyaktamāsīt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9585: sa eva tarhi pradhānakāraṇavāda evaṃ satyāpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:9587: atrocyate- yadi vayaṃ svatantrāṃ kāñcitprāgavasthāṃ jagataḥ kāraṇatvenābhyupagacchema,
GSP33brssgo1u:9589: parameśvarādhīnā tviyamasmābhiḥ prāgavasthā jagato 'bhyupagamyate na svatantrā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9592: nahi tayā vinā parameśvarasya sraṣṭṛtvaṃ siddhayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9597: avidyātmikā hi bījaśaktiravyaktaśabdanirdeśyā parameśvarāśrayā māyāmayī mahāsuptiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9599: tadetadavyaktaṃ kvacidākāśaśabdanirdiṣṭam- 'etasminnu khalvakṣare gārgyākāśa otaśca protaśca' (bṛ. 3.8.11) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9601: kvacinmāyeti sūcitam- 'māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram' (śve. 4.10) iti mantravarṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9605: yadā tu jīvo mahāṃstadāpyavyaktādhīnatvājjīvabhāvasya mahataḥ paramavyaktamityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9607: avidyāvattvenaiva jīvasya sarvaḥ saṃvyavahāraḥ saṃtato vartate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9611: anye tu varṇayanti- dvividhaṃ hi śarīraṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:9613: sūkṣmaṃ yaduttaratra vakṣyate- 'tadantarapratipattau raṃhati saṃpariṣvaktaḥ praśnanirūpaṇābhyām' (bṛ. 3.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9620: aviśeṣeṇa śarīradvayasya pūrvatra rathatvena saṃkīrtitatvātsamānayoḥ prakṛtapariśiṣṭatvayoḥ kathaṃ sūkṣmameva śarīramiha gṛhyate na punaḥ sthūlamapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9622: āmnātaṃ cāvyaktapadaṃ sūkṣmameva pratipādayituṃ śaknoti netaradvyaktatvāttasyeti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:9625: nahīme pūrvottare āmnāte ekavākyatāmanāpadya kañcidarthaṃ pratipādayataḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9628: tatrāvaśiṣṭāyāṃ śarīradvayasya grāhyatvākāṅkṣāyāṃ yathākāṅkṣaṃ saṃbandhe 'nabhyupagamyamāna ekavākyataiva bādhitā bhavati kuta āmnātasyārthapratipattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9633: anantaranirdiṣṭatvāttu kiṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamitīdamiha vivakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9635: sarvathāpi tvānumānikanirakaraṇopapattestathā nāmāstu, na naḥ kiñcicchidyate // 3 //
GSP33brssgo1u:9645: dṛṣṭā bībhatsā ghṛṇā yasmin tasya bhāvastattā tayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9653: yannāśānmuktiḥ sā svīkāryā, tāṃ vinaiva sṛṣṭau muktānāṃ punarbandhāpatterityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9668: avyaktasya paratve 'pi śarīrasya kiṃ jātaṃ, tadāha-tacceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9674: kathaṃ tasya mahato jīvātparatvamityāśaṅkya dvitīyasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-tadadhīnatvācceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9678: avyaktapadabalāt prakṛtamapi sthūlaṃ tyajyata iti śaṅkate-āmnātasyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9680: tava mate tasyā abhāvātkutor'thabodha iti samādhatte-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9681: tāṃ vināpyarthathīḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9682: śarīraśabdena rūḍhyā sthūlaṃ prakṛtaṃ tasya hāniraprakṛtasya bhūtasūkṣmasyāvyaktapadena grahaṇamanyāyyaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9685: ākāṅkṣayā vākyaikavākyatve sati prakṛtaṃ śarīradvayamavyaktapadena grāhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9688: tadarthaṃ sūkṣmamevākāṅkṣitaṃ grāhyam;tasya sūkṣmatvenātmābhedena gṛhītasya duḥśodhatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9689: sthūlasya dṛṣṭadaurgandhyādinā laśunādivadanātmatvadhīvairāgyayoḥ sulabhatvāditi śaṅkate-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9690: dṛṣṭā bībhatsā ghṛṇā yasmin tasya bhāvastattā tayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9694: kintu vaiṣṇavaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ vivakṣitamiti taddarśanārthaṃ prakṛtaṃ sthūlamevāvyaktapadena grāhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9695: kiñca sūkṣmasya liṅgāntaḥpātina indriyādigrahaṇenaiva grahaṇānna pṛthagavyaktaśarīrapadābhyāṃ grahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9704: jñeyatvena ca sāṃkhyaiḥ pradhānaṃ smaryate guṇapuruṣāntarajñānātkaivalyamitivadbhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9705: nahi guṇasvarūpamajñātvā guṇebhyaḥ puruṣasyāntaraṃ śakyaṃ jñātumiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9712: asmākaṃ tu ratharūpakakḷptaśarīrādyanusaraṇena viṣṇoreva paramaṃ padaṃ darśayitumayamupanyāsa ityanavadyam // 4 //
GSP33brssgo1u:9715: nahi śakyamiti ca vadadbhiḥ pradhānaṃ jñeyatvena smaryata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9716: na kevalaṃ bhedapratiyogitvena pradhānasya jñeyatvaṃ tairiṣṭaṃ kintu tasyopāsanayāṇimādiprāptaye 'pītyāha-kvacicceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9718: upadiṣṭaṃ hi jñānaṃ phalavaditi jñātuṃ śakyaṃ niṣphalasyopadeśāyogādavyaktasya ca jñānānupadeśātphalavajjñānagamyatvāsiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9721: nanu śarīrasyāpi jñeyatvānukteḥ kathamiha grahaṇaṃ, tatrāha-asmākaṃ tviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9722: asmanmate viṣṇavākhyapadasyaikasyaiva jñeyatvāttaddarśanārthamavyaktapadena śarīropanyāso yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9723: sādhāraṇaśabdamātrānna pradhānasya pratyabhijñā smārtaliṅgasyānuktyā niyāmakābhāvāditi tātparyam //4//
GSP33brssgo1u:9727: vadatīti cen na prājño hi prakaraṇāt | BBs_1,4.5 |
GSP33brssgo1u:9730: śrūyate hyuttaratrāvyaktaśabdoditasya pradhānasya jñeyatvavacanam- 'aśabdamasparśamarūpamavyayaṃ tathārasaṃ nityamagandhavacca yat /
GSP33brssgo1u:9731: anādyanantaṃ mahataḥ paraṃ dhruvaṃ nicāyya taṃ mṛtyumukhātpramucyate' //
GSP33brssgo1u:9733: atra hi yādṛśaṃ śabdādihīnaṃ pradhānaṃ mahataḥ paraṃ smṛtau nirūpitaṃ tādṛśameva nicāyyatvena nirdiṣṭaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9736: atra brūmaḥ - neha pradhānaṃ nicāyyatvena nirdiṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9737: prājño hīha paramātmā nicāyyatveta nirdiṣṭaṃ iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9741: 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' ityādinirdeśāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:9742: 'eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhotmā na prakāśate' iti ca durjñātatvavacanena tasyaiva jñeyatvākāṅkṣaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9743: 'yacchedvāṅmanasī prājñaḥ' iti ca tajjñānāyaiva vāgādisaṃyamasya vihitatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9745: nahi pradhānamātraṃ nicāyya mṛtyumukhātpramucyata iti sāṃkhyairiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9757: trayāṇām eva caivam upanyāsaḥ praśnaś ca | BBs_1,4.6 |
GSP33brssgo1u:9762: tatra tāvat 'sa tvamagniṃ svargyamadhyeṣi mṛtyo prabrūhi taṃ śraddadhānāya mahyam' (kā. 1.1.13)
GSP33brssgo1u:9770: prativacanamapi 'lokādimamagniṃ tamuvāca tasmai yā iṣṭakāyāvatīrvā yathā vā' (kā. 1.1.15) ityagniviṣayam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9771: 'hanta ta idaṃ pravakṣyāmi guhyaṃ brahma sanātanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9772: yathā ca maraṇaṃ prāpya ātmā bhavati gautama /
GSP33brssgo1u:9776: 'na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit' (kā. 1.2.18) ityādibahuprapañcaṃ paramātmaviṣayam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9779: atrāha- yo 'yamātmaviṣayaḥ praśno yeyaṃ prete vicikitsā manuṣye 'stīti,
GSP33brssgo1u:9780: kiṃ sa evāyam 'anyatra dharmādanyatrādharmāt' iti punaranukṛṣyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:9783: sa evāyaṃ praśnaḥ punaranukṛṣyata iti yadyucyeta,
GSP33brssgo1u:9784: dvayorātmaviṣayayoḥ praśnayorekatāpatteragniviṣaya ātmaviṣayaśca dvāveva praśnāvityato na vaktavyaṃ trayāṇāṃ praśnopanyāsāviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9785: athānyo 'yamapūrvaḥ praśnaḥ utthāpyata ityucyeta tato yathaiva varapradānavyatirekeṇa praśnakalpanāyāmadoṣa evaṃ praśna vyatirekeṇāpi pradhānopanyāsakalpanāyāmadoṣaḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:9786: atrocyate- naivaṃ vayamiha varapradānavyatirekeṇa praśnaṃ kañcitkalpayāmo vākyopakramasāmarthyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9787: varapradānopakramā hi mṛtyunaciketaḥsaṃvādarūpā vākyapravṛttirāsamāpteḥ kaṭhavallīnāṃ lakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9788: mṛtyuḥ kila nāciketase pitrā prahitāya trīnvarānpradadau /
GSP33brssgo1u:9789: naciketāḥ kila teṣāṃ prathamena vareṇa saumanasyaṃ vavre /
GSP33brssgo1u:9793: tatra yadyanyatra dharmādityanyo 'yamapūrvaḥ praśna utthāpyeta tato varapradānavyatirekeṇāpi praśnakalpanādvākyaṃ bādhyetha /
GSP33brssgo1u:9796: yoyaṃ prete vicikitsā manuṣye 'sti nāstīti vicikitsābhidhānāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9808: iha cānyatra dharmādityasya praśnasya prativacanaṃ 'na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit' iti janmamaraṇapratiṣedhena pratipādyamānaṃ śārīraparameśvarayorabhedaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9809: sati hi prasaṅge pratiṣedho bhāgī bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9810: prasaṅgaśca janmamaraṇayoḥ śarīrasaṃsparśācchārīrasya bhavati na parameśvarasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:9812: mahāntaṃ vibhumātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati //
GSP33brssgo1u:9814: iti svapnajāgaritadṛśo jīvasyaiva mahattvavibhutvaviśeṣaṇasya mananena śokavicchedaṃ darśayanna prājñādanyo jīva iti darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9817: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9819: tathā jīvavīṣayasyāstitvanāstitvapraśnasyānantaram 'anyaṃ varaṃ naciketo vṛṇīṣva' ityārabhya mṛtyunā taistaiḥ kāmaiḥ pralobhyamāno 'pi naciketā yadā na cacāla,
GSP33brssgo1u:9820: tadainaṃ mṛtyurabhyudayanīḥśreyasavibhāgapradarśanena vidyāvidyāvibhāgapradarśanena ca 'vidyābhīpsinaṃ naciketasaṃ manye na tvā kāmā bahavo 'lolupanta' (kā.1.2.4)
GSP33brssgo1u:9821: iti praśasya praśnamapi tadīyaṃ praśaṃsanyaduvāca- 'taṃ durdarśaṃ gūḍhamanupraviṣṭhaṃ guhāhitaṃ gahvareṣṭhaṃ purāṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9822: adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti //
GSP33brssgo1u:9823: ' (kā.1.2.12) iti, tenāpi jīvaprājñayorabheda eveha vivakṣata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9824: yatpraśnanimittāṃ ca praśaṃsāṃ mahatīṃ mṛtyoḥ pratyapadyata naciketā yadi taṃ vihāya praśaṃsānantaramanyameva praśnamupakṣipedasthāna eva sā sarvā praśaṃsā prasāritā syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9825: tasmāt 'yeyaṃ prete' ityasyaiva praśnasyaitadanukarṣaṇam 'anyatra dharmāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9828_0: pūrvatra hi dehādivyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvaṃ pṛṣṭamuttaratra tu tasyaivāsaṃsāritvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:9828_1: pṛcchyata iti yāvaddhyavidyā na nivartate tāvaddharmādigocaratvaṃ jīvasya jīvatvaṃ ca na nivartate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9829: tannivṛttau tu prājña eva tattvamasīti śrutyā pratyāyyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9831: yathā kaścitsaṃtamase patitāṃ kāñcidrajjumahiṃ manyamāno bhīto vepamānaḥ palāyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:9833: sa ca tadupaśrutyāhikṛtaṃ bhayamutsṛjedvepathuṃ palāyanaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:9834: natvahibuddhikāle tadapagamakāle ca vastunaḥ kaścidviśeṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9836: tataśca 'na jāyate mriyate vā' ityevamādyapi bhavatyastitvapraśnasya prativacanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9838: ekatve 'pi hyātmaviṣayasya praśnasya prāyaṇāvasthāyāṃ dehavyatiriktāstitvamātravicikitsānātkartṛtvādisaṃsārasvabhāvānapohanācca pūrvasya paryāyasya jīvaviṣayatvamutprekṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9841: pradhānakalpanāyāṃ tu na varapradānaṃ na praśno na prativacanamiti vaiṣamyam // 6 //
GSP33brssgo1u:9843: FN: mṛtyunā naciketasaṃprati trīnvarānavṛṇīṣvetyuktestrayāṇāmeva praśno naciketasā kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9845: he mṛtyo, sa mahyaṃ dattavarastvaṃ svargahetumagnimadhyeṣi smarasi /
GSP33brssgo1u:9847: dehādanyo 'sti naveti saṃśayo.'sti ata etadātmatattvamasaṃdigdhaṃ jānīyāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9854: yena sākṣiṇā pramātā paśyati tamātmānamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9859: mṛtyunā naciketasaṃ prati trīnvarānvṛṇīṣvetyukteḥ trayāṇāmeva praśno naciketasā kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9863: he mṛtyo, sa mahyaṃ dattavarastvaṃ svargahetumagni smarasi /
GSP33brssgo1u:9869: yāḥ svarūpato yāvatīḥ saṃkhyāto yathā vā krameṇāgniścīyate tatsarvamuvācetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9870: hantedānīṃ brahma vakṣyāmīti brahmavākyena jīvapraśnādvyavahitanamapi 'yathā ca maraṇaṃ prāpya'ityādi vākyaṃ jīvaviṣayamuttaraṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9872: vākyārthastu ātmā maraṇaṃ prāpya yathā bhavati tathā vakṣyāmīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9877: evaṃ ca trayāṇāmevopanyāsaḥ praśnaśca yataḥ ato na pradhānamavyaktamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9879: ekaḥ praśnaḥ dvau praśnau veti pakṣadvaye phalitaṃ pṛcchati-kiñcāta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9882: praśnaikye sūtrāsaṃgatiḥ bhede pradhānasya śrautatvasiddhiriti pūrvavādyāha-sa evetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9888: itaḥ punaḥ martyalokaṃ prāptasya mama pitā yathāpūrvaṃ sumanāḥ syāditi prathamaṃ vavre /
GSP33brssgo1u:9889: nanu dvitīyavaro jīvavidyā tṛtīyo brahmavidyeti praśnabhedaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-yeyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9890: prete ityupakramya tṛtīyatvoktiliṅgājjīvātmavidyaiva tṛtīyo vara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9891: evaṃ vākyopakrame sati praśnāntaraṃ na yuktamityāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9892: maraṇadharmādyasparśaliṅgābhyāṃ praṣṭavyayorjīveśvarayorbhedāt praśnabhedasiddhervākyabādho yukta iti śaṅkate-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9894: na kevalaṃ praṣṭavyabhedāt praśnabhedaḥ kintu praśnavākyayoḥ sādṛśyābhāvādapītyāha-praśnacchāyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9896: kiñca brahmāpraśne janmādiniṣedhena jīvasvarūpaṃ vadan yamastayoraikyaṃ sūcayatītyāha-iha cānyatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9900: kiñca jīvo brahmābhinnaḥ, mokṣahetujñānaviṣayatvāt, brahmavadityāha-tathā svapneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9902: yena sākṣiṇā pramātā paśyati tāmātmānamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9904: kiñcābhedamuktvā bhedasya ninditatvādabheda eva satya ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9906: evamihākhaṇḍaikarase brahmaṇi yo nāneva mithyābhedaṃ paśyati sa bhedadarśī maraṇānmaraṇaṃ prāpnoti saṃsārabhayānna mucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9907: kiñca jīvapraśnānantaraṃ 'taṃ durdarśam'iti yaduttaramuvāca tenāpyuttareṇābhedo gamyata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9909: putrādikaṃ vṛṇīṣvetyukte 'pi viṣayāṃstucchīkṛtyātmajñānānna cacāla 'nānyaṃ tasmānnaciketā vṛṇīte'iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9910: tadā saṃtuṣṭo yamaḥ 'anyacchreyo 'nyadutaiva preyaḥ'iti bhogāpavargamārgayorvailakṣaṇyaṃ pratijñāya 'dūramete viparīte viṣūcī avidyā yā ca vidyā'iti darśitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9911: preyaḥ priyatamaṃ svargādikaṃ, viṣūcī viruddhaphale, avidyā karma, vidyā tattvadhīḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9913_0: yataḥ tvā tvāṃ bahavo 'pi kāmāḥ putrādayo mayā dīyamānā durlabhā api nālolupanta
GSP33brssgo1u:9913_1: lobhavantaṃ na kṛtavanta iti praṣṭāraṃ stutvā praśnamapi 'tvādṛṅgo bhūyānnaciketaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9914: iyaṃ praśaṃsā praśnabhedapakṣe na ghaṭata ityāha-yatpraśneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9915: yatpraśnena stutiṃ labdhavāṃstaṃ praśnaṃ vihāya yadyanyamevotthāpayet tarhyanavasare stutīḥ kṛtā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9920: avidyānāśānantaraṃ brahmatvaṃ cedāgantukamanityaṃ ca syādityata āha-na cāvidyāvattva iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9921: jīvasya brahmatve svābhāvike sati brahmapraśnasya yaduttaraṃ tajjīvapraśnasyāpi bhavatīti lābhaṃ darśayati-tataśca na jāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9929: yathā mahacchabdaḥ sāṃkhyaiḥ sattāmātre 'pi prathamaje prayukte na tameva vaidike 'pi prayoge 'bhidhatte /
GSP33brssgo1u:9947: 'tamasaḥ parastādi'tyādinā śokātyayatamaḥ paratvādibhyaśca mahacchabdaḥ sāṃkhyatattvaṃ nābhidhatta iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9956: mantravarṇāt- 'ajāmekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīḥ prajāḥ sṛjamānāṃ sarūpāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9957: ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo 'nyaḥ' (śve. 4.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9963: na jāyata iti cājā syāt, 'mūlaprakṛtiravikṛtiḥ' ityabhyupagamāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9966: sā tu rūḍhiriha nāśrayituṃ śakyā, vidyāprakaraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9968: tāṃ prakṛtimaja ekaḥ puruṣo juṣamāṇaḥ prīyamāṇaḥ sevamāno vānuśete /
GSP33brssgo1u:9970: anyaḥ punarajaḥ puruṣe utpannavivekajñāno virakto jahātyenāṃ prakṛtiṃ bhuktabhogāṃ kṛtabhogāpavargāṃ parityajati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9973: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nānena mantreṇa śrutimattva sāṃkhyavādasya śakyamāśrayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:9974: nahyayaṃ mantraḥ svātantryeṇa kañcidapi vādaṃ samarthayitumutsahate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9979: ityasminamantre svātantryeṇāyaṃ nāmāsau camaso 'bhipreta iti na śakyate nirūpayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:9983: tatra tu 'idaṃ tacchira eṣa hyarvāgbilaścamasa ūrdhvabudhnaḥ' iti vākyaśeṣāccamasaviśeṣapratipattirbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9988_0: ajāmekāṃ- na jāyata ityajā tāṃ mulaprakṛtiṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ rajaḥsatvamoguṇāṃ sarūpāstriguṇātmikāḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9988_1: prajā janayantīṃ eko 'jo jīvastāṃ śabdādiviṣayarūpatāpannāṃ juṣamāṇaḥ sannanuśete
GSP33brssgo1u:9989: jīvena bhukto bhogo yasyāṃ yasyā vā tāṃ jīvena bhujyamānāmanyaḥ paramātmā jahāti nāsyāmāsaktiṃ karoti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9990: avayavāḥ pradhānasya raja ādayasteṣāṃ dharmā rañjakatvādayastaiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9998_0: tatkiṃ pradhānaparaṃ māyāparaṃ veti rūḍhyarthāsaṃbhavātsaṃśaye pūrvatrāvyaktaśabdamātreṇa
GSP33brssgo1u:9999: phalaṃ pūrvapakṣe brahmaṇi samanvayāsiddhiḥ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti pūrvavaddraṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10002: avayavāḥ pradhānasya rajādayasteṣāṃ dharmā rañjakatvādayaḥ tairnimittairlohitādiśabdaiḥ pradhānamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10016: viśeṣagrahahetoḥ prakaraṇāderabhāvāditi hetuṃ vyākhyāya dṛṣṭāntaṃ vyācaṣṭe-camasavaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:10021: jyotirupakramā tu tathā hy adhīyata eke | BBs_1,4.9 |
GSP33brssgo1u:10022: parameśvarādutpannā jyotiḥpramukhā tejobannalakṣaṇā caturvidhasya bhūtagrāmasya prakṛtibhūteyamajā pratipattavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10026: tathāhyeke śākhinastejobannānāṃ parameśvarādutpattimāmnāya teṣāmeva rohitādirūpatāmāmananti- 'yadagre rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejastadrūpaṃ yacchukraṃ tadapāṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10028: rohitādīnāṃ ca śabdānāṃ rūpaviśeṣeṣu mukhyatvādbhāktatvācca guṇaviṣayatvasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:10029: asaṃdigdhena ca saṃdigdhasya nigamanaṃ nyāyyaṃ manyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:10034: vākyaśeṣe 'pi 'māyāṃ tu prakṛti vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram' iti 'yo yoniṃ yonimadhitiṣṭhatyekaḥ' (śve. 4.10,11)
GSP33brssgo1u:10035: iti ca tasyā evāvagamānna svatantrā kācitprakṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ nāmajāmantreṇāmnāyata iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo1u:10036: prakaraṇāttu saiva daivī śaktiravyākṛtanāmarūpā nāmarūpayoḥ prāgavasthānenāpi mantreṇāmnāyata ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10040: te brahmavādino 'nayā rītyā vimṛśya dyānayogenānugatāḥ paramātmānamanu praviṣṭāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10041: avidyāśaktiryoniḥ sā ca pratijīvaṃ nānetyuktamato vīpsopapannā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10048: kiñca lohitādiśabdairapi dravyalakṣaṇā nyāyyā avyavadhānāt na tu rañjanīyatvādiguṇavyavahitā sattvādiguṇalakṣaṇetyāha-lohitādīnāṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10049: nanu śākhāntareṇa śākhāntarasthamantrasya nirṇayaḥ kathamityata āha-asaṃdigdheneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10051: yathā śākhāntaravākyānna pradhānagrahastathehāpi śvetāśvataropaniṣadi māyāprakaraṇānna tadbrahma ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10053_0: brahmavādino dhyānākhyayogena paramātmānamanupraviṣṭāḥ santaḥ tatraiva devasyātmabhūtāmaikyenādhyastāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10053_1: śaktiṃ paratantrāṃ māyāṃ sattvādiguṇavatīṃ brahmaṇaḥ sahāyamapaśyannityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10054: māyāyā ekatve 'pi tadaṃśānāṃ jīvopādhīnāṃ tattasaṃghātayonīnāmavidyākhyānāṃ bhedādvīpsā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10063: kathaṃ punastejobannātmanā trairūpyeṇa trirūpājā pratipattuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10072: yathāhi loke yadṛcchayā kācidajā rohitaśuklakṛṣṇaṇavarṇā syādbahubarkarā sarūpabarkarā ca tāṃ ca kaścidajo juṣamāṇo 'nuśayīta,
GSP33brssgo1u:10074: evamiyamapi tejobannalakṣaṇā bhūtaprakṛtistrivarṇā bahu sarūpaṃ carācaralakṣaṇaṃ vikārajātaṃ janayati aviduṣā ca kṣetrajñenopabhujyate viduṣā ta parityajata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10075: nacedamāśaṅkitavyamekaḥ kṣetrajño 'nuśete 'nyo jahātītyataḥ kṣetrajñabhedaḥ pāramārthikaḥ pareṣāmiṣṭaḥ prāpnotīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10079: 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī sarvabhūtāntarātmā' ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10084: ityevañjātīyakaṃ kalpyate, evamidamanajāyā ajātvaṃ kalpyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10091: kiṃ tejobannetvajāśabdo rūḍho, na jāyata iti yaugiko vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10105: naca yogasya mukhyavṛttitvāttena pradhānagraho nyāyya iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10108: tathāca rohitādiśabdasamabhivyāhārānugṛhītayā rūḍhyāśritayā guṇavṛttyā pradhāne yogaṃ bādhitvāvāntaraprakṛtirajāśabdena grāhya,
GSP33brssgo1u:10109: yathā madhvādiśabdaiḥ prasiddhamadhvādyāśritaguṇalakṣaṇaya ādityādayo gṛhyante tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:10115: na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi nānābhāvād atirekāc ca | BBs_1,4.11 |
GSP33brssgo1u:10119: asminmantre pañca pañcajanā iti pañcasaṃkhyāviṣayāparā pañcasaṃkhyā śrūyate pañcadvayaśabdadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10121: tathā pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā yāvantaḥ saṃkhyeyā ākāṅkṣyantelatāvantyeva ca tattvāni sāṃkhyaiḥ saṃkhyāyante- 'mūlaprakṛtiravikṛtirmahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ sapta /
GSP33brssgo1u:10122: ṣoḍaśakaśca vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ' (sāṃkhyakā. 3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10123: tayā śrutiprasiddhayā pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā teṣāṃ smṛtiprasiddhānāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānāmupasaṃgrahātprāptaṃ punaḥ śrutimattvameva pradhānādīnām /
GSP33brssgo1u:10124: tato brūmaḥ - na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi pradhānādīnāṃ śrutimattvaṃ pratyāśā kartavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10129: yena pañcaviṃśaterantarāle parāḥ pañca pañcasaṃkhyā niveśeran /
GSP33brssgo1u:10132: yathā 'pañca sapta ca varṣāṇi na vavarṣa śatakratuḥ' iti dvādaśavārṣikīmanāvṛṣṭiṃ kathayanti tadvaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:10135: paraścātra pañcaśabdo janaśabdena samastaḥ pañcajanā iti, pāribhāṣikeṇa svareṇaikapadatvaniścayāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10140: naca pañcasaṃkhyāyā ekasyāḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā parayā viśeṣaṇaṃ pañca pañcakā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10142: nanvāpannapañcasaṃkhyakā janā eva punaḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā viśeṣyamāṇāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ pratyeṣyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:10143: yathā pañca pañcapūlya iti pañcavaṃśatipūlāḥ pratīyante tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:10145: yuktaṃ yatpañcapūlīśabdasya samāhārābhiprāyatvātkatīti satyāṃ bhedākāṅkṣāyāṃ pañca pañcapūlya iti viśeṣaṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10146: iha tu pañca pañca janā ityādita eva bhedopādānātkatītyasatyāṃ bhedākāṅkṣāyāṃ na pañca pañcajanā iti viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo1u:10147: bhavadapīdaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ pañcasaṃkhyāyā eva bhavet, tatra cokto doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10155: sa ca pañcaviṃśatāvantargata eveti na tasyaivādhāratvamādheyatvaṃ ca yujyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10157: tathā 'ākāśaśca pratiṣṭhitaḥ' ityākāśasyāpi pañcaviṃśatavantargatasya na pṛthagupādānaṃ nyāyyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10159: kathaṃ ca saṃkhyāmātraśravaṇe satyaśrutānāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānāmupasaṃgrahaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10164: iti viśeṣaṇasmaraṇātsaṃjñāyāmeva pañcaśabdasya janaśabdena samāsaḥ tataśca rūḍhatvābhiprāyeṇaiva kecitpañcajanā nāma vivakṣyante na sāṃkhyatattvābhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:10166: pañcajanā nāma ye kecitte ca pañcaivetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10181_0: pañcajanaśabdaḥ sāṃkhyatattvaparo 'nyaparo veti yogarūḍhyoraniścayāt saṃśaye yathā
GSP33brssgo1u:10184: tatra catvāraḥ sūtraṃ annaṃ virāṭ tayoḥ kāraṇamavyākṛtamākāśaśca yasminnadhyastāstamevātmānamamṛtaṃ brahma manye /
GSP33brssgo1u:10186: nanvastu pañcatvaśiṣṭeṣu pañcajaneṣu punaḥ pañcatvānvayāt pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāpratītiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10187: tāvatā kathaṃ sāṃkhyatattvagraha ityāśaṅkya saṃkhyāyā dharmyākāṅkṣāyāṃ tattvāni grāhyāṇītyāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10192: ahaṅkārastāmasaḥ pañcatanmātrāṇāṃ śabdādīnāṃ prakṛtiḥ, sāttvika ekādaśendriyāṇām /
GSP33brssgo1u:10193: pañca tanmātrāśca pañcānāṃ sthūlabhūtānāmākāśādīnāṃ prakṛtayaḥ pañca sthūlabhūtānyekādaśendriyāṇi ceti ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyāko gaṇo vikāra eva na prakṛtiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10198: pañcsu pañcasu sādhāraṇasyetarapañcakāddhyāvṛttasya dharmasyābhāvo 'tra nānātvaṃ vivakṣitamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10199: yadyapi jñānakarmendriyeṣu daśasu jñānakaraṇatvaṃ karmakaraṇatvaṃ ca pañcakadvaye 'sti,
GSP33brssgo1u:10201: tathāpi yasminnityātmana ākāśasya ca pṛthagukteḥ sattvarajastamomahadahaṅkārāḥ pañca kartavyāḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10208: yathā dvāvaśvinau saptarṣayo 'ṣṭau vasavaśceti saptadaśetyatrāśvitvādikamādāya dvitvādayaḥ praviśantiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10210: pañcaśabdadvayena svavācyanyūnasaṃkhyādvāreṇa tadvyāpyā mahāsaṃkhyaiva lakṣyata iti sadṛṣṭāntaṃ śaṅkate-atheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10211: mukhyārthasya vakṣyamāṇatvāllakṣaṇā na yukteti pariharati-tadapi neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10218: tathāca na dvitīyapañcaśabdajanaśabdayoḥ samāsaṃ vināntyasyākārasyodāttatvaṃ pūrveṣāmanudāttatatvaṃ ca ghaṭate 'samāsasya'iti sūtreṇa samāsasyāntodāttavidhānāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10219_0: 'anudāttaṃ padamekavarjam'iti ca sūtreṇa yasminpade udāttaḥ svarito vā yasya varṇasya
GSP33brssgo1u:10219_1: vidhīyate tamekaṃ varjayitvāvaśiṣṭaṃ tatpadamanudāttaṃ bhavatīti vidhānādeva māntrikāntodāttasvareṇaikapadatvaniścayaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10219_3: yo mantradaśāyāmanudāttaḥ svarito vā sa brāhmaṇadaśāyāmudātto bhavatītyapavāda āśritaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10222: tathā cāntyanakārāduparitana ākāra ākāśaścetyanena śliṣṭatayā paṭhyamāno 'nudātto bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:10226: antānudāttaṃ hi samāmnātāraḥ pañcajanaśabdamadhīyata iti pāṭhakaprasiddhirasiddheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10227: tathā ca pañca pañcajanā iti māntrikāntodāttaḥ svaraḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10228: yasmin pañca pañcajanā ityantānudātto brāhnasvara iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10232: tvā tvāṃ pañcānāṃ pañcajanānāṃ devaviśeṣāṇāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi ityājyagrahaṇamantraśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10233: devatānāṃ karmaṇi yantradavasthitaṃ śarīraṃ tadeva dhartraṃ ihāmitrabhogādhāraṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10237: janapañcakamekaṃ pañcakānāṃ pañcakaṃ dvitīyamiti pañcakadvayaṃ tasya pañcapañceti grahaṇaṃ netyakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10250: pañcānāṃ pūlānāṃ samāhārā ityatra 'saṃkhyāpūrvo dviguḥ'iti samāso vihitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10251: tato 'dvigoḥ'iti sūtreṇa ṅīpo vidhānāt samāhārapratītau samāhārāḥ katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāṃ pañcetipadāntarānvayo yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10252: pañcajanā ityatra tu ṅībantatvābhāvena samāhārasyāpratīteḥ janānāṃ cādita eva pañcatvopādānātsaṃkhyākāṅkṣāyā asattvātpañceti padāntaraṃ nānveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10255: nanu janānāṃ nirākāṅkṣatve 'pi tadviśeṣaṇībhūtapañcatvāni katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ pañcatvāntaraṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavatvityāśaṅkate-bhavadapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10256: nopasarjanasyopasarjanāntareṇānvayaḥ kintu pradhānenaiveti nopasarjanyāyavirodha ukta iti pariharati-tatra ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10268: kiṃ ca pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāpratītāvapi na sāṃkhyatattvānāṃ grahaṇamityāha-kathaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10273: pañca ca te janāśceti karmadhārayādisamāsāntarātsaṃjñāsamāsasyāptoktyā balavattvaṃ tāvadāha-ucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10274: vigvācinaḥ saṃkhyāvācinaśca śabdāḥ saṃjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ subantetottarapadena samasyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:10282_1: pañca nirdiṣṭāḥ - 'prāṇasya prāṇamuta cakṣuṣaścakṣuruta śrotrasya śrotramannasyānnaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10286: samāne tu prasiddhyatikrame vākyaśeṣavaśātprāṇādaya eva gpahītavyā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10288: janavacanaśca puruṣaśabdaḥ prāṇeṣu prayuktaḥ 'te vā ete pañca brahmapuruṣāḥ' (chā. 3.13.6) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo1u:10289: 'prāṇo ha pitā prāṇo ha mātā' (chā.7.15.1) ityādi ca brāhmaṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10293: prasiddhārthasaṃnidhāne hyaprasiddhārthaḥ śabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ samabhivyāhārāttadviṣayo niyamyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:10295: tathāyamapi pañcajanaśabdaḥ samāsānvākhyānādavagatasaṃjñābhāvaḥ saṃjñyākāṅkṣī vākyaśeṣasamabhivyāhṛteṣu prāṇādiṣu vartiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10296: kaiścittu devāḥ pitaro gandharvā asurā rakṣāṃsi ca pañca pañcajanā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10298: kvacicca 'yatpāñcajanyayā viśā' (ṛ.saṃ. 8.53.7) iti prajāparaḥ prayogaḥ pañcajanaśabdasya dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10300: ācāryastu na pañcaviśatestattvānamiha pratītirastītyevaṃparatayā 'prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣāt' iti jagāda // 12 //
GSP33brssgo1u:10303: ye prāṇādiprerakaṃ tatsākṣiṇamātmānaṃ viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10304: janavācakaḥ śabdo janaśabdaḥ pañcajanaśabda iti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:10306: pañcajanaśabdasya saṃjñātvamuktvā saṃjñikathanārthaṃ sūtraṃ gṛhṇāti-ke punasta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10308: ye prāṇādiprerakaṃ tatsākṣiṇamātmānaṃ viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10309: pañcajanaśabdasya prāṇādiṣu kayā vṛttyā prayoga iti śaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10310: yathā tava tattveṣu janaśabdasya lakṣaṇaya prayogastathā mama prāṇādiṣu pañcajanaśabdasya lakṣaṇayetyāha-tattveṣviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10318: janakatvājjanaḥ pradhānamiti yogasaṃbhave kimiti rūḍhimāśritya lakṣaṇāprayāsa ityata āha-samāseti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10319: yathā aśvakarṇaśabdasya varṇasamudāyasya vṛkṣe rūḍhirevaṃ pañcajanaśabdasya rūḍhireva nāvayavaśaktyātmako yoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10322: janasaṃbandhācceti pūrvabhāṣye nareṣu pañcajanaśabdasya rūḍhimāśritya prāṇādiṣu lakṣaṇoktā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10323: iha tu prauḍhivādena prāṇādiṣu rūḍhirucyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10326: tataśṭodbhidetyaprasiddhasya tṛtīyāntasya yāgenetyanena prasiddhārthakena sāmānādhikaraṇyena tannāmatvaṃ niścīyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:10329: tathā chinattīti prasiddhārthacchedanayogyārthakaśabdasamabhivyāhārāddāruviśeṣo yūpaśabdārthaḥ karotīti samabhivyāhārādvediśabdārthaḥ saṃskārayogyasthaṇḍilaviśeṣa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10330: tathā prasiddhārtakaprāṇādiśabdasamabhivyāhārāt pañcajanaśabdaḥ prāṇādyarthaka iti niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10334: pāñcajanyayā prajayā viśatīti viṭ tayā viśāpuruṣarūpayendrasyāhvānārthaṃ ghoṣāḥ sṛṣṭā iti yattadyuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10335: ghoṣātirekeṇendrāhvānāyogāditi śrutyanusāreṇa prajāmātragrahe 'pi na virodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10342: kāṇvānāṃ tu kathaṃ prāṇādayaḥ pañcajanā bhaveyurye 'nnaṃ prāṇādiṣu nāmanantīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10345: asatyapi kāṇvānāmanne jyotiṣā teṣāṃ pañcasaṃkhyā pūryeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:10346: te 'pi hi 'yasminpañca pañcajanāḥ ityataḥ pūrvasminmantre brahmasvarūpanirūpaṇāyaiva jyotiradhīyate- 'taddevā jyotiṣāṃ jyotiḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10347: kathaṃ punarubhayeṣāmapi tulyavadidaṃ jyotiḥ paṭhyamānaṃ samānamantragatayā pañcasaṃkhyayā keṣāñcidgrṛhyate keṣāñcinneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10358: jyotiṣāṃ sūryādīnāṃ jyotistadbrahma devā upāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10360: tatkāṇvānāṃ pañacatvapūraṇāya gṛhyate nānyeṣāmiti vikalpo na yukta iti śaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10362: yathā atirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti iti vākyabhedādvikalpastadvacchākhābhedenānnapāṭhāpāṭhābhyāṃ jyotiṣo vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10363: nanu kriyāyāṃ vikalpo yukto na vastunīti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:10365: atrāpi śākhāmedena sānnā jyotiḥsahitā vā pañca prāṇādayo yatra pratiṣṭhitāstanmanasānudraṣṭavyamiti dhyānakriyāyāṃ vikalpopapattirityanavadyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10376: tatredamaparamāśaṅkate- na janmādikaraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo brahmaviṣayaṃ vā gatisāmānyaṃ vedāntavākyānāṃ pratipattuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10385: tathā kvacidasatpūrvikā sṛṣṭiḥ paṭhyate- 'asadvā idamagra āsīttato vai sadājayata' (tai. 2.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10387_1: āsīt' ityupakramya 'kutastu khalu somyaivaṃ syāditi hovāca kathamasataḥ sajjāyeteti
GSP33brssgo1u:10388: kvacitsvayaṅkartṛkaiva vyākriyā jagato nigadyate- 'taddhedaṃ tarhyavyākṛtamāsīttannāmarūpābhyāmeva vyākriyata' (bṛ. 1.4.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10389: evamanekadhā vipratipattirvastuni ca vikalpasyānupapatterna vedāntavākyānāṃ jagatkāraṇāvadhāraṇaparatā nyāyyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10391: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - satyapi prativedāntaṃ sṛjyamāneṣvākāśādiṣu kramādidvārake vigāne na sraṣṭari kiñcidvigānamasti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10394: yathābhūto hyekasminvedānte sarvajñaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sarvātmaiko 'dvitīyaḥ kāraṇatvena vyapadiṣṭastathābhūta eva vedāntāntareṣvapi vyapadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10396: atra tāvajjñānaśabdena pareṇa ca tadviṣayeṇa kāmayitṛtvavacanena cetanaṃ brahma nyarūpayadaparaprayojyatveneśvaraṃ kāraṇamabravīt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10397: tadviṣayeṇaiva pareṇātmaśabdena śarīrādikośaparaṃparayā cāntaranupraveśanena sarveṣāmantaḥ pratyagātmānaṃ niradhārayat /
GSP33brssgo1u:10399: iti cātmaviṣayeṇa bahubhavanānuśaṃsanena sṛjyamānānāṃ vikārāṇāṃ sraṣṭurabhedamabhāṣata /
GSP33brssgo1u:10402: tadatra yallakṣaṇaṃ brahma kāraṇatvena vijñātaṃ tallakṣaṇamevānyatrāpi vijñāyate- 'sadeva semyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10404: tathā 'ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsīnnānyakiñcana miṣat /
GSP33brssgo1u:10405: sa īkṣata lokānnu sṛjai' (ai.u. 4.1.1,2) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:10407: kāryaviṣayaṃ tu vigānaṃ dṛśyate kvacidākāśādikā sṛṣṭiḥ kvacittejādiketyevañjātīyakam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10408: naca kāryaviṣayeṇa vigānena kāraṇamapi brahma sarvavedānteṣvavigītamadhigamyamānamavivakṣitaṃ bhavitumarhatīti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo1u:10413: nahi tatpratibaddhaḥ kvacitpuruṣārtho dṛśyate śrūyate vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10415: upakramopasaṃhārābhyāṃ tatra tatra brahmaviṣayairvākyaiḥ sākamekavākyatāyā gamyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10416_0: darśayati ca sṛṣṭyādiprapañcasya brahmapratipattyarthatām- 'annena somya śuṅgenāpo
GSP33brssgo1u:10416_1: mūlamanvicchadbhiḥ somya śuṅgena tejo mulamanviccha tejasā somya śuṅgena sanmūlamanviccha' (chā.6.8.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10417: mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaiśca kāryasya kāraṇenābhedaṃ vadituṃ sṛṣṭyādiprapañcaḥ śrāvyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10445: adhikaraṇatrayeṇa pradhānasyāśrautatvoktyā jagatkāraṇatvalakṣaṇena brahmaṇa eva buddhisthatā,
GSP33brssgo1u:10446: tasminneva buddhisthe nirviśeṣe brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti sādhitaṃ pūrvasūtrasaṃdarbheṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:10449: na cāvirodhacintāyā dvitīyādhyāye saṃgatirnāsminnadhyāya iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10451: tatpadavācyajagatkāraṇavādiśrutīnāṃ mitho virodhādvācyārthānirṇayena lakṣye samanvayāsiddhau prāptāyāṃ tatsādhakāvirodhacintāyā atraiva saṃgatatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10452: na caivaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāmapyavirodho 'traiva cintanīya iti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo1u:10454: kimarthaṃ tarhi dvitīye taccintanaṃ, sthūlabuddhisamādhānārthamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10455: iha tu sūkṣmadṛśāṃ vākyārthe samanvayajñānāya tatpadārthaśrutivirodhaḥ parihriyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10456: tadyapi tvaṃpadārthaśrutivirodho 'tra parihartavyaḥ tathāpi prathamasūtreṇa bandhamithyātvasūcanādavirodhaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10459_0: tāḥ kiṃ brahmaṇi mānaṃ na veti saṃśaye 'nnajyotiṣoḥ saṃkhyādṛṣṭikriyāyāṃ vikalpe
GSP33brssgo1u:10462: pūrvapakṣe samanvayāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10481: tadidaṃ jagaddha kila tarhi prākkāle 'vyākṛtaṃ kāraṇātmakāmāsīt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10484: tatra sṛṣṭau virodhamaṅgīkṛtya sraṣṭari virodhaṃ pariharati-satyapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10485: ākāśādiṣu brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatve virodho naivāstīti pratijñāyāṃ hetumāha-kuta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10493: yathā taittirīyake sarvajñatvādikaṃ kāraṇasya tathā chāndogyādāvapi dṛśyata ityāha-tadatra yallakṣaṇamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10496: tathāpi kārye virodhātkāraṇe 'pi virodhaḥ syādityāśaṅkya niṣedhati-kāryaviṣayaṃ tvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10497: svapnasṛṣṭīnāṃ pratyahamanyathātvena so 'hamiti pratyabhijñāyamāne draṣṭaryapi nānātvaṃ prasajyetetyāha-atiprasaṅgāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:10505: śuṅgena kāryeṇa liṅgena kāraṇabrahmajñānārthatvaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāmuktvā kāraṇasyādvayatvajñānaṃ phalāntamāha-mṛdādīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10506: evaṃ niṣphalāyāmanyārthāyāṃ sṛṣṭau tātparyābhāvādvirodho na doṣa ityatra vṛddhasaṃmatimāha-tathāceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10516: yatpunaḥ kāraṇaviṣayaṃ vigānaṃ darśitam- 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' ityādi tatparihartavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10519: 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' (tai. 2.7) iti nātrāsannirātmakaṃ kāraṇatvena śrāvyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10523_1: pratyagātmānaṃ nirdhārya 'so 'kāmayata' iti tameva prakṛtaṃ samākṛṣya saprapañcāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10523_3: bhavati' iti tasminneva prakṛter'the ślokamimamudāharati- 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10525: tasmānnāmarūpavyākṛtavastuviṣayaḥ prāyeṇa sacchabdaḥ prasiddha iti tadvyākaraṇābhāvāpekṣayā prāgutpatteḥ sadeva brahmāsadivāsīdityupacaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10534: ityatrāpi na niradhyakṣasya jagato vyākaraṇaṃ kathyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:10535: 'sa eṣa iha praviṣṭa ānakhāgrebhyaḥ' ityadhyakṣasya vyākṛtakāryānupraveśitvena samākarṣāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10536: niradhyakṣe vyākaraṇābhyupagame hyanantareṇa prakṛtāvalambanā sa ityanena sarvanāmnā kaḥ kāryānupraveśitvena samākṛṣyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:10538: praviṣṭasya cetanatvaśravaṇāt 'paśyaṃścakṣuḥ śṛṇvañśrotraṃ manvāno manaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10539: apica yādṛśamidamadyatve nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākriyamāṇaṃ jagatsādhyakṣaṃ vyākriyata evamādisarge 'pīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10543: vyākriyata ityapi karmakartari lakāraḥ satyeva parameśvare vyākartari saukaryamapekṣya draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10544: yathā lūyate kedāraḥ svayameveti satyeva pūrṇake lavitari /
GSP33brssgo1u:10553: evaṃ sṛṣṭidvārakaṃ virodhamutsūtraṃ samādhāya kāraṇasya sadasattvādinā sākṣācchrutivirodhanirāsārthaṃ sūtramādatte-yatpunariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10555: ato 'tra śloke nirātmakamasanna śrāvyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10556: tat tatra sadātmani śloko mantro bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10564: eke śākhina ityartho na bhavati, kintu anādisaṃsāracakrasthā vedabāhyā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10565: śūnyanirāsena śrutibhiḥ sadvādasyaiveṣṭatvāttāsāṃ virodhasphūrtinirāsāya lakṣaṇā yukteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10568: nanu kartrabhāva eva parāmṛśyata ityata āha-cetanasya cāyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10569: cakṣurdraṣṭā, śrotraṃ śrotā, mano mantetyucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10572: nanu karmakārakādanyasya kartuḥ sattve karmaṇa eva kartṛvācilakāro viruddha ityata āha-vyākriyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10575: vyākriyate jagatsvayameva niṣpannamiti vyākhyāya kenacidvyākṛtamiti vyācaṣṭe-yadveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10582: kauṣītakibrāhmaṇe bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvāde śrūyate- 'yo vai bālāka eteṣāṃ kartā yasya vai tatkarma sa veditavyaḥ' (kau. brā. 4.19) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10583: tatra kiṃ jīvo veditavyatvenopadiśyata uta mukhyaḥ prāṇa uta paramātmeti viśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10589: vākyaśeṣe ca 'athāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' iti prāṇaśabdadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10591: ye caite purastāddhālākinā 'āditye puruṣaścandramasi puruṣaḥ' ityevamādayaḥ puruṣā nirdiṣṭāsteṣāmapi bhavati prāṇaḥ kartā prāṇāvasthāviśeṣatvādityādidevatātmanām /
GSP33brssgo1u:10592: 'katama eko deva iti prāṇa iti sa brahma tyadityācakṣate (bṛ. 3.9.9) iti śrutyantaraprasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10594: tasyāpi dharmādharmalakṣaṇaṃ karma śakyate śrāvayitum 'yasya vaitatkarma' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10597_0: yatkāraṇaṃ veditavyatayopanyastasya puruṣāṇāṃ karturvedanāyopetaṃ bālākiṃ prati bubodhayiṣurajātaśatruḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10598_0: tathā parastādapi jīvaliṅgamavagamyate- 'tadyathā śreṣṭhī svairbhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10598_1: śreṣṭhina bhuñjantyevamevaiṣa prajñātmaitairātmabhirbhuṅkte evamevaita ātmāna etamātmānaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10600: tasmājjīvamukhyaprāṇayoranyatara iha grahaṇīyo na parameśvaraḥ, talliṅgānavagamāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:10601: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - parameśvara evāyameteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10604: iha hi bālākirajātaśatruṇā saha 'brahma te bravāṇi' iti saṃvaditumupacakrame /
GSP33brssgo1u:10606: tamajātaśatruḥ 'mṛṣā vai khalu mā saṃvadiṣṭā brahma te bravāṇi' ityamukhya brahmavāditayāpodya tatkartāramanyaṃ veditavyatayopacikṣepa /
GSP33brssgo1u:10609: kartṛtvaṃ caiteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ na parameśvarādanyasya svātantryeṇāvakalpate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10610: 'yasya vaitatkarma' ityapi nāyaṃ parispandalakṣaṇasya dharmādharmalakṣaṇasya vā karmaṇo nirdeśaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10615: liṅgavacanavigānācca nāpi puruṣaviṣayasya karotyarthasya kriyāphalasya vāyaṃ nirdeśaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10621: tathāpyasati viśeṣopādāne sādhāraṇenārthena saṃnidhānena saṃnihitavastumātrasyāyaṃ nirdeśa iti gamyate na viśiṣṭasya kasyacit /
GSP33brssgo1u:10623: pūrvatra ca jagadekadeśabhūtānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ viśeṣopādānadaviśeṣitaṃ jagadevehopādīyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10624: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ya eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ jagadekadeśabhūtānāṃ kartā,
GSP33brssgo1u:10628: ye bālākinā brahmatvābhimatāḥ puruṣāḥ kīrtitāsteṣāmabrahmatvakhyāpanāya viśeṣopādānam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10629: evaṃ brāhmaṇaparivrājakanyāyena sāmānyaviśeṣābhyāṃ jagataḥ kartā veditavyatayopadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10636: yatkāraṇaṃ yasmājjīvaṃ bodhayati tasmādasti suptotthāpanaṃ jīvaliṅgamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10640: balākāyā apatyaṃ bālākirbrāhmaṇastaṃ prati rājovāca-yo vā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10641: na kevalamādityādīnāṃ kartā kintu sarvasya jagata ityāha-yasyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10646: iha tu vākyabhedāt 'brahma te bravāṇi'iti bālākivākyasthabrahmaśabdena prāṇādiśabdo brahmaparatvena netumāśakya iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣamāha--kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:10647: pūrvapakṣe vākyasya prāṇādyupāstiparatvādbrahmaṇi samanvayāsiddhiḥ siddhānte jñeye samanvayasiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10650: śrutaṃ puruṣakartṛtvaṃ prāṇasya kathamityata āha-ye caita iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10651: sūtrātmakaprāṇasya vikāraḥ sūryādaya ityatra mānamāha-kratama iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10652: yasya mahimānaḥ sarve devā iti pūrvavākye darśitaṃ, ataḥ sarvadevātmakatvāt, sa prāṇo brahma /
GSP33brssgo1u:10656: yatkāraṇaṃ yasmājjīvaṃ bodhayati tasmādasti suptotthāpanaṃ jīvaliṅgamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10658: taṃ rājā he bṛhatpāṇḍaravāsaḥ somarājannityāmantrya saṃbodhya saṃbodhanānabhijñatvāt prāṇāderanātmatvamuktvā yaṣṭhyāghātenotthāpya jīvaṃ bodhitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10659: śroṣṭhī pradhānaḥ svairbhṛtyairjñātibhirupahṛtaṃ bhuṅkte svāḥ jñātayaśca tamupajīvanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:10660: evaṃ jīvo 'pi ādityādibhiḥ prakāśādinā bhogopakaraṇairbhuṅkte te ca havirgrahaṇādinā jīvamupajīvantītyuktaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ jīvaliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10661: nanu 'prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti śrutaḥ prāṇaśabdo jīve kathamityata āha-prāṇabhṛttvācceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10663: sa ca bālākirbrahmatvabhrāntyā vyaṣṭiliṅgarūpānpuruṣānuktvā rājñā nirastastūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10664: tvaduktaṃ brahma mṛṣetyuktvā rājñocyamānaṃ brahmaiveti vaktavyamanyathārājño 'pi mṛṣāvāditvaprasaṅgādityāha-yadi so 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10668: yaduktaṃ calanādṛṣṭayorvācakaḥ karmaśabdaḥ prāṇajīvayorupasthāpaka iti, tannetyāha-yasyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10670: atra prakaraṇopapadayorasattvātkasya grahaṇamiti saṃśaye puruṣakartṛpadasāṃnidhyāt kriyata iti yogājjagadgrahaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10673: nanu puruṣotpādakasya karturvyāpāraḥ karotyarthaṃ utpādanaṃ tasyaphalaṃ puruṣajanma tadanyataravācī karmaśabdo 'stvityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10677: prakaraṇādikaṃ hi sarvanāmnaḥ saṃkocakaṃ, tasminnasati sāmānyena buddhisthaṃ sarvameva gṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10678: atra ca saṃkocakāsattvātsarvārthakena sarvanāmnā buddhisthasya kāryamātrasya karmaśabdo vācaka ityāha-tathāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10683: brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyāḥ parivrājakāścetyatra yathā brahmaṇaśabdaḥ parivrājakānyaviṣayaḥ tathātra karmaśabdaḥ puruṣānyajagadvācītyāha-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10684: astu jagatkartā veditavyaḥ, parameśvarasya kimāyātamityata āha-parameśvareti //16//
GSP33brssgo1u:10689: ata yaduktaṃ vākyaśeṣagatājjīvaliṅgānmukhyaprāṇaliṅgācca tayorevānyatarasyeha grahaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ na parameśvarasyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10691: yatrocyate- parihṛtaṃ caitat 'nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvādiha tadyogāt' (bra. sū. 1.1.31) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo1u:10692: trividhaṃ hyatropāsanamevaṃ sati prasajjyeta jīvopāsanaṃ mukhyaprāṇopāsanaṃ brahmopāsanaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10696: upasaṃhārasyāpi niratiśayaphalaśravaṇādbrahmaviṣayatvaṃ dṛśyate- 'sarvānpāpmano 'pahṛtya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyamādhipatyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10701: prāṇaśabdo 'pi brahmaviṣayo dṛṣṭaḥ 'prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ' (chā. 6.8.2) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo1u:10704: FN: śraiṣṭhyaṃ guṇādhikyam, ādhipatyaṃ niyanitṛtvam, svārājyamaniyamyatvamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10709: 'saṃbhavatyekavākyatve vākyabhedo hi neṣyate'ityuktaṃ cet punaruktiḥ syāditi śaṅkate-nanvevamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10710: karmapadasya rūḍhyā pūrvapakṣaprāptau tannirāsārthamasyārambho yukta ityāha-netyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10716: anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyām api caivam eke | BBs_1,4.18 |
GSP33brssgo1u:10717: apica naivātra vivaditavyaṃ jīvapradhānaṃ vedaṃ vākyaṃ syādbrahmapradhānaṃ veti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10721_1: dṛśyate- 'kvaiṣa etadbālāke puruṣo 'śayiṣṭa kva vā etadabhūtkuta etadāgāt' (kau.brā. 4.19) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10722_0: prativacanamapi 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'
GSP33brssgo1u:10722_1: ityādi 'etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyo devā devebhyo
GSP33brssgo1u:10723: suṣuptikāle ca pareṇa brahmaṇā jīva ekatāṃ gacchati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10724: parasmācca brahmaṇaḥ prāṇādikaṃ jagajjāyata iti vedāntamaryādā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10725: tasmādyatrāsya jīvasya niḥsaṃbodhatāsvacchatārūpaḥ svāpa upādhijanitaviśeṣavijñānarahitaṃ svarūpaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10727: so 'tra paramātmā veditavyatayā śrāvita iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10728_0: apicaivameke śākhino vājasaneyino 'sminneva bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvāde spaṣṭaṃ vijñānamayaśabdena
GSP33brssgo1u:10728_1: jīvamāmnāya tadvyatiriktaṃ paramātmānamāmananti- 'ya eṣa vijñānamayapuruṣaḥ kvaiṣa
GSP33brssgo1u:10731: 'sarva eta ātmano vyuccaranti' iti copādhimatāmātmanāmanyato vyuccaraṇamāmanantaḥ paramātmānameva kāraṇatvenāmanantīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10739: he bālāke, etacchayanaṃ viśeṣajñānābhāvarūpaṃ yathā syāttathaiṣa puruṣaḥ kvāśayiṣṭa /
GSP33brssgo1u:10742: etadbhavanamekībhāvarūpaṃ yathā syāttathā eṣa puruṣaḥ kvābhūtsuptaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10745: etadāgamanamaikyabhraṃśarūpaṃ yathā syāttathā puruṣaḥ kuta āgata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10748: uttare prāṇokteḥ praśno 'pi prāṇaviśaya ityata āha-suṣuptikāle ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10755: nanu tatrākāśaḥ suṣuptisthānamuktaṃ na brahmetyata āha-ākāśeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10757: evaṃ jīvanirāsārthakatvena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya prāṇanirāsaparatvenāpi vyācaṣṭe-prāṇeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10760: api caike śākhina evameva prāṇātiriktaṃ jīvātmānamāmanantaḥ prāṇasya vākyārthatvaṃ vārayantīti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10768_0: bṛhadāraṇyake maitreyībrāhmaṇe 'dhīyate- 'na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya' ityupakramya 'na
GSP33brssgo1u:10768_1: vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatyātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatyātmā
GSP33brssgo1u:10768_2: vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyo maitreyyātmano vā are darśanena
GSP33brssgo1u:10778_0: patijāyāputravittādikaṃ hi bhogyabhūtaṃ sarvaṃ jagadātmārthatayā priyaṃ bhavatīti
GSP33brssgo1u:10779_0: madhye 'pi 'idaṃ mahadbhūtamanantamapāraṃ vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya
GSP33brssgo1u:10779_1: tānyevānuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñāsti' iti prakṛtasyaiva mahato bhūtasya draṣṭavyasya
GSP33brssgo1u:10779_2: bhūtebhyaḥ samutthānaṃ vijñānātmabhāvena bruvanvijñānātmanaṃ evedaṃ draṣṭavyatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10780: tathā 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' iti kartṛvacanena śabdenopasaṃharanvijñānātmānamevehopadiṣṭaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10785: vākyaṃ hīdaṃ paurvāparyeṇāvekṣyamāṇaṃ paramātmānaṃprati anvitāvayavaṃ lakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10787_0: tadupapādyate- 'amṛtatvasya tu nāśāsti vittena' iti yājñavalkyādupaśrutya 'yenāhaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10787_1: nāmṛtā syāṃ kimahaṃ tena kuryāṃ yadeva bhagavānveda tadeva me brūhi' ityamṛtatvamāśāsānāya
GSP33brssgo1u:10791: yatkāraṇamātmavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāyānantareṇa granthena tadevopapādayati- 'brahma taṃ parādādyo 'nyatrātmano brahma veda' ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10792_0: yo hi brahmakṣatrādikaṃ jagadātmanonyatra svātantryeṇa labdhasadbhāvaṃ paśyati taṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10792_1: mithyādarśinaṃ tadeva mithyādṛṣṭaṃ brahmakṣatrādikaṃ jagatparākarotīti bhedadṛṣṭimapodya
GSP33brssgo1u:10795: ityādinā ca prakṛtasyātmano nāmarūpakarmaprapañcakāraṇatāṃ vyācakṣāṇaḥ paramātmānamenaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10797: saviṣayasya sendriyasya sāntaḥkaraṇasya prapañcasyaikāyanamanantaramabāhyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ prajñānaghanaṃ vyācakṣāṇaḥ paramātmānamenaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10810: ṛgvedādikaṃ nāma, iṣṭaṃ hutamiti karma, ayaṃ ca loka iti rūpam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10814: pratyāderātmaśeṣatvena priyatvādātmaiva sarviśeṣī priyatamaḥ, ato 'nyatparityajyātmaiva draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10819: yathā 'brahma te bravāṇi'ityupakramabalādvākyasya brahmaparatvaṃ tathātra jīvopakramādasya vākyasya jīvaparatvamiti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:10820: pūrvapakṣe vākyasya jīvopāstiparatvaṃ, siddhānte jñeye pratyagbrahmaṇi samanvaya iti phalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10826: etebhyaḥkāryakāraṇātmanā jāyamānebhyo bhūtebhayaḥ sāmyenotthāya bhūtopādhikaṃ janmānubhūya tānyeva bhūtāni nīyamānānyanusṛtya vinaśyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10836: yathā dundubhiśaṅkhavīṇāśabdasāmānyagrahaṇenaiva gṛhyamāṇāstadavāntaraviśeṣāḥ śuktigrahaṇagrāhyarajatavat sāmānye kalpitāstato na bhidyante,
GSP33brssgo1u:10842: ayaṃ ca lokaḥ paraśca loka iti rūpam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10843: kiñca 'sa yathā sarvāsāmapāṃ samudra ekāyanam'iti kaṇḍikayā sarvaprapañcasya mukhyalayādhāratvamātmano brahmatve liṅgamityāha-tathaivaikāyaneti //19//
GSP33brssgo1u:10847: yatpunaruktaṃ priyasaṃsūcitopakramādvijñānātmana evāyaṃ darśanādyupadeśa iti, atra brūmaḥ -
GSP33brssgo1u:10849: astyatra pratijñā 'ātmani vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati' 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:10850: tasyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ siddhiṃ sūcayatyetalliṅgaṃ yatpriyasaṃsūcitasyātmano draṣṭavyatvādisaṃkīrtanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10851: yadi hi vijñānātmā paramātmano 'nyaḥ syāttataḥ paramātmavijñāne 'pi vijñānātmā na vijñāta ityekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ yatpratijñātaṃ taddhīyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:10857: utkramiṣyata evaṃ bhāvād ity auḍulomiḥ | BBs_1,4.21 |
GSP33brssgo1u:10859: śrutiścaivaṃ bhavati- 'eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate' (chā. 8.12.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10860: kvacicca jīvāśrayamapi nāmarūpaṃ nadīnidarśanena jñāpayati- 'yathā nadyaḥ syandamānāḥ samudre 'staṃ gacchanti nāmarūpe vihāya /
GSP33brssgo1u:10861: tathā vidvānnāmarūpādvimuktaḥ parātparaṃ puruṣamupaiti divyam' (muṇḍa. 3.2.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10862_0: yathā loke nadyaḥ svāśrayameva nāmarūpaṃ vihāya samudramupayantyevaṃ jīvo 'pi svāśrayameva
GSP33brssgo1u:10862_1: nāmarūpaṃ vihāya paraṃ puruṣamupaitīti hi tatrārthaḥ pratīyate dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayostulyatāyai // 21 //
GSP33brssgo1u:10868: nanu saṃsārasyaupādhikatvāt sarvadaivābheda ityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntabalena saṃsārasya svābhāvikatvamityāha-kvacicceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10869: 'yathā nadyaḥ syandamānāḥ samudrestaṃ gacchanti nāmarūpe vihāya'iti nadinidarśanaṃ vyācaṣṭe-yathā loke iti //21//
GSP33brssgo1u:10877: mantravarṇaśca- 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste (tai.ā. 3.12.7) ityevañjātīyakāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10878: naca tejaḥ prabhṛtīnāṃ sṛṣṭau jīvasya pṛthaksṛṣṭiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10881: kāśakṛtsnasyācāryasyāvikṛtaḥ parameśvaro jīvo nānya iti matam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10883: tathāpi pratijñāsiddheriti sāpekṣatvābhidhānātkāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kiyānapyabhipreta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10884: auḍulomipakṣe punaḥ spaṣṭamevāvasthāntarāpekṣau bhedābhedau gamyete tatra kāśakṛtsnīyaṃ mataṃ śrutyanusārīti gamyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:10887: vikārātmakatve hi jīvasyābhyupagamyamāne vikārasya prakṛtisaṃbandhe pralayaprasaṅgānna tajjñānādamṛtamavakalpeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:10888: ataśca svāśrayasya nāmarūpasyāsaṃbhavādupādhyāśrayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ jīva upacaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10889: ata evotpattirapi jīvasya kvacidagnivisphuliṅgodāharaṇena śrāvyamāṇopādhyāśrayaiva veditavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10890: yadapyuktaṃ prakṛtasyaiva mahato bhūtasya draṣṭavyasya bhūtebhyaḥ samutthānaṃ vijñānātmabhāvena darśayanvijñānātmana evedaṃ draṣṭavyatvaṃ darśayatīti,
GSP33brssgo1u:10893: idamatra pratijñātam- 'ātmani vidite sarvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati' 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā' (bṛ. 2.4.6) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:10896: tasyā eva pratijñāyāḥ siddhiṃ sūcatyetalliṅgaṃ yanmahato bhūtasya draṣṭavyasya bhūtebhyaḥ samutthānaṃ vijñānātmabhāvena kathitamityāśmarathya ācāryo manyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10897: abhede hi satyekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñātamavakalpayata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10902: nanūcchedābhidhānametat 'etebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tānyevānuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñāsti' (bṛ. 2.4.12)
GSP33brssgo1u:10906_0: 'atraiva mā bhagavānamūmuhanna pretya saṃjñāsti' iti paryanuyujya svayameva śrutyārthāntarasya
GSP33brssgo1u:10906_1: darśitatvāt- 'na vā are 'haṃ mohaṃ bravīmyavināśī vā are 'yamātmānucchittidharmā
GSP33brssgo1u:10907: etaduktaṃ bhavati- kūṭasthanitya evāyaṃ vijñānaghana ātmā nāsyocchedaprasaṅgo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10909: saṃsargābhāve ca prakṛtasya viśeṣavijñānasyābhāvānna pretya saṃjñāstītyuktamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10910: yadapyuktam- 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' iti kartṛvacanena śabdenopasaṃhārādvijñānātmana evedaṃ draṣṭavyamiti,
GSP33brssgo1u:10912: apica 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati' (bṛ. 2.4.13)
GSP33brssgo1u:10913_0: ityārabhyāvidyāviṣaye tasyaiva darśanādilakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣajñānaṃ prapañcya 'yatra tvasya
GSP33brssgo1u:10913_1: sarvāmātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' ityādinā vidyāviṣaye tasyaiva darśanādilakṣaṇasya
GSP33brssgo1u:10914: punaśca viṣayābhāve 'pi ātmānaṃ vijānīyāt ityāśaṅkya 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' ityāha /
GSP33brssgo1u:10915: tataśca viśeṣavijñānābhāvopapādānaparatvādvākyasya vijñānadhātureva kevalaḥ saṃnbhūtapūrvagatyā kartṛvacanena tṛcā nirdiṣṭa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10917: ataśca vijñānātparamātmanoravidyāpratyupasthāpitanāmarūparacitadehādyupādhinim itto bhedo na pāramārthika ityeṣor'thaḥ sarvairvedāntavādibhirabhyupagantavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10927: bhedadarśanāpavādācca 'anyo 'sāvanyo 'hamasmīti na sa veda yathā paśuḥ' (bṛ. 1.4.10)
GSP33brssgo1u:10928: , 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ca iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.19) ityevañjātīyakāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10934: 'tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ' (īśā. 7) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:10936: sthite ca kṣetrajñaparamātmaikatvaviṣaya samyagdarśane kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmeti nāmamātrabhaidāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:10937: kṣetrajño 'yaṃ paramātmano bhinnaḥ paramātmāyaṃ kṣetrajñādbhinna ityevañjātīyaka ātmabhaidaviṣayo nirbandho nirarthakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10940: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyām' (tai. 2.1) iti kāñcidevaikāṃ guhāmadhikṛtyaitaduktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10943: ye tu nirbandhaṃ kurvanti te vedāntārthaṃ bādhamānāḥ śreyodvāraṃ samyagdarśanameva bādhante /
GSP33brssgo1u:10949: vicitya nirmāya teṣāṃ nāmāni kṛtvā tatrānupraviśyābhivadannabhivadanādi kurvan /
GSP33brssgo1u:10955: atyantābhedajñāpanārthaṃ jīvamupakramya draṣṭavyatvādayo brahmadharmā uktā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10960: jīvoddeśena brahmatvapratipādane bhedo 'pyāvaśyaka iti bhedābhedaśaṅkāprāptau kalpitabhedenoddeśyatvādikaṃ svato 'tyantābheda iti jñāpanārthamasyārambhāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10961: jñāpane cātra liṅgamātmaśabdenopakrāntasya jīvasya dharmiṇo brahmaṇo dharmyantarasya grahaṇaṃ vinaiva brahmadharmakathanaṃ bhedābhede dharmidvayagrahaḥ syāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10963_0: sarvāṇi rūpāṇi kāryāṇi vicitya sṛṣṭvā teṣaṃ nāmāni ca kṛtvā teṣu buddhyādiṣu praviśyābhivadanādikaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10963_1: kurvan yo vartate tadvidvānihaivāmṛto bhavatīti mantro 'pi jīvaparayoraikyaṃ darśayatītyāha-mantreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10973: kalpitasya bhedasya jñānānnivṛttiḥ saṃbhavati na satyasyetyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10976: utpattiśrutyā jīvasya brahmaṇā bhedābhedāvityata āha-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10978: atra pūrvapakṣe bījatrayamuktaṃ jīvenopakramaḥ parasyaiva samutthānaśrutyā jīvābhedābhidhānaṃ vijñātṛśabdaśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10981: ātmajñānātsarvavijñānaṃ yatpratijñātaṃ tatra hetuḥ 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā'ityavyatireka uktastasya pratipādanāttadeva pratijñātamupapāditamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10985: mṛtasya saṃjñā nāstīti vākye 'traiva māṃ mohitavānasi jñānarūpasyātmano jñānābhāve nāśaprasaṅgāditi maitreyyokto munirāha-na vā are iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10991_0: kāśakṛtsnasya mate tvatyantābhedādvijñānasya kārakābhāvātsa yukta iti śrutyanusāritvāttanmate
GSP33brssgo1u:10991_1: manaḥkalpitaṃ vijñātṛtvaṃ mukte brahmātmani bhūtapūrvagatyoktamiti pariharaṇīyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10992: kiñca pūrvāparaparyālocanayā vākyasya muktātmaparatvāvagamādvijñātṛtvaṃ kalpitamevānūdyata iti na talliṅgena jīvaparatvamityāha-api ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10993: ārṣeṣu pakṣeṣu kāśakṛtsnapakṣasyaivādeyatve kiṃ bījaṃ, tadāha-darśitamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10996: hetūnāṃ bhedo na paramārthika iti pratijñayā saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10997: bhedābhedapakṣe jīvasya janmādivikāravattvāttanniṣedho na syādityāha-sa vā eṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10998: bhedasya satyatve tatpramayā bādhādahaṃ brahmeti nirvādhaṃ jñānaṃ na syādityāha-anyathāceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11002: ātyantikaikatve hi prajñā pratiṣṭhitā bhavati na bhedābhedayoriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11003: nanu jīvaparamātmānau svato bhinnau, aparyāyanāmavattvāt, stambhakumbhavadityata āha-sthite ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11005: kiñcāvidyātajjabuddhirūpāyāṃ guhāyāṃ sthito jīvo bhavati, tasyāmeva brahma nihitamiti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11009: nanvekasyāṃ guhāyāṃ dvau kiṃ na syātāmityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11011: nanvatyantābhede jīvasya spaṣṭabhānādbrahmāpi spaṣṭaṃ syādataḥ spaṣṭatvāspaṣṭatvābhyāṃ tayorbheda iti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:11013: darpaṇe pratibimbasya sphuṭatve 'pi bimbasyāsphuṭatvavat kalpitabhedena viruddhadharmavyavasthopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11015: so 'yamitivattattvamasītyakāryakāraṇadravyasāmānādhikaraṇyādatyantābhedo vedāntārthastadbodha eva niḥśreyasasādhanaṃ tasya bādho na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11016: kiñca bhedābhadavādino jñānakarmabhyāṃ kṛtakaṃ mokṣaṃ kalpayanti, tatrānityatvaṃ doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11017: yattu kṛtakamapi nityamiti, tacca 'yat kriyāsādhyaṃ tadanityam'iti nyāyabādhitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11018: asmākaṃ tvanarthadhvaṃsasya jñānasādhyatvānnityamuktātmamātratvācca nānityatvadoṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11027: tacca lakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭarucakādīnāṃ mṛtsuvarṇādivatprakṛtitve kulālasuvarṇakārādivannimittatve ca samānamityato bhavati vimarśaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11034: īkṣāpūrvakaṃ ca kartṛtvaṃ nimittakāraṇeṣveva kulālādiṣu dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11036: sa ca nyāya ādikartaryapi yuktaḥ saṃkramayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:11038: īśvarāṇāṃ hi rājavaivasvatādīnāṃ nimittakāraṇatvameva kevalaṃ pratīyate tadvatparameśvarasyāpi nimittakāraṇatvameva yuktaṃ pratipattum /
GSP33brssgo1u:11042: brahma ca naivaṃlakṣaṇamavagamyate 'niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ niravadyaṃ nirañjanam' (śve. 6.19) ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11045: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ prakṛtiścopādānakāraṇaṃ ca brahmābhyupagantavyaṃ nimittakāraṇaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:11050: pratijñā tāvat- 'uta tamādeśamaprākṣyo yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātam' (chā. 6.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11051: tatra caikena vijñātena sarvamandavijñātamapi vijñātaṃ bhavatīti pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11053: nimittakāraṇāvyatirekāstu kāryasya nāsti, loke takṣṇaḥ prāsādavyatirekadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11054: dṛṣṭānto 'pi yathā 'somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam' ityupādānakāraṇagocara evamāmnāyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11055: tathā 'ekena lohamaṇinā sarvaṃ lohamayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt' 'ekena nakhanikṛntanena sarvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt' (chā. 6.1.4,5,6) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:11056: tathānyatrāpi 'kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati (muṇḍa. 1.1.2) iti pratijñā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11058: tathā 'ātmani kalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāta idaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' iti pratijñā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11059: 'sa yathā dundubherhanyamānasya na bāhyāñśabdāñśaknuyādgrahaṇāya dundubhestu grahaṇena dundubhyāghātasya vā śabdo gṛhītaḥ' (bṛ. 4.5.6,7) iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11060: evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ prativedāntaṃ pratijñādṛṣṭāntau prakṛtitvasādhanau pratyetavyau /
GSP33brssgo1u:11061: yata itīyaṃ pañcamī 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante' ityatra 'janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ' (pā.sū. 1.4.30)
GSP33brssgo1u:11064: yathā hi loke mṛtsuvarṇādikamupādānakāraṇaṃ kulālasuvarṇakārādīnadhiṣṭhātṛnapekṣya pravartate naivaṃ brahmaṇa upādānakāraṇasya sato 'nyo 'dhiṣṭhātāpekṣyo 'sti,
GSP33brssgo1u:11071: niṣkalaṃ niravayavam, niṣkriyamacalam, śāntamapariṇāmi, niravadyaṃ nirastasamastadoṣam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11074: dundubhyāghātasya janakasya janyatayā saṃbandhī vā śabdo viśeṣaśabda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11077: tatra hi brahmaṇo buddhisthatvārthaṃ sāmānyato jagatkāraṇatvaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11078: tena buddhisthe brahmaṇi kṛtasnavedāntasamanvayaṃ pratipādya tatkāraṇatvaṃ kiṃ kartṛtvamātramuta prakṛtitvakartṛtvobhayarūpamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11081: yadyapi tadānantaryamasya yuktaṃ tathāpi niścitatātparyairvedāntaiḥ kartṛmātreśvaramatanirāsaḥ sukara iti samanvayānte idaṃ likhitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11097: niṣkalaṃ niravayavaṃ, niṣkriyamacalaṃ, śāntamapariṇāmi, niravadyaṃ nirastasamastadoṣam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11104: kartṛjñānādapi sarvakāryajñānaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nimittakāraṇāvyatirekastviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11106: vāgārabhyaṃ nāmamātraṃ vikāro na vastuto 'stīti satyakāraṇajñānādvikārajñānaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11109: ghaṭaḥ sphuratītyanugatasphuraṇaṃ prakṛtistadatirikeṇa vikārā na santīti so 'yamartho yathā sphuṭaḥ tathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa ucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11110: hanyamānadundubhijanyācchabdasāmānyādbāhyān viśeṣaśabdān sāmānyagrahaṇātirikeṇa pṛthaggrahītuṃ śrotā na śaknuyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11111: sāmānyasya tu grahaṇena dundubhyāghātajaśabdaviśeṣo gṛhīto bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:11112: tasya vā grahaṇena tadavāntaraviśeṣaśabdo gṛhīto bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:11113: ataḥ śabdasāmānyagrahaṇagrahyā viśeṣāḥ sāmānye kalpitāḥ tadvadātmabhānabhāsyā ghaṭādaya ātmani kalpitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11115: 'yato vā'ityatra śrutau yata iti pañcamī prakṛtau draṣṭavyetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11118: evaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvaṃ prasādhya kartṛtvaṃ sādhayati-nimittatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11128: abhidhyopadeśaścātmanaḥ kartṛtvaprakṛtitve gamayati 'so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti' 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:11141: yatkāraṇaṃ sākṣādbrahmaiva kāraṇamupādāyobhau prabhavapralayāvāmnāyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:11143: yaddhi yasmātprabhavati yasmiṃśca pralīyate tattasyopādānaṃ prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:11158: kathaṃ punaḥ pūrvasiddhasya sataḥ kartṛtvena vyavasthitasya kriyamāṇatvaṃ śakyaṃ saṃpādayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:11160: pūrvasiddho 'pi hi sannātmā viśeṣeṇa vikārātmanā pariṇamayāmāsātmānamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11165: yatkāraṇaṃ brahmaṇa eva vikārātmanā pariṇāmaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyenāmnāyate 'sacca tyaccābhavat /
GSP33brssgo1u:11174: nanu kṛterāśrayaḥsiddhobhavati viṣayastu sādhya ityekasyobhayaṃ viruddhamityāśaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11175: yathā mṛdaḥ sādhyapariṇāmābhedena kṛtiviṣayatvaṃ tadvadātmana ityāha-pariṇāmāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:11179: nanu brahmaṇa ātmānamiti dvitīyayā kāryātmanā sādhyatvaśrutyāstu prakṛtitvaṃ kartā tvanyo 'stvityata āha-svayamiti ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11180: brahmaṇaḥ kṛtikarmatvopapādanārthaṃ pariṇāmāditi padaṃ vyākhyāyānyathāpi vyācaṣṭe-pṛthaksūtramiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11181: mṛdghaṭa itivadbrahma sacca tyacceti pariṇāmasāmānādhikaraṇyaśruterbrahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11193: itaśca prakṛtirbrahma yonirityapi paṭhyate vedānteṣu 'kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmayonim' (muṇḍa. 3.1.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:11195: yoniśabdaśca prakṛtivacanaḥ samadhigato loke 'pṛthivī yoniroṣadhivanaspatīnām' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11197: kacitsthānavacano 'pi yoniśabdo dṛṣṭaḥ - 'yoniṣṭa indra niṣade akāri' (ṛ.saṃ. 1.104.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11198: vākyaśeṣāttvatra prakṛtivacanatā parigṛhyate 'yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhyate ca' (muṇḍa. 1.1.7) ityevañjātīyakāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11200: yatpunaridamuktamīkṣāpūrvakaṃ kartṛtvaṃ nimittakāraṇeṣveva kulālādiṣu loke dṛṣṭaṃ nopādāneṣvityādi,
GSP33brssgo1u:11207: FN: kartāraṃ kriyāśaktimantam, īśaṃ niyantāram, puruṣaṃ pratyañcam, brahma pūrṇam, yoniṃ prakṛtim /
GSP33brssgo1u:11208: he indra, te tava niṣade upaveśanāya yoniḥ sthānaṃ mayā akāri kṛtam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11216: nanvanupādāne 'pi strīyonau yoniśabdo dṛṣṭa ityata āha-strīyoneriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11218: yoniśabdasya sthānamapyartho bhavati so 'tra bhūtayonyādiśabdairna grāhyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11220: he indra, te tava niṣade upaveśanāya yoniḥ, sthānaṃ mayā akāri kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11222: nanvanumānasya śrutyanapekṣatvānna tayā bādha ityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11224: yā kṛtiḥ sā śarīrajanyeti vyāptivirodhena nityakṛtimato 'numānāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11225: ataḥ śrautamīśvaraṃ pakṣīkṛtyānupādānatvasādhane bhavatyevopajīvyayā prakṛtitvabodhakaśrutyā bādha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11228: ata ubhayarūpaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamiti siddhām //27//
GSP33brssgo1u:11235: ityārabhya pradhānakāraṇavādaḥ sūtraireva punaḥ punarāśaṅkya nirākṛtaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11236: tasya hi pakṣasyopodbalakāni kānicilliṅgābhāsāni vedānteṣvāpātena mandamatīnpratibhāntīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11242: ataḥ pradhānamallanibarhaṇanyāyenātidiśati- etena pradhānakāraṇavādapratiṣedhanyāyakalāpena sarve 'ṇvādikāraṇavādā api pratiṣiddhatayā vyākhyātā veditavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11250: tathā hi chāndogye jagatkāraṇatvajñāpanārthaṃ pitā putramuvāca,
GSP33brssgo1u:11253: punaḥ pitrā kimatra paśyasītyukte na kiñcana bhagava ityāha /
GSP33brssgo1u:11258: atrāṇvādivādāḥ śrautā na veti saṃśaye satyasadaṇvādiśabdabalācchrautā iti prāpte 'tidiśati-eteneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11264: tasminnaiva sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti siddham //28//
GSP33brssgo1u:11267: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 4 //
GSP33brssgo1u:11269: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya yaturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
